“Siyavota awukho namnye unyaka ekuthwa zange savota. Abantwana bethu bawela indlela exakeke kakhulu ukuya eMdantsane esikolweni bebancinci benjalo kuba izikolo asinazo kule yethu indawo. Thina sizibona silibalekile, kudala sithetha naye uceba wethu uNomonde Moyikwa esithembisa, entsha ngoku into uyasibaleka. Nooceba abangaphambili kuye babeyazi le ngxaki kodwa zange sancedakala.” 
Abahlali bakhalela nobundlobongela obuphezulu kule ndawo nalapho bathi maninzi amaxhoba odlwengulo, ingakumbi amaxhegwazana.  
Owaxhaxhelwa umakhulu wakhe uSandi Fayo, uthi waxhaxhwa wagqitywa  umakhulu wakhe, engade afike amapolisa.  
Uthi azingeni iiveni zamapolisa sele kubulawa umntu okanye ephangwa, awezi aphelela ngaphezulu. Kwaye nee-ambulensi azingeni sibathwala ngeekiliva abantu bethu ukukhawulela zona endleleni. 
Le ndawo iphantsi koWadi 3, phantsi kolawulo lukaNomonde Moyikwa, kwaye oyaziyo le ngxaki yaseCuba.
title: ‘Sizithwala emagxeni iibhokisi zomngcwabo’

text:
Nangona sele kuyiminyaka engaphaya kwamashumi amabini sazizuzela idemokhrasi, sisamana ukothuka zizinto zayo, ingakumbi thina bengubo.  
Abantu benza ukuzithandela, bathetha unothanda, nje ukuba oko akunyatheli malungelo omnye umntu achazwe kuMgaqo-siseko.  
Ukuba uthi ibomvu ndibe ndisithi imnyama, lilungelo lakho ukuyibona ngolo hlobo, ngokunjalo nakum. Kukho nabathi abakayiva nangevumba leyo nkululeko kuliliselwa ngayo. 
Akukho nto singayifundiswanga ekukhuleni, enokuba kungokuyiyalelwa okanye kungokuyibona isenziwa na. Ukususela kwindlela yokuthetha ukuya kwizenzo ngokubanzi. Namhla akukho sohlwayo ngokungahlali kwezo mfundiso kuba idemokhrasi isikhululela ngolo hlobo. Ngelungelo analo umntu wenza akwenzayo ngexesha afuna ngalo. Kuthiwa suzixakekisa ngomntu ohamba indlela yakhe engenanto yakwenza nawe. 
Okwakaloku nje ke ndisuswa ngumcimbi wokungahlonitshwa komzimba ngamabhinqa namadoda, akucingelwana kuyatyhatshazwana.  
Kumaziko nakwiinkampani ezineethoyilethi zoluntu ndiphawule ukuba abacoci ababhinqileyo bayangena kwezamadoda, andazi amadoda kwezamabhinqa kuba oko ndadibana nale nto kuthiwa yithoyilethi andizange ndangena kweyamabhinqa.  
Ukungena nebhinqa ethoyilethi ndiyindoda kuntama umkhuba, ingakumbi kule mihla yokunqaba kwembeko. Ndiyayiva nale yamadoda afuna ukuvunyelwa asebenzise ezamabhinqa, kwanamabhinqa afuna ezamadoda kuba esithi azibona ilelona cala lawo elo.  
Mna mntu ungenankcubeko yathoyilethi andikhathali nokuba bangena phi na, ndakulinda phandle ndizingenele ndakubona kufanelekile. 
Siyaxakaniseka ke ziinkqubo ezinjalo. Kuthi bakhulele ezilalini, ukuba ubona ibhinqa uphisiwe, uyalinda lidlule, wandule ke ukuzithuma. Uyawabalekisa amehlo akho xa uthe ngebhaqa wagagana nowesinye isini eme kakubi, ungabi naye noqhwanya ngakwicala akulo, akukhathaliseki nokuba akakuboni na yena.  
Abedemokhrasi ke abantu abakonqeni ukusolwa nokuphanyaka, bathi akukho nto isolayo nanto iphanyazayo. Nam nditsho ke kambe, ukuba ibikhona ngesele satyhaphakayo yimisintsila egcadwa ngelanga ngabaniniyo kwizinxibo zanamhlanje, kowesiduna nakowesikhomokazi. Abantu banamhlanje ‘banotshalilanga’ okwenkomo. 
Ukuzibandakanya nemisadulo yoqhankqalazo ndakugqibela ngelixa kwakusele kumbovu sibambe unyulo lokuqala olukhululekileyo nolungena mkhethe ngokobuhlanga. Sele ndibone okuninzi kubantu bemisadulo ngokusingise kulo mcimbi ‘wesanyu’ kungagidwanga. Akonqeni umqhankqalazi ukubeka ibhulukhwe emanqineni aduntsulele umfoti aziyo ukuba uza kuyigcwalisa ihlabathi leyo foto! 
Ndake ndazibhaqa ndiyintlekisa ngaminazana ithile, mhla ndazama ukukhwexa ibhulukwe yomfana owayesihla eteksini endandikuyo, esizele ngamaduntsu egobile ukusinga emnyango.  
Ndandiba ke mna iyawa qha akayiva umniniyo, nanjengoko wayenayo nendawana yomqhelo, ndaleqeka ndimnyusa leyo bhulukhwe.  
Ndandicingela ukuphanyazwa kwabantu linxila ke mna, kanti kuloko ndizenza ilifa lentsini kwakubantu ebendiba ndinceda bona. Abantu bathi nqa ukuba ngumntu osavelaphi na lo ungalwaziyo olo hlobo lokunxiba. Kanti ke kwakukudala ndiyibona kwiindladiya zamakhwenkwe le nto kuthiwa kukutebhisa.  
Kwendiwaziyo bekuvela nokuba sisikhinda ngaphantsi, le yomsintsila obethiswa ngomoya esidlangalaleni ndandiyizibula. Yayisiwa leya ibhulukhwe!  
Ndafane ndazicelela uxolo ebantwini nakumfana ngokugxobeleka ezintweni ezikude nam, ndiziva ndiphoxekile ke noko. Nasemabhinqeni sele ndiyibone kaninzi leyo nto. Andisalungisi mntu ke ngoku, ndibayeka benjalo. 
Kulo mabonakude ndini ndike ndalama iimbarha zasebusuku ezinamabhinqa agweqa iintsika enxibe inkciyo engaphantsi nakweyomntwana.  
Amadoda endaweni yokuphuma abaleke ase akhuphe imali engamaphepha ayihlohle kuleyo nkciyo, amehlo ewakhuphe nezikhondo. 
Laka lathi ke iciko, uvula imbobo ngenjongo yokuziphozisa suka kungene isankqange sevumba neempukane, uthi uhesha impukane ube uvale impumlo ngelixa uxhamla ukuziphozisa. Inene, xa singekatyhaphaki ngoku asisenakuba satyhaphaka.  
Goba msenge iibhokhwe zikutye! 
Owenu kwisiXhosa, Nxuba
title: Hlamb’amehlo watyhaphaka!

text:
phantse bonke abantu abalandela ibhola ekhatywayo bebevumelana ngeenguqu ezifunekayo kwiKaizer Chiefs emva kwesizini ephelileyo eshiye uninzi lunxubile.  
Kodwa okothusayo kukuba ithe iChiefs yakube ithathe isigqibo sokukhulula amashumi amabini onke abadlali, zabetha-bethana izimvo ngabona badlali ebekufanel’uba bakhululwe. Amakhosi avale isizini kwindawo yesihlanu emva kokubethwa yiChippa United kumdlalo wokugqibela kwisizini ka’2015/16.  
Abaphathi beChiefs nomqeqeshi baxakekile kungokunje, bakhangela abadlali abatsha ukuze babuyisele isidima seChiefs emva kokuvala isizini ingafumenanga nenye indebe. Abanye babadlali abaphambili abakhululweyo yiChiefs baquka uMorgan Gourld, uSiyanda Xaba noSiboniso Gaxa.  
Umhlalutyi weli phephandaba, uSinesipho Mali, ulincomile inyathelo elithathwe yiChiefs. “Sisigqibo esikhulu kakhulu esi sithathwe yiChiefs. Ndiyasincoma ngoba ngoku uSteve Komphela uzakuthi afumane ithuba lokwakha elakhe iqela, futhi kuphele nento yokoyanyaniswa noStuart Baxter. 
 Kubalulekile umqeqeshi afumane abadlali abazakudlala ngale ndlela afuna ngayo. Kunzima ukubagxeka ngokukhulula abadlali abathile ngoba baqwalasele izinto ezithile phambi kokuba bathathe isigqibo.  
Khumbula thina kukho izinto esingaziboniyo, kanti bona bahlala nabo yonke imihla – indlela abazimisele ngayo bayazi ngcono,” utshilo uMali izolo. Amakhosi azise uSibusiso Khumalo njengomdlali wokuqala amtyikityileyo.  
Usuka kwiSuperSport United ethathe uKeagan Ritchie. Kwinyanga ephelileyo iChiefs yakhulula uReneilwe Letsholonyane noReyaad Pieterse. UYeye sele ethathwe yiSuperSport – lo gama uPieterse umcimbi wakhe ungekacaci.  
Nanga amagama wabadlali abayishiyayo iChiefs:  
Morgan Gould, Siboniso Gaxa, Reneilwe Letsholonyane, Reyaad Pieterse, Philani Cele, Ovidy Karuru, Levy Mokgothu, Simphiwe Mtsweni, Shandukani Mulovhedzi, Chris Matombo, Zitha Macheke, Siyanda Xulu, Bongani Ndulula, Edward Manqele, Siphelele Mthembu, Sula Matovu no-Ivan Bukenya.
title: Umhlalutyi uyasixhasa isigqibo seChiefs

text:
UKapteni weMamelodi Sundowns, uHlompho Kekana, unethemba lokuba iqela lakhe liza kuqhuba kakuhle xa lidibana neKaizer Chiefs emalanga namhlanje. Iintshatsheli zePSL ezikhuselayo ziza kuxikixana neChiefs kowona mdlalo ojongwe ngamehlo abomvu ngabalandeli bebhola ekhatywayo kuba iziphumo zawo zinokutyhila indlela yeqela eliza kuphakamisa indebe ekupheleni kwesizini. AmaSandawana anethuba elihle lokuqokelela iindebe ezintathu kule sizini – kodwa kufuneka abethe Amakhosi ahleli phezulu kwiPSL ukuze yenzeke lo nto. Amakhwenkwe kaPitso Mosimane akaqhubanga kakuhle emidlalweni eliqela – kodwa ukubetha kwawo iGolden Arrows ngorhatya lwangoMvulo kule veki kuwanike ithemba lokufumana iChiefs ephambili ngamanqaku amathathu qha. UKekana unethemba lokuba iqela lakhe liza kuphumelela kwaye uthi akukho mfuneko yokuba abantu baxhalabe. Sesiyazi imidlalo elolu hlobo kwaye siyiqonda ngokupheleleyo into esijongene nayo ngoba siliqela elingoyikiyo ukulwela into eliyifunayo. Siqhelene nezinto ezinje,” utshilo uKekana. 
“Sikuqonda ngokupheleleyo ukubaluleka kokujongana nomdlalo ngamnye ngexesha. Ngoku kufike ixesha lokuba sijongane neChiefs. Kunyanzelekile siwenze umsebenzi ukuze sikwazi ukuphumelela umdlalo. Ndicinga ukuba ufike siwulungele umdlalo emva kokubetha iGolden Arrows kutshanje. Ndiyakholwa ukuba sinalo ithuba lokuqhuba kakuhle,” utshilo uKekana kwikhasi lomnatha leSundowns. Emva kokungaphumeleli imidlalo emine phambi kokudibana ne-Arrows, ngoku iSundowns kunyanzelekile iyiphumelele yonke elandelayo ukuba ifuna ukuyikhusela indebe yayo. Ukudlala neChiefs elwela ukuhlala kwindawo yokuqala ngeke ibe yinto elula kwiSundowns. Kodwa nangona kunjalo, ingazifumana iziphumo ezincumisayo emdlalweni wanamhlanje ngoba iChiefs iyagqwidiza nayo futhi iza kudlala ngaphandle kweziqwayi zayo ezifana noSamir Nurkovic noLeonardo Castro owonzakeleyo.
title: UHlompho Kekana uthi iSundowns iqhelene nemidlalo emikhulu

text:
Xa siphuma kule yeSilimela sijonga kweyeKhala bendingathanda ukugxila kumba womqulu wenkululeko owaqingqwa kwingqungquthela yabantu eKliptown ngomhla we-26 kule yeSilimela koka-1955.  
 Xa sithetha ngalo mqulu siyathanda ukuziqhatha ngelicinga ukuba wonke umntu uyazi ukuba sithetha ngantoni. Ewe, igama le “Freedom Charter” liyaziwa kodwa ingaba na nyani sisakhumbula ukuba kwakufunwa ntoni ngoko? Kwaye ingaba ezo zinto zifezekile? Makhe sithi gqaba gqaba, sikrobe ukuba siqhube njani: 
1. Abantu bayakulawula? Ewe, kulawula urhulumente okhethwe sisininzi ngoku. 
2. Iintlanga zonke  ziyakuba namalungelo alinganayo? Ngokomgaqo-siseko injalo. 
3. Ubutyebi belizwe buyakwehlulwa phakathi kwabemi bonke? Ayikenzeki. Kwaye singasebenzisa miqathango mni ukuqikelela ukuba ubani ufumana obungakanani ubutyebi? Ingaba obu butyebi bezwe bufunyanwa ngokuba umntu afumane umsebenzi kuqala? 
4. Umhlaba uyakwabiwa phakathi kwabo bawulimayo? Ayikenzeki. Phofu kwa umcimbi wokulima yinto ekungathi siyityhafele. Umhlaba sinawo, ingakumbi kumaphondo afana neMpuma Koloni. Siwenzani? 
5. Bonke abantu bayakuphathwa ngokulinganayo emthethweni? Ingathi umthetho usebenzela abanemali okwangoku. Ingaba iinkundla zesiNtu zona ziyinikwa nini ingqwalasela? 
6. Onke amalungelo ayakunikwa bonke abantu? Injalo, sinawo amalungelo. 
7. Umsebenzi uyakwanela bonke abantu, bonke abantu abasayi koyika ingomso? Ayikafezeki ke le, ingakumbi kulutsha. 
8. Ingcango zemfundo nempucuko ziya kuvulelwa wonke umntu? Sicela imfundo esimahla jikelele; nakwiiyunivesithi. 
9. Kuyakubakho izindlu, ukonwaba nokwanela? Inde le ndlela kodwa ingathi siya ngakhona. 
10. Kuyakubakho inzolo nemvisiswano? Siyazama. 
Enye yezinto ekufuneka yenzekile yeyokuba ooNkululeko nooNonkululeko, aba sithi bakhululekile, kufuneka badibane babhale umqulu wabantu abakhululekileyo – sifuna ntoni njengokuba sikhululekile?
title: Umqulu wenkululeko

text:
Umongameli weli uJacob Zuma uqinisekise ukuba uzakungcwatywa ngokwaseburhulumente uMfundisi Makhenkesi Arnold Stofile.U Stofile ubhubhe ngo Mvulo waleveki emva kwengulo engephi esabambe isikhundla sokuzakuzela eli eJamani. Othethe egameni le ofisi kamongameli Bongani Ngqulunga uthi uZuma uyalele ukuba zindandele ezantsi iflegi kwizakhiwo zikarhulumente isithuba seveki. Ezi flegi zizakundandela ezantsi kude kungcwatywe uStofile ngo Lwesine weveki ezayo umhla wamashumi amabini anesihlanu kulenyanga. 
Ingxelo ithi kumiselwe ikomiti yabaphathiswa abaphuma kumasebe ahlukileyo ukuze baqalise ukwenza amalungiselelo omngcwabo ka Stofile.Urhulumente wephondo leMpuma Koloni kulindeleke ukuba adlale indima ephambili kwinkqubo yokulungiselela lomngcwabo. Lo ka Stofile ubhubhele eDikeni ngo Mvulo waleveki emva kwengulo engephi.Ubhubhe eminyaka ingamashumi asixhenxe anesibini.
title: Zindandela izantsi iflegi kwizakhiwo zikarhulumente

text:
Itshantliziyo lamalungelo abasebenzi uVusi Mahlangu uthi, useza kuqhubeka esilwela abasebenzi beYunivesithi iWalter Sisulu nangona ebebanjwe wavalelwa kwiveki ezimbini ezidlulileyo ngezityholo zokuphosisa nokulahlekisa ingalo yomthetho. 
UMahlangu ukutsho oku ngethuba ethetha nabasebenzi abalinganiselwa kumakhulu amathathu eFreedom Square eMthatha ngoLwesihlanu, kwimizuzwana nje ekhululwe yinkundla yamatyala ngebheyile yamakhulu amathandathu eerandi (R600). 
“Sizoliphumelela eli dabi, andizukurhoxa kuba ndiphuma ejele. Ukubanjwa kwam kundenze ndanamandla ndakhuthazeka nangakumbi, ndibulela inkxaso endiyifumeneyo kubasebenzi. Lo nto ibonakalise ukuba eli dabi alikho ngam kodwa ngabasebenzi bonke,” utshilo uMahlangu, ongumfundi e-Unisa. 
Umemelele abasebenzi bezinye iiyunivesithi ukuba bangenelele balwele amalungelo abo. Bebonke abasebenzi abebezonika inkxaso enkundleni balinganiselwa kumakhulu amathathu. 
Umbuso awukhange ukuchase ukunikwa kwebheyile uMahlangu. Igqwetha lakhe uBayethe Maswazi lithi, isamangalisa into yokubanjwa kwakhe ngamapolisa emveni kokuxhwilwa. 
Ukwathi okwangoku akanawutsho umbuso unetyala eliluqilima ngakumrhanelwa. 
UVuyo Mtonintshi wephulo #OutsourcingMustFall eWSU, uthi ababuyi ngamva kwaye abasebenzi abanangxaki nakugxothwa, kodwa elidabi bazoliphumelela. Inkundla ilimisele umhla weshumi elinanye kweyeKhala kulo nyaka ityala.
title: UMahlangu uthi akajiki

text:
Yinkosikazi enamashumi amathathu ubudala yelokishi yaseMotherwell eBhayi ethe yadlwengulwa yindoda ebidibene nayo kuFacebook ngosuku lwabathandanayo iValentines Day.  
Isithethi samapolisa uKapteni Andre Beetge uthi: “Ixhoba lidlwengulwe ngolu suku (Valentines Day) emva kwentsimbi yethoba kusasa, lidlwengulwa yindoda athe wayamkela kuFacebook akugqiba wabanobuhlobo nayo. Emva koko indoda iyalele ixhoba ekubeni kudityanwe kwa-N.U. 29 eMotherwell.” 
 “Indoda ixelele ixhoba ukuba ngumalume wayo ozakuza azo kulilanda kuba yena usaxakekile kodwa ngokwenene yabe iluqobo lwale ndoda kaFacebook. Le ndoda iyalele ixhoba ekubeni bangene ehlathini sele ivule isikhali, yakugqiba yalidlwengula,” utshilo uBeetge.  
Umrhanelwa ubanjiwe kwaye uza kuvela kwinkundla yamatyala eMotherwell kungekudala.  
UBeegte uyale abasetyhini esithi mabahlale beqaphele, bazilumkele iitshomi ezirhanelekayo kuFacebook.  
Kunyaka ophelileyo, kwabanjwa indoda yaseLibode emva kokuba imeme intombazana kuFacebook apho yazitshintsha ubuso yafaka obendoda ejongekayo kuba itsala amaxhoba.  
Le ndoda nayo yathi kwixhoba iza kuthumela umntu ayoyilanda kuba ixakeke emsebenzini kanti yiyo buqu, yakugqiba yalidlwengula ixhoba.
title: Uqhathwe kuFacebook, wadlwengulwa ngeValentines Day

text:
‘NDINOMKHUHLANE, andikhumbuli, ndiyilibele, andazi.’ 
La ngamanye amagama avele ngethuba obesakuba nguMongameli uJacob Zuma evele phambi kweKomishini yokuphanda ukubanjwa ngobhongwana kombuso (State Capture). 
Le veki ibekelwe bucala ukuva icala likaZuma nanjengoko abantu abaliqela abasele bevele kule komishini bethe bachaphazela igama lakhe. 
“Okokuqala sihlalo (Jaji Raymond Zondo), ndinomkhuhlane.” Leyo yimvulamazwi yobesakuba nguMongameli uJacob Zuma kwiKomishini yokuqwalasela ukubanjwa ngobhongwana kombuso (State Capture). 
Kwimibuzo ayihlatywe ngosuku lokuqala lwale komishini, uZuma uvakalise izihlandlo ukuba akaqondi ukuba le komishini isekezelwe enyanini. “Le komishini yasekwa nguMkhuseli woLuntu (uThuli Madonsela) ukuze kufunyanwe into ngam. Wayengenayo nemali (uMadonsela), kodwa kwagxajagxajiswa ukuze isekwe.” 
Malunga nobudlelwane bakhe nosapho lakwaGupta, uZuma uthe: “Zange ndophula mthetho nobuhlobo bam nabakwaGupta. AbakwaGupta ngoosomashishini abangoompondo-zihlanjiwe.” 
“Ndihlala ndizibuza ukuba kutheni abantu bengabuqondi ubuhlobo bam nosapho lakwaGupta, kodwa abanye ooMongameli abafana noqabane uThabo Mbeki bebenobuhlobo nabakwaGupta,” utshilo uZuma. 
Ukwadize ukuba ufumene izigrogriso ngosuku lwakhe lokuqala ukuvela phambi kwale komishini. 
Ethetha nabalandeli bakhe ngoMvulo, abebequka uSupra Mahumapelo, Des Van Rooyen noMzwandile Masina, uZuma uthe: “Ndifuna ukunibulela ngokundixhasa, ningandiyekeli ndonekwe emoyeni ngolu hlobo.” 
Ekungazini nokuba ebebhekisa kubani, uZuma ukwavakele ethetha ngombandela wamayelenqe wokumdlisa. “Kukho iintshaba ezibulala ngedliso, hayi ngompu. Ndisinde kumayelenqe okundibulala ngedliso.” 
Xa sele egqibile ukuphengululwa ngemibuzo, uZuma uvakalise ukuba unomphako kubalandeli bakhe, esithi uza kuhlahla indlela ebhenca okuninzi akholelwa ukuba yiminyaka kuphehlwa. 
“Abantu bandinyhokonyhe kakhulu iminyaka engaphaya kwama-20. Mayiphele lo nto.”
title: Zuma: ‘Ndinomkhuhlane, ndiyilibele, andikhumbuli’

text:
Kucace nakuthathatha okokuba iChippa United liqela elingalawulwa kakuhle. Zine iisizini esinde kuzo ngolambisa ngenxa yezigqibo zokugxothwa kwabaqeqeshi nguMnu. Siviwe Mpengesi. Akukhathaliseki nokuba isizini iyaqala okanye iyaphela, xa ecingile, ugxotha umqeqeshi qha. Ukungena nokuphuma kwabaqeqeshi kuchaphazela abadlali kakhulu kuphinde kungabikho uzinzo kwiqela lilonke. Ukudlala kweChippa United imidlalo yokuxabangela (PlayOffs) kumbonisile uMpengesi ukuba iqela lakhe liza kuthotyiselwa ukuba akenzi izinto ngendlela eyiyo. Nomxhasi omkhulu weqela lakhe, iNelson Mandela Bay Metro, uvakalise ukungonwabi kwakhe kukungabikho kozinzo watsho esithi ufuna kwenziwe izinto kakuhle, ngakumbi ngoku kukho uGavin Hunt – omnye wabaqeqeshi abaphambili ebholeni yaseMzantsi Afrika. 
UHunt ufike eGqeberha kwiveki ephelileyo emva kokuhamba kukaLehlohonolo Seema obeqeshelwe ukusindisa iqela ezembeni. “Kuyasivuyisa ukungathotyiselwa kweChippa. Sifuna ukwenza indawo yethu isigqubu sezemidlalo. Yiyo lo nto sizibona njengabanini bezabelo kwiChippa. Siyinika imali iChippa ngoba sifuna iqela lendawo yethu kwiPSL. Kukhulu kakhulu ke esikulindeleyo singabantu beliphondo. Abantu bayayithanda iChippa – kodwa ndithe mayiphathwe kakuhle phaya kuMpengesi,” utshilo usodolophi, uNqaba Bhanga. Ingaba ukufika kukaHunt sisiqalo sokuguquka kwezinto? Akukho bani waziyo – kodwa uHunt uwaphakamisile amaqela afana neMoroka Swallows, iSuperSport United neBidvest Wits eminyakeni eyagqithayo. 
Xa enokunikwa inkxaso epheleleyo nethuba, ungakhona umahluko. “Sithethile noMnu. Mpengesi ndambonisa nokubaluleka kokuqinisa iqela. Akukho nto endiza kuyithembisa – kodwa siza kulakha iqela abaza kuzingomba isifuba ngalo abantu bale ndawo,” utshilo uHunt, ethetha emva kokwaziswa kwakhe ebantwini kwiveki ephelileyo. UDaine Klake, odlalele amaqela afana neSuperSport United, iPirates neWits, kulindeleke abe lisekela likaHunt. Akuphelelanga apho ngoba kulindeleke kubekho nomphathi weqela omtsha okhethwe ngumqeqeshi omtsha. Akukacaci nokuba isizini entsha yeDStv iya kuqala na kwinyanga ezayo ngoba kusekho umbaweRoyal AM engayidlalanga imidlalo yokuxabangela kuba isithi kumele inyuselwe ngasentla.
title: Ingaguquka iChippa United phantsi kwesandla sikaGavin Hunt?

text:
Andinakuwabala amatyeli apho ndive okanye ndihlangene neengxoxo malunga nokufinyeza kwamabhinqa ekuthiwa kukhokelela ekudlwengulweni okanye ekuxhatshazweni kwawo ngamadoda ngokwezesondo.  
Andikade ndive sisombululo ke ukuthintela lo mkhuba. Abantu baphelela nje ekuthini mababanjwe ngumthetho abo baxhaphaza amabhinqa, izitshixo zentolongo ziphoswe elwandle. Iyandicubhula ke le yokuphoswa kwezitshixo zentolongo elwandle, kuba ngunongeke enzeke lowo; unotshe iimpundu zelawu!  
Abanye bathi makubuyiswe intambo, ndixakwe ke nayileyo ukuba isigwebo salo uza kube ebulala abanye ngokubaxhoma siza kuba yintoni na sona. Ndaza ndakuva zwindini! 
Kokwam ukuthabathisa, ezi ngxoxo azisingisi sisombululweni ngaphezu kokuzintwanisa kwabantu okukhuselwa nguMgaqo-siseko. Ndithi kukuzintwanisa ke kuba umntu ilungelo lakhe ulifuna nokuba sele limbeka ebugxwayibeni, okomntwana ezibizela iintshulube ngeelekese.  
Kwezi ngxoxo kuse kuthethwe ngamalungelo okunxiba ngohlobo athanda ngalo umntu, nje ukuba olo hlobo alugilani nomthetho okanye alunyhashi malungelo abanye. Linyanisile ke elo, kodwa elam lithi kumele kuxoxwa ngezinto eziphembelela udlwengulo.  
Ukuxoxa ngamalungelo endaweni yendlela yokuthintela udlwengulo kunqwa nokubhula umsi endaweni yomlilo; obunjani bona ubuhiba!  
Amalungelo luluhlu nje lwezinto ezifanele umntu ezibhalwe encwadini nezingena kuthintela dlwengulo. Amalungelo akalinqandi izuma elitsalwa kukufinyeza kwebhinqa; amabhinqa azunywa ekhona la malungelo.  
Amalungelo kule imeko anqwa nomalusi olalayo avuke umhlambi sele uqwengiwe ziingcuka, kodwa abe nelunda lokuthi ungumalusi. Umalusi olalayo! 
Maxa wambi uluntu luse lulande amangunda okuba kudala kwahanjwa ze, ingazumisi loo nto. Iintombi zazibetha ngamabele neempundu ngaphandle de zifikise, ze zakufikisa zogqume nangasemva kodwa amabele ahlale engaphandle.  
Kutheni ngoku zizunywa zakwenjenjalo? Ngumbuzo ongancedi nto nowaphelelwa lixesha lowo, kuba inkcubeko sele iguquke kakhulu.  
Nezimilo zabantu sele ziguquke kakhulu, kobhinqileyo nakoyindoda. Ukuba ungaphicotha ngokunyanisekileyo izizathu zokufinyeza kwamabhinqa asele ‘evuthwe ophulwa’ ungamangala, uziyeke ezi zobuqholo bengcuka zokubanga ilungelo lomfaneleko. Ibhinqa liyalazi inyiki lendoda nendoda iyalazi elebhinqa! 
Wonke umntu uyazi ukuba akufaka isandla emlilweni siza kutsha, kwaye loo nto ayinanto yakwenza nokutshisa komlilo kuba umlilo awutshisi nto koko ngumntu otshisa into ngawo.  
Akukho mntu ungaziyo ukuba kukho ntoni na phantsi kwezambatho, kobhinqileyo nakoyindoda.  
Kungani ke ngoko kunqabile ukuzunywa kwabarhuqisayo nangani kululwazi lukawonkewonke ukuba nayo banayo le nto izunywa ngamazuma? 
 Ndoke ndikuve zwindini!  
Ukuba uyazi ukuba isantya siyabulala, ubalekisela ntoni? Wakube ufe ngengozi yenqwelo-mafutha makukhalazelwe bani kukho inqwelo-mafutha nendlela nomqhubi nayo nayiphi na enye into edala ingozi yenqwelo-mafutha endleleni?  
Nge ngowufe ngengozi yenqwelo-mafutha na ukuba ubungakhange ube kwindawo enento yokwenza nenqwelo-mafutha? Vabaza phendula ndikuhlawule! 
AmaXhosa amisela kwantlandlolo ukuba umkhwenyana angambambi ngesandla umkhwekazi, nobawozala angambambi ngesandla umolokazana. Ayesenzani ke amaXhosa ngokumisela lowo mthetho xa ayengathinteli amathuba ombulo? Mna ndalikhuphela inkomo ilungelo lokumbamba owam umkhwekazi. Ingaba leyo nkomo yowuthintela na ke umkhuba ekwakunqandwa wona ngalo mthetho?  
Unotshe! Ndim ngokwam ozalusayo. Imo-ntlalo yoluntu iyaphicothwa ze ilungiselelwe njengoko kufanele. Ngabatheni aba banamhlanje abantu bangakufuniyo ukunyaniseka ngemo-ntlalo ebangqongileyo, bazilungisele ukuze baphile impilo ebafaneleyo?  
Nxibani izigqebhezana ke mabhinqa kuba lilungelo lenu elo. Kodwa yazini ukuba izijama-nkungwini zilindele ukuba nenjenjalo kanye.  
Xa bendinako ngendisithi fakani iingxeba ngambini!  
Goba msenge iibhokhwe zikutye!  
Owenu kwisiXhosa, Nxuba.
title: Isigqebhezana!

text:
Ixesha leziyunguma,  
Ixesha elimaxhaphetshu,  
Ixesha apho kumakhaya ngamakhaya kuyakube kuyimivuyo,  
nolonwabo nentlutha,  
Ixesha elibi kwiinkedama ezingenabani  
Kwanga kumakhaya onke kungafudumala,  
Konwatywe kubhiyozwe,  
Kufudumale kuvuywe,  
Umhla weKrisimesi umhla omkhulu,  
Umhla wezimungumenye namapoyoyo.  
Kwabo bazakuqhuba ezindleleni ,  
Baqhube ngenkathalo nonophelo, Kwabo bayakuyitya ngaphandle kwentsapho zabo,  
Ngenxa yemeko ezithile, nabo bayonwabele,  
Nabo bazakuzitika ngomabil’ebanda,  
Basele ngenkathalo bazilinganisele, Ze kunyaka ozayo sibonane kwakho, Siqale unyaka omtsha sisaphelele.  
Halala ! 
kwabo bakungena kunyaka ozayo bengoNobhonasi,  
Sithi huntshu nakwabo bakungena bengoNomgcana,  
Abo badudelwe nguJambase, Bangalahl’ ithemba le min’ iyeza nakubo.  
UThixo woxolo asombathise ngengubo yoxolo nothando,  
 sibuye sihlangane kunyaka ozayo,  
Kungekho onxaphela omnye, Krisimes’ emyoli, egcwele ulonwabo namathamsanqa.
title: Krisimesi Emyoli

text:
Ndinjenje kungenxa yentlupheko, 
Ndiliqhawe eliqhakazileyo neliziqhenyayo, 
Iqhawe eliziqhayisa ngobuqhawe nobugagu, 
Ndiqaqambile ndiqatshelwe nazingqondi, 
Ndiwuqinisil’umqolo kuba ndiliqolo kwamna, 
Ndagob’umnqonqo ndathozama, 
Ndiqamele ngobuqhijili bokuqaqambisa ikamva lam, 
Nditsho nangoku ndithi ndiliqhawe . 
Kwakungeyontando yam, 
Kungeyiyo nentando yabazali bam, 
Okhokho bam nabo abanagalelo, 
Nditsho nezinyanya azinasandla, 
Kwakuyintando kaMvelingqangi, 
Konke okwenzeka phantsi kwelanga, 
Kwenzeka ngentando yalowo wasidalayo, 
Ophila phantsi kwelanga akanatyala, 
Ityala malingathweswa mntu, 
Akukho namnye onokukugweba, 
“Kungako ndisithi umzingisi akanashwa.” 
Intlupheko ayinamnikazi, 
Ukuhlupheka kuyashiyana, 
Ezingqondweni zongantweni ulikhoba, 
Emehlweni engqondi ungungqondo-ngqondo, 
Entliziyweni yakho kugcwele inzondo nentiyo, 
Uzibuza imibuzo engaphendulekiyo, 
Mna ndingotheni, ndoneni kabani? 
Xa bekutheni? 
Yiwa uvuke uzivuthulule uthathise uyeke ukukhalaza, 
Nditsho ngomzimba ongenaxhala ndithi ndiliqhawe . 
Ukuhlupheka kunesigqezu, 
Intlupheko ikhatshwa ziimpazamo, 
Ungenil’entluphekweni wasola abazali bakho, 
Ukufa uhlupheka seyilityala lakho, 
Yilwa nentlupheko ungasoli abantu, 
Unamehlo okubona, unezandla zokubamba, 
Unengqondo yokucinga, unenyawo zokuhamba, 
Unendlebe nje unetyala, 
Mna nentlupheko namhlanje sizintshaba, 
Mna nentlupheko sakhula singamathe nolwimi, 
Namhlanje sizintlaba-zahlukane, 
Enkosi Mdali ngokundipha ingqondo yemveli, 
Akusenani noba wandibandezela eyesikolo, 
Ingqondo esebenza ngokugqibeleleyo nangokuqonda, 
Ndinga nakusasa ndingema phambi kwezihlwele ndithi, 
“Intluphekho yandenza ndaliqhawe” 
Andizigwagwisi nganto , 
Andisosikhakhamela, ndingesiso nesinhanha, 
Kodwa ingaphakathi lam liteketeke, 
Andinibangisi nto, ndingasoli kwanto, 
Ndiqhayisa ngobuqhawe nobuqaqawuli boMvelingqangi, 
Ndiqhayisa ngothando nenkxaso macal’onke, 
Andisebenzisanga buqhophololo, 
Ndingasebenzisanga zigalo, 
Ndisebenzise ubuchule nobuchwepheshe, 
Ndancediswa yintobeko nokuthembeka, 
Umonde nethemba zizikrweqe zakowethu, 
Kungako ndisithi ! 
Ekunyamezeleni ukhona umvuzo. 
Andinabango nantlupheko, 
Ndingenabango nabo nobutyebi, 
Ntonje ndibulela le ntlupheko ngokundishiya ndiqhakazile njengeqhaji, 
Umqhagi uyakhonya ekuzeni kusa, 
Kungakhony’umqhangi kusondel’ukukhanya, 
Kumfiliba kusisithoko sobumnyama 
Umqhagi kulo ndawo ukuyo awukulibali ukukhonya, 
Nawe ungamncami uThixo. 
Iinyembezi zezolo yincindi yobusi ngomso, 
Khala uzithulise, ulile uzithuthuzele, 
Uqokelele ubomi bakho, ubenze bubeyimbumba, 
Ungunozakuzaku wesiqu sakho, 
Ungumongameli womzimba nengqondo yakho, 
Ungumphathiswa wentliziyo yakho, 
Ubomi bobakho bulawule ngengqiqo hayi ngegqudu, 
Nditsho ndingenavalo nadyudyu, 
NdinguNodeliqabaka umbhali-sihobe, 
INTLUPHEKO YANDENZA NDALIQHAWE.
title: Intlupheko yandenza ndaliqhawe

text:
KAPA: Ivele phambi kweNkundla kaMantyi eKhayelitsha ngoLwesithathu umhla wamashumi amathathu kule nyanga inkosikazi ejamelene nezityholo zokudlulisa amafu umyeni wayo yaye igcinwe kwintolongo iPollsmoor. 
Kungokunje lizibuza imibuzo engaphendulekiyo usapho lakwaBheme eSite B eKhayelitsha kulandela isithwakumbe sokungcwatywa kwesizalwane salo ngaphandle kolwazi nemvume yalo, uThobela Bheme, onamashumi amahlanu anesine eminyaka ubudala.  
Umfi lo ungcwatywe ngoLwesihlanu umhla weshumi elinanye kule iphezulu, engcwatywa bucala ngamalungu eCawe yamangqina kaYehova. 
UNosisi Jevu, 58, uxelele intatheli ye-I’solezwe malunga nesi sihelegu. 
I’solezwe: Sithini isizekabani sokubhubha komntakwenu? 
Nosisi Jevu: Ngomhla weshumi kweyeNkanga kunyaka ophelileyo kufika inkosikazi kamfi uNothemba Bheme, indixelela malunga nokulahleka komyeni wayo ongumntakwethu nadize ukuba akabuyanga emsebenzini nanjengoko ebexelenga kwiziko lamajoni eEsteplaat njengompheki owayeqale ngeminyaka yoo1987. 
 Zindothusile ezi ngxelo kuba umntakwethu akazange angabuyi emsebenzini. Inkosikazi kabhuti wam yadiza ukuba akukho ndawo ingamkhangelanga kuyo, sele isuka nakumzi ogcina izidumbu ze yabuya nelize.  
Emva koko le nkosikazi yadiza ukuba umyeni wayo usenkazaneni makangakhangelwa, kulapho ndamphikisa khona malunga nale nkazana awayethetha ngayo kuba wohlukana nayo.  
Uphinde kwayena wasixelela ukuba abelungu bomyeni sele ebaxelele malunga nokulahleka kwakhe.  
Emva kweentsuku ezimbalwa, ibuyile le nkosikazi indixelela ukuba umntakwethu ukhona usemsebenzini yaye uza kuhlala khona.  
UNothemba udize ukuba baye badityaniswa ngabelungu ngelizama ukufuna ukuqonda unobangela wokuba le ndoda ingahlali kwikhaya layo neyadiza ukuba iyathwetyulwa  
kuvela unina wayo yaye iyaphaphazela, kulapho abelungu bathatha isigqibo sokuba bayigcine ngokokutsho kwenkosikazi yomntakwethu. 
I’solezwe: Wazi njani ukuba umntakwenu ubhubhile? 
Nosisi Jevu: Ixesha lonke kuthe kathi uNothemba uyasixokisela kuba mna ndeva ngomnye umfazi endibuza malunga nokuba bekutheni uThobela ukuze abhubhe, ndothuke, ndiyiphikise le nkosikazi.  
Ndimane ndiziva iingxelo zokuba ubhubhile ngenene ubhuti nto nje inkosikazi iyakhanyela. 
 Ndiphindile kwakhona ngomnye umhla ndadibana nala nkosikazi yayindixelela ngokubhubha kukaThobela. 
 Yandibamba ngengalo yandisa komnye umama olilungu eliphambili kumaNgqina kaYehova, ngenene ikungqinile ukuba ubhuti ungcwatywe ngomhla weshumi elinanye kule nyanga, umzimba wakhe awuzange uze endlini yakhe, waphuma kwikhaya lokugcina izidumbu wangqala emangcwabeni. 
 Nalapho inkonzo yakhe yokugqibela yayizinyaswe ngamaNgqina kaYehova nabantu basemsebenzini wakhe.  
Emva koko ndabikela izalamane zam ze savula ityala kwisikhululo samapolisa eSite B ukuze ibanjwe inkosikazi yakhe nebisele iza kugqiba unyaka itshate nenye indoda. 
Apha endlini kabhuti ibifika izokuthatha imali kuphela.  
Ixelele amapolisa ukuba yaqesha abantu babulale umntakwethu ngamashumi amabini amawaka eerandi. 
Umzimba wakhe wafunyanwa sele wonakele kunxweme laseStrandfontein.  
Kungokunje kukhala ibhungane kulo mzi kabhuti.  
Into esiyifunayo ngamathambo akhe ukuze siwagoduse ukusinga eTsomo, yaye umama usakhala kunanamhlanje ngendlela ubhuti abhubhe ngayo. 
UNosisi Jevu uthi emva kanye kosuku lomngcwabo kabhuti wakhe wafumana umnxeba othi ubhuti wakhe utshe wabhubha kwingozi eyehle eKimberly.  
Esitsho kananjalo ukuba inkosikazi kabhuti wayo yadiza ukuba iyile eKimberly ukuya kufanisa umzimba kuba bekushiyeke ingalo yodwa kumyeni wayo. 
 Olu sapho luthi le nkosikazi yasebenzisa unyana womyeni wayo ukumfumana kumzi wabangcwabi nanjengoko wayesele onakele ze kwenziwa uvavanyo lweDNA ukuze akwazi ukufumana isidumbu, phofu unyana wayengenalwazi malunga nokubhubha kukayise. 
“Kuvulwe ityala lokubulala kwizityholo ezijoliswe kwinkosikazi enamashumi amane eminyaka ubudala netyholwa ngokubulala,” utshilo uSajini uNoloyiso Rwexana isithethi samapolisa eNtshona Koloni.
title: Ungcwatywe ngaphandle kwemvume yosapho!

text:
INKULUMBUSO yaseMpuma Koloni uPhumulo Masualle, uza kukhe athi gu bucala kumsebenzi wakhe wokuxakeka ziimfuno zephondo nanjengoko ethabatha ikhefu leentsuku ezisixhenxe. 
Kule veki uMphathiswa woPhuhliso loLuntu kweli phondo, uGqirha Pumza Dyantyi, ufungiswe njengeBambela Nkulumbuso.  
UDyantyi, obefudula enguMphathiswa wezeMpilo, uza kubambela kwesi sikhundla de kube ngomhla wesixhenxe kule yeNkanga. 
Ngokwengxelo, uMasualle ebethe tsi gxada phesheya kweelwandle ngokwempangelo, ukusuka ekuqaleni kwale veki ukuza kuthi ga izolo (ngoLwesithathu). Ukusukela namhlanje (uLwesine), uMasualle uza kuthatha ikhefu ayokubuyela emsebenzini ngomhla wesixhenxe. 
UDyantyi ufungiswe yiNtloko yeeJaji yaseMpuma Koloni uMfanelo Mbenenge koondlunkulu bephondo eBhisho. 
UDyantyi ligqala lombutho iANC kwaye sele esuka kuba nguSodolophu kumasipala waseMbhashe ozinze eDutywa.  
Ngaphandle koko uDyantyi, owaqeqeshelwa ubugqirha eCuba kwiminyaka yoo1990, ukhe wachitha iminyaka engugqirha wabucala eDutywa.
title: UMasualle usahlaba ikhefu leveki

text:
Amaqela esizwe ombhoxo, AmaBhokobhoko neSpringbok Women, aseYurophu – apho alungiselela kudlala khona imidlalo yovavanyo. Iqela lesizwe lamanenekazi linikele umva ilizwe loMzantsi Afrika ukuzithemba kuphezulu nangona linethuba elide lingasadlali. Kulindeleke ukuba lidibane namazwe alushica emidlalweno yovavanyo afana neNgilane, iWales neFrance. Utyelelo loMzantsi Afrika kwizwekazi laseYurophu yinxalenye yamalungiselelo etumente yehlabathi eza kudlalelwa eNew Zealand kunyaka ozayo. Kulindeleke iSpringbok Women sidibane neFrance emdlalweni wokuqala eVannes ngosuku lwangoMgqibelo. Emva koko, siza kuntingela eNgilane – apho kulindeleke sidlale imidlalo yobuhlobo phambi kokuya komnye umdlalo obalulekileyo eTwickenham. 
Umqeqeshi weSpringbok Women, uStanley Raubenheimer, uxelele amajelo eendaba ukuba bacele kubekho utyelelo oluseYurophu ukuze bakwazi ukulungiselela ukudibana neFrance kwitumente yehlabathi eyingozi kakhulu. “Asikwazanga ukufumana ithuba lokudlala iminyaka emibini yonke ngenxa yezizathu ezahlukeneyo. Sibona kubaluleke kakhulu ukujonga inkqubela yeqela lethu njengokuba silungiselela itumente yehlabathi. Sifune ukuzivavanya kwiFrance ngoba ikwindawo yesithathu kumanqwanqwa ehlabathi,” utshilo uRaubenheimer. 
“Asifuni ukulinda kube ngunyaka ozayo ukuze sibone indlela edlala ngayo iFrance. Okunye okunika umdla kutyelelo lwethu eYurophu kukuba siza kudlala imidlalo eliqela eza kunceda kakhulu abadlali bethu. Akukho mahluko ungako phakathi kwethu neqela elifana neWales ngokomgangatho nangona idlale imidlalo eliqela xa ithelekiswa nelethu,” utshilo uRaubenheimer. ULusanda Dumke uthi akanalo tu uvalo. “Siyalibulela ithuba esilifumanayo lokudlala namaqela aseYurophu. Thina siliqela elisoloko lilangazelela ukudlala ngoba umbhoxo yinto esiyithandayo. Uxinizelelo lukwiFrance, hayi kuthi. Apha eqeleni kuxutywe abadlali abanava nabasebatsha. Lo nto yenza kube mnandi kakhulu enkampini. Singxamele ukufika eFrance senze umsebenzi,” utshilo uDumke.
title: Amanenekazi oMzantsi Afrika afumana uvavanyo kumaqela aseYurophu

text:
Liphinde lazenzela igama kwakhona iphephandaba I’solezwe lesiXhosa emva kokugqwesa kwiimbasa zamawonga obugcisa.  
Oku kulandela emva kokuba umfoti uMichael Pinyana ethe wabuya newonga lokuba ngumfoti ogqwesileyo kumsitho obubanjelwe eGoli weembasa zobugcisa bobuntatheli obusingathwe yiBusiness Arts SA kwakunye neNational Arts Festival (NAF).  
Ukuphumelela kukaPinyana kuza emva kwemifanekiso abeyithathe eRhini ngethuba lomnyhadala wezobugcisa obanjwa minyaka le.  
UPinyana uchulumance kakhulu yile mbasa. Uthi oku kuthetha lukhulu kuye kwaye kubonisa nokukhula kweli phephandaba. 
“Ndiyayivuyela le mpumelelo. Ngoku songeza elesine iwonga kwingxowa yethu kweli xeshana sinalo sipapasha. Oku kukwabonisa nakuluntu jikelele ukuba sele sinalo igalelo elikhulu kwakunye nefuthe,” utshilo uPinyana.  
“Nangona iphepha lilitsha impumelelo yona kwakunye nothando lolwimi lwesiXhosa lokubalisa amabali abantu. Oku kubonisa ukuba umyalezo wona uyafika eluntwini, yilo nto ndonwabe kangaka,” woleke ngelo uPinyana. 
UPinyana ngumfoti onamava osele eneminyaka eliqela kweli candelo. Usebenzile kumaphepha afana neCape Argus, Cape Times, Sunday Times kwaye sele efudula ukuba ngumhleli wemifanekiso kwiphepha laseBhayi iHerald.  
Usihlalo weIndependent Media uGqirha Iqbal Surve uqhwabele izandla iqela lakhe elithe laphumelela kula mawonga. “Amawonga afana nala asisiqinisekiso sokuba senza umsebenzi oncomekayo.”  
I’solezwe liphephandaba lesiXhosa eliqale ukupapasha kweyoKwindla kunyaka ophelileyo. Iimbasa esele zizuzwe leli phephandaba ziquka ezimbini zakwaVodacom, eyesebe lezobugcisa nenkcubeko kwaneli lakwaNAF.
title: I’solezwe liphinde lazuza imbasa

text:
UMongameli Jacob Zuma uthi bonke abagqatswa abasixhenxe abafolele isikhundla sobuMongameli kwiANC, banezakhono zokuthatha lo mbutho nelizwe bawuse kwelinye inqanaba. 
UZuma ebethetha ngenjikalanga yangoMgqibelo ngethuba evula ngokusesikweni inkomfa yeANC yamashumi amahlanu anesine ebanjelwe eNasrec eRhawutini. 
Ukuvulwa kwale nkomfa, kuthetha ukuba izithethe zenkomfa ezifana nokulungiselelwa komba wokonyulwa kwabagqatswa, zingathabatha inxaxheba. 
UZuma uthi uthethile nabagqatswa abafolele isikhundla sobuMongameli kwiANC, futhi uyabathemba bonke. 
“Nokuba konyulwa bani, bonke banezakhono zokukhokela ilizwe. Kokokuqala ndibona kukho abagqatswa abasixhenxe kwisikhundla sobuMongameli. Yonke le nto ibonakalisa ukuba inkqubo yedemokhrasi iyasebenza kwiANC. 
“Ndilindele nokuba konyulwa bani, ukuze ndimbize uMongameli wam. 
Masamkeleni iziphumo zenkomfa nokuba zinjani,” utshilo uZuma. 
UZuma uthi umgaqo-nkqubo weANC uthi nokuba sele ubumthanda kanjani umgqatswa wakho, kufuneka wamkele iziphumo zenkomfa, kuba “amasebe athethile”. 
Le nkomfa iqhubeka ngexesha apho umbutho wethu usezingxakini. UZuma uthi iziphumo zolonyulo loomasipala ngo-2016, zingumfuziselo wokuba uluntu alonwabanga yindlela “esiqhuba ngayo izinto”. 
Kodwa uZuma ukhuthaze abathunywa bale nkomfa ukuba bamanyane emva kwale nkomfa. 
“Masiphume kule nkomfa simanyene, kuba ubumbano lulo oluzakubangela ukuba sibenempumelelo,” utshilo uZuma. 
Abagqatswa abafolele isikhundla sobuMongameli kwiANC nguNkosazana Dlamini-Zuma, Cyril Ramaphosa, Lindiwe Sisulu, Zweli Mkhize, Baleka Mbethe, Mathews Phosa noJeff Radebe. 
Iziphumo zophumelele kwisikhundla sobuMongameli, nakwezinye izikhundla, zakubhengezwa ngokuhlwa kwangeCawe.
title: Zuma: Owonyuliweyo izakuba nguMongameli wam

text:
Imbaleki ephokeleyo eMzantsi Afrika kwicandelo lezembaleki, uStephen Mokoka, uphinde wenza adume ngazo ngethuba eqhumisela ngothuli inyambalala yeembaleki eKapa kwimpelaveki egqithileyo. UMokoka ubhale ngokutsha iincwadi zembali ngokuthi abe yintshatsheli yeCape Town Marathon – ethandwa kakhulu ziimbaleki zehlabathi – ityeli lesithathu. Olu gqatso olubanjwa rhoqo eKapa lohlulwahlulwa kaninzi ngokwemigama kuba kulungiselelwa iimbaleki ngokohlukana kwazo. Umgama woompondozihlanjiwe beembaleki ngulowo ungamashumi amane anesithandathu, kubekho owamshumi amane anesibini ukuya kwishumi leekhiomitha. UMokoka, 37, uye watshatshela kwakhona emva kokuba ebaleke ixesha eliziiyure ezimbini nemizuzu elithoba (2:09:54). 
Emva kwakhe kulandele uDerseh Kindie Kassie ngeeyure ezimbini ezineshumi elinanye lemizuzu (2:11:26) kwaze kwindawo yesithathu yanguDagnachew Adere Maru ngeeyure ezimbini naye (2:11:52). Emva kokuphuma phambili, uMokoka uvumile ukuba bekunzima. “Bekunzima kakhulu ukubaleka olu gqatso. Okuye kwandivuyisa kukuba ndikwazile ukugqiba iikhilomitha ezilishumi ndiphambili ngoba bekunzima kakhulu. Ndisokoliswe kakhulu liqhina laseDistric Six – kodwa ke bekumnandi,” utshilo uMokoka okwayintshatsheli ye-Olimpiki. Le mbaleki yaseMahikeng, kwiphondo laseMntla Ntshona, iye eKapa inomnqweno wokuphucula ixesha eyalenza kwilixa elidlulileyo. 
“Rhoqo xa ndisiza apha, ndisoloko ndifuna ukwenza ngcono kunangaphambili. Mhlawumbi ndiza kude ndizifumane iiyure ezimbini nemizuzwana,” utshilo uMokoka oyimbaleki yemigama emide. Kwicala lamanenekazi kuphumelele uMseret Dinke Meleka welizwe lase-Ethiopia. “Bekumnandi ukubaleka eKapa,” utshilo uMeleka. “Kuye kwanyanzeleka ukuba ndibaleke ndodwa ngoba bekungekho mntu ecaleni kwam. Akululanga ukubaleka wedwa. Kuye kube ngcono kakhulu xa ukhuphisana nezinye iimbaleki – kodwa ke ndibalekile ngendlela ebendicwangcise ngayo,” utshilo uMeleka obaleke iiyure ezimbini namashumi amabini anesine emizuzu (2:24:02). Emva kwakhe kulandele uTecla Kirongo noJudith Cherono baseKenya.
title: UStephen Mokoka uthi uyifumene evile intshinga yeCape Town Marathon!

text:
Ngomhla wamashumi amabini kule nyanga, iTLB Boxing Promotions iza nengxikela yetumente yamanqindi emva kwesithuba esingaphaya konyaka kuvaliwe. Phakathi kweembethimanqindi ekulindeleke zibuyele eqongeni lamanqindi nguXolisani “Nomeva” Ndongeni – owagqibela ukulwa ngo-2019, unyaka awabethwa ngawo yimbethimanqindi yaseGauteng, uPrince Dlomo. 
Le tumente eququzelelwa yinkampani yabathelekisi, iTLB Boxing Promotions, iza kubanjelwa kwidolophu yaseSecunda, eMpumalanga. UNomeva, owayekhe wayintshatsheli yeWBF lightweight, ngoku ufuna ukubuyisa isidima sakhe xa edibana noByson Gwayani waseMalawi emlweni oza kuba nemijikelo engaphaya kweshumi. 
“Ndiyakuvuyela ukubuyela eqongeni emva kokubethwa kakubi. Kuhle ngoba ndiyazazi ukuba ndiza kuphumelela. Yaba lilishwa nje into yokubethwa kwam nguDlomo. Ndiya kubulela ukuba yinxalenye yetumente ezayo,” utshilo uNomeva, ethetha neentatheli ekuqaleni kwale veki eGoli. Emva kokubethwa kwakhe, kwaye kwanyanzeleka anzule ngeengcinga uNomeva akhangele nomntu onokubuyisa ubunganga bakhe kwicandelo lamanqindi. Akekho omnye umntu othe qatha engqondweni yakhe ngaphandle kukaMnu. Mzamo “Chief” Njekanye – umqeqeshi ophum’izandla emanqindini eMpuma Koloni. 
“Emva kwala mlo, ndandihleli ndiza kubuyela kuChief. Ndihleli kakhulu eGoli. Noxa ndizazi izinto ezenziwa yimbethimanqindi – kodwa uChief ngumqeqeshi osemgangathweni ophezulu kwaye kulula ukusebenza naye. Ndingaya kuye eMonti okanye angeza kum eGoli. Kulula ukusebenzisana naye,” utshilo uNomeva wakwaBhaca – kodwa ongumhlali waseGoli. 
UNomeva akamazi uGwayani; nangona kunjalo – uthi uza kulwela ukuphumelela. “Ndimbonile kancinci; endikuqapheleyo kukuba noko akangomntu onokundisokolisa. Ndiza kulwela ukuphumelela umlo mna,” utshilo uNomeva. Enye imbethimanqindi eza kulwa nguNoxolo Makhanavu waseMonti.
title: UNomeva umfuna esiqwini uGwayani waseMalawi!

text:
Abalandeli be-Orlando Pirates bazizisulu zokuncithwa nokuhlaselwa ngoogxa babo ebholeni emva kokungaqhubi kakuhle kwezi sizini zidlulileyo. 
 I’solezwe lichube isikhwebu nomnye wabalandeli abayithanda kakhulu futhi onqwenela ukuba iPirates ingadlala ngcono kule isizini. 
Pedro Mapelo: Siyabulisa Mhlekazi, unjani namhlanje? 
Umlandeli: Molo Bhuti. Ndiphilile, unjani wena? 
PM: Nceda uzazise kubalandeli bebhola nabafundi beSolezwe ngokubanzi. 
Umlandeli: Mna ndinguMzukisi Tikita, ngokokuhlala ndilapha eMossel Bay – ndingumlandeli we-Orlando Pirates. 
PM: Siyabulela ngokuzazisa. Khawutsho, ngubani umdlali kwiBucs omthandayo? 
Mzukisi Tikita: Ha ha hanguThabo Qalinge. Eyona nto ndikholwa yiyo kuye yindlela ayidlala ngayo ibhola ekhatywayo. Kangongokuba ndivuya kakhulu njengokuba ebonakala kakhulu kwiPirates kule isizini. 
PM: Kuhle ke xa kunjalo. Ungathi sesiphi esona siganeko ongasoze usilibale ngePirates? 
MT: Ndaqala ukulandela iPirates phaya ngo-1997. Eyona nto endingathi iphuma phambili zezandebe zintathu sakhe saziphumelela kwisizini enye. Ngoko iPirates yayisaqeqeshwa nguRuud Krol. Ndikhumbula umdlalo wokugqibela wePSL siwudlala neGolden Arrows kwelinye icala nayo i-Ajax Cape Town esasilingana nayo idlala. Sakhululwa ligowuli elafakwa ngu-Isaac Chansa kuloo mdlalo, kunzima kakhulu. 
PM: Unqwenela kwenzeke ntoni kwiPirates kule sizini? 
MT: Ndingavuya ukuba umqeqeshi angasinceda ngokuphumelela indebe yeTelkom Knockout. Kungakuhle ukuba singaqhuba kakhulu nakwimidlalo yePSL ngokuba ndifuna sibuyele kwiCaf Champions League. Ndisakhala ke phaya esiswini, ingase bafumane nokuba ngu-Andile Jali ngemboleko ukuze kube ngcono.
title: UTikita ufuna iPirates ibuyele kwiChampions League

text:
USAVUTHA ngumsindo umsasazi owanikwa uphum’ aphele sisikhululo sasekuhlaleni iForte’ FM. 
UZuko Giyose wayengumsasazi kweli jelo likanomathotholo elizinze eDikeni, ukususela kunyaka ka2012 de yangunyaka ka2014 ukugxothwa kwakhe. 
UGiyose okwayinzalelwane yaseDikeni, usenesikhalo ngolawulo lwe-Forte fm phantsi kwesandla sikaNksk.Vuyelwa Mdazana. 
Exelela I’solezwe lesiXhosa, uGiyose utyhola ngelithi, “Eyona nto ibuhlungu ngeForte FM ayikhuli, uluntu lwaseDikeni alumelwanga kwesa sikhululo, akukho nxibelelwano.” 
UGiyose uqhubekeka ngokutyhola uMdazana ongumphathi-sikhululo ngelithi, uyazilawula kwaye amagunya kwesa sikhululo ngawakhe. 
“Awaziwa nokuba ngubani amalungu ebhodi kwesa sikhululo, uMam’Mdazane wenza ngohlobo afuna ngalo. 
“Xa eziva efuna ukuqasha uyaqasha, xa efuna ukugxotha uyakugxotha,” uthethe watsho lo msasazi. 
UGiyose ebefudula eqhuba inkqubo yasemin’emaqanda iCommunity Calendar eForte’ FM, kwaye uthi ukugxothwa kwakhe ngendlela engenalusini iseyinto ekunzima ukuyamkela. 
“Azange ndityityinjiselwe mnwe (warning) , zange ndisiwe kuviwo (hearing), ndaye ndanqunyanyiswa ze emva koko ndagxothwa.” 
“Ndanqunyanyiswa emva kokuqhwaba umsasazi owandibukula ngokwesini,” utsho uGiyose. 
Uthi emva kokugxothwa kwakhe, wakhangela iminyango enokumnceda. 
“Elinye ilungu lebhodi laliseKapa, elinye kuvakala ukuba liseRhawutini. Emva kokungaphumeleli ukuncedwa yibhodi yesikhululo, ndaya kwigosa lonxibelelwano kwiYunivesithi yaseFort Hare, uNksz. Zintle Filtane, owohlulakalayo naye kukundinceda, emva koko ndaya kuMnu. Mvuyo Tom oyinqununu yeziko eliya, naye wazisonga ezakhe izandla.” 
“Ngoobani abalawula iForte FM? Ngoobani amalungu ebhodi eForte’ (kuba thina zange sawabona ngeliso lenyama). 
Kutheni yona i-Eastern Cape Radio Forum iyeke iForte’ FM injeya?” uthethe watsho. 
“Xa ukhala kumphathi wesikhululo ubangumntu ogwenxa,” uvakalise watsho uGiyose. 
Uhlabela mganyana etyhola uNksk. Mdazana njengowabulala into ayithandayo ikukusasaza. 
“Ndizamile ukuthetha naye, wathembisa ukuba uzakundibuyisela kunomathotholo, ndalinda, emva kokuba ndibuyele kuye ndiyokuqonda ngesicelo sam, wathi usandul’ukuqesha abasasazi abatsha, ndabe ndiyancama.” 
“Ndancama ndayokusebenza esibhedlele kodwa iphupha lam ikukusasaza,” ukhalaze watsho uGiyose. 
UGiyose uthi usayenza imisebenzi wayefudula eyenza ngethuba engumsasazi weForte’ FM. 
“Ndisanceda uluntu nangoku. Ndandinceda abantu bafumane izazisi, ulwazi ngezinto yinto, nkqu nemisebenzi. Kwinkqubo yam ndandisebenzisana norhulumente, imibutho yasekuhlaleni kunye noogqirha bengqondo noonontlalontle,” utshilo. 
Eziphendulela kwezi zityholo, uMdazana uthi, nasiphina isikhululo sosasazo siqhutywa phantsi kwemiqathango yemigaqo-nkqubo yaso. 
“Esi sikhululo sisebenza ngemigaqo njengazo zonke izikhululo zikanomathotholo. 
UZuko (Giyose) wanikwa umsebenzi njengaye wonke umsasazi, kodwa akube ephule imiqathango, kwanyanzeleka ukuba akhutshelwe ngaphaya kwamasango. 
UMdazana uthi, lo msasazi wagxothwayo wayengenandlela yokuziphatha. 
“Wemka ethuke kwamntu apha ukuya kubaphathi beYunivesithi, kwaye iimbalelwano zakhe ezilapha ungazoyika,” utshilo. 
“Andiyazi nokuba unengxaki nam uZuko okanye unengxaki nesikhululo na. Waya kwiinkundla zezikhalazo (CCMA) kodwa zange aphumelele. Ufuna nje ukugqwalisa isikhululo ngokuthetha ubuxoki,” uqukumbele watsho. 
UGiyose uyavuma ukubiza abaphetheyo kwela ziko njenga “mamene mene” emva kokungamanyelwa kwesikhalazo sokugxothwa kwakhe. 
Uthi, uCCMA wamgqithisela kwiinkundla ezingaphambili zezimangalo, kodwa wohluleka ukwenza njalo ngenxa yemali.
title: Usenemibuzo exananazileyo owagxothwa yiForte’ FM!

text:
Kapa: Kutshiswe ooduladula ababini benkampani yakwaGolden Arrow kwingingqi yaseTown Two, eKhayelitsha kwaye kutyholwa abahlali abafuna ukusika iziza kumhlaba wabucala.  
Abahlali bathi bafuna ukubeka amatyotyombe abo kumhlaba okufutshane nenkundla kamantyi yaseKhayelitsha; mhlaba lowo ungoweKhayelitsha Community Trust (KCT) ulungiselelwe ukwakha izindlu ezizakuqashiswa kubantu abarhola imivuzo emincinci. 
Usomlomo wenkampani yakwaGolden Arrow uBronwen Dyke uthi, “emva kwesisiganeko sesibini sokutshiswa koduladula wethu siye sazinqumamisa inkonzo zethu kula lokishi ukuqinisekisa ukhuseleko lwabantu. Imeko siyijonge ngeliso elibukhali kuba siphoxekile kakhulu yile nto kuba sizama ngako konke ukusa iinkonzo zethu eluntwini nekulapho zifuneka khona, kodwa kufuneka sijongile nelahleko eyenzekayo ngenxa yeziganeko ezikumila kunje.” 
Omnye uduladula utshiswe ngenjikalanga yangeCawe, logama owesibini utshiswe ngenjikalanga yangoMvulo; nalapho kuye kwagityiselwa ngamatye udululadula wesixeko seKapa nekudizwa ukuba umqhubi uzisindise ngokuba aphume ame ngaphandle kwayo. Ngenxa yokuba aba duladula besixeko besoloko bebekwe esweni ngamagosa onyanzeliso-mthetho akhawuleze afuna uncedo emapoliseni yabe isinda ngolohlobo ukuba ingatshiswa. 
Kwezi zenzo zabahlali konakaliswe nesikhululo sikaloliwe saseKuyasa.  
Abahlali bengingqi ezahlukileyo eKhayelitsha basika iziza kumabala akufutshane kubo bengajonganga ukuba abekelwe ntoni na, babanga ngelithi badiniwe kukuhlawula imali yerenti apho bahlala khona.
title: Badudula ooduladula eKhayelitsha

text:
Ndingomnye wabaninzi abangazi zwe limbi ngaphandle kwelo bahlala kulo, ndingenawo nomnqweno ke kambe. Ingxoxo yam isoloko isithi kuninzi endingakwaziyo ngeli lizwe lam, ukufuna ukwazi elinye akusayi kuba bubulungisa ke ngoko. 
Entloko kule veki (ngeCawa), ndithathwe ndayophoswa kwelinye ilizwe nebendihlala ndisithi amanakanibe endinawo ngalo andanele.  
Ndifumanise ukuba ndisekude ukuba ndilazi, ndahlupheka nangakumbi kukuthi kanti ndisasilela kangaka nje ukulazi lingummelwana esingahlulwanga nalucingo. Ukungahlulwa nalucingo kuthetha ukuba asilizwe limbi koko yimida yobuyatha. 
ISebe lezeMfundo leMpuma Koloni, ngeprojekthi yalo yoLwimi lokuThetha ngeZandla loMzantsi Afrika, lisityhilele banzi ngelizwe lezithulu.  
Lisazise okuninzi ngolwimi nenkcubeko yezithulu kumsitho obubanjelwe eNU 15 eMdantsane, kusaziswa ngokusesikweni le projekthi. Abantu abazizithulu siphila nabo, nakwabo kungekho zithulu kumakwabo bahlala besiva ngobuthulu.  
Kodwa ngenxa yobuyatha, isizwe asikuthathelanga ngqalelo oku ithuba elide, de kwakho umsantsa omkhulu phakathi kwethu nabo ngokungathi bakwelinye ilizwe. Banolwimi lwabo nenkcubeko yabo, njengabo nabaphi na abantu abadibana ngolwimi nenkcubeko kweli lizwe. 
Urhulumente wedemokhrasi iimbedlenge neenkedama neziqhwala, nabantu abanezinye iziphako zomzimba, nezikhwasilima, ubanike indodla ukuze bafeze izidingo zabo ezizodwa.  
Izithulu, nangona nazo zilufumana uncedo lobukhwasilima, kodwa ezona nto zingundoqo ebomini bazo, ulwimi nenkcubeko, zibethwe ngoyaba.  
Ukushiya ngaphandle ezo nto zimbini emntwini kuthetha ukuba ushiye uqobo lwakhe. Umntu ngumntu ngolwimi nenkcubeko, ze alekelise ngenkolo. 
Ulwimi lokuthetha ngezandla, nekuphela kolwimi olusetyenziswa zizithulu, buninzi ubutyebi obumele kwaziwa sithi “bothethayo” kulo.  
Kolu lwimi into ibizwa ngobunjalo bayo nangegama layo, itoliki iqhiyaze ifune izihlonipho nangona zingekho kolu lwimi. Izinto esithi mna nawe zizithuko, kulwimi lokuthetha ngezandla zizibizo nezenzi, kungakhathaliseki nokuba kuphi na. 
 Ecaweni umfundisi osisithulu uthe ecacisa ngobudlavu bonyana wolahleko ekubuyeleni kwakhe kuyise, wazekelisa ngokurhama ukwenza umfanekiso-ngqondweni ngobumdaka bakhe, itoliki yona ikhethe ukuthetha ngokosula iimpundu; ndatsho ndathi “ihlangene!” EmaMpondomiseni siyakwahlula ukurhama nokwasula. 
Abacimeli xa bethandaza. Bathi ukungacimeli kwabo kukuba indawo yokungasebenzi kweendlebe ithathwe ngamehlo, ngako oko umthandazo bayawujonga abawumameli. Ndaza ndakuva zwindini! 
Lisebenzile iSebe lezeMfundo leMpuma Koloni ngokuza nale nkqubo. Lisivule amehlo ekuthe kanti sijongile nje asiboni, lisivule iindlebe ekuthe simamele nje kanti asiva, lisityhile ingqiqo ekuthe sinobuchopho nje kanti asinangqondo!  
Kunini ngoku ukuba makube kanti ulwimi lokuthetha ngezandla, nekuphela kolwimi oluthethwa ngabantu abazizithulu, asikalwenzi ulwimi olusemthethweni kweli lizwe?  
Ingaba oku sikwenzayo asikuko na oko kwenziwa ngabacinezeli bethu? Abacinezeli bethu basifuthanisele iminyaka engaphezu kwamashumi amane, thina mingaphi le sele sibafuthanisele yona abantu abalwimi likukuthetha ngezandla? 
Sivumelene noMphathiswa wezemfundo kweli leMpuma Koloni, oHloniphekileyo uMnu Makupula, ukuba isenzo sokuyekela ukucinezeleka kwabolwimi lokuthetha ngezandla sisenzo esingafanelwe kuxolelwa – ukuphilisa abantu kwilizwe elingekhoyo elizweni labo! Elowo kulo msitho umke engazilibali ubutyala anabo ngakubantu abazizithulu. Isilogeni sale nkqubo kaMphathiswa Makupula esithi “Ukudilizwa kothango lobulolo kwabangeva ngeendlebe,” nebenegalelo eliphambili iPanSALB (Mpuma Koloni) ekusakheni, sithetha lukhulu. Maludilizwe uthango lobulolo! 
Phantse zonke iindawo zoncedo lukarhulumente azinazitoliki zolwimi lokuthetha ngezandla, zimbini ntathu ezinazo.  
Izithulu kufuneka zixhomekeke kwinceba yabamelwane abalwaziyo ulwimi lwabo okanye baqeshe iitoliki ukufumana iinkonzo zasimahla. Ndaza ndakuva zwindini!  
Goba msenge iibhokhwe zikutye. 
Owenu kwisiXhosa, Nxuba.
title: Elingaziwayo ilizwe

text:
Umqeqeshi we-Orlando Pirates upopene, akayazi eyona nto makayenze – ngenxa yabadlali bakhe abangama-athalala phambi kweepali. Emva komdlalo we-Absa Premier Soccer League obuphakathi kwePirates neGolden Arrows ophelenga ntanganye ngo’0-0, uMilutin “Micho” Sredojevic uthe ukuphosa kwabadlali amathuba emidlalweni yeyona nto imbi angazange wayibona kwamanye amazwe aqeqeshe kuwo ngaphambili. USredojevic, 48, uneminyaka engaphaya kwamashumi amabini engumqeqeshi kwinqanaba eliphezulu kwibhola ekhatywayo kumazwe afana noMzantsi Afrika, Uganda, Ethiopia, Tanzania, Sudan, Rwanda neSerbia – ilizwe awazalelwa kulo nawaqala kulo ukuqeqesha. 
Le ndedeba igaleleke eMzantsi Afrika embindini wonyaka isuka e-Uganda; injongo ibikukunceda nokuguqula imeko yeBucs esokoleyo kwisizini yePSL ka-2016/17 – kodwa umsebenzi wakhe awululanga ngenxa yabadlali abangaziboniyo iipali. “Ndizama ukubethelela umkhwa wokufaka amagowuli ebadlalini ngokuthi bangazikhathazi ngamathuba abawaphosileyo xa ebesebaleni. Le yingxaki ebonakalayo jikelele elizweni. Bendifanelwe kukuphuma izimvi ngenxa yoxinizelelo – kodwa andinguye umntu onikezelayo,” utshilo uSredojevic emva kokubambana kweqela lakhe naBafana Bes’thende ngoLwesibini. 
USredojevic uyahlonitshwa ebholeni ngoba uthathwa njengomnye wabaqeqeshi abangoongqondo-ngqondo. Ukuzothi ga ngathi uzamile ukusitshintsha isimo seqela – kodwa eyona nto isilelayo ngoku yile yamagowuli ngoba indlela iqela elidlala ngayo ibhetele kakhulu kunaleyo yesizini egqithileyo. “Ingxaki ekhoyo apha yile yabadlali abazikhathaza kakhulu xa bephose amathuba. Siyazama ukuncedisana nabo ngoba asifuni lo nto ihlale ezingqondweni zabo. EMzantsi Afrika iyadlalwa ibhola. Ingxaki ilapha engqondweni qha. Zange ndayibona into nje, kudala ndijiekeleza ihlabathi,” utshilo uMicho. 
Emalanga ngeCawe, iPirates indwendwela iBloemfontein Celtic. Eyona nto enika umdlalo ngalo mdlalo kakhulu kukuba kuzakube kudibene abaqeqeshi abazanayo – uSredojevic noVeselin Jelusic owenza izinto ezibonakalayo kwiCeltic esinde ngolambisa ekuthotyisweleni kwisizini edlulileyo.
title: “Zange ndayibona into enje, kudalala ndilijikeleza ihlabathi!”

text:
AbeNkonzo yesiPolisa eMpuma Koloni baphisa ngemali ekumakhulu amabini amawaka eerandi (R200 000) kulowo unokuza nolwazi ngaphambili olunokukhokelela ekubanjweni komrhanelwa obandakanyeka ekubulaweni kukaNamhla Mtwa. 
UMtwa, 35, wafunyanwa egwintiwe ekhayeni lakhe eliseSidwadwa eMthatha ngentlwa yomhla wama21 kuTshazimpuzi 2022. 
Kutyholwa ukuba eli nenekazi ladutyulwa lwahlanz’ iselwa lungaphakathi kwinqwelo yalo ngumntu ongaziwayo ngethuba lifika ekhaya eSidwadwa. 
Lachanwa ziimbumbulu kumzimba ongasentla, laze lachazwa njengelingasekhoyo kwindawo leyo yeshwangusha. 
OnguMlomo emapoliseni kula mmandla, uBrigadier Tembinkosi Kinana, uthi uphando luyaqhutywa ukuze kube kubhaqwa umenzi wesi senzo. 
“Imali ekunikiswa ngayo yinxalenye yophando oluqhubayo, ngoko ke nawuphina umntu onokuza nolwazi olunokukhokelela ekubanjweni, utshutshiso oluyimpumelelo nasekugwetyweni komenzi owenza oku kuNamhla Mtwa, makeze ngaphambili,” kutsho uKinana. 
UKinana uthi kulowo unokwabelana nabo ngolu lwazi lubalulekileyo angaqhagamshelana noBrigadier Venetia Masingi kwa: 082 040 6751 okanye atsalele kwaCrime Stop kwinombolo engu: 08 600 10111. 
Lonke ulwazi oluza ngaphambili lwakuthathwa njengoluyimfihlo.
title: Isixa semali ngokubulawa kukaNamhla

text:
NAKULO nyaka njengakwiminyaka edlulileyo, iPAC isakhokelisa umbandela womhlaba, isithi isicwangciso sokusetyenzwa komhlaba sifanele ukuhamba ndawoninye nemfundo. 
Usihlalo wePAC eMpuma Koloni, uSandla Goqwana, uthi akukho ntshukumo yezoqoqosho enakuze ibonakale xa uninzi lwabantu baseAfrika, abantu abamnyama, besaxuthwe umhlaba. 
“Akukho nto sinakuze siyenze singenalo ulawulo lomhlaba. Umhlaba mawusenzele imali, kodwa ukuze kwenzeke oko kufuneka isicwangciso esicacileyo. Isicwangciso esiphambili yimfundo eluntwini ukuze abantu babenezakhono. Xa uza kuphatha umhlaba, kufuneka ubenezakhono ingakumbi ezo zeenjineli,” utshilo uGoqwana. 
“Yonke into esinakuthi siyenze njengorhulumente woMzantsi Afrika isekezelwe kulawulo lwethu kuqoqosho lweli lizwe. Iintsika zemveliso kwezoqoqosho zintathu: ngumhlaba, ngabasebenzi kwanenkunzi (imali yokuqala nokuqhuba ushishino),” kutsho uGoqwana. 
Kwimpelaveki esiyishiya ngasemva, iPAC iphehlelele ngokusesikweni umqulu wayo wezithembiso eMonti, apho ibidakanca izicwangciso zayo nanjengoko ifinyeziwe imihla phambi konyulo lwenyanga ezayo. 
UGoqwana uthi into ephambili kwiPAC kukubuyiselwa komhlaba eluntwini. 
“Kwantlandlolo sasiqhuba idabi lokubuyiswa komhlaba usiya kuluntu lwaseAfrika ukuze lwenze iintshukumo zalo zoqoqosho. Nangoku sisaqhuba nelo dabi. Umhlaba mawubuyiselwe kubanikazi bawo amaAfrika.” 
UGoqwana ubalule iSajonisi esithi yenye yeendawo ekufanele kugxilwe kuzo kuphuhliso loqoqosho lwaseMpuma Koloni. 
Kumbuzo wokuba ithini na iPAC kumbandela womhlaba osele wenziwe undabamlonyeni ngamanye amaqela ezopolitiko, uGoqwana uthe: “Masibaqhwabele izandla. Asikhathazeki nakancinane. Le nto ithetha ukuba umyalezo ekudala siwuqhuba ude wavakala nakwamanye amaqela ezopolitiko.” 
“Babesithi iPAC ifanele ukunikwa ikiriva ukuba ifuna umhlaba, xa ke beyibonile inyani – masibaqhwabele izandla. SiyiPAC sithi lo mhlaba woxuthwa ngokuphalala kwegazi lamaAfrika, ngoko ke sithi makuthathwe wonke umhlaba.”
title: PAC: Umhlaba ebantwini kuqala

text:
Eziphuma eNaturena iindaba namhlanje zithi iKaizer Chiefs ityikitye umdlali omtsha. Igama lale ndedeba nguDumsane Zuma – obekade edlalela iBloemfontein Celtic kwisizini egqithileyo. UZuma utyikitye isivumelwano sengqesho seminyaka emithathu kwiChiefs. “Sinovuyo lokwazisa umdlali-siswini obekade edlalela iBloemfontein Celtic, uDumsani Zuma, ukuba ngumdlali wethu,” itshilo ingxelo ekutshwe yiChiefs kwikhasi layo lonxibelelwano uTwitter namhlanje. 
Amakhosi asakhangela ifolosi ezakuncedisana noGustavo Paez okubonakala ngathi ngoyena ongawanceda kwicala lamagowuli kwisizini entsha. Kungokunje abaqeqeshi baphonononga ifolosi yase-Argentina egama linguJonathan Philippe enkampini. Kulindeleke kuthathwe isigqibo ngaye phambi kokuphela kwale veki. Amakhosi atyikitye abadlali abambalwa abaquka uBhongolwethu Jayiya obedlalela iCape Town City kwisizini ka-2016/17.
title: Amakhosi atyikitye umdlali weBloemfontein Celtic

text:
“Ezi zikhumbuzo zeenyhikityha azithethi ukuba asenzi nto ukulandelela izinto ezi zazisilwelwa ngabo babhubhayo,” uthethe watsho uNkosi Mzileni ongumdikoni kwiChurch of God eyaziwa njengenkonzo yakwaSirayeli.  
“Kufuneka inguqu, kutshintshwe neekhalenda kususwe amagama afana nooJuly – obhekisa kuJulius Caesar noAugust obhekisa kuAugustus. Ayombali yethu leyo.  Mayitshintshwe,” uqhube watsho uMzileni.  
Oku kuvele kwindibano yephondo yeenyhikityha kule veki iphelileyo, eGinsberg, nalapho bekumenywe iikomiti zeenyhikityha ezilithoba; iBulhoek, Duncan Village, Bhisho, Egerton, Northen Areas, Uitenhage, Queenstown, Aliwal North neNgquza Hill Massacres.  
Egxininisa le ntetho kaMzileni, uNkosinathi Biko wongeze elithi: “Xa sisenza izikhumbuzo kufuneka siqaqambise le nto yabhujelwa ngabo babesilwa, hayi amagama abantu.”  
Ekwatsho ukuba bona beyiSteve Biko Foundation basekwa ngeenjongo zokulandelela kumsebenzi owawusilwelwa nguSteve Biko, hayi ukukhumbula indlela awabhubha ngayo kuphela.  
UNkosinathi ucebise ezi komiti ngeendlela zokuseka izakhiwo zezikhumbuzo ezifana neSteve Biko Centre ekwatsho ukuba ukubandakanya urhulumente kwenza izinto lula. 
 Nangona kunjalo uninzi lwabo bebezimase le ndibano bakhale ngokungabinalo ulwazi lweenjongo zale ndibano kunye nokungabikho koomasipala abafana neBuffalo City kwinkqubo. UMphathiswa kwezobugcisa nenkcubeko, uBulelwa Tunyiswa, unqande ngelithi makhe kubekwe izikhalazo bucala kuvakaliswe ukuba zifuna ukusebenzisana njani norhulumente ezi komiti zeenyhikityha. 
 “Endaweni yokuthi ‘sicela uncedo rhulumente!’ oko, kunganjani ukuba ningathi ‘nantsi into esiyenzayo rhulumente, sicela usebenzisane nathi’. 
 “Sifuna ukomeleza ezi komiti zenu ngolwazi oluthe vetshe ukuze nikwazi ukucela imali nezixhobo ngendlela efanelekileyo kwiiarhente zabucala nezikawonkewonke,” uqhube watsho uTunyiswa phambi kokuba amalungu eekomiti acebise ngelithi kufuneka bazenzele imanyano yezi komiti, bathethe ngazwi linye.  
                                   – isibhalo@inl.co.za
title: Ziyakhala iikomiti zeenyhikityha!

text:
UXolisani ‘Nomeva’ Ndongeni, owayeyintshatsheli ye-IBO light weight, usavuyela imbasa yembethi manqindi yonyaka ayifumene kumsitho obubanjelwe eThekwini kwiveki ephelileyo.  
Le mbethi manqindi, 26, yeMpuma Koloni ifumene eli wonga kwicandelo ebikhuphisana kulo noSimphiwe Konkco – enye yeembethi manqindi eziqaqambileyo eMzantsi Afrika.  
UNomeva uphumelele imidlalo emibini kunyaka ophelileyo – kodwa ebaluleke kakhulu kwikhono lakhe lamanqindi. Kumlo wokuqala wabetha * -Emilio Norfat kumjikelo wokuqala, walandelisa ngoJuan Garcia Mendez. Waba uNomeva uzenzela imbali ngokuyiphumelela yonke imidlalo engamashumi amabini anesibini.  
Le ndedeba isayivuyela imbasa eyifumeneyo kwaye ithembisa ngezinto ezinkulu ezizayo. 
“Kuluvuyo kum njengokuba ndiphumelele le mbasa. Le nto ithetha ukuba umsebenzi wam uyabonakala, ndiyavuya kakhulu. Ngokomsebenzi wam bendikulindele ukuphumelela – kodwa ndiye ndisazi ukuba wonke umntu obephaya usebenzile kakhulu. Bendizithembile – kodwa ndiye ndothuka xa kubizwa igama lam,” utshilo uNomeva kwincoko yakhe neli phephandaba. 
Njengokuba unyaka ophelileyo uyihambele kakuhe le nzalelwane yaseMount Frere, kulo unyaka kulindelwe lukhulu kuyo. “Lo nyaka uyathembisa xa ndisiva. Ndilinde ukuvela komlo wehlabathi ungaphelanga lo nyaka,” uvale ngalo mazwi uNomeva. 
Umlo wonyaka ibe ngulowo wawuphakathi kukaKonkco noHekkie Budler.  
Kanti iwonga le mbethi manqindi yonyaka kwabasetyhini lithathwe nguBukiwe Nonina waseDutywa. 
pedro.mapelo@inl.co.za
title: ‘Umsebenzi wam uyabonakala’ – Ndongeni

text:
Njengoko ndisenza uphando ngokusungulwa kwemfundo yasesikolweni kubantu abaNtsundu boMzantsi Afrika, ndithe ndahlangana nemigaqo eyasekwa phantsi kwayo iYunivesithi yaseFort Hare ngamaNgesi.  
Wonke umntu owayeza kusebenza nowayeza kufunda khona ukususela ngo1916 kwakufuneka engumKrestu.  
Umngeni waba kwiilwimi zesiNtu, isiXhosa, isiSuthu nesiZulu ekwakungekho zincwadi zibhaliweyo ezinemigaqo yokwakheka kwazo.  
Kwelinye icala kungekho ziincwadi ezinamabali ngezi lwimi asekeke kubuKrestu. Nto leyo eyenza ukuba kutolikwe iincwadi zesiNgesi, kuphindwe kubhalwe iincwadi ezazihambisa iLizwi likaNdikhoyo ngezi lwimi. 
 Eso sizathu sawalahla kude amabali afundisayo esiqaba afana neli, nawakhokelela ekuthini amadoda aNtsundu agcinwe ezinkomponi ngabeLungu kuba kusithiwa awalithandi isondo. Nomfazi xa encancisa akamombathi. 
 USityana, A.M.S. kwincwadi yakhe ethi, ‘Izixingaxi ZamaXhosa,’ ubhala uthi ngokufika komfazi ekwendeni: “Mandulo intombi ibisenda iyintombi nqo, ukutsho oko bungazanga buchukunyiswe ubuntombi bayo ebomini bayo. Ngelo lixa lokulala kubakho abantu abaya ngakulaa ndlu kulelwe kuyo ngaba bantu, bathi nca ngodonga bamamele.  
Le nto yayisenzelwa izinto ezimbini; eyokuqala kukuqondisisa okokuba umfana lo akoyiswa yintombi; okwesibini kukuva xa ikhalayo, kuba kaloku buhlangene ubuntu bayo ebuntombazaneni.  
Ukuqhekezwa komhlumba wobuntombazana akulula. Iye ikhale ke intombazana. Babesithi ke abo baye kumamela bakusiva isikhalo bonwabe bayokulala. Into ebonwabisayo kukuqonda okokuba zombini ezi zinto zenzekile, ungumfazi ke kwelo khaya.  
Kanti okokuba ihlangene nomfana lowo ayakhala sisithuko eso kuyo apho emzini wayo. Unobangela waloo nto kukucinga into yokuba ithwelwe ingasenawo umhlumba eyona nto iliqhayiya lentombi ebomini bayo. Okokuba kwenzekile ahamba amathuba nemihla kungekho nto iqondakalayo, umfana uyabizwa nguyise abuzwe unobangela wokokuba kubekho loo mrhano.  
Akuba exelile kuyise esithi ayivumi iyamoyisa, uyise uqokelela abafana baye kungena kulaa ndlu yabo emini nomyeni lowo wayo, baxelelwe abafana okokuba bayibambe bayilalise ngomhlana alale nayo umyeni lowo de baqonde okokuba uyikrazule umhlumba, bayiyeke ke. Xa kunjalo ayinakude iphinde ikhathaze, kananjalo izazi okokuba ingumfazi ngoku, ibhongo lobuntombazana liphelile kuyo.”  
Xa ndingqina ke apha okuthethwa ngokaSityana, ndingathi kwakusenzeka ukuba umfana azekelwe intombi naye engazi nto ukuba kuqalwa ndawoni na, kuthiweni, kuyekwe xa kutheni xa kutswetyelwana nebhinqa.  
Omnye umama wakhe wandibalisela wathi, “Isishumane sendoda esasingazange sakhe sazililela entombini siphimisa, sakhe sazekelwa eyona yakhe yabantle intombi, saze sasiwa ekoyini nomtshakazi. Zaqengqeleka iinyanga zade zantathu umfazana engenzakali.  
Bathe abazali bakubona le nto, utata wakhe wabuza kunyana, “Mfo wam sifuna de sibone umzukulwana, sibadala siza kufa nonyoko. Njengokuba uyindoda nje ukhe umtsibe umfazi wakho?  
Amadoda ayabatsiba abafazi bawo, nam ndamtsiba unyoko kwatsho kwavela wena lo.” Unyana waphendula, “Hayi tata, zange ndimtsibe oko wafika.” Uyise wathi, “Kufuneka namhlanje mfo wam nicime isibane, ukhulule ume ze bhushu, umtsibe. Uqine mfo wam umtsibe, umtsibe kude kuse ungadinwa tu nyana. Umfazi uyatsitywa mfo wam. Ukuba akumtsibi uya kukhathazeka ancame azitsibise ngamanye amadoda. Kufuneka xa utsiba umfazi ungawavali amehlo, ude ukhonye uthi, ‘Ndicel’inkwenkwe!” Ebusuku sicinyiwe isibane, walala umfazana, yavuka ngoko into enkulu yenza umyalelo kayise yatakataka njengesele itsiba umtshakazi. Yamtsiba, yamtsiba, yamtsiba, kwade kwasa tyaa, zakhala neentaka zokusa, bavuka abantu.  
Yaba ke indoda enkulu iyayeka ukutsiba. Ngeli thuba itsibayo iyathetha ithi, “Ndiceli inkwenkwe!” Yavuka yayokubalisela uyise, “Tata awunakungamfumani umzukulwana oyinkwenkwe.” Kwelakhe icala umolokazana uvuke waya kuninazala, “Mazala ubhuti kaNozithile ndiyabona wena uqalwa yimpambano, okanye utshaya icuba lamahashe. Ndibe ngakhalaza wenza isimanga kwade kwasa oko enditsiba tsiba, athi ekweli cala abe ekweliya.”  
Abazali babona ukuba ikhona into, kwathunyelwa abafana, kwathiwa ze baqale bakhe bamhlukuhle bajonge ukuba ziyakhonkothana na izinja. Bafika izinja zisitsho kuqala, baze bamthatha, balalisa umtshakazi, bamlalisa yena phezu komtshakazi, bamsondeza ukuba afunze izinja ziye.  
Hayi umfana akakwazi kufunza kwancanywa kwagalelwa iinkozo zombona obomvu apha esinqeni sendoda, kweziwa nesikhukukazi saxhola. Sithe sakuxhola elokuqala wehla wangena, saxhola elesibini wenyuka, saxhola elesithathu wehla wangena kwakhona.  
Sithe sisiya eshumini leenkozo isikhukukazi, wabe umfana sele ezihlela ezenyukela. Susela loo mini waqala wamgada umfazi wakhe, wade wamncoma, “Mfondini, kanti unento emnandi kangaka oyifihle phantsi kwamathanga. Sindincedile isikhukukazi senkuku ngendingakhange ndiyibhaqe. Undincede mfazi wasekhaya ungaze uyilahle into emnandi kangaka.”  
Kwabanzima nokuhamba kumfazana ayokutheza okanye ayokukha amanzi nabanye abafazi kuba umyeni wayegadile exhalele ukulahleka kwento emnandi.  
Ukuzophula kuloo nto yokusoloko elandelwa ngumyeni wavela wathi eye emlanjeni wagoba wafaka isandla phantsi kwezikhaka wenza ngathi ukhupha into emnandi.  
“Jonga ungaphinde undilandele kuba into emnandi ngoku nantsi ndiyayilahla esizibeni. Jonga nangoo amanzi esimka nayo.”  
Kumhla loo mfo wakhe waxakeka imihla namazolo esihla umlambo ekhangela into emnandi, de waphinda waxolelwa ngumfazi wathi unayo enye into emnandi yokugqibela, kodwa ngoku xa emnikile angaphindi amjikeleze, emlandela kuba uya kuphinde ayilahle.
title: Ungalali ikhona into endiza kwenza yona

text:
Ukuba ungahlala phantsi uphulaphule inkulumbuso entsha eMpuma Koloni, uOscar Mabuyane, ungagqiba kwelokuba ‘noko, ithemba likhona!’ Zonke izinto azithethayo nazithembisayo zezi kanye kanye kudala silindele ukuziva.  
Uyambona kwayena ukuba ayingomntu wee ‘pomp and ceremony’ okanye wee ‘protocol’ kakhulu; kukho umsinga ka “masiqhubeni sisebenze, ixesha limkile!” Aphinde abe ngulo mntu usoloko egxininisa ukuba amagosa karhulumente awaqeshelwanga ukubhatalwa, aqeshelwe ukusebenzela abantu.  
Unyanisile, kwaye kulapho aza kuxakana nento. Phaya ngaphakathi kurhulumente nakumasebe ngamasebe karhulumente kugcwele iinkonde neenkondekazi ezicinga ukuba unyaka isengu1960-nto; basajonge ukuhlonitshwa kuqala, basajonge ukuphakanyelwa xa beza kuthetha, basajonge ukubongwa nokwaziswa xa bekhona kumsitho.  
Kwakuloo masebe kusekho amatitisholo amavila angakwazi nokuzonwaya oku; izinto ezasoloko zicela abanye abantu zibenzele. Kukwakho naba bangakwazi kwaukwenza kwanto bengakhange baqale bathethe neenqununu zabo; kwaukuphendula i-imeyili ethi ‘ingaba umsitho othe nothe uyenzeka ngemini ethile’ uphendulwa emva kwexesha elide; umntu uxakeke ngooSolitaire nooFacebook kwakunye neza imeyili zithi ‘gqithisa lo myalezo ukuze uThixo akusikelele’ ngeekhompyutha zomsebenzi. 
 Iimbalelwano ezibalulekileyo ke zona aziphendulwa kwaukuphendulwa. Silapho, kwaye iinkokheli ezifana noMabuyane nooZamani Saul (inkulumbuso yoMntla-Kapa) ezithetha kamnandi kuza kufuneka ziqinisekise nangokugqogqa, zikhuphe la magosa, adodobalisa umsebenzi karhulumente.  
Kuyo yonke lo nto baqinisekise ukuba kufakwa ulutsha kwizikhundla eziphezulu zamasebe karhulumente. Kugcwele ulutsha oluneeMasters nezinye izifundo phandl’ apha. Ukuze izinto zenzeke ngesantya kwakufuneka lo rhulumente azithobe, afake ulutsha.  
Ukuba sijonga pha kumaxesha akudala; ooMandela, ooBiko, Sobukwe, babekule minyaka sithi yeyolutsha namhlanje xeshikweni besenza izinto ezinkulu. Kutheni ke olu lwanamhlanje ulutsha siluvalela?  
Sicinga ukuba ooMandela abalandelayo bakusuka phi xa bengafakwa ezikhundleni benze beselulutsha?
title: Noko, ithemba likhona

text:
U-ADVOCATE Dali Mpofu unelungelo lokumela nabani na ocela uncedo lomthetho kuye.  
Oku kuthwethwe ngumbutho we-EFF emva kondaba-mlonyeni wokuba uMpofu okwangusihlalo uzakumela usaziwayo kwezosasazo uGareth Cliff, notsalela inkampani yakwa-Mnet ezinkundleni ngelithi ugxothwe ngokungafanelekanga.  
Ibingumnqa kubemi beli emva kokuba uCliff egxothwe ngentetho enobuhlanga, xa ezakumelwa nguMpofu, oyinkokeli kumbutho olwa ubuhlanga.  
Lo mbutho uthe ukholelwa ukuba uCliff ngumntu onobuhlanga, kodwa ukumelwa kwakhe nguMpofu akuthethi kuthi lo mbutho umele ubuhlanga.
title: UMpofu unelungelo lokumela wonke ubani, itsho i-EFF

text:
UGavin Hunt akonwabanga ngenxa yeKaizer Chiefs engakwaziyo ukuphumelela imidlalo. Kodwa okuthe kwabonakala kutshanje kukuba iingxaki zakhe zongezelelekile ngoba ngoku kukho ingxaki kaSamir Nurkovic obekade onzakele. Emva kokuba iChiefs ibambene neBlack Leopards ngo’2-2 emdlalweni weDStv Premiership ngoLwesithathu wale veki, uHunt uthe uNurkovic uneeveki ezimbini zonke ephilile – kodwa kukho into embambileyo engadibenanga nokonzakala kwakhe. 
Kwisizini ephelileyo, uNorkovic ebengoyena mdlali ebixhathise ngaye iChiefs nofake amagowuli wayo amaninzi. “UNurkovic uneeveki ezimbini zonke ephilile – kodwa kukho ezinye iingxaki ezikhoyo. Zingxaki ezo ezingalungiswa. Angadlala yena – kodwa masiyiyekele olunye usuku lo nto,” utshilo uHunt emva komdlalo eFNB Stadium kule veki. Emva kwemidlalo emithandathu kule sizini, Amkhosi aqokelele amanqaku amathandathu kuphela. 
Kwinyanga ezigqithileyo, kukhe kwakho iingxelo ezithi uSamir Nurkovic uphakathi kwabadlali abafunwa yi-Al Ahly yaseYiphutha eqeqeshwa nguPitso Mosimane obekade eqeqesha iMamelodi Sundowns. Kubonakala ngathi lo nto iyamphazamisa umdlali waseSerbia osenesivumelwano sengqeshi seminyaka emibini neChiefs. Yayibeka yacaca ke iChiefs into ethi akathengisi uNurkovic – kodwa kuye kwanyanzeleka uBobby Motaung aphinde acacise. 
“Kufuneka kubekho ofuna ukuthengisa nofuna ukuthenga. Amacala omabini kubekho ixabiso avumelana ngalo,” utshilo uMotaung ezama ukucacisa kwiSAFM kule veki. “Andifuni ukuxoka, umdlali uyaphazamiseka xa kusithiwa ufunwa liqela elithile. Kodwa ke yena unesivumelwano sengqesho seminyaka emithathu. Into esingasoze siyenze kwiChiefs kukuvala ucango xa umdlali efuna ukuhamba – kodwa xa sikhulula umdlali, kufuneka sibe sisazi ukuba kukho umntu oza kuthatha indawo yakhe. Angakhululwa kunyaka ozayo xa umqeqeshi emfumene omnye umdlali,” utshilo uMotaung.
title: UBobby Motaung ucacisa okwenzeka phakathi kukaSamir Nurkovic neChiefs

text:
ISuperSport United igoduke namanqaku amathathu emva kokubetha iKaizer Chiefs ngo’2-1 kumdlalo we-Absa Premier Soccer league obuvutha bhe kobu busuku eFNB Stadium. Amatsatsantsa afumana impumelelo emva kokubethwa ngo’2-0 yiMamelodi Sundowns kumdlalo wokuvula isizini kwiveki ephelileyo. Amakhosi alwe kangangoko kulo mdlalo nangona ebedlala ngabadlali abalishumi. Ngaphandle kwamathandabuzo uSteve Komphela uxhelekile emva kokungaphumeleli umdlalo wesibini wePSL nakukuphulukana nomdlali ekuqaleni komdlalo. 
Aziwahambelanga kakuhle kwaphela izinto Amakhosi kwisigaba sokuqala. Umdlali wasemva u-Eric Mathoho unikwe uphumaphele ngusompempe ngekhadi elibomvu emva kokuwisa uBradley Grobler kufuphi nomhlaba kanozinti weChiefs. Emva kwemizuzu embalwa u-Aubrey Modiba ubeke emnatheni igowuli lokuqala ngentloko; ibhola igotywe kakuhle nguDove Wome kwicala lasekunene. Athe esajonge leyo Amakhosi konzakala uTsepe Masilela kumzuzu wamashumi amabini anesine. 
Konke oku kunike amandla iSuperSport United; phaya phambili uGobler ebeyinkathazo exhaswa nguThuso Phala noTeboho Mokoena. Nangona iKaizer Chiefs ibidlala ngabadlali abangaphelelanga ikwazile ukudlala umdlalo othembisayo – kodwa ayikwazanga ukugqobhoza kwiSuperSport kwisigaba sokuqala. 
Kuvele kwacaca nje ukuba u-Eric Tinkler ufuna ukuyicishilela kwisigaba sesibini ngokufaka uJeremy Brockie zisuka. Uqhubele phambili iChiefs nokuzama ukufumana amathuba nangona bekunzima. USteve Komphela ukhuphe uBernard Parker waze wafaka uWilliam Twala endaweni yakhe. UGustavo Paez ebengathi ufakwe enkonkxeni ngabadlali beSuperSport kwaye noogxa bakhe bebengakwazi ukumnikela iibhola eziphucukileyo. UPaez ukafe igowuli leChiefs kumzuzu wamashumi amathandathu anesixhenxe emva kokuyixheshwa kweSuperSport macala onke. URamahlwe Mphahlele uyinike amandla iChiefs ngezabhola ebeban’ ukuzigoba ekunene. Kuye kwanyanzeleka okokuba abadlali beSuperSport bafumbe emva ngelizama ukukhusela kwiChiefs ebihlasela macala onke. Kude kwaphela umdlalo engaguqukanga amagowuli ebhodini.
title: Amatsatsantsa ayibethile kwakhona iChiefs

text:
Abantu bephondo laseFree State, ngakumbi abalandeli bebhola, bashiyeke benxubile emva kokubhanga kweBloemfontein Celtic, eyasekwa kumashumi amahlanu anesibini (52) eminyaka eyadlulayo. ICeltic ithengwe ngusomashishini waKwaZulu-Natal, uNksz. uShaun Mkhize, ngemali eqikelelwa kumashumi amahlanu ezigidi zerandi (R50-m). Ukuthengwa kwelinye lamaqela elinabalandeli abaninzi kuqinisekisiwe ngusihlalo wePSL, uGqirha Irvin Khoza, kwindibano yamajelo eendaba ngoLwesibini wale veki. “Into ebalulekileyo ekuthengweni kweCeltic sithe malungabinamaqhina ngoba baninzi abantu abachaphazelekayo. Kukho into esixoxe ngayo kakhulu kuyo yonke le nto: imeko yezimali yeqela nenkqubo yePSL ngokubanzi. 
Zizinto ezi esijongana nazo yonke imihla ebholeni. Siyakufuna ukukhusela imbali yeqela – kodwa ingxaki esijongene nayo luzinzo lwezimali. Noxa singayithandi into yokuthengiswa kwamaqela, kufuneka siqinisekile ukuba yonke lo nto yenziwa kakuhle,” utshilo uKhoza. “Xa umntu esithi andikwazi ukumelana neendleko zeqela, thina sithini? Thina siyiPSL sinoxanduva lokuqinisekisa ukuba kukho amaqela alishumi elinesithandathu xa kuqala isizini. Asinabantu abaninzi abanemali eninzi ebholeni yaseMzantsi Afrika. Yiyo lo nto sithathe iintsuku ezintathu zonke sixoxa lo mba. Kuko konke okwenzekayo, kufuneka sikhusele imisebenzi yabadlali nabasebenzi,” utshilo uKhoza. 
Kupasisiwe ukuguqulwa kweCeltic, ngoku yiRoyal AM ebiguqulwe yayiTshakhuma Tsha Madzivhandila emva kokuthengwa ngusomashishi waseLimpopo. Ukuguqulwa kwamagama kuthetha ukuthi yiBloem Celtic engekhoyo ebholeni yaseMzantsi Afrika. Abadlali abebedlalela iCeltic kunyanzeleke bafudukele KwaZulu-Natal – apho baphantsi komphathi omtsha. Ngokokutsho kukaMnu. Max Tshabalala, umnikazi weRoyal AM ugqibe kwelokuba uJohn Maduka, uAbraham Nteo, uDitheko Mototo noSimon Gopane abathathe njengabaqeqeshi.
title: Irvin Khoza: Sibe njalo ke isiphelo seBleomfontein Celtic

text:
Iqela elizinze eBhayi iChippa United liphinde laqesha uRoger Sikhakhane njengomqeqeshi oyintloko ukulungiselela le sizini izayo.  
USikhakhane ebesandula kugxothwa kweli qela ekuzeni kuphela kwesizini ephelileyo indawo yakhe yathathwa nguErnst Midderndorp. USikhakhane ubuyele kwiChippa emva kokugqibezela isizini ephelileyo.  
Ukugxothwa kwakhe ngaphambili bekungenxa yokungaqhubi kakuhle kwakhe neli qela.  
“Ewe ndingangqina ukuba uRoger Sikhakhane ngumqeqeshi wethu oyintloko, njengokuba ibisele ihletywa lo nto ngamajelo eendaba,” utshilo usomlomo weli qeli uLukhanyo Mzinzi kwikhasi lomnatha leKickOff.   
Kukwavakale nokuba kuseza kubhengezwa iziphumo ezenziwe ngoMidderndorp, nowathi wanqunyanyiswa naye kweli qela ngokungaphumeleli midlalo.
title: Ubuyele  kwiChippa kwakhona uSkhakhane

text:
Kweli gumbi kuqikelelwa ukuba kutshe iimpahla ezingaqikelelwa kwizizigidi zerandi. Kuzo kungabalulwa iibhedi, oomabonakude, iimatshini zokuhlamba impahla, izitovu, iikhompuyutha kwakunye nezinye izixhobo zokusebenza ebezingaphakathi. 
Isithethi seSANCO, uJabu Mahlangu uthe,  abo bafundi babandakenyekayo kwesi sehlo mabadibane nengalo yomthetho ngukahlekwa nanye kubo. 
Ukanti abanye babafundi besisikolo bayaziguzula koku besithi bekungafanekanga ukuba kwenziwe ngoogxa babo. Eligcuntswana litshisileyo,  belikhalazela ukuba makongezwe oonogada bazokukhuseleka kwindawo zabo zokuhlala. 
Usekela ngqonyela ugqirha Mvuyo Tom, uthe oku kwenzeke xa kanye befikelela kwisivumelwano neSRC yeli ziko lemfundo kwiingxaki ezomethe imfundo nezikhokelele kuqhankqalazo lwabafundi abafuna imfundo engahlawulelwayo. kumagumbi kufundwe.  
Okwangoku amapolisa ebengekabambi mfundi malunga ngokwayamene nekutshiswa kwesi sakhiwo.
title: ISANCO ithi mababanjwe abafundi abatshise iFort Hare

text:
Nto zimnandi, hay’ithemba Nto ziyonwabisa hay’ ithemba Ngumomelezi wemiphefumlo eyonakeleyo Sihlobo esingabonwayo Silw’amadabi’anzima  
Lincoko lendab’eziphilisayo Mthembisi weminqweno utsho wonwabe Mniki themba kwabagulayo Liyimfuneko kumntu wonke Ongenalo uhle’ekhalaza  
Onalo ngonethamsanqa Likunik’ukuzithemba Likunik’ ukuthenjwa Lisus’ubumnyama kuvel’ukukhanya Likhulu linamandla  
Onal’uvakala selethetha Akaligcini kuye unika nabanye Linwen’okomlilo liyosulela Litsho liphilise abaninzi Ngethemba unento yonke  
Mfihlo eviwa ngumniniyo Sixhobo nomomelezi kwabakhulayo Mphelisi wamaxhala nokoyika Mniki mfuneko yokuphila Ungazilahla zonke,hay’ithemba
title: Ithemba

text:
UMONGIKAZI waseLife St Dominics eMonti, ucele ukuba akhe ayozihlalela kowabo emva kokuqaphela ukuba isigulana athe wasondelelana naso sinentsholongwane yeKhorona, kodwa isibhedlele siye “samalela” sathi makaqhube nomsebenzi. 
Le ngcamango yalo mongikazi, nengakhange yamkelwe ngabasemagunyeni eLife St Dominics, iza emva kokuba lo mongikazi ezazi ukuba “angasemngciphekweni” ngenxa yesigulo ebekhe wanaso ngaphambili. 
Usapho lwalo mongikazi lubanga ngelithi iziphathimandla zesibhedlele zala ukuba lo mongikazi ayokuhlala ekhayeni, zathi makaqhube asebenze noxa nje isigulana ebesondelelene naso sinentsholongwane yeKhorona. Akukhange kudlule ntsuku zingephi, lo mongikazi waneempawu zeKhorona. Uye kuvavanyo kwiveki ephelileyo, iziphumo zabuya zisithi unentsholongwane yeKhorona. 
Usapho lwalo mongikazi, osesibhedlele esilwela ubomi bakhe sibhala nje, lubanga ngelithi ingcaciso yeLife St Dominics, ngokwemibandela yokhuseleko lwabasebenzi, ayibonelisi. 
“Khange bakhathale kwasekuqaleni. Umama ngumntu ebendisoloko ndimsa emsebenzini kuba uphangela ebusuku. Ngenye imini umama ufumene umnxeba kugxa wakhe embuza ukuba ingaba ukhe wadibana kusini na nesigulana esithile. 
“Ngaloo mini umama noogxa bakhe babizelwa kwigumbi elijongene nezabasebenzi (HR), baxelelwa ngesigulana abebesondelelene naso esifunyenwe sinentsholongwane yeKhorona. 
“Emva koko babuzwe imibuzo ngokusondelelana kwabo nesi sigulana.
