Libe ziintshatsheli ezivunyiweyo iqela laseMbhashe emva kokuba labetha iMusketeers yaseMnquma emdlalweni owaphela kumapenela. Itumente yasungulwa nguMnu. Silence Matta – onethuba elide elisoja lophuhliso kwicandelo lezemidlalo. Umqeqeshi weBashee, uMnu. Malibongwe “Rajah” Masekwane, uxelele I’solezwe lesiXhosa ukuba iqela lakhe liyakuvuyela ukufumana indebe – kodwa injongo ephambili ibikukulungisa iqela ukuze liye emidlalweni ephantsi kweMathole League liyilungele. 
“Siliqela sichulumance kakhulu ngoba silunguselela imidlalo ezayo yesithili. Sivuyiswa kakhulu kukuba nemali esiyifumeneyo. Iza kusincedisa kwiindleko zokuhambisa iqela xa lisiya emidlalweni,” utshilo uMnu. Masekwana. “Enye imali siza kuthenga ngayo izinto zokuziqeqesha. Sibulela kakhulu umxhasi wetumente onike abantwana ithuba lokudlala ibhola. Isincedile itumente ngoba sikwazile ukusebenzisa abadlali abaninzi. Okubaluleke kakhulu kuthi ibe kukunika abadlali abatsha ithuba lokudlala ukuze bakwazi ukuqhelana nabanye,” utshilo uRajah. 
Iqela lakhe lizuze indebe ekhatshwe lishumi limawaka erandi (R10 000). Yona iMusketeers ifumene amawaka asixhenxe erandi (R7 000). Abadlali abazuze amawonga: UJulius Jonga ifumene iwonga lomdlali ofaka amagowuli amaninzi emva kokufaka amahlanu. Umdlali oqaqambileyo kwitumente yonke ibe nguMava Nonxuba weMusketeers. Unozinti oqaqambileyo ibe nguSifuba Siphelele. ULusanda Ntshobondwana wangumqeqeshi wetumente.
title: IBashee Eagles ziintshatsheli ezivunyiweyo zeMatta Easter Challenge

text:
Ndibolekeni ezondletyana zenu khe ndiphos’ilitye esivivaneni, Ndingumlomo ongathethi buxoki, Ndithi ndakuvul’umlomo kunge ndibhibhidl’amazinyo, Ndakukhamisa bathi ndikhamisa ndityhale, Kodwa izwi lam alityiwa-nja, Ndanditshilo ndathi esi sizwe sifikile kwantshabalala, Ndanditshilo ndathi esi sizwe sifikelele ekupheleni, Kodwa basuka bandihewula, Bandixwaxwa bendibiza ngamagama, Bathi ndinkcenkceshela umoya wezikhova, Ndidala impixano nembambano, Kunjani xa kunje namhlanje? 
Andinkcenkcesheli moya wezikhova, Ndingadali ngxabano nagxeke, Ntonje ndifuna isisombululo, Eyona nto siyibulawelwayo yintoni? Esona sizathu senza uba masixhelwe sesiphi? Ingaba yinzondo okanye yintiyo ? Unozala wabo bonke obu butyadidi yintoni? Ayontando kaThixo, ndisola ubuSathana, Sibulawelwa ntoni kodwa isizwe? Satshatyalaliswa yimidlwembe senzeni? Kwaba ngasa kunegqiyazana elixheliweyo, Kwaba ngasa kunemveku ebuleweyo, Sicel’uxolo manene noxa linganifanele elo gama, Sithi taarh’ameva, noko ngoku kwanele, Siyadomboza kubenzi bobubi sithi, Kwanele! kwanele! kwaye kwanele.  
Makungabi sesihogweni kweli lizwe, Mawuphele lo mbhodamo kusemnandi, Mawuchithwe lo mtshotsho ingoma ayivakali, Masingabulawelwa unobenani, Sifela eluthandweni nasemalini, Siyangcuthwa sibulawa okwezinja, Ilisikizi into yokungcuthwa komntu ngumntu, Linyumnyezi into yokubulawa komntu ngumntu, Ihambisa umzimba into yokukrolonqwa komntu ngumntu , Uthando lwayaphi ebantwini? Kutheni sakwaSathana apho inja idla enye? Hayibo sithi “hanewu” kwanele ngoku.  
Uxolo alukho kulo mhlaba, Kunempixwano inzondo,inkohlakalo nentiyo, Umona nekratshi zidlangile, Ubugebenga, uburhalarhume nabo buya ngokwanda, Umthetho ulala ngengub’enye nezikrelemnqa, Sowumkhulu lo umonakalo sewenzekile, Isidima sebhinqa masibuyele ebhinqeni, Isidima sendoda sibuyele endodeni, Umthetho nawo mawungafadalalali, Kungenjalo sakuyilungisa lento ngaphandle kwebhokhwe, Izidlwengu nababulali mabenzelwe isiko noba kungentuku, Zesikufumane ukuphumla kulo mhlaba.  
Sikhumbul’emandulo , Apho ibhinqa lalihlonitshwa kwaye lihlonelwa, Sikhumbul’emandulo apho ibhinqa belixatyisiwe , Sikhumbul’emandulo apho ibhinqa lalinesidima nesithozela, Sikhumbul’emva phaya, Ngexesha ibhinqa lalikokoswa liphathwa okweqanda, Lingaxhixhinjiswa ngamaxhwangusha ngokungenalusini, Kungaxhwilwa kuxhwithwe intsana zethu, Imveku yayinikwa uthando nobubele, 
Yonke lo nto sekuyimbali namhlanje. Sigutyungelwe luloyiko, Songanyelwa ngumothuko, Ukonwaba akusekho, kusale ukungcungcutheka, Le yinto ebonakalayo neqondakalayo, Ichaphazela phantse wonk’umntu nangona ngokuqhelekileyo oku kungaphawulwa. Yintoni le ibangela olu loyiko? Siziva singakhuselekanga kweli lizwe, Kutheni abantwana bethu bengakhuselekanga? Sihleli nengonyama ugonyamelo luyanwenwa, Ndandithi zincukuthu zodwa eziphila ngegazi, Ndandithetha ukungazi nokungaqondi, Siphila namazim namaxhalanga, into ezithi zihlelinje zibe zinengcwangu, Sihleli nokrebe int’ezihleli nje zinukelwa ligazi, Igazi lo mntu obhinqileyo liyathetha, Igazi lemveku linomvuka, Yanga igazi elixhaphe izandla zombulali lingangamniki ukuphumla, De kufike isisombululo kule nyewe, Wayeken’amabhinqa azonwabele neentsana zawo.
title: Babulawelwa ntoni abasetyhini neentsana?

text:
Usekela mphathiswa wesebe lorhwebo noshishino uMzwandile Masina wenze intetho kwinkqubo ejolise ekuphuhliseni ulutsha kwezoqoqosho kwiholo iRabasotho eTembisa eRhawutini izolo. 
 Lo msitho wenziwe ngokubambisana phakathi kweli sebe nomasipala iEkurhuleni.  
Abantu abatsha babuthelene kweli holo ngeenjongo zokufumana ulwazi neendlela zokuphuhla ngokwezoqoqosho ukuze bakwazi ukuziqesha.
title: UMzwandile Masina uthethe nolutsha laseTembisa

text:
UMBUTHO wabasebenzi bakamasipala iSouth African Municipal Workers Union (Samwu) uthi bekusatshayelelwa nje kuqhankqalazo osele lubonakele eBuffalo City, watsho usithi olona gwayimbo kukhona luqala namhlanje. 
Izolo iinkokheli zeSamwu, bezikwindibano neCCMA eMonti, apho iinjongo ibikukufumana imvume yoqhankqalazo olwakuqhuba de umqashi aphendule kwizikhalazo zabasebenzi. 
“Sifuna ukuyibeka icace eyokuba oomanejala bomasipala beBCM bathathe inyathelo lokugxeka imanyano yethu, bekwenza oko ngokuya ezinkundleni ngokumayelana nokuqhubeka kumasipala,” utshilo uZolani Ndlela, unobhala weSamwu kwingingqi yaseBuffalo City. 
“Ukuthabatha kwethu isigqibo sokuya kuqhankqalazo olwakuqhuba de umqashi abuyele kuthi ngokumayela nezikhalazo zethu. SiyiSamwu sizimisele ekubeni singema ngoqhankqalazo xa umasipala enokubuyela kuthi nento enesihlahla,” utshilo uNdlela. 
Umbutho wamaKomanisi kwingqingqi iSkenjana Roji (eBuffalo City) ithi iyazixhasa iziphakamiso zeSamwu. “Simemelela kwisikhokelo somasipala waseBCM ukuba alusombululule ngokukhawulezileyo olu qhankqalazo,” kutsho isithethi samaKomanisi kule ngingqi uLuntu Sokutu. 
UNdlela uthi izinto abazikhalazelayo kukusilela komqashi ekumiliseleni isivumelwano esasityikitywe ngoTshazimpuzi ngo2016 sokuhlengahlengiswa kwemisebenzi. 
“Umasipala uphinde wasilela ekuhlawuleni iibhonasi esasithethe ngazo kweyoKwindla ngo2017. Kukho nokusilela ekugxotheni umanejala kamasipala (Andile Sihlahla) osileleyo ekuthobeleni imiqathango kuquka nokuswela isakhono sokuza nozinzo kumasipala,” kutsho uNdlela. 
Olu qhankqalazo lubangele ungcoliseko eBCM nanjengoko inkunkuma ingacholwa. Kwanasemangcwabeni, izihlobo kunzima ukungcwaba abantu bazo kuba zivaliwe iindawo zokuhlawulela amangcwaba kuquka nabasebenzi bokomba amafihlo. 
Kwezinye iindawo, izitishi zombane zitshisiwe into ebangele ukuba iindawo ezininzi zingabi nambane eBuffalo City. Kwanamanzi achaphazelekile, nanjengoko kuvakala ukuba kukho izitishi zamanzi ezimoshiweyo. 
Umasipala waseBCM, ngokomlomo kaSodolophu uXola Pakati, uthi uyaxolisa ngemeko esizibone sikuyo isixeko. 
sithandiwe.velaphi@inl.co.za
title: Samwu eBCM: ‘Kukhona siqala uqhankqalazo’

text:
Ngabemi belizwe laseJamani abakhenkethele kweli lizwe loMzantsi Afrika abathe baqhekezelwa imoto yabo ngethuba bemise phambi kwevenkile ethile kwidolophu yaseDutywa. 
 
Ngokwengxelo ephuma emapoliseni, aba bakhenkethi bamisile bangena ngaphakathi evenkileni bethenga, ukuphuma kwabo bafika imoto yabo sele iqhekeziwe kwaye kuthathwe izixhobo ezithile ngaphakathi emotweni.  
 
Oku kwenzeke ngoMvulo kusasa kule veki.  
 
Isithethi samapolisa aseGcuwa uKapteni Jackson Manatha udiza ukuba umrhanelwa onamashumi amabini anesixhenxe ubudala ubanjiwe ngamapolisa kwaye zafumaneka zonke nezixhobo ezo ebeziphange kule moto zaze zanikezelwa kubakhenkethi. 
 
Umrhanelwa ubanjwe ngakumatyotyombe akufutshane nedolophu yaseDutywa ngoLwesibini. 
 
Umrhanelwa ujongene netyala lokuba. Ulindeleke avele phambi kwenkundla yamatyala eDutywa kungekudala. 
 
INkumanda kwiKlasta yaseGcuwa, uBrigadier Ngangema Xakavu uncome amapolisa aseDutywa ngokusebenza ngokuzinikela kwanokukhawuleza ukubamba umrhanelwa.
title: Kuphangwe abakhenkethi baseGermany eDutywa!

text:
Abahlali baseZimbane Valley eMthatha bathi abazukubukela umasipala ezithathela umhlaba wabo ngokungekho mthethweni.  
Oku kulandela inyathelo labahlali abasondele ekhulwini lokuzisikela amanxiwa ngenkani kule mpela veki. Ngethuba intatheli yeli phepha ndaba, Isolezwe – igaleleka kule ndawo ekufuphi nerenki yezithuthi eZimbane Valley, abahlali bebezidaphela kulo mhlaba logama itele – tele ibinyuka isihla icanda amanxiwa olutsha lwale ndawo. 
Inkokheli yabahlali uRodgers Zwakala, uthi emveni kweengxelo zokuba umasipala uwuthengisile lo mhlaba, kwaye omnye kuzokwakhiwa kuwo izindlu zikarhulumente, bavumelene ekubeni bacandele ulutsha amanxiwa.  
“Abantwana bethu abaphangeli, abanamanxiwa, kwaye xa umasipala enikezela ngezindlu zikarhulumente abaxhamli. Asizukuhlala sibukele sithathe isigqibo sokuwasika kumhlaba wethu. Asibangisani namntu,” utshilo uZwakala. 
Ukwathi ukusuka namhlanje [uMvulo] ulutsha luzokwakha izindlu zalo kula manxiwa amatsha.  
“Sinolwazi ukuba umba webango lomhlaba usenkundleni yamatyala kodwa umasipala uyaqhuba nokwenza unothanda kulo mhlaba engakhathaleli nenkosi yethu,” kucacisa le nkokeli. 
Ngokwengxelo yabahlali, inkosi yelali uNkosikazi Nosizwe Maxhwele, ubefikile wathetha nabo ngoMgqibelo ezokusabela ngenjongo yokuzisikela amanxiwa. Unike umyalelo wokuba kuthiwe xha ngeli nyathelo nanjengoko ibango lomhlaba lisaqhuba enkundleni yamatyala aphakamileyo. 
Omnye wabantu abatsha abasikelwe amanxiwa kule ndawo, noneminyaka engamashumi amathathu anesithandathu ubudala uthe:  
“Kudala silinde ithuba lokusikelwa amanxiwa, siyavuya abazali bethu besisikela amanxiwa. Abantu abanikwa izindlu zikarhulumente ayingobantu balapha eZimbane ngabezinye iindawo. Asiphangeli kodwa sizokwazi ukuzakhela imizi yethu.” 
Inkosi yaseZimbane, uMaxhwele uthe: “Mna njengenkosi andinalwazi ngocando lwamanxiwa ngabahlali. Lo mhlaba kucandwa kuwo asikawunikwa yinkundla ngokwebango lomhlaba. Ndiyile phaya ngoMgqibelo ndiyokusabela, kodwa ndaxelelwa ukuba kunqandwa umasipala ozakuthatha lo mhlaba akhe izindlu zikarhulumente” 
UMasipala weKing Sabata Dalindyebo (KSD) uligxekile inyathelo labahlali ngelithi oku kubambezela inkqubo yophuhliso, kwaye wonke umntu ofuna inxiwa makatyelele umasipala angazithatheli umhlaba.
title: Abahlali bazisikela iziza ngenkani!

text:
UVELILE Nobebe usebenze iminyaka engamashumi amabini anesibhozo kwiinkonzo zongxamiseko (Emergency Medical Services [EMS]) phantsi kwesebe lezempilo, kodwa endaweni yokonwabela umhlala-phantsi wakhe uhliswa esenyuswa ngamagosa angathethi nyani malunga neemali zakhe zepenshini. 
I’solezwe lityelele uNobebe (55) kwindlu yakhe eseDabhan eNgqushwa kutshanje, apho sifike enyephile kukudana yinto ayibiza njengempatho-mbi kumagosa athwaliswe uxanduva lokujongana neemali zakhe. 
Amehlo akhe ebebomvu futhi eduduzela umzimba lo, ilizwi linendyondyo. Uthi oku kungenxa yokuba womelwa bubuthongo ngenxa yokucinga le mpatho-mbi ayifumana kumagosa esebe lezempilo. 
“Amehlo am abomvu ngenxa yokuba andilali, ndivuka nasekuseni ngentsimbi yesibini ngenxa yentlungu endiyenziwa ngabantu ebekufanele ukuba bayandinceda. Into ebangele ukuba ndifowunele I’solezwe kukuba ndixakiwe. 
“Ndathi xa ndifowunela ePitoli ndifuna ukuqonda ngemali yam yepenshini, ndaxelelwa ukuba amaxwebhu am aphindiselwa eMonti ngenxa yokuba eneenkcukacha ezigwenxa,” utshilo uNobebe. 
UNobebe usebenze iminyaka engamashumi amabini anesibhozo ejongene neengozi kwimimandla engqonge isibhedlele saseNgqushwa iNompumelelo, apho isiza sabo sikhoyo. Amagosa akwa-EMS asabela nge-ambulensi kwiingozi zemoto, zokudutyulwa nokuhlatywa kwabantu. 
“Bendicinga ukuba ngeli xesha ndiza kube ndinemali yam yomhlala-phantsi, kanti ndiyaziqhatha. Ndingumntu obehlawula iimali zepolisi yomngcwabo, nezinye. Ndithetha nje nawe, zonke zicimile ezonto kuba iinyanga ezintathu ziphelile ndingenamali ebhankini,” utshilo uNobebe. 
UNobebe uthi ngenxa yokungabi namali, unqongotshelelwe kukutya. “Yhini ukuphoxwa ngurhulumente endimsebenzele ixesha elide kangaka.” 
UNobebe akayedwanga kule ngxaki. Obefudula engugxa wakhe uThuto Mafempi (57) – osebenze iminyaka engamashumi amabini anesixhenxe kwaEMS – naye uthi ude waphelelwa ngumonde ngokulinda imali yakhe yepenshini. UMafempi ukhutshwe ngugqirha emsebenzini kulandela ukusikwa umlenze ngenxa yokugula. “Ndifuna imali yepenshini, le endiyisebenzele iminyaka. Lide eli thuba ndilindile. Asiyomeko intle le. Nam ndicinyelwe ziipolisi zam kuba andinamali ebhankini,” utshilo uMafempi. 
Abatata bathi ukusebenza kwii-ambulensi yinto ebangela umvandedwa nonxunguphalo noxa nje iye iqheleke ngokuhamba kwexesha. “Umsebenzi wethu ngumsebenzi ocekeceke kakhulu, maxa wambi usabela kwingozi kanti ngumntu ohlala naye apha ekuhlaleni okanye isizalwane sakho. Ayimnandanga lo nto, kodwa xa uqhutywa yintshisakalo yokunceda uluntu, lo nto iyanyamalala,” kutsho uNobebe. 
Isithethi sesebe lezempilo uSizwe Kupelo, uthi ulibaziseko kumaxwebhu kaNobebe kubangelwe kukubhidana kweenkcukacha zakhe ngethuba esebenza kwiphandle laseCiskei. “Lo mba siwunika ingqwalasela, uzakulungiswa. KuMafempi akukho ngxaki, iinkcukacha zakhe ziyalungiswa ePitoli.”
title: Akalali buthongo kukuxokiswa ngamagosa karhulumente

text:
UBUCHULE bomcuphi waKwaBhaca (Mount Frere) uConstable Ntobeko Potolwane bubangele ukuba asebenzise ubungqina besikhinda esashiywa ngunqevu owadlwengula abafundi baseSonqishe High equqa ebuyelela kwigxamesi labo elikwilali iLuyengweni. 
Kwiveki ephelileyo, inkundla yengingqi yaKwaBhaca imgwebe ubomi ejele izihlandlo ezibini uManxubandile Ntshobololo (24) emva kokufunyanwa enetyala lokudlwengula abafundi ababhinqileyo abathathu abaphakathi kweminyaka elishumi elinesithandathu ukuya kwishumi elinesithoba. 
Kwisihlandlo sokuqala, kweyeThupha ngo2016, uNtshobololo wangena kwigxamesi laba bafundi ebusuku wafika kukho umfundi oneshumi elinesithandathu leminyaka. Wamdlwengulela kobo bumnyama, emva koko wabaleka eshiya ngasemva isikhinda sakhe. Ixhoba lathatha eso sikhinda laya naso emapoliseni ngethuba liyokuvula ityala. 
Emva kweenyanga ezintandathu enze obu bubi, uNtshobololo waphinda wabuyela kweli gxamesi, ze wafika kukho abafundi ababini. Bathi nje xa besiva ethukuza ebhedini, bakhanyisa isibane. 
Emva kokuba bekhanyise esi sibane, uNtshobololo wajijisana naba bafundi, kodwa wabohlula kuba ebahlaba ngemela emva koko wabadlwengula ebabophelele izandla. Emva kodlwengulo wabaleka neefowuni zabo. 
Emva kweli sikizi, aba bafundi bayokubika kumnini wendlu abahlala kuyo, ze ilali yaseLuyengweni yaphuma yonke igqogqa esi sidlwengu. 
Ilali yamkhangela de yamfumana, nanjengoko wayesaziwa kuba ehlobene nelinye lamaxhoba. 
Emva kokuba ilali imfumene lo kaNtshobololo, kwafikwa esankonye eza fowuni zabafundi, ekwaneekhondom esele zisetyenzisiwe epokothweni kuye. Emva kokuba esiwe emapoliseni, umcuphi wetyala, uPotolwane, wasebenzisa ubuchule bakhe ukungqamanisa isikhinda esashiywa sesi sidlwengu ngethuba lodlwengulo kwityeli lokuqala. 
Ngethuba kuqhuba ityala, uNtshobololo ebethe gqolo ukuxelela inkundla ukuba umsulwa, kodwa umtshutshisi uChumile Mkentane ukwazile ukubonisa inkundla kamantyi uPatiswa Mjame ukuba sinetyala esi sidlwengu. 
UMjame umgwebe ubomi ejele uNtshobololo ze waphinda wambhasela ngeminyaka emihlanu yokuxhwila kwanemithathu yokuqhekeza. 
Isithethi seGunya-Bantu lezoTshutshiso (NPA) kule ngingqi uLuxolo Tyali, uthi bayasamkela esi sigwebo, watsho esithi sakuba sisilumkiso nakwabanye abasacinga lo mkhwa wokudlwengula amabhinqa angakwazi kuzikhusela.
title: Wadlwengula abafundi, wabhaqwa ngesikhinda awasishiyayo!

text:
Bakhalela ukungaphatheki kakuhle nangokungarholiswa kakuhle ngumphathi wabo ootitshala besikolo sabucala esikwilali yakwaPayne eMthatha, nesibizwa ukuba yiRiver Jordan Christian School. 
Aba titshala bathi iyaphela inyanga idlule futhi bengakhange barholiswe, kube kungekho nelizwi eliphumayo lokuba kutheni bengakhange bahlawulwe. 
IRiver Jordan Christian School sisikolo esingekho phantsi kukarhulumente kwaye siqale ngo2010. Siqala kuGradeR ukuya kuGrade7. Ootitshala abaqashiweyo kwesi sikolo balithoba bebonke. Ngokokukruquka, aba titshala badlulise le nyewe yesi sikolo kwisebe lezabasebenzi eMthatha. 
“Emva kokuba kungenelele eli sebe umphathi wethu uye wasingxolisa kwaye esigrogrisa. Asibhatalelwa imali yokusebenzela ixesha eligqithileyo, asilifumani nexesha lokuphumla. Eyona nto iye isenze singaphatheki kakuhle mpela kukuba uye athi kuthi imali ayikho, kodwa sibone kufika izinto zesikolo abe ebethe imali ayikho,” kutsho omnye wabasebenzi. 
Bathi kwisivumelwano sabo nomphathi yayikukuba bazakurhola imali engange R2,500 kodwa bayakwazi ukuba bafumane iR500 kuphela ngenyanga okanye ingabikho kwayona. 
Xa I’solezwe libuza ukuba bona banyamezeleni ukuhlala le ntlalo, badize ukuba ngekudala bemka koko kukunqaba kwemisenzi. 
Umnikazi wesikolo uMitchell Ashley, uxolisile esithi naye ubethwa yimeko kuba abazali babantwana baye bangabhatali kwangexesha nanjengoko bebhatala ngeziqingatha enyakeni.  
Uthi wona umceli-mngeni ukhona kwaye uthi kunzima nokugxotha abantwana kuba abazali bengahlawulanga, kuba oko kuye kubachaphazele nasezifundweni, abantwana bashiyeke ngasemva. Kodwa angakhange ayivume yile yokuba ikhefu akabaniki ootitshala bakhe.
title: Barholiswa iR500 ngenyanga ootitshala

text:
Isithethi kurhulumente waseMpuma Koloni uSonwabo Mbananga, uthi into ephezulu kulo msebenzi wakhe mtsha kukuqinisa unxulumano phakathi kukarhulumente kwakunye nabantu beli phondo. 
UMbananga uqeshwe kulo msebenzi ngomhla wokuqala kwinyanga yoMdumba. Ungena kulo msebenzi ethwele amava okusebenza kwicandelo lezonxibelelwano nanjengoko ebekhe wasebenza kwisebe leenkonzo zoluleko kwanelo lezokhuselo. 
Ethetha nephephandaba I’solezwe, uMbananga uthi ukufikelela kukarhulumente ebantwini yeyona nto ibalulekileyo kumsebenzi wakhe. 
“Andizi namilingo, kodwa into esizakugxila kuyo kukuba iNkulumbuso ifikeleleke, urhulumente afikeleleke, ukuphendulwa kwezikhalo zabahlali khona ukuze ucace umsebenzi karhulumente,” kutsho uMbananga. 
“Indlebe karhulumente kufuneka isondele eluntwini, ukuze singathathi ixesha elide ukuphendula eluntwini,” utsho uMbananga. 
Uthi bazakuwasebenzisa amaqonga onxibelelwano, ngeenjongo zokufikelela kubantu abaninzi ephondweni. 
 “Siphila kumaxesha obuchwepheshe. Sizakugxila phaya kooTwitter, Facebook no-Instagram. Sisafakana imilomo noogxa bam malunga nokuba la maqonga sizakuqala nini ukuwasebenzisa,” utshilo uMbananga.
title: UMbananga usondeza indlebe karhulumente eluntwini

text:
Umfana owaqhawulwa ulwimi ngethuba edlwengula inkosikazi yaKwaNonyembezi eSigangala kuCentane kweyoMnga ngo2015, ugwetyiwe yinkundla yamatyala yakuCentane kwiveki ephelileyo.  
USazini Gxulu onamashumi amabini anesine ubudala ugwetywe iminyaka esixhenxe engaphakathi eziseleni.  
UGxulu wavingcela lo mama unamashumi amahlanu anesithandathu ubudala kumzi wakhe.  
Emva kwengxelo eyakhutshwa sisithethi samapolisa ala mmandla uKapteni Jackson Manatha,  
I’solezwe latyelela ixhoba kwikhaya lalo kuCentane.  
Ngethuba encokolela I’solezwe lo mama wathi: “Kwankqonkqozwa emnyango ndisazingqengqele emva kwentsimbi yesibhozo ngorhatya, xa ndibuza ukuba ngubani akwabikho mpendulo andavula ndabe ndingenaso nesikhali sokuzilwela, ndaphakama, xa ndibona ukuba uvula ngenkani ucango ngomhlakulo wam endandiwushiye phandle kuba ndandiwusebenzisa emini. 
“Wangena wangqala kum wandijijisa aph’ ebhedini ndade ndoyisakala wazenzela endidlwengula.  
“Xa ezama ukundincamisa ngoku aphezu kwam kulapho ndafumana ithuba ndalukrazula ulwimi lwakhe. Ndaqiniseka ukuba ndilubambile, ndabuya nalo. Waphakama emva kwethuba waphuma wabaleka.” 
Lo mama waluthatha olu lwimi walufaka eplastikini, esithi ufuna ukwenza ubungqina. Ixhoba laye layokuvula ityala kwisikhululo samapolisa kuCentane liphethe olu lwimi njengobungqina.  
UGxulu wakhangelwa wabanjwa wavalelwa ngamapolisa.  
Obambele njengenkumanda kumapolisa angqonge eGcuwa uKenel Ncedo Ngwendze usamkele esi sigwebo.
title: Ugwetyiwe owaqhawulwa ulwimi edlwengula!

text:
Umdlali ophambili kwiMamelodi Sundowns, uKhama Billiat, uthi udinga ixesha ukuze azokwazi ukucinga kakuhle ngekamva lakhe. 
 Le ndedeba yaseZimbabwe izibonakalisile kakhulu kule sizini ukuba ngokwenene ngoku inguphopho ebholeni, ngokuthi idlale indima ebaluleke kakhulu kwimpumelelo yeSundowns. Kuvakala iindaba ezithi lo mdlali uhlaselayo ufunwa phesheya kolwandle ngamaqela ohlukeneyo.  
Lo mdlali uneminyaka engamashumi amabini anesihlanu uyinxalenye yamadoda amathathu ateketiswa ngegama elithi “CBD”; Leonardo Castro, Khama Billiat noKeagan Dolly, athe athatha iSundowns ayibeka kwelinye inqanaba kule sizini. 
 Ngaba badlali bobathathu abafake amagowuli amaninzi eDowns. Kukho iimpawu ezibonakalisa ukuba uBilliat akafuni kuthatha isigqibo engxamile, kwaye azakuthi azisole ngaso emva kwexesha. Yiyo lo nto esithi phambi kokuba athathe isigqibo ngeyona ndawo azakudlala kuyo kwisizini ezayo uzakuthetha nabantu abanomfutho nabasondeleyo kuye.  
“Okwangoku andazi nokuba kuzokwenzeka ntoni, yinto le endizimisele ukuyiqwalasela ekupheleni kwesizini. Ndizakuhlala phantsi nomanejala wam, umqeqeshi neqela lam ukuze sibonisane ngendlela eya phambili. Andingxamelanga nto. Wonke umntu uyakufuna ukudlala phesheya, kodwa kufuneka umntu aqiniseke ngesigqibo asithathayo,” utshilo uBilliat. 
Ngenxa yeminyaka kunokwenzeka lo mdlali aphethe esiya kwiqela eliphesheya kolwandle, kodwa kunokwenzeka nayo iSundowns ithethe naye ngoba imali ayiyongxaki kuyo futhi inalo nelungelo lokwandisa isivumelwano sayo noBilliat ukuba iyathanda.  
Ukuba uBilliat ukhetha ukuya phesheya uyakuba ngumdlali wesibini weeBrazillians, elandela uBongani Zungu osele etyikitywe liqela lasePortugal.
title: UBilliat ucinga ngekamva lakhe kwiDowns

text:
Umqeqeshi we-Orlando Pirates, uMandla Ncikazi, ukholelwa kwelokuba ukudlala neKaizer Chiefs iza kuba ngumsebenzi olula emva kwemidlalo enzima yeCAF Confederation Cup. OkaNcikazi ukuthethe oku ngethuba encoma iPirates evuthulule iRoyal Leopards ngo’6-2 eqale yophisa kwisiga sokuqala eMbombela Stadium kwiveki ephelileyo. Ngoku iPirates iza kwamkela iChiefs emdlalweni weDStv Premiership onzima oza kudlalelwa eFNB Stadium ngentsimbi yesithathu emalanga ngoMgqibelo. Nangona amaqela aseSoweto emane egqwidiza nje emidlalweni yawo – kodwa kuzaw’dlan’iintsimbi emdlalweni wangempelavkei ngaphandle kwamathandabuzo. 
Omabini amaqela aya emdlalweni ojongwe ngamehlo abomvu lilizwe lonke ekhuthazekile emva kokuphumelela imidlalo yawo ngempelaveki egqithileyo. Amakhosi abethe iBaroka FC ngo’1-0 emdlalweni ebekufanele awuphumelele ngamagowuli amaninzi. UNcikazi uthi ukudlala neChiefs kuza kuba yinto elula ngoba imidlalo yeCAF ililungiselele ngokwaneleyo iqela lakhe. “Ukungahambi kakhulu kuza kwenza izinto lula xa sidibana neChiefs,” utshilo uNcikazi. Yinto engathathwa njengendelelo leyo yiChiefs. Ibancede ke lo nto abalandeli ngoba iza kuba nefuthe emdlalweni. Abalandeli bamaqela omabini abaxolanga yindlela amaqela wabo aqhuba ngayo kwiDStv Premiership. 
Ukuphumelela idabi laseSoweto kwakunika umqeqeshi ngamnye ithuba lokufumana inkxaso yabalandeli kwakhona. UStuart Baxter iya kwiPirates onwabile emva kokubetha iBaroka. Uvumile ukuba ukudlala nePirates kwahlukile kweminye imidlalo – kodwa okumchulumancise kakhulu bubukho babadlali bakhe bonke. “Ukudlala nePirates kwahlukile. Okumnandi kukuba abadlali bethu bakhona bonke,” utshilo uBaxter emva kokubuya namanqaku amathathu eLimpopo. Kulindeleke abadlali abafana nooNgcobo (bobabini), uNgezana, uParker noSabelo bakulundele ukudlala ngoMgqibelo. Njengokuba iSundowns itshele kwindawo yokuqala, iChiefs nePirates zilwela indawo yesibini ukuze zikwazi ukuphindela kwiCAF Champions League. 
Imidlalo yeDStv Premiership: 
Mgqibelo: Baroka vs TS Galaxy @Peter Mokaba Stadium, 15:30; Orlando Pirates vs Kaizer Chiefs @FNB Stadium, 15:30; Cape Town City vs Sekhukhune United @Cape Town Stadium, 17:00; SuperSport United vs AmaZulu @Lucas Moripe Stadium, 19:30; Maritzburg United vs Mamelodi Sundowns @Harry Gwala Stadium, 19:30 
Cawe: Royal AM vs Swallows @Chatsworth Stadium, 15:30; Golden Arrows vs Chippa United @Princess Magogo Stadium, 15:30; Marumo Gallants vs Stellenbosch @Peter Mokaba Stadium, 17:30
title: UMandla Ncikazi wePirates akaboni bunzima kwiChiefs emva koweCAF!

text:
Nangona bekukho ukunxunguphala elizweni lonke ngenxa yokungaqhubi kakuhle kwaBafana Bafana emidlalweni yeAfrica Cup of Nations kodwa kuye kwathi kwabu ebantwini abaninzi emva kokuba uMzantsi Afrika ufumene indawo kwiTop 16 ngoLwesibini.  
Yenzeke lo nto nakubeni uMzantsi Afrika ubethwe yiMorocco ngo’1-0 emdlalweni wokugqibela kaGroup D ekuqaleni kweveki.  
ABafana Bafana baphumelele umdlalo wamnye kwiAfcon kodwa iye yafumana ithamsanqa lokudlulela phambili emva kokubethwa kweGuinea-Bissau yiGhana nokuphumelela kweMali ebethe iAngola ebusuku ngoLwesibini wale veki.  
Ngoku uMzantsi Afrika uza kudibana noosotheko, iEgypt, emdlalweni obaluleke kuwo omabini amazwe eCairo Stadium ngentsimbi yethoba ebusuku ngoMgqibelo. 
Njengokuba iqela likaStuart Baxter lifumene elinye ithuba kodwa lijongene neyona ngxaki enkulu, iYiphutha.  
Ngeke kube lula ukudlala nayo phambi kwabalandeli balo. Akukho nto efanele kukumxaka uBaxter ngoba unabadlali abaqheleneyo nemidlalo enzima kwiCaf Champions League.  
Ukapteni weMamelodi Sundowns, uHlompho Kekana, akavumanga ukubagxeka oogxa bakhe emva kokuphisa ngomdlalo kwiMorocco ngomzuzu wokugqibela. 
 “Kusikhathazile ukubethwa yiMorocco ngoba ndicinga ukuba besifanelwe yindawo engcono kule tumente. Yaba lilishwa ukungena kwegowuli ngomzuzu wokugqibela emva kokusebenza ngokuzimisela okungakaya. Bekukho ukungazithembi ebadlalini ngoba eyona nto ebifuneka emdlalweni ibikukusebenzisa amathuba kakuhle emdlalweni,” utshilo uKekana. 
UBaxter ukwamkele ukuthelekiswa kweqela lakhe neYiphutha nangona liza kuya edabini ngaphandle kukaThemba Zwane.  
“Ngumdlalo onzima kakhulu. Sifumana ithuba lokudlala ne-Egypt kwelona nqanaba endingathi besijonge lona. Lifikile ixesha lokuba abantu bazimisele. Ukunxanelwa kwabo ukuya phambili ndicinga ukuba kuba yinkuthazo eyaneleyo ebadlalini xa sidibana noosotheko,” utshilo uBaxter ogxekiweyo ngokungasebenzisi uThembinkosi Lorch emva kokugqwesa kwisizini yePSL.  
Bathe zava emalini aBafana Bafana emva kokungena kwiAfcon Top 16.  
Umdlali ngamnye uza kufumana ibhonasi yeR320 00, ngokubetha iNamibia, umdlali ngamnye uza kufumana iR60 000.
title: Bathe zava emalini abadlali beBafana!

text:
ISizwe Kupelo Foundation nengumbutho ongenanto yakwenza norhulumente, enjongo ikukuphuhlisa uluntu olungathathi ntweni, kuquka nabantwana besikolo, iphindile kwakhona kweli xesha linzima yanika ithemba kwabo bangenalo.  
Lo mbutho sithetha nje wakhela indlu ixhegwazana laseKatkop eMaclear enamagumbi amathathu. Olu sapho belukade luhlala kwityotyombe elivuzayo emva kokutshelwa ngumzi walo.  
USizwe Kupelo, umseki weSizwe Kupelo Foundation, uthi kuninzi esele ikwenzile ukunceda abahlelelekileyo noxa nje imfuno ikhula ngokukhula.  
UKupelo uthi ibe mithathu imizi ethe yafumana ingqwalasela kwiSizwe Kupelo Foundation, eSajonisi naseMaclear kule Lockdown.  
Le mizi, kuquka onomntwana orhubuluza ngamadolo xa ehamba, noneshumi elinesibini leminyaka, oye wafumana isitulo sokuhamba (iwheelchair), wakhelwa nendlu efanelekileyo ngoncedo lukaVuyani Jarana nowayesakuba yingqonyela yakwaSAA. Omnye uhlala ebhedini naye ngenxa yenkubazeko kwakunye nomama owakhelwayo.  
UKupelo uthi le mizi bayiqaphele ngethuba iSebe lezeMpilo ephondweni lalityelele eMajola, eSajonisi, lali leyo yayihlaselwe yintsholongwane yeKhorona kwinyanga kaMatshi.  
Uthi imeko yomama lo wakhelwayo ibiseyimenza afune ukuya eKapa ayokuhlala khona kubantwana bakhe ngenxa yempilo ebuhlungu kwityotyombe lakhe.  
“Le ntlungu yalo mama yaqatshelwa nguMphathiswa wezeMpilo ephondweni, waxelelwa ngemeko yomzi, kulapho siyiSizwe Kupelo Foundation saye sangenelela khona sakhela lo mama,” utshilo uKupelo.  
Uthi ngoku bamane bemsela into esiwa phantsi kwempumlo ngoku esalinde indlu yakhe igqitywe. UKupelo uthi ukusukela ngo2008, sele bengapha kwe30 000 abantwana abancedakale ngeeyunifomu zesikolo.  
Uthi lo mbutho ikwaluxanduva lwawo nokonwabisa abantwana ngosuku leKrisimesi njengoko sele besuka eTsholomnqa eMonti, eMqwangweni eNgqeleni naseThabo Mbeki – besonwabisa abantwana bekwabapha nezipho. Ukwabulela inkxaso athe wayifumana koogxa bakhe kwisebe lezeMpilo, ayifumene koosomashishini kwakunye nabahlobo bakaFacebook abaye bancedise ngokuthi bafake isandla. 
Uthi yonke le mali kumaxesha amaninzi iphuma kuye.
title: Bazuza uncedo kwiKupelo Foundation

text:
UAsanda Mabinda ongumhlali waseHighway eNdevana uthi uTelkom uneminyaka eyi23 efake ipali kwiyadi yeli khaya kodwa abazange bafumana mali isuka kubo.  
UMabinda uthi le nkampani yenza isivumelwano nomakhulu wakhe uNonkululeko Cynthia Mthuma ongasekhoyo esathi satyikitywa ngumama wakhe, nalapho kwaye kwaqalwa khona ukwakhiwa le pali.  
“Kwakuvunyelenwe ukuba uTelkom uza kusibhatala rhoqo ngenyanga, kodwa kunanamhlanje asikafumani nepeni emdaka esuka kubo,” utshilo uMabinda.  
Uthi ekubeni ebonile ukuba ubethwa ngemfe iphindiwe waye wabaxelela ukuba bangaphindi babeke unyawo lwabo kwela khaya, nalapho bamgrogrisa ngelithi baza kumbizela amagqwetha ngoba ngumhlaba karhulumente lowa.  
“Baye baqhaqha ucingo lweyadi yasekhaya apho babengena ngalo balishiye bengalivalanga.” UMabinda uthi baninzi abantu abaziyo abanayo le pali kwaye bayayifumana imali esuka kuTelkom rhoqo ngenyanga, nto nje eli lishwa lifikele usapho lwakhe. Uye wongeza ngelithi kukho amaxesha apho aziva engakhuselekanga ngoba le pali inobuxhakaxhaka bezinto ezixabisa imali enkulu ezazikhe zabiwa ngaphambili, ngoko ke akayazi ukuba ubomi bakhe bukhuselekile kusini na. “Ndaye ndayaleza abamelwane ukuba xa bebona umntu okanye imoto esondele apha ekhayeni bandixelele ngoba andiyazi into enokwenzeka,” uvale ngelitshoyo uMabinda.  
Ngokwentetho yomnxeba, abakwaTelkom baye baphendula ngelithi baza kuqhagamshelana nolu sapho.
title: ‘UTelkom akafuni ukusibhatala’

text:
UMasithembe Rawe uthi kudala warhalela ukukhe akhwele eqongeni naye ngenye imini, koko uthi wayebethwa zintloni kwanokungazithembi.  
Uthi kodwa ngokuye ekhula nangokuye kuhamba ixesha, uye wabona ukuba kunyanzelekile ezisusile iintloni alandele okufunwa yintliziyo kuba efuna ukuthabatha inxaxheba ekwenzeni inguqu kweli lizwe. 
URawe, 25, ophuma kwilali yaseMadwaleni kuTsolo nophakathi kwekhulu lamadoda angenele ukhuphiswano lokuba nguMr South Africa, ngoku ulwela ukungena kwiTop 20 xa kuhluzwa kweli khulu akulo.  
Uthi uza kungena kwiTop 20 ngenxa yeevoti zoluntu xa luthe lwamnika inkxaso ngokuthi lumvotele. 
“Oko kuya kuthi kwenzeke ngokuthi uluntu lundivotele njengoko sele zivulile iivoti. Zininzi izizathu kwaneenjongo ezindibangele ukuba ndingenele kolu khuphiswano. Enye yazo kukuba siphindele kuTsolo esi sithsaba njengoko uMiss South Africa ephuma khona. Okunye ndifuna ukuthubelezisa umyalezo eluntwini wokuthi phantsi ngokuphathwa gadalala kwabantwana kwakunye namanina,” utshilo uRawe. 
Uthi enye yenjongo kaMr SA yalo nyaka kukuxhobisa uluntu ingakumbi ulutsha ekubeni luphakame luthabathe inxaxheba ekwenzeni inguqu kweli lizwe loMzantsi Afrika. Enye yeenjongo kukuba bakwazi ukuza namacebo aza kuthi aphucule intlalo 
URawe uthi kufike ixesha lokuba azinike uxanduva lokutshintsha iingqondo zabantu abatsha njengoko bengafani nolutsha lokuqala olwaluzilwela kwaye luvakalise nezimvo zalo.  
Uthi kumaxesha amaninzi ulutsha olukhoyo ngoku luhoye kakhulu ulonwabo kwaye luchitha nexesha lalo kwiindawo ezigwenxa.  
URawe uqhube wathi baninzi abantwana abanenjongo ngobom abadinga abantu abanje ngabo abanokuba khuthaza babe yimizekelo kubo ingakumbi amakhwenkwe asakhulayo. 
URawe akukho kokuqala engenela ukhuphiswano olukumila kunje. Ebengenele ngo2016 ukhuphiswano lukaMr Justice South Africa. 
Oyena uphumeleleyo uza kubhengezwa kwinyanga yoMsintsi kunyaka ozayo. Lo nyaka wonke uzayo baza kube besenza imisebenzi abayinikiweyo equka kuyo ukufuna inkxaso koosomashishini. 
URawe mvotele kanje: MRSA59 ku40439.
title: ‘Ndifuna siye kuTsolo nesi isithsaba’

text:
INJINELI yeSABC eBhayi, eyashicilela igwijo elithi A’sphelelanga elisetyenziswa liqela lePSL iChippa United, ithi amalungelo eli gwijo akekho phantsi kweli qela lebhola ekhatywayo. 
Kule veki iChippa United ivakalise ukuba iza kuthethana namagqwetha ayo kuba isithi ayonelisekanga kukusetyenziswa kwale ngoma yimvumi uVusi Nova. 
Ethetha kwinkqubo yoMhlobo Wenene FM iBEE, uLukhanyo Mzinzi, umanejala weChippa United, uthe: “Isikhalazo sifakwe licandelo labalandeli bethu, besithi bafuna singenelele kule nyewe yale ngoma. Le ngoma sayishicilela ngoncedo loMhlobo Wenene, ze sayibhalisa ngo2014. Kubuhlungu kuthi kuba uVusi Nova ngumntwana walapha eMpuma Koloni, bekumele ukuba sithetha ngokuxhasana hayi ngale nto.” 
Kodwa uNova uthi le yi ngoma kawonkewonke, ngoko ke akukho bani onebango kuyo.  
“Le ngoma ligwijo lakudala, kwaye ndikhule ndiyicula. Nabanye abantu endibaziyo, kudala beyicula. Le nyewe bekufanele ukuba sithethe ngayo kakuhle phambi kokuba side size kwabeendaba nakumaqonga ezonxibelelwano.” 
“Phambi kokuba sishicilele le ngoma, silwenzile uphando lwethu. Safumanisa ukuba le yingoma kawonkewonke, into ethetha ukuba ingasetyenziswa nokuba ngubani. 
Le ngoma yekawonkewonke, ngoko ke akukho bani onebango kuyo kuba asingomqambi wayo,” utshilo uNova. 
UMzinzi uthi kudala abantu befuna ukushicilela le ngoma, kodwa bengakwazi. 
“Bafika sele kusithiwa siyibhalisile. Kukho nevenkile enkulu yePizza ebifuna ukusebenzisa le ngoma, kodwa ayizange ikwazi ukuyisebenzisa. Siza kuwuthabatha lo mba ngokwezomthetho, emva kokucelwa ngabalandeli bethu.” 
Umsindleki weBEE, uPastor Nozewu, uxelele abaphulaphuli ukuba umntu owayeshicilela le ngoma kuMhlobo Wenene uthi amalungelo ale ngoma akekho phantsi kweChippa United. 
“USiyabonga Hlekani uthi zange wawathengisa amalungelo engoma. Uthi emva kokuba eyishicilele, nguye owabhalisa ingoma,” utshilo uNozewu.
title: Ngokabani na lo “As’phelelanga?”

text:
Ugwetywe iminyaka engamashumi amabini anesihlanu engaphakathi entolongweni uThukela Myekeni onamashumi amabini anesihlanu eminyaka (25) ubudala waseGcuwa,  emva kokufunyanwa yinkundla yaseGcuwa enetyala lokudlwengula intwazana eneminyaka emithandathu (6) kuphela. 
Kwingxelo kaKapteni Jackson Manatha,  ixhoba elineminyaka emithandathu lidlwengulwe ngomhla wesihlanu kwinyanga yeDwarha ngonyaka ka2015.  
Uthi ladlwengulwa emin’ emaqanda kwilokishi yaseMchubakazi eGcuwa. 
 Ityala laye layokuvulwa kwisikhululo samapolisa esikwilokishi yaseMsobomvu kwaseGcuwa. 
Amapolisa ephondo leMpuma Koloni asamkele isigwebo esibekwe kuMyekeni, esithi sakuthi sibe sisifundo nakwabanye abacinga ukudlwengula abantwana nabantu abadala  abangoomama. 
INkumanda kumapolisa aseGcuwa uBrigadier Trevor Mey ,  uvuyisene namapolisa ebephanda ityala ngomsebenzi omhle awenzileyo nangokuqinisekisa ukuba abenzi bobubi bafumana isigwebo esiqatha.
title: Ugwetyiwe owadlwengula umntwana ona-6

text:
Iqela lesizwe loMzantsi Afrika kwiqakamba libuye lintywizisa emva kokubethwa yiNgilane kwimidlalo yovavanyo ngo’3-1.  
Ukungakwazi ukuqhokra ibhola yeyona nto ethe yaqaqamba kwaye ngoku kukrokreleka ngathi indoda eyaziwa ngokubetha ibhola * -AB de Villiers, ebingekho kule midlalo, ingangaphindi idlale kwimidlalo yovavanto yeProteas.  
Oku kuthethwe nguFaf du Plessis emva kokunkulwa koMzantsi Afrika. 
“Ndingavuya ukuba uDe Villiers angabuya. Sonke siyamazi indlela adlala ngayo kwaye kuvakele ukungabikho kwakhe. Ndiyathemba uzakubuya, lo nto ingasinceda. Sidinga umntu onodlala kula ndawo yakhe – kodwa ukuba uyebuya kungakuhle,” utshilo uDu Plessis. 
UMzantsi Afrika usebenzise abadlali abaqhokrayo abathathu ngethuba udlala neNgilane. 
 Kwaqala uJP Duminy kumdlalo owawuseLord, kwalandela uQuinton de kock noTemba Bavuma ongoyena mdlali oqhokre ngcono nangona engakwazanga ukuba nolwamvila. 
pedro.mapelo@inl.co.za
title: Ingxubakaxaka ngo-AB de Villiers

text:
Xa sikumbindi wale nyanga yokuhlonipha nokubhiyozela imitsi eyenziwa ngamanina kubomi bomntu ngokubanzi, ndivumeleni mathole nani mathokazi omthonyama ndikhahlele, ndincome kwaye ndibulele ubuntu benina elihlala lingumzekelo omhle ebantwini, umama uNosimo Bhalindlela. 
Umama uNosimo Bhalindlela abaninzi bamazela kumhlaba wezopolitiko. Kaloku eli nina neqhawekazi liqale labalasela njengoMphathiswa wezeMfundo kwiPhondo leMpuma Kapa.  
Kulo msebenzi watshatshela kangangokuba wayengaphelelanga nje ekwenzeni konke okusemandleni ukuze kuphucuke imfundo yomntwana ontsundu ephondweni, koko wayebonwa esihla enyuka ezikolweni ngaloo mibhaco yakhe indilisekileyo, esebenzisana namagosa emfundo, iinqununu kwanootitshala ngeenjongo zokuzinzisa umgangatho onguwo kwimfundo ezikolweni zethu. 
Eyona nto ndayincoma nendayibuka kakhulu kumama uNosimo njengoMphathiswa wezeMfundo, yayikukukhuthaza umdla nakufundo lolwimi lwesiXhosa.  
Abo bangaziyo, ngomnyaka ka2003, kula yunivesithi sele ibizwa ngeNelson Mandela University eBhayi, umama uNosimo waye wanikwa nembeko yokukhokela nokuvula inkomfa yamazwe ngamazwe yombutho weeLwimi zaseAfrika ebizwa ngokuba yiALASA.  
Nalapho, ngenxa yodlwabevu lwentetho yakhe, wabashiya abaphandi bolwimi bezimisele ukwenza nangakumbi ukuze kuphucuke umgangatho weelwimi zaseAfrika ngokubanzi. 
Umzi waseCumakala, kuquka nam lo, eli nina ulazi ngokobuntu nesidima salo, hayi ngezopolitiko kuphela okanye indima yakhe njengenkulubaphathiswa yangaphambili kwelo leMpuma Kapa.  
Phambili phaya, eli qhawekazi lisengumfundisintsapho eKholejini eNxukhwebe, lalisithi xa lifika emzini walo kwaMlungisi eCumakala, ufike lizihambela zonke izikolo ukusukela kwezo zamabanga asezantsi, ukuya kuqhina kwezo zamabanga aphezulu. 
Kwezo zikolo wayesenza le nto kuthiwa lungenelelo ngeenjongo zokufaka isandla. Bangaphi na abafundisintsapho basezikholejini nakwiiyunivesithi abaquqa bebuyelela ezikolweni bezixhasa ngezakhono zabo njengomama uBhalindlela?  
Ndifun’ukuthi bambalwa okanye abekho, kuba uninzi luphelela kwii-ofisi nakumagumbi okufundela kuloo maziko, kulityalwe tu ngenkxaso enokunikwa umlisela nomthinjana osanxanelwe imfundo.  
Phambi kokufika kweli qhawekazi kumhlaba waseCumakala, babenqabe okwezinyo lenkuku abazali abazibandakanyayo kwiinkqubo zemfundo yabantwana babo ezikolweni.  
Baninzi abazali ababeyibuka into yokundwendwela kukamama uNosimo ezikolweni, kangangokuba kwenyuka namanani abazali abathatha inxaxheba kwizikolo zaloo ngingqi yaseCumakala. 
Ngaphezu kwazo zonke izinto ezintle ezenziwe leli qhawekazi, akukho yandichukumisa ukogqitha leyo yokuba yena nomyeni wakhe uMadiba uSir Balad, babesithi xa kukho umntwana ophumelele emagqabini kwezo zikolo zingqonge iCumakala, ubabone bendwendwela elo khaya, beze kuvuyisana nabazali kwanomntwana lowo ugqwesileyo.  
Nalapho, babefika bavuyisane nomntwana lowo, bade banikezele ngesipho esiya kumnceda umntwana lowo xa esiya kumaziko emfundo enomsila. Nam njengabaninzi, ndingema phezu kwentaba, ndingqine ndikwabulela ukuba kwimali yam yokubhalisela ukuba ngumfundi eYunivesithi, umama uNosimo nowakwakhe ubawo umNtande, baba negalelo elikhulu.  
Kungoko nathi safunda kubo ukuba isizwe siya kuthi ukuze siphakame, nathi sizeke mzekweni, sixhase nabanye, nangoku sisenza njalo ngenxa yezo mfundiso. 
Phakathi kwezinto ezikhethekileyo kumama uNosimo, ndikhuthazwa kakhulu nakukuhlonipha kwakhe umntu, umzi kwanesiko.  
Ezi zizinto ekumele ulutsha lufunde kakhulu kuzo, lusondele kweli nina ngoku lisenamandla, ukuze lurhabule kuloo masi angqaka imthubi. Ungayiva le ntombi yasemaNtlaneni ngoku isisifundiswa esibalaseleyo, ihlonipha umzi wayo. 
Uthi sele ebuzwa ngegama lakhe, umve lo mama ehlonipha esithi unguNosimo Krwedintshicila. Sincume thina bathandi bolwimi nesiko sisithi kanene ukukrweda kukubhala, ukuze intshicila ibe yindlela, abe ngolo hlobo lo mama ufundisa namanye amakhosikazi ukuba ifani yomzi iyahlonitshwa.  
Ngenxa yegalelo lakho ekuphakamiseni iphondo leMpuma Kapa kwiinkalo ezininzi mama wethu Nosimo Bhalindlela, ngenxa yokuvakalisa udumo lwekhaya lakho iXesi ntombi kaMzathi, nangenxa yokunika umzi wakho iCumakala intlonipho ezizweni, sithi maz’enethole kuwe kule nyanga yamanina. Sikubulela ngamazwi kabawo uBurns Ncamashe athi: 
Umfazi’osimo sihle 
Ugcin’intombi yakhe, 
Intombi enesimo 
Ithobela unina, 
Iba ngumzekel’omhle 
Intomb’eva unina, 
X’ingumolokazana 
Iva uninazala, 
Ova uyisezala, 
Intomb’enjalo 
Yotsho ngomzi onoyolo, 
Nomyeni onoxolo 
Nokwenda kube njalo, 
Wena uliqhayiya lohlanga 
Uthandwa naliZulu!
title: Maz’enethole mam’uNosimo!

text:
Uthikoloshe sisilwanyana samagqwirha esihlala emilanjeni ezingcongolweni, ngokutsho kwabantu abakholelwa kubugqwirha.  
Amagqwirha athi amthumele ebantwini ngeenjongo zokubathakatha. Uthikoloshe kuthiwa sisilwanyana esifutshane esinomthondo omde ongangowedonki.  
Ngokwenkangeleko kuthiwa uyafana nomntu, xa ethetha uyateketa. Kuthiwa ukhe avele phakathi kwabantu. Abona bantu athanda ukudlala nabo ngabantwana. 
Xa abantu befuna ukumbamba usuke aginye imbokotho yakhe yomlingo athi shwaka. 
Uthikoloshe ukwayimpilo ebantwini xa ethe wabanjwa ngamagqirha namaxhwele. 
 Izangoma zithi zimbulale uthikoloshe zize zimqhekeze ukhakayi lwentloko kutsho kuvele ubuchopho bakhe zize zenze uphuncuka bemphethe. Amathambo akhe alunge kakhulu kuba anqanda imishologu nabanye oothikoloshe phakathi kwekhaya. 
 Ithambo likathikoloshe umntu othe walithenga kumaxhwele kufuneka alixhome phezulu entungo kwindlu enkulu emzini wakhe khon’ukuze linqande zonke izinto zokuthakatha ezimjikelezayo. Lenza afumane nobutyebi ayibone into ayenza ngemali yakhe. 
Esi silo xa singene phakathi komzi siyawugqiba kutsho kungalungi yonke into. Amabali angothikoloshe athi: “Komnye umzi kulaa dolophu yaseMthatha kwindawo ekuthiwa yiNorwood, esi silwanyana safika sahlala nabantu baloo mzi.  
Olu sapho lalusandula kuwuthenga lo mzi, abazi nokuba lo thikoloshe bafika naye okanye bafika ekho. Kuthiwa lo thikoloshe wayethanda ukuvela xa abantu balo mzi behleli etafileni besitya. Wayebonwa ethe ngcu phezu kwesitulo ethetha eteketa esithi: “Okwam ningakugaleli ityuwa, mna andiyityi ityuwa”. 
Lo thikoloshe wayenayo nentlonti yokubamba elo gqajolo lude lobudoda bakhe aze athethe eteketa encoma umama welo khaya esithi, “Uyabona mnt’ongutata mhl’umedem, mhle kakhulu ndiyamthanda. Uyabon’ithondo yam inkulu.” 
Wayecaphuka apho umninimzi amleqe apha endlwini uthikoloshe. Wayemleqa abile abe lithontsi bejikelezisana apha endlwini engamfumani, ade adinwe umninimzi ahambe aye kulala ngomqolo esitulweni sesofa esintofontofo aze azame ukubukela umabonakude. Wayesithi esabukele abone sele ekrwecwa sesi silwanyana singuthikoloshe sesimxelela ukuba uligwala woyisiwe. ‘Uyigwaya wena kakhulu uyabanda,’ wayesitsho uthikoloshe eqobisela loo ndoda yalo mzi. Enye into lo mfo walo mzi wayehlutshwa naliphelo lakhe elalisoloko nalo limbuza ukuba uyoyiswa na nguthikoloshe. Umntwana wayebuza, ‘Tata uyayoyika itikolose, iyakoyisa? Uyigwaya tata wam.” 
Umntwana wayebhekisa kunina athi, ‘Itata yigwaya yoyika itikolose.’ Le ndoda yayicaphuka ngumsindo imngxolise umntwana ithi, ‘Thula kwedini!’ 
Olu sapho lwaseMthatha lade labona ukuba maluyithengise loo ndlu lufudukele kwenye indawo khon’ukuze loo thikoloshe abe yingxaki kubantu abaza kuthenga loo mzi wabo.  
Bathe aba bantu xa begqibezela ukuthutha iimpahla ngelori bemiswa ngomnye ummelwane ebuza ukuba kwenzeka ntoni na. Ithe le ndoda ifudukayo ingekathethi kwaphendula uthikoloshe ethe ngcu phezulu elorini wathi eteketa, “Siyafuduka phaya besikhona, sihlutshwa nguthikoloshe, simzimele akazuphinde asibone. Siyafuduka siyafuduka.” 
Wakhuza ummelwane wathi, ‘Mmelwane uya kuzula lonke eli lizwe uthikoloshe ugxothwa ngokubethelelwa nokuqiniswa komzi.’ 
Elinye ibali lelaseDutywa lithi: Indoda ethile yayinomfazi, ingxaki yabo ikukungafumani bantwana. Kuthiwa le ndoda nalo mfazi bawahamba onke amagqirha namaxhwele eli lizwe de baya kuthiwa choo ligqirha laseKapa kwilokishi yaseMfuleni.  
Eli gqirha lababhilabhila satsho savela isigelekeqe senkwenkwe. Aba bantu bakhwela ibhasi ngebhongo ukuya kwelasemaXhoseni. EmaXhoseni bafika baxhela baphalaza igazi bebulela izinyanya. Nanjengandoda lo mfo uthe kwakuhlwa wamana ephosa iintsizi ezaziwa nguye yedwa eqinisa umzi wakhe. 
Kodwa kuthe ngolunye urhatya abantwana baya kudlala kwibhodlo lomzi onguzwelidala. Bathe besadlala bothuswa nguthikoloshe. Bakhala abantwana baya kubikela le ndoda isuka kwigqirha laseMfuleni eKapa.  
Le ndoda yathatha ibhunguza lomnqumaswili eyalikha kwiminyaka elishumi eyadlulayo yaze yathi emva kokulolula ngokulitshisa emlilweni yaliqaba amafutha enqatha legusha yandula ukulifaka emgqubeni. Yaliphuthuma phantsi komgquba yaleqa kweli bhodlo. 
Ngokwenene lafika emile uthikoloshe kule ndawo ibhodlokileyo. Yathetha le ndoda yathi, “Thikoloshe ndini ufuna ntoni apha?” 
Tu ukuphendula uthikoloshe. Yacaphuka le ndoda yagalela entloko yambetha wawa phantsi uthikoloshe, yaza yambhuqa yamqusha wade wafa. Abafazi baya bekikizela ngakwelo bhodlo lendlu bemncoma lo mfo ubugorha bokubulala uthikoloshe owoyikwayo. 
 Uthe akuba efile uthikoloshe yamrhuqa yamsa ekukhanyeni. Kowu! Umothuko owaba lapho awuthetheki, le ndoda imbulele umntwana wayo eyamfumana nzima ngokuthiwa choo ngeqwili ligqirha laseKapa eMfuleni.  
Eyokugqibela eyamxhela umphefumlo yaba kukusweleka kwenkosikazi yayo ngenxa yomothuko nobuhlungu bentliziyo bokusweleka kakubi ngolo hlobo komntwana wabo olizinyo lenkuku. 
Enye into eyamqwelayo lo mfo yaba kukugwetywa kwakhe yijaji iminyaka engamashumi amabini yaza emihlanu yaxhonywa, kwathiwa mayidontse nje iminyaka elishumi elinesihlanu kuphela. Waba ke uyaphela umzi wayo ugqitywa nguthikoloshe. 
NaseMqanduli kuthiwa omnye umfo wabiza amaZiyoni ukuba akhe afake inkonzo kwakhe agxothe imishologu.  
Kuthiwa yathi ingoma isatsho amaziyoni ebetha igubu ejikeleza iziko esiya ngakwicala lasekhohlo, kwacaca ukuba kukho le nto iwagilayo ijikelezayo, kodwa yona iya ngakweli cala lasekunene.  
Le nto ayibonakali iyawagila iyawaphazamisa. Amanye akhubeka kuyo awe, atatsalaze avukwe nangumshologu. 
Iziyoni elikhulu elingumthandazeli nomdikoni kaBhishophu ophethe inkonzo wamisa inkonzo wathi, ‘Khanizise isiwatsho sam ndigxothe lo thikoloshe.’ Kuthiwa uthikoloshe waphendula wathi, ‘Ninomona maziyoni maan! Ninomona nangesiyezi esi!”
title: Uphele tu umzi wendoda yaseDutywa nguthikoloshe

text:
UBuyiswa Gqoli wedolophu yaseMount Frere, ophila nenkubazeko, ukhuphe icwecwe lakhe elithi “Andisoze ndakhohlwa” elinengoma ezilithoba ngaphakathi kulo. 
UGqoli, 57, wazalwa ekwazi ukuhamba ngeenyawo zakhe zombini, kodwa xa eneminyaka esixhenxe zajika izinto akakwazi ukuhamba ngenxa yesifo esamhlaselayo, nalapho waphela sele ehamba ngesitulo esinamavili. 
Uthi uthando lomculo laqala kanye elele kwiibhedi zesibhedlele awayenyangwa kuso eneminyaka esixhenxe kuphela. Uthi omnye umntu owamosulela ngomculo ngutata wakhe kuba wayekuthanda kakhulu ukucula enaso nesigingci. 
Le mvumikazi ngumama kubantwana bayo ababini uAmandla kwakunye noAnathi, nathi bamncedisa kakhulu ebomini bakhe. Uthi umculo kuye ufana nobizo. 
“Ndathi emva kokuba ndifumene umntwana wam wokuqala ndazixelela ukuba ndiyayeka ukucula ndizokujongana nomntwana wam. Kodwa ndandivele ndingakwazi ukulala ibe ingoma indihleli nanjengoko ndikwanguye nomqambi. Ndiyavuka ezinzulwini zobusuku ndivuswa yingoma endifikeleyo kuye kunyanzeleke ukuba ndiphakame ndiyibhale,” utsho uGqoli. 
Ngethuba efunda eKwezi Lokusa eMthatha uthi wafika wakha iqela lomculo ikwanguye nomqambi wezo ngoma. 
Uthi xa kukho itheko esikolweni sabo kwakungabhatalwa bantu bangaphandle kuba yonke into yayisenziwa ngabo becula, bedanisa besonwabisa iindwendwe ezize kwitheko. Uthi ubunzima kule ndlela ubufumene kodwa ngenxa yento engaphakathi efuna ukuba acule, khange ayeke, walifezekisa iphupho lakhe. Sele ekhe wacula kwiqela iNgwebamabala wacula nakwiNathi Gospel Group. 
UGqoli uthi ufuna ukuba ngumzekelo nakwabanye abantu abakhubazekileyo bayazi ukuba awunanto ungenokuyenza onqwenela ukuyenza.
title: ‘Ayindivaleli inkubazeko kwiinzame zam’

text:
Lizakuxoxwa yinkundla yamatyala yenqila eMthatha kwinyanga ezayo ityala labarhanelwa abane basetyhini abatyholwa ngokuba izidumbu kumzi wogcino lwazo karhulumente eMthatha. 
Abarhanelwa uNomfaneleko Nondula (48), Nomagcisa Mayeza (39), Nomasister Mahlungulu (32), Vuyiswa thembu(42) bavele kancinane enkundleni yamatyala kwiveki ephelileyo. Ngethuba bekhwela emkhumbini bebebonakala bezolile bengenaloyiko lokuqala kweli tyala kwaye alikhange ligqibe neshumi nesihlanu lemizuzu larhoxiswa.  
Izizathu zokumiswa kweli tyala kukucotha kophando kweli tyeli lesithathu. Ngethuba eli tyala livela enkundleni ngoFebruwari kulo nyaka abarhanelwa babebathathu. 
Umrhanelwa wesine uVuyiswa Mthembu ubanjwe ngookhetshe kwinyanga ephelileyo ngokudlala indima kobubuqhophololo bokubiwa kwemizimba.  
UMthembu uqeshwe lisebe lezempilo kwiziko lokugcina izidumbu iForensic eMthatha.Kusuku lwayizolo amagqwetha abarhanelwa aquka uPhumza Malifane ebengekho enkundleni ngethuba kuqhuba eli tyala. Ngokwengxelo yombuso uphando alukaqosheliswa ngamapolisa, kunyanzeleke umantyi uGugulethu Namba alimise ukunika ithuba lokuqhuba kophando. Kulindeleke lixoxwe kwinkundla yesigqeba kwinyanga ezayo.  
Abarhanelwa batyholwa ngokuba umzimba womntu owasweleka kwingozi yemoto kwindlela uN2 ngaseSibangweni ngoDisemba, izinzalelwane yaseMbizana.  
Ityala limiselwe umhla weshumi elinesihlanu kwinyanga ezayo. Ngolu suku kuzokhangelwa umkhomba ndlela kulungiselelwe ukuqala kweengxoxo.
title: Azakuxoxa kwinyanga ezayo amasela ezidumbu

text:
Iqela lootata kumasipala wesithili iAmathole lizeke mzekweni nalo lisilwa ukudlwengulwa, ukubulawa nokunkulwa kwabantwana kwakunye namanina okuthe gqolo kusenzeka kwiphondo leMpuma Koloni nakwilizwe liphela.  
Oku kulandela emva kokuba bethe bathatha imizuzu yabo yexesha lesidlo sasemini bephuma besiya kuma ezitalatweni ngakwii-ofisi zonke zalo masipala bephethe amaqwakuqwaku abhalwe ngokuchasene nokuphathwa gadalala kwamanina, ngokuhambela nenyanga yamanina le sikuyo 
“Sonke sinoxanduva singootata lokulwa kwanokukhusela oosisi bethu, oomama bethu kwakunye nabantwana bethu abangamantombazana. Sibone ukuba nathi singootata, sikwangabasebenzi baseAmathole, masivakalise elethu ilizwi kule nyanga yoomama. Singabambalwa kodwa sinethemba lokuba lona ilizwi lethu liza kufikelele pha napha kunjalo nje utshintsho lubekhona,” oko kudizwe nguSiyabulela Makunga, othethela umasipala iAmathole. 
UBandile Gqwetha nongusihlalo weli qonga lamadoda ebeyinxalenye naye neli phulo lokulwa ukuphathwa gadalala kwabantwana kwakunye namanina.
title: Amadoda aseAmathole alwa ubundlobongela

text:
Ityala lodlwengulo ebelibekwe uBanele Mancoba (30) lirhoxisiwe emva kokuba umtshutshisi evakalise ukuba ubungqina ngakweli tyala abonelanga. 
 
NgoLwesithathu, uMancoba ebevele enkundleni kamantyi waseNgcobo emva kokubanjwa kwakhe ngamatyala aquka ukuxhaphaza ngezesondo ilungu letyalike ekhe yangundabamlonyeni iMancoba Seven Angels’ Ministries eNyanga, eNgcobo. 
Le tyalike yaduma emva kokudutyulwa kubulawe amapolisa amahlanu aseNgcobo kuquka nejoni, kweyoMdumba kulo nyaka, kwisehlo esenziwa ngamalungu eMancoba Seven Angels’ Ministries. 
 
Isithethi seGunya Bantu lezoTshutshiso uLuxolo Tyali uthi umtshutshisi oyintloko, emva kokuba eqwalasele okuqulathwe kwizityholo ezityatyekwa uMancoba, ugqibe kwelokuba alirhoxise eli tyala ngenxa yokuba kungekho bungqina boneleyo. 
Kodwa uMancoba, ngokokutsho kukaTyali, usashiyeke ngaphakathi eziseleni kwelinye ityala atyatyekwa lona lokuceba ukuphanga. 
 
Ngethuba I’solezwe lalinodliwanondlebe noBanele Mancoba kwizakhiwo zale tyalike kweyoMdumba, le ndedeba yaxelela eli phephandaba isithi: “Ngokwesiprofeto sikatata (Siphiwo) akusekudanga ngoku ukuba avuke ekufeni. Yiyo le nto ubona abantu beyeke imisebenzi yabo, abanye bencame amakhaya abo. Bafuna ukuba yinxalenye nosapho lakwaMancoba, ukuze mhla abuyayo afike kukho aba bantu wayebashiye ebandleni lakhe.” 
 
Abo babebanjelwe ukubulala amapolisa basengaphakathi eziseleni. Aba ke nguAndani Monco, Kwanele Ndlwana, Siphosomzi Tshefu, Siphesihle Tatsi kwakunye noPhumzile Mhlatywa kunye noPhuthumile Mancoba.
title: Lirhoxisiwe ityala ngakuBanele Mancoba

text:
Amapolisa aseDutywa abambe owasetyhini oneminyaka engama-55 ngokufunyanwa enompu ongekho semthethweni nongenazimpepha uneembumbulu ezimbini ngaphakathi.  
Lo wasetyhini ubanjwe ngomgqibelo kusasa kwilali yakuTimane eColosa eDutywa. Ngokwengxelo, amapolisa aye ahletyelwa ngale nyewe yalo mama ngabahlali bakuTimane.  
Lo mpu kulindeleke ukuba uyokuhlolwa ukujonga ukuba awukhange wenze monakalo kusini na ngaphambili kummandla waseDutywa.  
Owasetyhini ujongene netyala lokuba nompu ongekho semthethweni.  
Kulindeleke ukuba avele namhlanje phambi kweenkundla zamatyala aseDutywa.
title: Kubanjwe owasetyhini enompu

text:
Amapolisa ommandla waseMthatha aphume iphulo ezama ukusiphula nengcambu udushe lweeteksi kwingingqi yaseOR Tambo. olu dushe ligqugqise iidolophu eMthatha, eNgqeleni naseSajonisi, kwaye kunhunhe abaqhubi, nakunye nabakhweli emva kokudutyulwa kwezi ziganeko.  
Ukulwa nlo mkhuba amapolisa asungule iphulo elibizwa operation Vulindlela ngoMvulo wale veki kwiziko loqeqesho lwamapolisa eMthatha. 
Ngobusuku bangoLwesihlanu weveki ephelileyo kudutyulwe kwabulawa umqhubi nomnini weteksi kwilali yaseLujecweni eNgqeleni, ngelixa omnye ebulewe eSajonisi. Ukanti eBuntingville eNgqeleni umqhubi udutyulwe wenzakala. UNjengele Sizakhele Dyantyi oyinkumanda yehlokondiba lamapolisa eMthatha uthi bafuna ukulwa nabantu abophula umthetho, bekwaqinisekisa ngokhuseleko lwabantu.  
“Sibona abakhweli bephila phantsi koloyiko lokuhlaselwa ezindleleni,sathatha inyathelo lokuqinisa umsebenzi wethu wokukhusela ukuzisa uzinzo kwezothutho kuphele uloyiko kubakhweli. Asinaxesha silibekileyo lokuyeka eli phulo de imeko ibuyele esiqhelweni,ixesha lokuthetha liphelile sifuna kwenziwe umsebenzi ngamapolisa kuba siwunikwe ngokuthenjwa,” kutsho uDyantyi. Ukwathi amapolisa akanosebenza odwa ukohlula lomkhuba kodwa abantu mabancedise ngolwazi nanjengoko kuchaphazeleka wonke umntu. Kwelakhe icala uBrigadier Nompumelelo Majikijela wamapolisa kummandla waseSajonisi uthi asixhenxe ubuncinane amatyala avuliweyo anxulumene nodushe lweeteksi kula ndawo kuquka nokuhlaselwa kwepolisa.  UMajikijela uthe: “Sizovala indlela sisenza ugqogqo phakathi kwindlela R61 siye nakwirenki ezahlukeneyo sibonakalise ukhuseleko lwabahlali.” Amacandelo athatha inxaxheba ku Operation Vulindlela aquka iTactical Response Team, Pop, ooKhetshe namanye, kwaye ngamapolisa angaphezulu kwekhulu elinamashumi amathandathu athatha inxaxheba nekulapho ohlulwe ngokwamaqela.  
Kusenjalo kuzoqwalaselwa imeko yezithuthi ezingena nombolo mbhalo nekudizwa ukuba zisetyenziswa kakhulu kwiziganeko zodubulo ezindleleni.
title: Iphulo lokusiphula neengcambu udushe loonoteksi

text:
Ngomhla wembali, ekudlalwe ngawo umdlalo wekhulu wedabi laseSoweto – Amakhosi ancume olukabhulankethe emva kokuquthisa i-Orlando Pirates ngo’1-0 emdlalweni weDStv Premiership obuseFNB Stadium emalanga namhlanje. Igowuli ephumelele ngalo iKaizer Chiefs ifakwe lixhwanguswa lefolosi, uSamir Nurkovic, emva kweshumi lemizuzu kwiisiqinga sesibini. 
UNurkovic unikelwe ibhola ngentloko nguLazarous Kambole oyifumene kuReeve Frosler. Isiqingatha sokuqala siqale ngesantya esiphezulu, njengesiqhelo – iPirates yiyo ebihlasela. ULinda Mntambo, uSiphesihle Ndlovu noDeon Hotto ngabona badlali bebethande ukuba yinkathazo kwiChiefs esiswini. 
UDaniel Cardoso, uEric Mathoho, uSiyabonga Ngezana noFrosler benza umsebenzi oncomekayo kakhulu. Amakhosi aqale ukudlala into ecalile emva kweshumi elinesihlanu umdlalo uqalile. Ebezixelele ukuba iPirates kufuneka idlale ngebhola – kodwa into engazukuyenza kukufaka ibhola emnatheni. 
Isiqingatha sokuqala siphele iyiChiefs ezamileyo ukudala amathuba acacileyo emdlalweni. Kwesesibini isiqqingatha, omabini amaqela athathe apho ayekho khona kwesokuqala. Akachithanga xesha lide uJosef Zinnbauer, ukhuphe uNtsikelelo Nyauza noLinda Mntambo – kwiindawo zabo ufake uFortune Makaringe noKabelo Dlamini. 
Emva kokusukelana ixeshana, iChiefs ibhalise ebhodiningegowuli elifakwe nguNurkovic – obenethuba elide engafumani magowuli. IPirates ayibethwanga ingazamanga, zininzi iinzame ezenzileyo emizuzwini yokugqibela – kodwa abadlali beChiefs bebevale mba emva. 
Ekugqibeleni, Amakhosi akwazile ukuphumelela okokuqala kule sizini emidlalweni wayo nePirates aphumelele imidlalo emithathu. Emva kokuzuza amanqaku amathathu, iChiefs ihleli kwindawo yethoba isuka kwindawo yeshumi elinanye. Ukubethwa kwePirates ehleli kwindawo yesine ngoku kunciphise kakhulu amathuba wayo okufumana iMamelodi Sundowns ekwindawo yokuqala. 
Kaizer Chiefs: Akpeyi, Frosler, Cardoso, Mathoho, Ngezana, Mashiane, Blom, Ngcobo, Parker, Kambole, Nurkovic. 
Amalalela: Bvuma, Katsande, Moleko, Agay, Sasman, Zulu, Matsheke, Lesako, Radebe. 
Orlando Pirates: Mpontshane, Hlatshwayo, Maela, Nyauza, Mako, Monare, Motshwari, Ndlovu, Pule, Hotto, Mntambo. 
Amalalela: Sandilands, Mabaso, Dzvukamanja, Tshobeni, Dlamini, Jooste, Makaringe, Mabasa, Mhango.
title: Amakhosi aquthise iPirates emdlalweni wekhulu wedabi laseSoweto

text:
Ifolosi ebikade idlalela iMamelodi Sundowns, uToni Silva, ithethe yashiya engalaziyo ngoPitso Mosimane kwincwadi ejikeleze kumajelo endaba namhlanje. USilva, 25, ngomnye wabadlali abangafumananga thuba kakuhle lokudlala kwiSundowns – kodwa obenethamsanqa lokuthengwa liqela lase-Egypt ekuthiwa yi-Al-Ittihad ekuqaleni kwale nyanga. Lo mdlali waseGuinea-Bissau udlalele amaqela waseNgilane naseBulgaria phambi kokutyikitywa nguPitso. Kwincwadi ebhalwe, uSilva umchaze uPitso Mosimane njengebhetyebhetye lomqeqeshi, uzwilakhe onomkhethe ebadlalini. 
“Ukungafuni kwakho ukuva ilizwi lomnye omntu akuloncedo kwaye kuyabanxunguphalisa abadlali bakho. Ubulala izakhono zabadlali wakugqiba uthi “izinto azihambanga kakuhle”’. 
“Ndisebenze phantsi kwesikhokelo sakho iinyanga ezintandathu. Yonke imihla ubusenzisa into enye… kodwa uthi ungumqeqeshi? Ubusokolo usithi ukuba umdlali udlale kakuhle uza kulifumana ithuba lesibini. Lo nto ibingeyonyaniso ngoba ubungumqeqeshi onomkhethe’. 
“Unabadlali obanikayo ithuba lesibini nokuba abadlalanga kakuhle noxa abanye bengalifumani ithuba lesibini xa bengadlalanga kakuhle ngoba (wena) ungumqeqeshi ongalunganga. Oko ndafika kwiSundowns, zange wandinika ithuba lokudlala endaweni yam endifaneleyo ephikweni – kodwa uyakwazi uhamb’ uthetha kakhulu emaphepheni usithi izinto azihambanga kakuhle, logama usithi abanye abadlali basebenza kakhulu’. 
“Sulibala ukuba wena unabadlali bakho obathandayo obanikayo ilungelo lokudlala ngendlela abayithandayo – kuphinde kubekho abo bangavunyelwayo ukuba badlale ngendlela abayithandayo’. 
USilva uthethe oku ngemeko kaGeorge Lebese ongadlaliyo naye kwiSundowns: “UnoLebese eqeleni lakho ongamdlalisiyo. Wonke umntu uyamazi uGeorge Lebese ukuba ungomnye wabadlali abanesiphiwo kwi-Absa Premier Soccer League – kodwa awukwazi ukucacisa ukuba kutheni engadlali ngoba uhamba usithi: izinto azihambanga kakuhle’. 
“Uyoyika nangoku ukumkhulu (uGeorge Lebese) ngoba uza kubhenca ukuba ungumqeqeshi onjani futhi aphinde adlale kakuhle’. 
USilva ulebele ngelithi uPitso makafunde kumqeqeshi weCape Town City, uBenni McCarthy, obaxabisileyo abadlali bakhe. “Awubasebenzisi kakuhle abadlali bakho ngoba umfanyekiswa ngumkhethe lo unawo,” utshilo uSilva. Amasandawana adlala naMaZulu ngecala emva kwentsimbi yesixhenkxe namhlanje eLoftus Stadium.
title: UToni Silva umxelele iindaba zakhe umqeqeshi weMamelodi Sundowns

text:
Sinkenenkene isimo samanqindi aseMpuma Koloni. Kule minyaka mibini edlulileyo ibiyimbalela kwicala lamanqindi.  
Kulo nyaka kuvumbuluke ukruthakruthwano phakathi kwabaququzeleli . 
Ngo2016 abaququzeleli basungula iqumrhu ekuthiwa yiEastern Cape Boxing Promoters Association enjongo yayo yayikukukhulisa amanqindi eMpuma Koloni.  
Kwinkomfa yalo mbutho konyulwa uAyanda Matiti (usihlalo) noThando Zonke. 
Kulo nyaka, la madoda akwiinkampu ezimbini ezingaboni ngasonye.  
UZonke wonyulwe njengosihlalo kunyulo olubanjwe eScenary Park kutshanje – kodwa akukacaci ukuba liza kuma kusini ulawulo lwabo ngoba ngomhla wolonyulo kwakungekho mntu omele iBoxing SA. 
 Bonke abonyulwa ngo2016 bebengekho, kuquka noMatiti, ekukholelwa ukuba akafuni kusuka esikhundleni nangona ixesha lakhe liphelile. 
“Ndandingomnye owayeluxhasa ulonyulo eChintsa – kodwa zange sivumelane ngokuphatha iminyaka emibini. Sasithe sifuna aphathe unyaka omnye ngoba iimpephamvume zobuququzeleli zithatha unyaka. Ngoko ke akekho umntu onemvume yolawulo olungaphezu konyaka,” utshilo uZonke. 
“Enye yezinto esizikhalazelayo kukuba yiXaba Boxing Promotion yodwa exhamlayo kwimali exhasa abaququzeleli esuka kwisebe lezemidlalo eMpuma Koloni,” utshilo uZonke. 
Isithethi sombutho owaya kulo nyulo ngo2016, uMnu. Xolani Jamani, utyhola iqela elikhokelwa nguZonke ngobugwala nangokwenza izinto ngendlela engalulanga.  
“La madoda ayikho la nto ayenzileyo. UBSA nesebe lezemidlalo kufuneka babekhona kunyulo. Bebengekhona kulonyulo lwabantu. Siza kubanonyulo ngenyanga yeSilimela ngoba ixesha leenkokheli ezazonyulwe eChintsa liphela ngoko,” uJamani utshilo. 
“Ayivumelani kumgaqosiseko konke konke la nto yenziwe ngala madoda. Ndiyakuqinisekisa, kunyulo oluza kuba kwinyanga yeSilimela uza kube ekhona uBSA kwaye nguye oza kubhatala iindleko zolonyulo,” utshilo uJamani.
title: Balwa ngezikhundla abamanqindi eMpuma Koloni

text:
Zaqubuda izizwe zonke, Zakhedama iintlanga zonke, Zavova iiflegi zoMzantsi weAfrika, Zaqengqeleka iinyembezi kwizalamane, Lwaqala usizi kwizihlobo, Zathi tshitshilili iindaba zokuwa kweqhawekazi, Zathokombisa iintaka, zadangala nezityalo, Yatshintsha imo yezulu, Kwalusizi ezantsi emhlabeni, Izizwe zonke kweli lomdibaniso zinxubile, Uz’usikhonzele kwamanye amaqhawe Zanyiwe.  
Ukufa kukufikele Nomzamo washiya umzila wethemba, Ukufa kukufikele ntombi kaMadikizela Washiya imbali engasoze yabuna, Waliphakamis’inqindi kwaphephezel’umoya woxolo nothando, Igalelo lakho lishiye umzila obukekayo kule nkululeko, Izivubeko onazo ziyakupholiswa ngeoli yasemazulwini, Iintlungu ubunazo zoxuthiwe, UThixo ubabizela kuye bonke abalungileyo.  
Yashiy’ezomhlab’emhlabeni inzwakazi, Lalala obanaphakade iqhawekazi, Lashiya thina nento zomhlaba, Inzwakaz’entle engafanelwe kubhubha, Bekungasekho nempunde na engafela eli qhawekazi? Yanga ndingazenza idini ndinikele ngam, Ntonje wonke umntu unomda, Uze ubulise kuChris Hani kwelozwe, Lala mama ushiye intlungu zomhlaba , Ukuphumla ukuphiwe.  
Sithi thuthu kusapho lwakaMandela, Akuhlanga lungehliyo, Ukufa akuqheleki, ukufa akunalusini, Sithi thuthu kusapho lwakwaMadikizela, Lo mmiselo wuqondeni , Kulele iqhawe elinobuntu nesisa, Kulel’umama onobubele nothando, Kulel’umama omhle ononcumo , Uz’ubulise kooTambo qhawekazi.  
Ndinga ndingakuthwesa isidlokolo sengqanga nakwelogumbi lakho lanaphakade, Ndinga ndingakombesa ngomnweba wengwe nakwelokhaya lakho lokugqibela, Emehlweni wam uyakuhlala uliqhawekazi, Ndiyalubona olo ncumo lwakho ngamehl’engqondo, Ntonje ndiswele amandl’okuzoba umfanekiso-ngqondweni ndizobele esi sizwe sidandathekileyo, Ndinomnqweno wokuba nawe uyakuvuka ngomhla wovuko, Ndinethemba lokuba awufanga koko ukhothamile nkosazana, Uze usibulisele kooSisulu.  
Phumla ngoxolo MaNgutyana, Ukufa kweqhawekazi kunesidima, Lala ngoxolo mama wesizwe, Usishiya sidandathekile , Uthandekile elizweni kwaye uthembekile, Uthembeke kwangumzuzu wokugqibela, Ze nisiphathe ngobunono isithsaba sale ntokazi Mzantsi Afrika, Ze niwaphathe ngobunono amathambo eqhawekazi lesizwe, Umzamo uwuzamile nogqatso ulufezile, Icekwa lilele kuthi thina basele phezu kwegade, Wanga umphefumlo wakho ungaphumla ngoxolo, Uhambo lwakho lusothusile.
title: Uhambile umama wesizwe

text:
Amaqela amabini amakhulu eSuper Rugby kweli loMzantsi Afrika azakuqala ukhenketho kule mpelaveki.  
Ukhenketho amatyeli amaninzi ludla ngokuwanceda okanye luwabulale amaqela eSuper Rugby. IiBulls zizakube zisendleleni kuhambo lweeveki ezintathu olusingise e-Australia, kule veki izayo.Kweezi veki zintlanu zidlulileyo, bakwazile ukukhuphisana, kuba abanamdlalo bathe babethwa kuwo. Kolu khenketho bazakudlala neeReds, zaseAustralia ezingeloqela libetheka lula ingakumbi xa lidlalela kowalo. IReds ziyiqale kakubi kakhulu le sizini babethwe kwimidlalo emine kwemithandathu abayidlalileyo. 
Omnye umdlalo ozakunikisa umdla weSuper Rugby kule mpelaveki ngumdlalo ophakathi kweStormers neeLions. Indlela abadlala ngayo kulo nyaka yahluke kakhulu kunenimyaka edlulileyo. 
 Ngelixa zidlala neSunwolves kwiveki ephelileyo iiStormers bezihlasela kakuhle, kwaye bezidlala ngesantya esiphezulu kakhulu.
title: UKhenketho lungadala iingxaki kwiiBulls

text:
Yinyhikityha yantoni nale ikweli lizwe? Impi yomlomo seyilanyulwa ngezulu lezandla? Uthetha-thethwano yinto engasiwe so, Kuxhwitshulwa imiphefumlo yamaqhawe, Kushiyeke eyezaqhaga, KuseGcibhala kwizihange ziyatanasa, Uba yindlala makube inamanyala, Kazi yozala nkomoni? 
Lilele iQhawe elithembekileyo, Elafunga alajika lathi noba kubi ndakufel’emfazweni, Lala mntaka Magaqa umzamo uwuzamile, Kwaye nogqatso ubuseza nalo kakuhle, Ababulali bakho bakhona bazingomba isifuba, Abazilibali benze into yokwenyani, Kodwa nelab’ilanga liyeza lakubatshonel’ emini, Zizikhundla kusini na ezi ezenza kubenje? Yimali kusini na le ingunozala walo mbhodamo? Sizibuz’imibuzo engaphendulekiyo, siva ubuhlungu bentliziyo. 
Uliqhawe Sindiso,iqhawe elifele ubuqhawe nokuzinikela, Ungcatshiwe usangcamla inkululeko, Wacuthelwa iintsuku usathe chuu, Bushunqulelwe ubomi bakho lashiyek’usapho lwakho lunyembezana, Kubangwa ubukhulu nezikhundla. 
Ababulali bazenza abacudisi nabangcatshi, Bona basishiya sinesingqala nesingqukru, Namhlanje sibulalana sodwa, Sibukeka njengezidenge kubaphambukeli, Sinenzondo ehamba nekratshi, Unozala yimpixano nembambano, Kukurhala, ukunyoluka noburhalarhume, Kubulawa imiphefumlo engenatyala , Kushiy’amawexu-wexu, amasela namazim, Isono sikaSindiso kukuzinikela. 
Lala ngoxolo qhawe lamaqhawe, Ukufa kukufikele, ushiye umzila wentembeko , Uxhwilwe bubuxhwili nobubhedengu, Izirhalarhume nenjubaqa zikuthumele kooyihlo phambi kwexesha, Iintsunguzi zobudenge azinakugecwa. Liphalel’igazi lomAfrika, Laphalala lashiy’usizi nengxubakaxaka, Intshaba zixhelelw’eXhukwane, Kubabulali kusindwe ngobethole, Umnqweno wabo ufezekile, Umbuzo ngubani ozokulandela? Kulusizi nentlungu kwaMagaqa ngenxa yezandla ezimdaka, Izandla ezixwaye intukuthelo nentiyo, Siqalekisiwe eso sandla esidale inkedama, Sashiy’usizana olungumhlolokazi. 
Iyakuzika loo nqanawe yobukroti ngeny’mini, Ubukrelekrele isezokuba bubu ethe-ethe, Ababulali bavukelane bodwa, Andishwabuli nto nje ndiyashwankathela, Sawuhlangulwa nguQamata, sivuse noMvelingqangi, Thethani inyaniso kuzokuthungeka loo manxeba kwabanyembezana, Bazenz’iitshomi kanti zintshaba ezitshabalalise itshantliziyo, Ubuntu bemka noMbombayi beza nombayi-mbayi, Sikhanywa yintambo yedyokhwe emqaleni, Kunqabe isimo nesimilo, Kwanqab’intobeko nentembeko, Kwadlanga ubugebenga nobulwanyana obukhatshwa bubunja nobugwinta, Lala ngoxolo mntakaMagaqa uThixo uzokulwela.
title: Lala ngoxolo Sindiso Magaqa uThix’ uzokulwela

text:
Chithani amanzi inkukhu ibalekile. Oku kwenzeke emba kokuba aBafana Bafana bengakwazanga ukuzibekela indawo kwi-Afcon, kwakhona! Abalandeli bebhola eMzantsi Afrika baza kuvuka ngomso bombethe ingubo yehlazo emva kokuba aBafana Bafana bebethwe yiSudan ngo’2-0 emdlalweni kaGroup C wokugqibela wokuzibekela indawo kwi-Afcon eza kube iseCameroon ekuqaleni konyaka ozayo. 
Iqela lesizwe loMzantsi Afrika liye eSudan lidinga inqaku elinye kuphela emva kokubambana neGhana ngo’1-1 emdlalweni obuseFNB Stadium ngoLwesine ebusuku kule veki. 
Lo nto ithethe ukuthi aBafana Bafana kufuneka balwelwe ukungabethwa okungenani ukuba abakwazi ukuyibetha iSudan. Iboyisile lo nto ngoba emzuzwini wokuqala, uSaifeldin Bakhit, ibhalise igowuli lokuqala ebhodini yatsho yahamba phambili iSudan. 
Konke oku kwenzeke emva kokuba iqela likaMolefi Ntseki liphose amathuba amaninzi. Phambi kokusongwa kwesigaba sesibini, uMohamed Abdel Raman ufake igowuli lesibini leSudan atsho ancipha ngakumbi amathuba woMzantsi Afrika wokuzuza impumelelo. 
UBen Motshwari, obenikelwe nguThapelo Morena, ukhe wakhaba ibhola efumana ithuba – kodwa ibhola yakhe iye yabanjwa ngu-Eshrein.UNtseki ukhuphe ithemba lokugqibela uPercy Tau, endaweni yakhe ufake uSifiso Hlanti odlala emva. 
USudana isebenzile ngoba iye yaqinisekisa ukuba ifaka amagowuli futhi idlala kakuhle ngomso. Babethe njalo ke aBafana Bafana abangaqaliyo ukuphoxa abalandeli baseMzantsi Afrika. Ukugcinwa kukaNtseki njengomqeqeshi yeyona nto eza kuba semilebeni yabantu abaninzi emva kobufede obuboniswe liqela lakhe kwakhona. 
Bafana: Williams, Hlatshwayo, Maela, Xulu, Monare, Motshwari, Morena, Zwane, Maboe, Singh, Tau. 
South Africa: Khune, Hlanti, Martin, Kutumela, Phete, Mbule, Gamildien, Nodada, Mvala, Lebusa, Pule, Foster.
title: Ubufede beBafana Bafana kuwufake ehlazweni uMzantsi Afrika – kwakhona!

text:
Uzakuvavwa ngembasa ngorhatya lwanamhlanje uNjingalwazi Mvuyo Tom,  ngethuba iKomani Development Foundation izakube inik’ imbeko koosaziwayo baseKomani.  
Ingxelo ephuma kwiKDF ithi ezi mbasa zikhutshwa ngeenjongo zokunika imbeko, logama zikwakhuthaza abo bangumzekelo ngomsebenzi wabo eKomani nakuMzantsi Afrika.  
Usihlalo weKDF uLuvuyo Rani,  uthi uTom yenye yamadoda abayihloniphayo ngenxa yomsebenzi awenzileyo ebomini bakhe. 
 “Uliphakamisile igama lale dolophu yaseKomani ngoko siza kumnika imbeko, asinguye yedwa ke bakhona nabanye abafana no-Inga Vangqa oyinjineli ephume izandla nabanye abaninzi,” ucacise watsho uRani.  
UMvuyo Tom uthathe umhlala phantsi eyingqonyela yeyunivesithi yaseFort Hare kunyaka ophelileyo, ethetha neli phepha ngamava akhe kwintlalo yaseKomani wathi:  “Sikhule intlalo inzima kodwa kumnandi apha eKomani ngalo maxesha, sonke sinenjongo yokuba makufundwe, izikolo zonke ezilapha zixaxekile yimidlalo, umculo kwakunye nezifundo,” watsho uTom. 
      IKDF iqhube iinkqubo ezahlukeneyo ukusukela ngoLwesine                       wale veki eziquka ukuxhotyiswa koosomashishini abakhulayo                  ngezi mbasa zizakunikiswa ngolu rhatya.  
      Usaziwayo womsasazi okwayinzalelwana yaseKomani,  uNonala             Tose, usebenzise eli thuba ukuxhobisa oosomashishini abaphuma          kwiindawo ezahlukeneyo zaseKomani. 
      ”Umbono wakho ngeshishini lakho sesona sixhobo sikuncedisa                 ukuba ukwazi ukuzibona uwuzalisekisa lo mbono, masifunde                   ukwabelana ngolwazi ukuze sonke sibenolwazi olufanele                         amashishini ethu,” uthethe watsho uTose. 
      Le nzwakazi isebenza njengomdidiyeli weenkqubo kwijelo losasazo       i-5FM eRawutini,  ikwaqhuba ushishino lweenkampani ezenza izinto       ezininzi. 
   ”Omnye umlenze woshishino lwam kukukhuthaza nokufundisa                amabanjwa ezintolongweni ngeendlela zokuba alungele ukubuyela       eluntwini bezilungiselele, noluntu nalo lukwazi ukubamkela,” uthethe      watsho uTose. 
  
  Ukanti uRani uthi iKDF ineenjongo zokuqinisa ubuhlobo nabezoshishino, imfundo nokuphuhliswa kwezimali. 
“Simi ngemigomo emithathu imfundo, uphuhliso lwezimali kunye nezoshishino,  yiloo nto usibona apha sikhuthaza ngezi mbasa abantu abaphuma kwezemfundo njengoNjingalwazi Tom, sixhobise oosomashishini,” uthethe watsho uRani.
title: Uzakwamkela imbasa uNjingalwazi Mvuyo Tom

text:
Umbutho weZizwe eziManyeneyo (United Nations) ubekele bucala lo nyaka ka2019 ukuze kuqinisekiswe okokuba iilwimi zenkobe zifumana intlonipho eziyifaneleyo. Kusoloko kukho impazamo eyenziwa ngabantu abathile abacinga ukubalula isiNgesi “sodwa” yeyona nto ebhadlileyo. Kanti ke akunjalo. Ukuphakanyiswa kweelwimi zonke zehlabathi linyathelo elincomekayo ngoba lo nto iqinisa indlela abahleli ngayo abantu nababelana ngayo ngolwazi lwezinto ezibalulekileyo entlalweni yabo. Kwinyanga ephelileyo, uMongameli welizwe, uCyril Ramaphosa, ukhuthaze ukuhlonitshwa kweelwimi zemveli kwintetho ayothule ngomhla wamaLungelo oLuntu eSharpeville. Uthe ukuhlonitshwa kweelwimi zabantu kuyinxalenye yokuhlonitshwa “kwamalungelo abantu”. Ngamanye amazwi wayesithi “Iilwimi mazisetyenziswe ngendlela efanelekileyo”. Ndithe mandiqhwaye uchuku  nje! Ndithethe ngesiXhosa – ulwimi olunzonzayo okwesibane ekuthiwa ngufinyafuthi okhanyise kungquphantsi. Kukho amaXhosa afundileyo acinga ukuba ukwazi isiNgesi yeyona nto ebaluleke ukodlula zonke izinto ebomini. Yingcingane efileyo leyo, abayityala eluntwini besebenzisa amaqonga eendaba, iicawe, iindibano zoluntu kuba befuna ukubonwa ngendlela ethile ngabantu. 
Impazamo yamagqobhoka (abelungu abamnyama) kukucinga ukuba abantu abathetha isiXhosa esisulungekileyo bachasene nempucuko. Wonke umntu kufuneka akhumshe ukuze abonakale njengomntu obhadlileyo kuwo. Umongameli uhlab’ ikhwelo ngexesha elibi, iilwimi zethu zisengelwa phantsi nguRhulumente nejelo losasazo loluntu – iSABC. Zizigidi ezingaphaya kwesithandathu abantu abathetha isiXhosa kweli lizwe, kodwa ngeke utsho ngoba uRhulumente wePhondo akasisebenzisi nangona umgaqosiseko usithi mazisetyenziswe iilwimi zabantu.  
Omnye umntu angacinga ukuthethwa kwesiXhosa ngesiNgesi kwiSABC yinto edaliweyo kube kungenjalo. Kubonakala ngathi abaphathi kwiSABC bakhetha iindlela ezimfutshane xa beqesha abantu kuba besenzelela abantu abazana nabo. Ndiyitsho lo nto kuba akukho zibhengezo ezenziwayo xa kukhangelwa abafundi beendaba phaya kuMhlobo Wenene FM. Ukusukela mhla kwasungulwa I’solezwe lesiXhosa, abantu bafumene iqonga lokuthetha ngesiXhosa. 
Abaninzi basoloko besilungisa xa kukho igama abangaliqondiyo okanye elibhalwe kakubi. Okuye kwacaca kum kukuba abantu bafuna isiXhosa esibhalwe ngendlela efanelekileyo necacileyo kubo. Ibalulekile nyhani ke lo nto. Kodwa mna ndithi ukulungisa I’solezwe endaweni yokuqala ngoMhlobo Wenene, yinkcithaxesha. Makuqalwe kulungiswe indlela esithethwa ngayo isiXhosa kuMhlobo Wenene, kugqityelwe ngalo I’solezwe. Nazi izizathu: 1. UMhlobo Wenene lijelo losasazo labantu elinikwe igunya lokusasaza ngesiXhosa kuphela. 2. UMhlobo Wenene unefuthe ebantwini ngaphezulu kweencwadi ngoba ufikelela ngokukhawuleza ebantwini futhi simahla. 3. Kufuneka isiXhosa sithethwe kakuhle (singathethwa ngesiNgesi) ukuze sibhalwe kakuhle. Kungakuhle ukubona nokuva iinkokheli eziphetheyo eBhisho zithetha isiXhosa esiphucukileyo xa zithetha ewayilesini. 
Ukuba bekusekho iiNkosi neeKumkani eziyikhathaleleyo inkcubeko yazo, beziza kuhlanganisa iinkokheli zikaRhulumente namajelo eendaba (onke) asebenzisa isiXhosa kulungiswe le ngxaki. Ntekunayo iinkosi ezikhoyo zithe phithi bubomi beengcungcu kodwa singqongwe ngabantu abathe gabhu endlaleni. Xa ndisithi makuthethwe isiXhosa, andithi masingathethwa isiNgesi ngabantu – kodwa sinendawo yaso.  
Xa singathethwa kakuhle isiNgesi, abantu bayakhala. Kungani ingenzeki lo nto xa ezinye iilwimi zisophulwa? Ulwimi luza emva kwengqondo ngokubaluleka – ezo zizixhobo uThixo awazinika umntu xa wayemdala. Sicela isiXhosa esilula, esiviwa ngumntu wonke  kodwa singathethwa ngesiNgesi. Phaya kwinyanga yesibini kulo unyaka, ngenye imini uSlyso wancokola noMnu. Zolani Bongco ngobom bakhe njengomsasazi omdala kwezemidlalo. Kuloo ncoko, uBongco wathi uMhlobo Wenene yindawo enkulu efundisa abantu abaninzi, watsho esithi yiYunivesithi enezigidi ezingaphaya kwesihlanu zabantu, ethelekisa nenkosikazi yakhe efundisa abantwana besikolo ehlohla kuso. 
Wayethetha inyaniso uBongco, uMhlobo Wenene uyiYunivesithi, kodwa engaphezulu kwezi ziqhelekileyo ngoba uyeyona ndawo enkulu edibanisa abantu. Umsebenzi wephephandaba (I’solezwe) noMhlobo Wenene kukwazisa abantu izinto ezibalulekileyo, ukufundisa nokonwabisa – kodwa zonke ezo zinto zenziwa kuqanyelwe ngaso isiXhosa. Onke amajelo eendaba (amaphephandaba, oomabonakude neewayilese) kunyanzelekile zihloniphe inkcubeko yamaXhosa.  
Xa sithetha ngenkcubeko sithetha ngamasiko, izithethe, iilwimi nezinye izinto zabantu iindawo amajelo eendaba (asebenzisa isiXhosa kuphela) azinze kuzo. Makuqeshwe abantu abasaziyo isiXhosa futhi abazimisele ukusikhulisa, hayi abantu abafuna imali ezipokothweni zabo ekupheleni kwenyanga. Ukubambisana kukaRhulumente, amajelo eendaba nePensalb yeyona nto ingasisisombululo.
title: Lungisani uMhlobo Wenene, nigqibele ngamaphephandaba esiXhosa

text:
KOOMASIPALA ababini baseMpuma Koloni ebifudula ibalawula, iKoukamma neDr Beyers Naude, iANC iphulukene nolawulo lwesininzi kwaba masipala. 
Ukubalwa kweevoti kwaba masipala kugqityiwe. 
Ngo2016 iANC yaphumelela iKoukamma ngomyinge we-50.9%. Kolu lonyulo iANC iyakwazanga ukuphumelela ngesininzi kulo masipala ozinze eKareedouw. 
Emva kobalo, iANC ifumene u-46.3%, iDA 27.5% ze iPatriotic Alliance yafumana u-10.9%. 
Ukanti eDr Beyers Naude, umasipala ozinze eRhafu, iANC ifumene u-46.8%, iDA 39.6% ze iPatriotic Alliance yafumana u-4.2%. 
Ngo2016, iANC yaphumelela iDr Beyers Naude ngomyinge we-51.1%.
title: AbeANC baphulukene nolawulo lwesininzi koomasipala ababini eMpuma Koloni

text:
AMAPOLISA ekunye nosapho lakwa Sitshetshe eMatatiele afunisa ngenkwenkwana eyalahleka kwilali yaseLukholweni kwinyanga yoMsintsi. 
USikhokele Sitshetshe oneminyaka emibini waduka ngexesha edlala neentanga zakhe kwamakhelwane apho wayegciniswe khona nguninakhulu. 
Ingxelo kanina uChwayita Sitshetshe ominyaka engamashumi amabini anesibini ithe: “USikhokele wayegciniswe ngumama wam kwamakhelwane kuba ndandisesikolweni, xa siyomthatha emalanga kwathiwa akaziwa ubonwe sele enyamalele. Sazama ukumfuna kodwa asikamfumani nangoku akukho nomkhondo. Kubuhlungu, asilali sicingana naye, ndiyacela nabani ongasinceda simfumane asazise.” 
USitshetshe uthe kuyaqala ukulahleka umntwana kule lali kwaye kunzima nokusola ngokumehleleyo.  
Uthe unyanakhe yinkwenkwana ethanda ukuhleka nokudlala, emfutshane entsundu ngebala. Wagqityelwa ukubonwa enxibe isikhinda esitshekhi nejezi eluhlaza natyheli neembadada. Olu sapho luthi lusenethemba lokuba uyaphila apho akhoyo kuba akubonakali nathambo okanye sinxibo esingabonisa ukuba wagetyengwa. 
Othethela amapolisa aseLukholweni eMatatiele uKhapteni Raphael Motloung uthe ityala lomntwana olahlekileyo lavulwa laqaliswa uphando kodwa unangoku akukafunyanwa nkcaza ibambekayo ngokuduka kwale nkwenkwana. 
Onolwazi angatsalela akwaSitshetshe ku0727879440 okanye amapolisa.
title: Kufuniswa ngemveku elahlekileyo eMatatiele

text:
Imbethi-manqindi eyinzalelwane yakwa N.U 12 eMdantsane uMakazole “The Professor” Tete uphumelele ngendlela encumisayo kuRamadhani Kumbele oyinzalelwane yase- Tanzania kumlo we Regional IBF kudidi lweJunior-bantamweight eOrient Theatre ngolwesihlanu kwimizuzu emibini kumjikelo wokuqala. Le ndedeba ibibuyela okokuqala kwiqonga lokulwa emva kokungcamla ukubethwa kwikamva lakhe kudidi labahlawulwayo xeshikweni wayecela umngeni kwintshinga yeInternational Boxing Organisation kuGideon Buthelezi. 
Kumlo omkhulu wosuku, intshatsheli yoMzantsi Afrika uMcBute Sinyabi uphumelele intshinga ye IBO international kuFrancis Miyeyusho oyinzalelwane yaseTanzania. 
Impumelelo kaSinyabi kuMiyeyusho imnika ithuba lokusondela ekulweni intshinga yehlabathi, ngelixa uMiyeyusho ebethwa ityeli lesibini kweli,  emva kokubethwa kanobom nguZolani Tete ngonyaka ka 2008. 
UBongani Mahlangu uyikhusele ngempumelelo intshinga yakhe yelizwe kudidi lweJunior-featherweight ebetha uJasper Seroka.
