Kukho oye wahleba esithi, “Andiyikholelwa ukuba le ndoda isaphila.” Kule ndawo bekugcwele iintatheli, abakhenkethi, izangoma, kukwakho nomama wekumkanikazi yaBakwena uMathokoana Mopeli wendlu yakomkhulu eseQwaqwa. Ibiyimpelaveki, apho bekusungulwa ngokusesikweni Impelaveki yeNkolo yakwaNtu liziko elijongene nemiyezo yezokhenketho iSanParks eGolden Gate eseHighlands national Park. 
Iphulo le SanParks belijoliswe ekukhulisweni kweenkcubeko ezahlukeneyo nokufundisa uluntu ngenkolo yakwaNtu, iinkokeli zemveli, nendlela ekuphilwa ngayo kwiilali ezikufutshane nale ndawo. 
Bebothukile nabo babeke batyelela apha ngaphambili kukubona inkonde efana noNtate Taba Tsa Badimo osephile ixesha elide, ngelo xesha izangoma bezigquma zibonga. “Makhosi! Thokoza Gogo!” Zivakele zisitsho. Ziguqe ngamadolo zityibela izinyanya ngelinqulayo. 
Xa ungena kweli qolomba kucima amakhandlela ayimibalabala owafumana ekhanyisiwe, ancanyatheliswa ematyeni. Abanye bangena bephethwe luloyiko apha, kuba bengazi. Wonke umntu olapha iba ngathi uguqukile, uphila kumaxesha amandulo. Kubekho igcutswana labantu eliphuma kwizindlu ezakhiwe ngamatye nodongwe, kukhonkotha izinja, kukhonya imiqhagi.  
Abasetyhini basakha amanzi emlanjeni, uluntu kule ndawo alinxibi zihlangu kwaye kusaphekwa ngeenkuni. Amanye amadoda ebecanda iinkuni, ngelixa amanye ekhanda amayeza. Abasetyhini abangafumani bantwana beza apha, ngelizofumana imithandazo kaNtate Taba Tsa Badimo. Esinye sezangoma uThato Tshukudu ubesichubela ngamandla emithandazo yale nkonde, enceda abo bangafumani nzala. Noxa kunjalo uyibalule eyokuba ukuzofumana umthandazo apha akuthethi ukuthi uzakumitha ngosuku olulandela utyelelo elo. 
UTshukudu ukwathe, uluntu lwamkelekile ngamaxesha onke apha, noxa kunjalo wabalula eyokuba ezi ntaba ikwa ngamakhaya ezangoma, namanye amaqela eenkolo ezahlukileyo, watsho esithi kubalulekile ukuhlonipha abo beyenza ikhaya labo le ndawo. Phakathi kwezindlu ezilapha, kukho indawo eluphawu elikhethekileyo ekungamkelwa nokuba ngubani kuyo. “Ngamagqala kuphela awamkelekileyo phaya,” utshilo uTshukudu. Abakhenkethi bafundiswe ngokutshiswa kwempepho, ukuphehlwa, nohambo ngeenyawo olusingise kwilali yenkcubeko yabeSuthu.  
Kule lali sihlale ecaleni kweziko, sotha umlilo, satya ukutya kwesintu, sisela nomqombothi, sabona nobumbejembeje bokukhanya kweenkwenkwezi. Sibaliselwe imbali kakumkani uMoshoeshoe, sabukela namaqwarha agcinwe apha. UVictor Mokoena obengumkhaphi bakhenkethi uthe libalulekile ulwazi ngendlela asebenza ngayo amagqirha.  
Intwaso yinto yeendindi ngeendidi zabantu, abanye babo bafundile, kodwa eyona nto ingundoqo, ziingcambu nothando kubizo lwabo zizinyanya. Ngelixesha sibuyela eGoli omnye wabakhenkethi ubalise ngentlonipho ayizuzileyo ngakwinkolo yesiNtu. Nditsho ndakhumbula into ebhalwe nguEllen Goodman waseMelika ethi, “Imvelaphi sisibane esisenzulwini sentliziyo yomntu, esinamandla, nekunzima ukusicacisa, ngelinye ixesha awusazi nokuba sikhona.”
title: Umyalezo osuka kwizinyanya

text:
KAPA:  
Usethubeni lokuphumelela iindondo ezimbini athe watyunjelwa zona kwiNational Community Radio Week Awards (NCRW) ezibanjwa minyaka le uSivuyile ‘Khuze’ Wayi ongumsasazi kwisikhululo sika nomathotholo wasekuhlaleni iZibonele FM. 
“Eli lityeli lam lesibini ndichongwa nanjengoko kunyaka ophelileyo ndingazange ndiphumelele kodwa kulo nyaka ndichongelwe amawonga amabini!” utshilo uSivuyile Wayi (28) ongumsasazi kwiZibonele FM eKhayelitsha.  
Kulo nyaka ube nenyhweba yokuchongwa njengoyena msasazi obalaseleyo oyindoda ze wachongelwa kwakho kwinkqubo ayibhexeshayo. 
 “Ndichulumancile kakhulu ukuba ndiphinde ndichongwe kwakho kulo nyaka lo nto ithetha ukuba noko ikho into abayibonayo apha kum njengomsasazi” utshilo okaWayi.  
Uthi uyazingca ngokuphinda atyunjwe kwakho esitsho kananjalo ukuba unethemba lokuba uyakuphumelela kulo nyaka. 
Oka Wayi waqala ukusasaza kwiZibonele FM ngonyaka ka2014 kwaye uthi unesipho sokuba ngumsasazi ngelithi uliciko lokuthetha yaye uthi wenza into ayiphilayo.  
UWayi unqwenela ukukhula kakhulu kwezosasazo engalungiseleli yena nje kuphela koko nabanye abantu ngelizama ukusondeza unomathotholo eluntwini ngokubanzi.  
“Imfihlo yam njengomsasazi kukubeka abaphulaphuli phambili ze mna ndize mva!” utshilo okaWayi.  
OkaWayi uthi uchongwe njengomsasazi obalaseleyo kwinkqubo ethi ‘Unyango lwesiNtu’ ze waphinda wachongwa kwakho kwinkqubo yezenkolo kumyalezo wosuku odluliswa rhoqo kusasa ngeMigqibelo.  
Kananjalo xa uvotela okaWayi, ukuze umbeke ethubeni lokuphumelela kwiNCRW uthumela igama elingu “Male 6” ku45844 ze uphinde kwakho uthi “Religion 1” uthumele kwakho kule nombolo ingentla. 
Kungokunje okaWayi wenza izifundo zakhe kunyaka wokuqala njengomfoti eCPUT. 
 Ukwakhuthaza abo bagxelesha ukuba ngabasasazi ukuba balandele izakhono zabo yaye bagxile ngakumbi kwizifundo zabo. 
Abaphumeleleyo kwiNCRW bakwaziwa kweyo Mdumba 2019.
title: Umsasazi waseZibonele usethubeni lokuphumelela kumawonga eNCRW

text:
Anciphe ngakumbi amathemba eSpringbok Women okuphumelela emva kokuphulukana nomnye umdlalo ngempelaveki egqithileyo. UMzantsi Afrika ugutyungelwe yiFiji ephumelele ngo’21-17 emizuzwini yokugqibela emdlalweni weNdebe yeHlabathi obudlalelwa eWaitakere Stadium, eAukland, eNew Zealand. Amanenekazi aye kwiFiji eyazi ukuba iyingozi – kodwa ebenethemba lokuzuza impumelelo ngoba adlale kakuhle emdlalwen wokuqala noxa abethwayo nje yiFrance ngo’40-5. Umdlalo obuphakathi koMzantsi Afrika neFiji ububambene nakwisigaba sesibini. Izinto ziye zohluka kancinci emva kokuba uJanse van Rensburg efumene ipenela enike iSpringbok Women ithemba lokuphumelela umdlalo okokuqala kwitumente yehlabathi. 
Kodwa izinto ziye zonakala emva kokuba iFiji ifumene amanqaku yaqabela ngaphezulu koMzantsi Afrika oza kudibana neNingale emdlalweni olandelayo uqhwalela. “Kubuhlungu kuthi ngoba besifuna ukuyibetha iFiji. Kodwa ke ndifuna ukuyiqhwabela izandla (iFiji) elele emgceni ngomzuzu wokugqibela,” utshilo uRaubenheimer. “Ukuphumelela umdlalo kwitumente yehlabathi uqala ukuya kuyo yinto enkulu. Ndiyavuyisana nabo. Ngaphandle kwamathandabuzo, thina siphoxekile – kodwa akufuneki sigxile kakhulu kulo nto. Amathuba besinawo – kodwa ke siye sohlwaya ngenxa yokuqinisekisi ukuba siyawuphumelela umdlalo. Siyivumele iFiji emdlalweni yenza unothanda. Indlela izinto ezenzeke ngayo, ayisiyiyo into esize siyicinga apha,” utshilo uRaubenheimer emva komdlalo. 
Noxa kuza kunyukwa iqhina siSpringbok Women xa sidibana neNgilane ngeCawe – kodwa yena uRaubenheimer uthi abazu kuncuma futhi baza kulwela ukuphumelela emdlalweni olandelayo. “Siza kuvavanywa ngoogqirha emva koko siphindele edabini. Umdlalo ophakathi kwethu neNgilane mkhulu kakhulu. Silapha ngoba besifuna ukuziva amandla kumaqela amakhulu nangoompondozihlanjiwe embhoxweni wehlabathi. Sinomqobo osimeleyo phambi kwethu. Ngabaqeqeshi abaza kuthatha isigqibo ngendlela ekuza kudlalwa ngayo. Asikaphumi kolu khuphiswano nangona siphoxwe ziziphumo zomdlalo ogqithileyo,” uvale ngaloo mazwi uRaubenheimer. Naye uKapteni weqela, uNolusindiso Booi, waleke ngelithi kunzima ukwamkela indlela ababethwe ngayo yiFiji.
title: iSpringbok Women esiqhwalelayo sidibana neNgilane emdlalweni wetumente yehlabathi

text:
AmaZulu abokoboko amacala kwaye akayikrokreli nakancinci iKaizer Chiefs emva kokuwabetha ngo’3-0 kumdlalo weTelkom Knockout obushushu bgeyona ndlela ingathethekiyo kobu busuku eMoses Mabhida Stadium ebithe mome ngabalandeli bebhola abaqabele ngaphaya kwamashumi amabini anesihlanu amawaka. Iqela likaSteve Komphela lingena kwisigaba esilandelayo solu khuphiswano [Telkom Knockout] ngokukhulu ukuzithemba emva kokuvula kakuhle ngemvula yamagowuli. Amakhosi anethemba lokuguquka kwezinto emva kwendlala ewathe mpa iisizini ezimbini zonke. 
Umdlalo uqale ngesantya esiphezulu zisuka ngoba omabini la maqela aze kulo mdlalo ekhuthazekile emva kokudlala kakuhle kwimidlalo yePSL kwiveki ephelileyo – kodwa ngaphezulu koko bekubonakala ukuba anxanelwe impumelelo. UBernard Parker ebedlala yedwa phambili – kodwa ebebaphethe mantsantsa abadlali baMaZulu emva encediswa zizikhuthali zabadlali abafana Hendrick Ekstein, uGeorge Maluleke, uJoseph Molangoane noSiphiwe Tshabalala. UMaluleka ungcangcazelise umnatha kwisigaba sokuqala; emva koko iChiefs iquqe ibuyelela okwezulu laseMthatha kumdlalo kanozinti waMaZulu. UMabhuti Khenyeza njengesiqhelo ubagcine bemincile abalandeli beChiefs ngenxa yokuyikhathaza phaya emva. 
Kwisigaba sesibini somdlalo Amakhosi abuye etyile kwelinye iphepha; ahlasele macala ade avuzwa ngebhola efakwe ngu-Ekstein kwaze emva kwakhe kwalandelisa uTshabalala. Umgangatho womdlalo ubuphezulu kakhulu kwaye nawo AmaZulu ebengatyhafanga nangoba ebehamba emva ngamagowuli. Nakwisigaba sesibini, u-Itumeleng Khune, uye wanyanzeleka asebenze; iifolosi zikaCavin Johnson bezifun’ into ibilapha. Kude kwasekugqibeleni AmaZulu engakwazanga nokufumana eli lokubika ekhaya igowuli. Kodwa akanawukhala nakancinane ngoba abethwe liqela ebelizimisele kakhulu emdlalweni.
title: AmaZulu abokoboko macala yinduku

text:
UGavin Hunt uthi iqela lakhe lilungiselela ukulwa njengokuba ugqatso phakathi kwamaqela aphambili luthande ukunyuka phambi kokusongwa kwesizini.  
IBidvest Wits ihleli phezulu kwiPSL, ishiya ngamanqaku amathathu iMamelodi Sundowns ekwindawo yesibini neCape Town City ehleli kwindawo yesithathu.  
IWits yandise amathuba okubamba indebe ngokuthi ibethe iMaritzburg United ngo’1-0 kwiveki ephelileyo. Nangona kunjalo, uHunt uthi ulindele iDowns neCitizens zilwe kude kube sekugqibeleni. 
Amakhosi, ekulindeleke avale isizini engenanto, aphise ngomdlalo kwiGolden Arrows efake igowuli ngomzuzu wokugqibela kumdlalo ophele ngo’1-1 kwiveki ephelileyo.  
Kule minyaka mihlanu uHunt ayichithe kwiWits njengomqeqeshi, le yeyona sizini enethuba elicacileyo lokuphumelela eyona ndebe iphambili kwibhola yelizwe loMzantsi Afrika.  
Eli qela laseGoli lizamile kwisizini edlulileyo – kodwa loyiswa yiSundowns egqugqise izwekazi le-Afrika lonke. Ngenxa yamava wakhe umqeqeshi weWits emva kokuphumelela le ndebe izihlandlo ezithathu ngethuba eqeqesha iSuperSport United phakathi kuka’2007 no’2010, ngoku ukulungele kwakhona ukulwa namakhwenkwe wakhe kude kube sekugqibeleni. 
“Mamela apha, iSundowns neCape Town City ziza kulwa, utshilo uHunt. Njengokuba kushiyeke imidlalo emithathu kwiqela ngalinye – iWits kunyanzelekile iyiphumelele yonke imidlalo yayo ukuze iphumelele indebe yesibini kule isizini. 
“Ukuba uya emdlalweni ubala ngeziphumo zomdlalo, izakuba khona ingxaki. Kufuneka sidlale qha, singacingi ngamanqaku afunekayo nemidlalo ekufuneka siyiphumelele ngoba iyabambezela lo nto. Ndakhe ndakuyo loo ngxaki ngaphambili, abadlali badlala nzima kakhulu,” utshilo uHunt. 
Abafana bakaHunt bazakujamelana nePolokwane City efuna ukubethelela indawo yayo kwiTop 8, kumdlalo wokugqibela iWits idibana neChiefs elwela indawo yesithathu kule sizini. 
Imidlalo yePSL 
 NgoLwesihlanu: Highlands Park vs Chippa United @Makhulong Stadium 20:00 
NgoMgqibelo: Golden Arrows vs Baroka FC @Princess Magogo Stadium 15:00; Polokwane City vs Kaizer Chiefs @New Peter Mokaba Stadium 18:00; Ajax Cape Town vs Bloemfontein Celtic @Athlone Stadium 20:15
title: Amava kaHunt azakuyinceda iBidvest Wits!

text:
Ndazalelwa kwisitalato saseBrinton kwaLanga. Ngokucacileyo, utatomkhulu wam wayeyinxalenye yabo babesakha ezi zindlu zilapha kwaLanga.  
Umama wam wayezibandakanye kakhulu kwezo politiko. Sasingenalwazi ngeentlanganiso awayesiya kuzo. Waqhubekeka esilwa idabi kodwa engafumani ntlawulo nangona sasibhuqwa yindlala. Wayehleli ngelithi, ‘Bantwana Bam, kuya kulunge ngenye imini’.  
Kuqhubeka ngolu hlobo, kodwa kuza kulunga ngenye imini’ Indlu yethu yayi gqogqwa ngamaBhulu, sasikhala kubuhlungu. Wayebanjwa ngamadoda amjule emva kwinqwelo yamapolisa.  
Sasingenalwazi nokuba uza kuvalelwa kweyiphi na intolongo. Sasihamba simkhangela namaqabane wakhe omzabalazo.  
Zininzi izinto ezibuhlungu ezazisenzeka ebantwini balapha kwaLanga. Umama wam wayezikhalimela ezilwa ezi zinto zaziqhubeka. Njengokufakwa ediphini.  
Amadoda ayesuka eMakhaya, eMpuma Koloni, ezokuphangela edolophini aye siza nge… nge… bathi yintoni kanene xa beyibiza? YiJoyini.  
Kwakukho iholo elalinendawo enkulu yokudlula. Amadoda ayefakwa ediphini apho. Sasisenza uqashiqashi njengabantwana. Babe jongeka okweenkomo ezifakwe ediphini. Amadoda ayezivula iisutikheyisi zawo kwaye kubekho into egalelwa kuzo. Andinalwazi ke nokuba yayiyiDDT’, kodwa ikhona into eyayi galelwa kubo ukuthintela ukuba bangasasazi izifo. Babefakwa ediphini. Yinto eyayi senziwa kubo leyo. Amadoda ayehamba engumkrozo njengeenkomo ezilindele ukufakwa ediphini.  
 Abafazi bona babe sima babukele, becula igwijo. Babecula ingoma ethi: ‘Phaya kwaLanga, rhoqo ngoLwezithathu, abafudukeli bayaditshwa. Wenyuk’uMbombela… Otata bayaditshwal’ Sacinezeleka ngenxa yocalucalulo. Kwakunzima.  
Uthi xa uhamba edolophini ubone umntu omhlophe ehamba nabantwana bakhe.  
Bengathethanga nto kuwe, uza kusuke uhambe usuke kwindledlana yokuhamba ngenyawo, nokuba ungade ube utshayiswa yimoto ngoba babe kutyhala bakubhekisele kude kubo kwaye kungekho nto unokuyithetha.  
Okanye xa ugqitha kwindawo yokutyela mhlawumbi unqwenela ukungena uzithengele into etyiwayo neziselo kuyo. Kodwa wawungenako!
title: Kwenzeka izinto ezibuhlungu ebantwini balapha kwaLanga

text:
Umnini ndawo yokoja inyama kwidolophu yaseNgcobo uthi ukubona abantu abonwabileyo besophula izitulo zeplastiki abezisebenzisa kwindawo yakhe kumenze wacinga cebo limbi. 
 Lo mfo usemtsha unguLudwe Bambani uthi xa abantu bonwabile ingakumbi ngempelaveki bahlala nanjani na ezitulweni bame nangeenyawo kuzo bajuxuze zophuke kube ngu saa. “Iveki neveki bekufuneka ndithenge ezinye izitulo yaye leyo yinkcitho endingayifuniyo, ngenye imini ndathi ndihleli phezu kwetayara elidala ndacinga ukuba xa abathengi bam benokuhlala kuwo ndingayeka ukuchitha imali kwizitulo zeplastiki,” utsho uBambani. 
Emva kwale ngcinga waye waqokelela amavili amadala kwindawo ekulungiswa kuyo iimoto, wawahlamba waqalisa ukwenza izitulo. Udibanisa amavii amabini awathungele ngentambo eyomeleleyo, enze nendawo yokuhlala ngentambo, elinye ivili lenziwa indawo yokungqiyama.  
Ezi zitulo zingaqhelekanga zihlalisa kamnandi ngohlobo olungummangaliso, zintofontofo, kwaye zibufana nesi situlo kuthiwa yiRocking Chair xa ufuna ukugungqa kuso, umntu uhlala athi zava kuzo agungqe ayokuma apho athanda khona. Intambo netayara azophuki nokuba umntu ukweyiphi imeko. 
Ngenxa yokuthandwa kwezi zitulo abathengi bakaBambani baxhwithana ngazo xa bezokuzonwabisa kule tshisanyama yaye bathi maziphume ezi zeplastiki kugcwale itayara, abanye abapheleli nje ekuzonwabeleni xa belapha baye bamcela ukuba abenzele abathengisele baye nazo kumakhaya abo. 
‘’Ngoku ndizibona ndineshishini ebendingakhange ndilicinge lokwenzela abantu izitulo ezibhamapayo,’’ utsho ehleka.  
Nabani na ofuna ukwenzelwa esi situlo ufaka i-odolo enzelwe, ixabiso lixhomekeka kubukhulu besitulo eso.
title: Kwenziwa izitulo ngamavili eNgcobo

text:
UMphathiswa wezeMpilo, uGqirha Aaron Motsoaledi, uyalele iNkulumbuso uPhumulo Masualle ukuba iyozivavanyela isifo sephepha, ukuze yazi ubumme bayo. 
 
Ethetha eMdantsane ngoLwesihlanu apho urhulumente ebedibene khona ukukhumbula usuku lwehlabathi lwesifo sephepha, uMotsoaledi ubuze uMasualle ukuba uzivavanyile kusini na ukuhlola ubumme bakhe kwesi sifo. 
 
Ngolu suku, ngakwibala eliseSisa Dukashe, bekukho iinkonzo zokuvavanya izifo kuquka neso sephepha. 
 
Ukuphendula umbuzo kaMotsoaledi, uMasualle uthe akakhange azivavanye. 
UMotsoaledi uye wayalela uMasualle ukuba ayokuzivavanya, ze iNkulumbuso yanqwala intloko ukubonakalisa ukuba iyawuthobela lo myalelo. 
 
UMotsoaledi akakhange aphelele apho, ubuze uSodolophu waseBuffalo City, uXola Pakati, ukuba uzivavanyile kusini na. UPakati naye uthe akakhange azivavanye, ze wayalelwa nguMotsoaledi ukuba alandele uMasualle. 
 
UMotsoaledi uthi zintlanu iimpawu eziphambili ekufuneka ubani aziqwalasele, ze emva koko ayozivavanyela esi sifo.  
Kodwa ukungabinazo iimpawu akuthethi ukuba kufuneka ungayozivavanya. 
 
Ezi mpawu kukubila ebusuku, ukukhohlela isithuba esingaphaya kweeveki ezintathu, ukonqena ukutya, ukwehla esiqwini kwanokugabha igazi. 
 
UMotsoaledi ukwathe xa kukho umntu onesifo sephepha emzini kubalulekile nabanye ukuba bazivavanye.
title: ‘Hamb’ uyozivavanyela isifo sephepha’, uMphathiswa uyalele uMasualle

text:
UMMANDLA wase-O.R. Tambo woluse inkitha yamakhwenkwe ayi-7 972 ngexesha lolwaluko kuDisemba wonyaka ophelileyo. 
Kwelinani, bathandathu kuphela abakhwetha ababhubhe e-O.R. Tambo, logama bebathathu kuphela abathe baphulukana nobudoda babo. 
Liqhwatyelwe izandla igalelo labathathi-nxaxheba kwisiko lolwaluko kule ngingqi, kulandela ukuhla kwenani labakhwetha ababhubhe emabhumeni ngexesha lolwaluko lasekupheleni konyaka. 
Oku kuthethwe ziinkosi zemveli, amasebe karhulumente nabanye, ngethuba kukhutshwa le ngxelo kwiholo yalo masipala ezifemini eMthatha izolo. Nangona lehlile inani lokusweleka kwabakhwetha, nabangeniswa kwizibhedlele ezahlukeneyo, kodwa usemkhulu umsebenzi ekusamele wenziwe ukulungisa le ngxaki. Mnye kuphela umkhwetha obhubhe eKSD, bathathu eQaukeni, logama bebabini eNyandeni. 
Esenza ingxelo, uNkosi Gcobani Tyhali ojongene neli siko kwicala lenkosi kule ngingqi ye-O. R. Tambo, uncome umsebenzi omhle owenziwe ngabathathi-nxaxheba kwelisiko.  
“Ukusebenza ngokubambiseneyo kuzele amaduna namathokazi. Lehlile inani labakhwetha abaswelekileyo kulo nyaka, kuquka nabangeniswe ezibhedlele kunye nabanqumlwe ubudoda. Sincedwe luqeqesho lococeko satsho sakwazi ukuhlangula abakhwetha lula ngaphandle kokubiza oogqirha,” utsho uTyhali.
title: Amakhwenkwe ayi-7 972 olusiwe e-O.R. Tambo

text:
Le ntwazana nguInathi Mhlahlo waseMdantsane obeneminyaka emithandathu kuphela ezelwe, ebethunywe evenkileni engekudanga kowabo ngoMvulo emva kwentsimbi yeshumi elinesibini emin’ emaqanda. 
UInathi akabuyelanga kowabo de banesithukuthezi kowabo nto leyo iye yaxhalabisa. 
Emva koko uInathi uzokubhaqwa ngumfana obezihambela ngakumatyotyombe angekudanga kowabo sele ebhubhile enenxebakazi lokuhlatywa elisemqaleni kwaye edlwengulwe. 
I’solezwe lesiXhosa lincokole nekomiti yasekuhlaleni yombutho iEFF, uBongiwe Mandoyi, nodize ukuba umntwana uqhele ukuthunywa njengesiqhelo kule venkile. 
“Siza kubafihlaphi abantwana bethu kwezi zinto zimbi kangaka zenzeka apha? Siphakuphaku ngoku! Embi into kukuba akukho kokuqala isenzeka le nto kule ndawo. Kwityeli elidlulileyo ibingumntwana ona-11 ubudala, nakuye zange lihambele ndawo ityala. Siyacela abenzi bobubi babanjwe, ibuhlungu le into!” utshilo uMandoyi. 
Uthi kumama womntwana kusekubi kuye njengoko kungelulanga ukwamkela esi sihelegu. 
Iingxelo ezivakalayo zezokuba usodolophu uXola Phakathi negqiza lakhe bakweli khaya sithetha nje beyokugxwala emswaneni. 
UMandoyi uthi beyiEFF baza kutyelela nabo kweli khaya.
title: Intlungu yentwazana ena-6 edlwengulwe yabulawa!

text:
Minyaka le ngomhla we-14 kwinyanga yoMdumba, ihlabathi lonke libhiyozela usuku lwabo bathandanayo, suku olu lubizwa ngokuba lusuku lweValentina (Valentines` Day ngolwasemzini).  
Uya kuqaphela ke kwakwigama eli lolu suku, ukuba alukho kwimbali yethu maXhos`asekhaya, kwimveli yethu, nkqu nakwiingcambu zobuntu bethu.  
Kungoko igama elithe ngqo lesiXhosa lolu suku lingekho. Endikubonayo nendikuqwalaselayo kukuba ngolu suku, akupheleli nje ekukhuthazweni kwabo bathandanayo ukuze babe nokuthandana nangakumbi, koko kuvuselelwa neemvakalelo zothando nokuthandana phakathi kwabo babandakanyeka eluthandweni olo. 
Olu thando lubonakaliswa ngeendlela ngeendlela. Ubukhulu becala ubona amanene engena ephuma kwiivenkile ezahlukileyo ngeenjongo zokuthengela amaqabanekazi awo izinto-yinto, kuquka neentyatyambo; izimuncu-muncu; imifanekiso; impahla; kude kuyiwe kudliwa nakwiindawo ezishishina ngokutya.  
Namanenekazi kwelawo icala awaziyekeli, uwabona eyimiqodi kusiyiwa kuthengelwa amasoka nabayeni kwa ezi zinto ziza kuwenza azive ethandwa kwaye exabisekile. Imibuzo ihlala izinga engqondweni yam ke zidwesha zakuthi malunga nolu suku. 
 Ingaba uthando lokwenene kumele lusikelwe usuku olunye phakathi kwezo zingaphaya kwamakhulu amathathu? Ingaba uthando lokwenene kumele lubonakaliswe ngokuchithwa kwemali ngeli lixa kwiindawo esihlala kuzo kukho amakhaya angathathi ntweni, kwanamakhaya anabantwana abangakwaziyo ukuqhubekeka nemfundo ngenxa yokungabi namali? 
 Ingathi kum xa le mali ichithwa ngolu suku ibinokuqokelelwa yabelwe amakhaya angathathi ntweni, imizi egcina amahlwempu neenkedama, kungenjalo ifundise abo bangakwaziyo ukuqhubekeka nemfundo ngenxa yokungabi namali, oku bekuya kubonakalisa uthando lokwenene! 
Kwangolu suku, iintsana zethu ziyalelwa ukuba ziye kumaziko emfundo zimbeje-mbeje zizinxibo eziyimibala ibomvu namhlophe, mibala leyo kufumaniseka ingumqondiso wolu suku lwabathandanayo.  
Rhoqo ngomhla wama-27 kuTshazimpunzi uMzantsi Afrika ubhiyozela usuku lokukhululeka komntu ontsundu kumakhamandela engcinezelo.  
Ingaba bangaphi kuthi ma-Afrika abachitha imali ngokuthengela izipho loo makhaya aswelekelwa ngamatsha-ntliziyo abulawa ngokungenalusini ngamagosa karhulumente wocalu-calulo?  
Bangaphi kuthi abazidinayo ngokuya ezikolweni kufundiswe iintsana zethu ngamaqhawe namaqhawekazi omzabalazo ngolo suku? 
 Zingaphi izikolo ezikhuthaza abantwana ukuba beze esikolweni bephethe nokuba yimizobo yaloo maqhawe namaqhawekazi adlala indima egqathu ekulweleni le nkululeko? 
Rhoqo ngomhla wama-25 kuCanzibe, kubhiyozelwa usuku lwe-Afrika kwizwekazi lonke ngokubanzi. Bangaphi kuthi abangena bephuma ezivenkileni ezinezipho zobu-Afrika okanye bathontelane besiya kwiimarike ezinezirhoxo zama-Afrika athengisa impahla, ukutya nezipho zobu-Afrika, ukuze zinikezelwe kwiintsana zethu namaqabane ethu, ngeenjongo zokuvuselela uthando lobu-Afrika kuthi sonke ma-Afrika?  
Bangaphi kuthi abathatha ixesha baye ezikolweni kufundiswe ngomanyano lwamaAfrika, ukutshatyalaliswa kwenkohlakalo egqubayo yokuhlaselwa kwabantakwethu noodadewethu abasuka kumanye amazwe e-Afrika, kungenjalo kubhiyozelwe uthando lwe-Afrika kwizikolo zonke nakwiindawo zonke ngokufanayo nale Valentina ndini! 
Luza kufika usuku lolutsha (June 16), usuku lokukhumbula ulutsha lwaseSoweto olwagetyengwa ngokungenalusini ngenxa yokulwela ilungelo lokufundiswa ngolwimi abaluvayo.  
Ndinomdla wokubona ukuba amaziko emfundo eli lizwe, nabantu beli lizwe ukuba baza kuluhlonipha njani na olu suku. Luza kufika usuku lwabasebenzi (Workers Day), ngomhla wokuqala kuCanzibe.  
Ngolu suku kubhiyozelwa kukwahlonitshwa indima edlalwe ngabasebenzi ekulweleni inkululeko nokuxatyiswa kwabasebenzi kwiinkalo zonke eMzantsi Afrika nakwihlabathi jikelele.  
Ndijonge ngamehlo abomvu ukuba uluntu luza kuluhlonipha njani na olu suku lubaluleke kangakanana! Luza kufika nosuku lwamafa ethu (Heritage day), ngomhla wama-24 kweyoMsintsi, nangona luza kuzinyaswa ngomhla wama-25 ngoMvulo, kuba umhla wama-24 kweyoMsintsi ungeCawa.  
Ndinomdla wokubona thina maXhos`akowethu, nani ma-Afrika amahle, ukuba olu suku lwamafa ethu kwanobuhle beenkcubeko zethu kwanemveli yethu, siza kuluhlonipha njani na! 
Ingaba ezi ntsuku zibaluleke kangaka kubuntu bethu, kwintlalo yethu, kuphuhliso lwethu nakwinkqubela-phambili yethu, siza kuzibhiyozela ngokufanayo kusini na nale Valentina ndini yenkcitha-mali engadingekiyo?  
Ukubonakalisa uthando kuhle, kubalulekile, kwaye kuyadingeka kweli xesha lokusilela kobuntu nemvisiswano, kodwa andiqondi ukuba oku kumele ukubekelwa usuku olunye kuphela, nalapho kuchithwe imali ngeli lixa kukho iintsizana ezilala ngamanzi, zakugqiba zivuke ngomvubo wamalongwe!
title: Makube njalo nakwezinye iintsuku!

text:
Abadlali beMpumalanga Black Aces abazi nokuba kuzakwenzeka ntoni ngabo emva kokuba lithengisiwe iqela labo. AmaZayoni athengiselwe uJohn Comitis ngokusesikweni.  
Oko kungqiniwe ngabaphathi beBlack Aces naye uComitis. Umdlali we-Aces ucatshulwe ngamajelo eendaba esithi bave nje kuthethwa ngayo lo nto ngamaphephandaba, akukho bani ozikhathazileyo kwi-Aces wabaxelela ngezo ndaba.  
“Sizibonile izinto ezibhaliweyo kodwa asazi kwanto thina.” Umnikazi weBlack Aces omtsha, uComitis kuthiwa useseMelika apho intombi yakhe ifunda khona, akwazeki nokuba uya- kubuya nini na.  
Njengokuba eli qela lithengisiwe kulindeleke ukuba lihlale eMpumalanga unyaka ubemnye phambi kokuba liye eKapa. Lowo ngumthetho wePremier Soccer League olandelwayo xa kukho iqela elithengiweyo.  
Yonke inkqubo yothengiswa kwe-Aces sele igunyazisiwe yiPSL. Imali ethengiswe ngayo ayaziwa, kodwa iqikelelwa kwikhulu lezigidi zeeRandi.
title: Baxhalabile abadlali beBlack Aces

text:
KWISITHUBA nje esingephi emva kokwabelana ngesondo nentokazi ayifumene kwiStokvel sezesondo iMavuso, indoda yaseSoshanguve ePitoli ibone le ntokazi iphuma ugwebu emlonyeni.  
Isajonge oko, le ndoda ineminyaka engamashumi amabini anesithoba, ibone le ntokazi ithe tywaa ibhubhile kuloo bhedi yashiyeka ibambe ongezantsi ixakiwe ukuba konakele ntoni na kulo mdaniso wabo wasekamereni. 
 IMavuso ligama leStokvel sezesondo elisetyenziswa kwiilokishi zasePitoli apho amadoda akhupha imali ethenga amantokazi kwiindibano ezibanjwa ebusuku. Kufuneka ube lilungu ukuze uthabathe inxaxheba.  
Ngundaba-mlonyeni iStokvel seMavuso ePitoli kangangokuba iHammanskraal kwesi sixeko yaziwa njengekomkhulu leMavuso. Le ndoda, nengavumanga kuthiwa pa ha, ithi isihamba umhla nezolo esi Stokvel seMavuso. Lo mfo, uhlala kwindlu engasemva kumzi kamama wakhe, uthi ushiye ikhaya lakhe ngokuhlwa kwangoLwesibini kwiveki ephelileyo esiya kwiMavuso eqhube kwade kwangoqhiza ngoLwesithathu. 
Kuleli xesha ke apho lo mfo athe waphandlwa yintokazi ethile. Akakhange achithe xesha, uthethe nale ntokazi bavumelana ngexabiso emva koko barhuqa besiya kowayo le ndoda, bagqibezela ezo yure zobumnandi ebhedini. “Bendisandula ukwahlukana nesinqanda-mathe sam ensingumama womntwana wam, ngoko ke bendicinga ukuzonwabisa ndikwiingalo zelinye ibhinqa,” kutsho lo mfo.  
“Sivumelene nale ntokazi okokuba ndizakuhlawula iR300, ngokuhamba ngqo nemithetho yeMavuso. Ndimthengele utywala, sasela sobabini kwade kwalithuba lokuba siye endlini yam siyokwabelana ngesondo.” Ngenene bayile kwigumbi lalo mfo, zanda iiyure besabelana ngesondo. “Yonke into ibintle ebhedini, kodwa ndithe xa ndibiwa bubuthongo le ntokazi yandivusa isithi iqaqanjelwa yintloko. 
 “Ndiyinike iipilisi zentloko, sakhe saphumla, sinethemba lokuba sakubuyela kwakho kumdaniso wasekamereni (ukwabelana ngesondo) xa engcono kwintloko eqaqambayo. “Kodwa uqhubekile esithi akaziva mnandi. Ndibone kuphuma ugwebu emlonyeni kuye, waminxana wavela wabhubha ngoko na ngoko; ngolo hlobo nje,” kutsho le ndoda.  
Le ndoda ithi ivele yoyika ingazi nokuba mayenze ntoni. “Ndibize umama wam, kodwa bekungekho kwanto angayenza kuba ibisele ibhubhile le ntokazi,” itsho le ndoda.  
Umama wale ndoda ubize amapolisa, afike nemoto yezidumbu ezokuthatha umzimba. Emva koko le ndoda ithathwe yasiwa kwisikhululo samapolisa aseSoshanguve ihamba nonina. “Bendothuke kakhulu.  
Umama wam uthethile namapolisa kodwa akukho tyala lithe lavulwa.” Le ndoda iyasiqalekisa isigqibo sokuthabatha inxaxheba kwiMavuso, kwaye ithi sokuze iphinde ibeyinxalenye nesi Stokvel. 
 Izalamane zale ntokazi ibhubhileyo sele kuqhagamshelwene nazo, kwaye zombini ezi ntsapho zivumelene ngokuncedisana ngeendleko zomngcwabo. 
 Kuyacaca ukuba le ndoda ayinantlahla kumabhinqa ewafumana kwiMavuso. Ngaphambili yakhe yathabatha intokazi kwiMavuso yayokwabelana nayo ngesondo ayahlawula emva koko. Lo ntokazi yathabatha zonke izihlangu zalo mfo zasenxele yabaleka nazo iyishiya kuphela nezo zasekunene. “Ndifundiswa isifundo apha. Ndicela wonke umntu ajongane neqabane lakhe ayeke iMavuso,” kucebisa le ndoda.
title: Ubhubhel’ ebhedini yendoda ovuswe kwiMavuso Stokvel

text:
Imidlalo yePSL iza kuthi nqumama ngempelaveki ngenxa yemidlalo emibini yeNedbank Cup. Oyena mdlalo oza kujongwa kakhulu ngophakathi kweChippa United neKaizer Chiefs ngo’20:15, eNelson Mandela Bay Stadium ngoMgqibelo. Ngumdlalo ekuza kudlana iintsimbi kuwo ngoba iChippa United ifuna ukubhala iincwadi zebhola ngokutsha ngokuthi ibethe Amakhosi ukuze iye emdlalweni wamagqibelakankqoyi okokuqala kwimbali yeNedbank Cup. Kanti yena uErnst Middendorp neqela lakhe bagxeleshe iNedbank njengeyona ndebe abanokuthi baxolise ngayo abalandeli abaneminyaka emithathu bekhala ngenxa yembalela egqubayo eNaturena. Ngeke Amakhosi achebeleze kwiChippa eqhuba kakuhle phantsi kwesandla sikaClinton Larsen nangona kusekho ixhala lokuthotyiselwa emva kokubethwa kwayo ngo’1-0 yiBidvest Wits, eBhayi kwiveki ephelileyo. 
Kutshanje, uLarsen uxelele iintatheli okokuba lifikile ixesha lokuba iChippa United ikhule kwaye iya emdlalweni ikhululekile ngoba uxinizelelo lukwiChiefs. Noxa umdlalo uza kubanzima kodwa abadlali beChippa baza kukhuthazwa ngumsebenzi oncomekayo abawenze ngethuba beguqisa amaqela afana neSundowns neWits. “Akukho mntu owayecinga ukuba singagqitha kwiSundowns nakwiWits  nangoku sidibana neChiefs, abantu bacinga njalo. Uxinizelelo lukwiChiefs. Yiyo eza kulahlekelwa kakhulu ukuba ayiphumeleli, ngoba lo nto iyakuthetha ukuthi enye isizini iphele ingenanto. Lelona xesha lilungileyo lokudlala neChiefs ngoba emdlalweni wokugqibela ingagcwalisa abalandeli bayo ebaleni. IChippa zange yawudlala umdlalo wokugqibela kwindebe. Sinamashumi alithoba emizuzu yenzeke lo nto. Abadlali bethu bazithembile kwaye bazimisele ukulwa neChiefs,” utshilo uLarsen emva kothelekiso lwamaqela kutshanje. 
Amakhosi awanayo enye indlela, kufuneka aphumelele ukuze afumane ithuba elicacileyo lokuphumelela indebe kule sizini. Njengokuba iChiefs ingasenalo ithemba lokuphumelela indebe yePSL, eyona ndebe eyigxeleshileyo ngoku yiNedbank. UMiddendorp uthe iqela lakhe liza kuzilungiselela kangangoko ngoba umdlalo ozakube useBhayi ubaluleke kakhulu kwiqela lakhe. “Kunyanzelekile sizame esinokuzama kweli xesha sikulo. Ngoku silungiselela umdlalo obalulekileyo ongoMgqibelo,” utshilo uMiddendorp ekuqaleni kweveki.
title: Kuza kudlana iintsimbi eBhayi kwiNedbank Cup

text:
“IGAMA elithi Oxford liseNgilane ngoko ke kufuneka silisuse kwisixeko sethu.” 
Oku kuthethwe nguceba waseBuffalo City uXolani Witbooi, ngethuba lomsitho wosuku lweAfrika eMonti kwiveki ephelileyo. 
UWitbooi uthi amagama ezitalato neendawo zokuhlala eBuffalo City, ingakumbi eMonti, akaxeli imbali yesi sixeko – endaweni yoko axela imbali yezinye izizwe. 
“SiyiANC kule ngingqi siyenzile inkquleqhu yokutshintsha igama elithi Buffalo City sayibiza njengeDr WB Rubusana, igqala lomzabalazo eladlala indima ekusekweni kweANC. Siyakunqwenela ukuba nomasipala buqu abizwe njengeDr WB Rubusana kodwa ke siyakuqonda ukuba oko kunenkqubo yako,” utshilo uWitbooi. 
UWitbooi ubalule esona sitalato side nesidume kunene eMonti iOxford esithi asixeli mbali yeli lizwe. 
“Sesinye sezitalato ekufuneka zitshintshile kwesi sixeko. Xa sithetha ngebuyambo nokuzidla ngeAfrika, masibeneendawo kwaneezitalato ezithiywe ngamagorha ale ndawo,” utshilo uWitbooi. 
“Sifuna ukulanda imbali yethu ukuze ikwazi ukuxela ngendlela eyiyo isixeko sethu.” 
UWitbooi uthi kunyakamali ozayo, lo masipala uza kuxhabashela phezulu nenkqubo yokutshintsha amanye wamagama esi sixeko. 
“Sesihambele phambili kakhulu ngoku. Inkqubo yokuthethana nabahlali sele yenziwe yagqitywa kwezinye iindawo. Ngoku sikwisigaba sokuphethula le nkqubo. Ukubona ukuba siyithathele ingqalelo le nyewe, sifuna ukuba ibekho kuhlahlo lwabiwomali ka2018/19. 
“Sifuna kutshintshe negama lesikhululo seenqwelomoya salapha eMonti. Kaloku amagama eendawo zesixeko sethu kufuneka axele futhi aqamele ngamagorha ethu, hayi abantu esingabaziyo,” utshilo uWitbooi. 
Amanye amagama ekudala ekwiingxoxo zotshintsho aquka ukutshintshwa kweQuigney kuthiwe yiMhlonyane, iVincent ibeyiSister Aidan, iBeacon Bay kuthiwe kukuNondyilo, iSouthernwood ibeyiTebekana ze iGonubie ibeyiQunube. 
Kodwa isixeko sichula sinyathele kulo mba wokutshintshwa kwamagama nanjengoko kukho abantu abathi akuyomfuneko oku. 
“Ewe kukho abantu ekufanele sithathele ingqalelo yeemvakalelo zabo ngalo mba. Kodwa sokuze sijongele phantsi imbali ngenxa yokuba sisoyika ukuba abantu baza kuthini,” woleke njalo uWitbooi.
title: Uceba: Yeyantoni iOxford eMonti?

text:
Ukuba unecebo okanye ingcinga yesixhobo esingaphuhlisa iMpuma Koloni ngokwezobuchwepheshe, iziko lezenzululwazi nobuchwepheshe (Science and Technology Park) kwiziko lophuhliso noshishino (IDZ) eMonti, lingakwamkela ngezandla ezishushu. 
Eli qonga lijongene nokuncedisana neenkampani ezisakhasayo, abaphandi abaphanda ngokukhulisa ubuchwepheshe.  
Kutsha nje, libe nenkqubo apho belidibanise oosomashishini bale ngingqi abase batsha libanika iqonga lokuba bavelise amacebo abo anokuthi abelu lutho kweli phondo leMpuma Koloni. 
ULudwe Macingwane Fanie ongumanejala eScience & Technology Park uthi, enye yenjongo ephambili yokukhulisa abasomashishini kukuba baphuhle ukuze bazokwazi ukuba iimveliso zabo zithengiseke nakumanye amazwe aphesheya. 
“Sifuna iinkampani ezithe zakhula kule ngingqi yethu zikwazi ukuba zithengiseke kwihlabathi jikelele. Ngokudibanisa oosomashishini ngolu hlobo sikwafuna ukuba bazane bazokuncedisana, kuzokwazi nokuba kuthengiseke iimveliso zabo,” utshilo uMacingwane Fanie. 
Uthi abajonganga abafundi baseWSU kwakunye neFort Hare abenza izifundo zobuchwepheshe kuphela, “nawe wena uphaya ekhaya ukuba unecebo onalo ngakwe zobuchwepheshe kwaye uyabona ukuba lingathi libene galelo kuphuhliso lwephondo wamkelekile uze nalo ngaphambili”. 
UMacingwane Fanie ukwadize ukuba amathuba eMonti maninzi, esithi zininzi izinto ezenzekayo kwela ziko. Uthi ingxaki abasajongene nayo kukuba abafundi bezi yunivesithi baphumelela bakugqiba bahambe baye kumanye amaphondo, kushiyeke kungekho mntu wokuziphuhlisa kula maziko. 
UBarrington Shirley nongumsunguli wesixhobo se-GPS ezakunceda ukunciphisa iingozi ezindleleni, naye ibengomnye woosomashishini abasakhasayo ababonise ngeemveliso zabo kule ndibano ibise-IDZ eMonti.
title: Kukhwetywa abo banamacebo ophuhliso kwezobuchwepheshe

text:
Umqeqeshi weqela lesizwe lombhoxo, * -Allister Coetzee, nabadlali bakhe bantingele kwilizwe elikumazantsi eMelika begcobile emva kokuphumelela umdlalo wokuqala.  
AmaBhoko-bhoko avuthulule i-Argentina ngo’37-15 kumdlalo wokuqala weRugby Championship odlalelwe phambi kwabalandeli bombhoxo abangaphaya kwamashumi amane amawaka eNelson Mandela Bay Stadium kwiveki ephelileyo.  
Nangona impumelelo iyeyona nto ebalulekileyo – kodwa umdlalo weBoks useneendawo ezifuna ukuqwalaselwa, naye umqeqeshi uyivumile lo nto. Njengokuba uMzantsi Afrika uzakudlala ne-Argentina, eSalta, ngoMgqibelo, izinto zingajika.  
“Kufuneka silungise iindawo ezithile kumdlalo wethu. Kufuneka siqinisekise ukuba siyabashicilela futhi nokukhaba kwethu kube ngcono. Phambi kwabalandeli, abadlali be-Argentina bazakufuna ukuguqula izinto kwaye kufuneka silungiselele umdlalo onzima,” utshilo uJaco Kriel kwiintatheli. 
Umqeqeshi ubaqhwabele izandla abadlali bakhe kwiveki ephelileyo kwaye uyazazi iiPumas ukuba zinamandla okumelana naliphi na iqela.  
“Abadlali be-Argentina bebesebenzisa amandla emdlalweni – kodwa amaqhinga wethu phaya emva asebenzile. Bebethi xa bezama ukuhlasela sibe sibalungele. Ndonelisekile yimpumelelo kulo mdlalo nangona ingagqibelelanga,” utshilo uCoetzee kwiveki ephelileyo. 
Abadlali baMaBhoko-bhoko abathe bazenzela igama kumdlalo ogqithileyo baquka uRaymond Rhule, uCourtnall Skosan, uSiya Kolisi noPieter-Steph du Toit.
title: AmaBhoko-bhoko anganzinyelwa e-Argentina

text:
Umdlalo obuphakathi kweMaritzburg United neChippa United uphele ebambene ngo’1-1 la maqela mabini kumdlalo we-Absa Premier Soccer league obubanjelwe eHarry Gwala Stadium kubusuku banamhlanje.  
  
IiChilli Boys zintingele eMgungundlovu zingafumananga nenye impumelelo kwimidlalo emithandathu edlulileyo ilandelelana. Lo nto yenziwa kukubabuthuntu kweefolosi zayo. Nakulo umdlalo wanamhlanje, iThe Team of Choice, ingcangcazelise umnatha kuqala emva kwempazamo eyenziwe ngabadlali basemva nonozinti weChippa, uDaniel Akpeyi. 
  
Eli qela lizinze eBhayi lifumene ithuba imizuzu ilishumi elinesihlanu umdlalo uqalile – kodwa uKatlego Mashego akakwazanga ukulisebenzisa elo thuba. Nayo iMaritzburg United iwafumene awayo amathuba engawasebenzisanga – kuyiwe kwikhefu esabambe ngeqanga la maqela. 
Kwisiqingatha sesibini, uDeolin Mekoa, ufake igowuli lokuqala le Maritzburg United kulo mdlalo emva kwemizuzu emihlanu qha. Kuye kwanyanzeleka nazo iiChilli Boys zixoze mphini wumbi.  
UThembinkosi Lorch ufake igowuli lokulinganisa ngomzuzu wamashumi asixhenxe emva kwebhola egotywe nguMac Van Heerden. 
Ngoku eli qela liqeqeshwa nguDan Malesela lizakujamelana neKaizer Chiefs kumdlalo wePSL, eBhayi, ngoMgqibelo.  
  
Komnye umdlalo Amakhosi abambene neCape Town City ngo’1-1 kumdlalo wePSL obubanjelwe eFNB Stadium. Nangona iKaizer Chiefs iwuqale kakuhle lo mdlalo – kodwa kwakuphuma uSibusiso Khumalo, onikwe ikhadi elibomvu, yabuya ngamandla iCape Town City.  
Amathuba wokuphumelela umdlalo macala omabini ebekhona. Kanti iBidvest Wits ebingekabwethwa kule sizini ibethwe yiSuperSport United ngo’2-0 namhlanje kumdlalo obubanjelwe eMbombela Stadium.  
  
Oku kwenzeka emva kokuba amakhwenkwe kaStuart Baxter ebethe i-Orlando Pirates ngo’1-0 kwiTelkom Knockout kwimpelaveki edlulileyo.
title: Izinto aziyihambeli kakuhle iChippa United

text:
Abahlali baseMizizi eMbizana kwaWadi 20, batyhola uceba wabo uMlungisi Manyathela ngokutshisa ikhaya lakwaMpofane emva kokuba lufumene uncedo lokutya kumbutho iAbahlali baseMijondolo.  
Oyinkokheli yalo mbutho uNtsikelelo Mathumbu uthi bagqithise ukutya kweli khaya njengesiqhelo emva kokuqaphela ukuba kulala kungatyiwanga kweli khaya.  
“Kubekho ukungavani phakathi kwethu noceba emva kokuba evile ukuba siza kusa ukutya kwela khaya, namanye amakhaya amabini, besingaqali ukwenza oku,” ucacise watsho uMathumbu. 
Uthi bakugqithisile ukutya ngomhla wesithandathu, kwaza kwasa kutshile ngomhla wesixhenxe.  
“Eyona nto ayithethayo uthi ngumsebenzi wakhe ukunceda abantu,  masahlukane nokwenza umsebenzi wakhe, esifungela nokusifungela,” utsho uMathumbu.  
Ukanti ilungu losapho lakwaMpofane, uNandipha Mpofane, uthi ngenene barhanela unyawo lwemfene kuko konke oku. 
“Ngorhatya umntwana ebethunywe kwenye indlu, ubuye ebaleka esithi ufike kuvulwe ucango. Ngumona wokuba sinikwe oku kutya ngulo mbutho waBahlali baseMijondolo unobangela walo mlilo,” utshilo uMpofane. 
Olu sapho lolunye lwamakhaya asokolayo kule ndawo yakwaWadi 20. 
 “Le ndlu sihlala kuyo siyibolekwe emva kokuba sadilikelwa likhaya kunyaka ophelileyo, akukho ncedo sakhe salufumana kuceba noogxa bakhe, asinakungaluthathi ke uncedo,” utshilo uMpofane. 
Ingxelo ithi kulalwa kungatyiwanga kweli khaya lakwaMpofane. 
Amanye amakhaya amabini ebefumene oku kutya awachatshazelwanga ngulo mlilo otshise iimpahla ebizezokugqibela kweli khaya.  
“Kutshe iibhedi, iimpahla zokunxiba, izazisi zethu, iziqinisekiso zokuzalwa zabantwana,” utshilo uMpofane.  
Ukanti umhlali ongavumanga negama lakhe uthi nguceba wale ndawo ophambili ukuchasa imisebenzi wokuncedwa kwabantu.  
“Nguceba otshise kwela khaya, ebengafuni kwale yokuba sigqithise oku kukutya kuba aba bantu kudala belinde uncedo lwakhe. Sihleli ngokoyika kuba akufuneki mntu uchase yena,” utshilo umhlali.  
Ongumphathi wesikhululo samapolisa aseMzamba uNjengele Devan John uqinisekise ukuba ngenene kukho uphando oluqhutywa ngamapolisa esa sikhululo.  
“Ndingatsho ukuba ngenene kukho uphando oluqhutywayo, ngenxa yesiganeko esixeliweyo sokutshiswa komzi othile kwaWadi 20, akukho nto ingako sinokuyithetha ke okwangoku,” utshilo. 
 Ngaphambili, uceba lo uxelele eli phephandaba ukuba akayazi into efunwa ngumbutho waBahlali baseMijondolo kuye.  
“UMathumbu lo ukhokele lo mbutho akahlali nalapha kule wadi, uhamba esithi ukhokele abantu ethetha ngabantu abathathu, ulahlekisa abantu lo mntu,” watsho uManyathela.  
Akafumanekanga kwesi isihlandlo ukuziphendulela kwizityholo zokutshiswa kwekhaya lakwaMpofane. 
Ukanti usodolophu waseMbizana uDaniswa Mafumbatha uthi akazani nazo izityholo zokuba uceba wakhe utshise ikhaya lakwaMpofane.  
“Amapolisa awuphethe lo mcimbi ngoko ke akumele ukuba senze izityholo ezinje ngezi. Iqhelekile kubantu bakuthi ukuba batyhole umntu xa kukho ingxaki ngenxa yokungavani kwabo nomntu lowo. Masilinde amapolisa ayaqhuba nophando lwawo,” utshilo uMafumbatha. 
Uthi akukho nkokheli enjengoceba enokutshisa abantu ebakhokeleyo.
title: Uceba utyholwa ngokutshisa ikhaya

text: UseBhayi? UBlackcoffee uzakube elapho ngomhla wesibini kweyo Msintsi 2016. Sinamatikiti angamashumi amabini esiphisa ngawo. Sibhalele ku isibhalo@inl.co.za okanye usitsalele ku 043 721 1547 usixelele ukuba yintoni oyithanda ngoBlackcoffee.
title: Blackcoffee eBhayi

text:
Ukubhutyuza kukanozinti weKaizer Chiefs kufikelele kwiqondo lokugqibela. Emva komdlalo izolo, uErnst Middendorp, uvakalise ukukruquka kwakhe ziimpazamo ezenzeka emidlalweni watsho esithi kufuneka kubekho inguqu phambi kweveki ezayo (xa iChiefs idlala nePirates). UMiddendorp ebethetha neentatheli emva kokubethwa kweChiefs edlale ngamathuba ngo’1-0 yiCape Town City, ekungekho nto ingako eyenzileyo ngaphandle kokufaka igowuli, emdlalweni we-Absa Premier Soccer League obuseFNB Stadium. UVirgil Vries ubhutyuze ibhola nayizolo eye yangena emnatheni. Kanti ebengaqali, ekuqaleni kwenyanga woyiswa kukubamba ibhola eyakhatywa kude iChiefs idlala neMamelodi Sundowns. UVries wangena endaweni ka-Itumeleng Khune ongasadlaliyo ngenxa yokonzakala – kodwa kukho imbombo kakhulu ngenxa yendlela engonelisiyo abamba ngayo ezipalini. 
“Ndiyayazi into eyenzekileyo, andisosidenge tu. Kubalulekile ukuba nonozinti owenza umsebenzi ocacileyo xa ungakwazi ukufaka amagowuli. Andizami kukhusela ukwenziwa kweempazamo ngoba azindonwabisanga. Kokwesibini ngoku isenzeka le nto. Kufuneka side sithini?” utshilo uMiddendorp emva komdlalo izolo ebusuku. 
“Kufuneka sibone ukuba senzani kwezi ntsuku zilishumi zilandelayo ukuze sikhangele ukuba ngubani ozakuba ngunozinti kuMgqibelo ozayo. Kulungile ukubakhusela abadlali, yile nto ndiyenzayo. Kodwa kufuneka kwenziwe umsebenzi kakuhle. Indlela ebilula yokuqubisana nala bhola ibikukuyixhimfa ngamanqindi/ngenqindi. Ngeke ndikwazi ukulungiselela lo nto icacile. Ndiyavuma asiwafaki amagowuli phaya phambili – kodwa sinale ngxaki esemva,” utshilo uMiddendorp. 
Abalandeli beChiefs balele bethe khunubembe emva kokubethwa kweqela labo elingakwazanga ukusebenzisa amathuba abaninzi emdlalweni. Lo nto ebekhale ngayo umqeqeshi nangethuba iChiefs idlala neTornado FC emdlalweni weNedbank Cup kwiveki ephelileyo. “Andizami kubulala mntu apha – kodwa nangokuya besidlala neTornado, besiwafumene amathuba amaninzi emdlalweni. Zizinto ekufuneka sijongane ngqo ezi,” utshilo uMiddendorp.
title: UMiddendorp ukruqukile ziimpazamo zikaVirgil Vries ezipalini

text:
Umququzeleli wamanqindi kwingingqi yeChris Hani nokwangumqeqeshi weQueenstown Boys Boxing Club(QBBC), uMabhuti Mapeyi, uthi uyoneliseka yindlela okhula ngayo umdlalo wamanqindi kule ngingqi. 
Oku ukutsho kudliwano ndlebe neli phepha ndaba, I’solezwe lesiXhosa, emva kwetumente yamanqindi ebibanjelwe kumabala emidlalo i-Indoor Sports Centre, kuKomani kule mpela veki igqithileyo. 
Le tumente ibiququzelelwe liqela leQBBC nebelibhiyozela iminyaka engamashumi asibhozo anambini lasekwayo.Ngalo mhla i-QBBC ibimeme amaqela eengingqi ezohlukeneyo zaseChris Hani, Sara Baartman kunye neBuffalo City.UMapeyi uthe, “Nangaphezu kwemincili esinayo ngokugqiba iminyaka emininzi siqhuba, sivelisa iintshatsheli zikazwelonke, sonwatyiswa kukubona indlela ophucuke ngayo umdlalo weembethi manqindi zasezilalini nokonyuka kwenani lamaqela ethu. Lo nto ibonakalisa phandle ukuzimisela kwabaqeqeshi nabadlali basezilalini”. 
Phakathi kwemilo ibingundaba mlonyeni singabalula obuphakathi kwentshatsheli yePhondo leMpuma Kapa, uAti Hola weXhalanga Boxing Club, kunye noLukhanyo Matiso waseSara-Baartman. UAti uthe wawisa ngophotho uLukhanyo kumjikelo wesibini kumdlalo wamagqibela kankqoyi kuluhlu lwabaneminyaka elishumi elinesixhenxe, watsho waphumelela imbasa yegolide. 
Umququzeleli lo uthi, le tumente ibitshayelela ezininzi ezizayo eziquka ezakubizwa ngeqhawe lomzabalazo ethiywe ngayo le ngingqi yabo uChris Hani, ezakuba kwakule nyanga ngomhla wamashumi amathathu. UMapeyi uvale ngokubulela wonke umntu ofaka isandla ekuphuhliseni izakhono zolutsha oluntyumpa ntyumpeka kwiziyobisi. 
Ubulele nakubahlali ebebephume ngendlu ingakumbi abazali babadlali abanika inkxaso kubantwana babo. Ophumelele indebe yegolide, uAti uthe akusekho kubuya mva ngoku, eqalile nje ukuchola chola ezi mbasa akasayi kubuya umva nakulo unyaka.
title: Uyakhula umdlalo wamanqindi eChris Hani

text:
ICACE gca nakubani eyokuba akukho bani onokuthintelwa ekubambeni uqhankqalazo, kuba oko kungabe kuyakhabana noMgaqosiseko. Abantu bathi bakunganeliseki ziingxoxo, baye kuqhankqalazo ngelifuna isisombululo kwiingxaki zabo. 
Oku bakwenza kuba bekholelwa ukuba iimfuno nezimvo zabo zakumanyelwa xa bengene esitalatweni, baqhankqalaza. Ngamanye amaxesha uqhankqalazo luye lukhatshwe ludushe, kodwa ngamanye amaxesha kungabinjalo. 
Uqhankqalazo lukhokelwa ziinkokheli, nokuba zezabasebenzi, ezasekuhlaleni okanye ezabafundi. Ziinkokheli ezinoxanduva lokuxelela oogxa bazo malunga nokuba kufuneka baziphathe njani kuqhankqalazo. 
Xa iinkokheli zimanyelwa futhi zithenjiwe kolu xanduva lokukhokela uqhankqalazo, ziye zimanyelwe ngabasebenzi kwimiyalelo eziyikhuphayo, malunga nokuziphatha kwabaqhankqalazi. 
Uqhankqalazo olungenabakhokeli luyinkathazo, kuba lungabangela ukuba bangakuzuzi abebekucebile abo baqhankqalazayo. Endaweni yokuzuza abebekucebile, luvele luphume nadlolwazana uqhankqalazo. 
Udlolwazana ke kukuba luphume nomntu othile angene kwingxaki ekude kunale bekuqhankqalazelwa yona, mhlawumbi kuphume isidumbu okanye ubani onzakale. 
Nalu ke udlolwazana luphumile kuqhankqalazo lwaseWalter Sisulu University obelubanjwe ngabafundi ngoMvulo. Bagxogxe bonzakalisa amapolisa. Abaphelelanga apho, bakwatshise nesithuthi sohlobo lweNyala samapolisa. Elinye kula mapolisa lisesesibhedlele emva kokugxogxwa ngabafundi. 
Izolo (Lwesithathu), amapolisa abhengeze ukuba kubanjwe umfundi onama-24 malunga nokutshiswa kwesithuthi samapolisa kwanokonzakalisa amapolisa 
Iyakukhumbuleka eyokugxekwa kwamapolisa kuqhankqalazo lwaseWits, apho kwabhubha uMthokozisi Ntumba ezihambela engenanto yakwenza noqhankqalazo. Esi sehlo sokubhubha kukaNtumba sibangele ukuba agxekwe amapolisa ngendlela alusingatha ngayo uqhankqalazo. 
Kodwa kwesi sihlandlo saseWSU, amapolisa akakhange onzakalise mfundi. Endaweni yoko konzakele wona. 
Ingaba le yindlela ebifuna ukuzuzwa luqhankqalazo lwabafundi baseWSU? Iinkokheli zabafundi beziphi zisenzani?
title: Uqhankqalazo okanye ulwaphulomthetho?

text:
Ndizive ndingenako ukuthi cwaka emva kokufunda inqaku lakho (01 EyeSilimela 2016, ikhasi 11) elithetha ngezifundiswa ezingenzi nto ngezo zinto zizifundeleyo okanye ziziphandileyo.  
Ewe kunganjalo, ingakumbi xa sifundele izinto ezifika zingabinayo ncakasana indawo kwintlalo yethu. 
Okokuqala xa sisenza uphando, sicela imvume kumaSebe aqondene nezihloko ezo. Kwakhona sifumana isiqinisekiso senkxaso yesihloko sophando olo kunye nendima olunoyidlala kwabo bachaphazelekayo.  
Yonke le nto yenziwa ngenkcitho-mali evela kwimizi namaSebe anikisa ngenkxaso-mali ukuze kuphuhle ezi zifundo. Kubamnandi nje kuphela ngexesha kusenziwa izivumelwano ngezifundo ezo, kodwa emva kokuba abafundi bephumelele, kunqabile ukuba kubekho imisebenzi eqondene noko bebekufunda. Nalapho ithe yakho khona loo misebenzi, kunqabile ukuba ibe ijoliswe ngqo kuloo nto abafundi abo bebeyifunda okanye besenza uphando ngayo. Izidanga ke ziba zezamaphepha nokwenza nje indumasi yomzuzwana. 
Yeyodwa ke eyokuba ubani alandele ngokunika ingxelo ngophando lwakhe kwelo Sebe likaRhulumente, suke ibeyinam nawe ibhulukhwe yasetrongweni!  
Ubonakale njengomntu ozekufuna injezu okanye ophuphayo. Loo mqulu wakho soze uye kufika nakwabo bafanele baqwalasele ukuba iziphumo zophando lwakho zingancedisa njani kwiinjongo zeSebe elo kunye nophuhliso lwesizwe.  
Luphi ke unxibelelwano phakathi kweeDyunivesithi ezizivulela amathuba ophando ngezihloko ezitsha kunye namaSebe kaRhulumente? Asingabo bonke abafundi abenze uphando, abangazamiyo ukwenza igalelo kuphuhliso loluntu, nto nje, kuya- ngokuthi le nto bayifundeleyo ikhathalelwe kangakanani ngabasemagunyeni. 
Ukujolisa kubafundi, ndingenjenje; ukuba ubufundela into ongayiphiliyo okanye waphiwa isihloko sophando ngumhlobo okanye abazali bakho, awungekhe ukwazi ukwenza igalelo elililo. Kufuneka ukuba ukwazi ukukhangela amathuba avulelekileyo ajoliswe kule nto ufunde ngayo nale wenze ngayo uphando.  
Izinto ezifana nale ndiyifundeleyo, umzekelo, “indima enokudlalwa ziintsomi zesiXhosa ekufundisweni kwabafazi abakhulelweyo kwiiklinikhi zaseMpuma Koloni”, azinandawo itsolileyo ezingena kuyo kuba izinto zesiXhosa aziniki mdla kanye kwaba basemagunyeni.  
Ukuba ke umfundi akazingci kuqala ngalo nto ayifundeleyo, azame ukuzifukuzela, inkal’ ixing’ etyeni ke xa kulapho! 
Okokugqibela, ingaba kulula ukuzifukuzela xa kunqaba izixhobo ezo zokuphakama uyokwenza loo nto uyiphandileyo kwiyunivesithi nekholeji leyo?  
Hayi akulula konke konke, awunayo nepeni emdaka, amathuba agushwe kwangabo bafanele ukuwaveza. Ukuba awukho ngasemfuthweni wolwazi wokomela emcingeni uxele intethe! Akungencedi ke ukuba sizazi iingxaki, kodwa singabinampangelo okanye izixhobo ezizizo zokuzifukuzela ukuze senze igalelo elo lilindelekileyo. 
UNompucuko Zakaza uzisebenzela ngeentsomi zesiXhosa eQonce kwaye wathweswa isidanga seeMasters kwicandelo leelwimi zesiNtu eRhodes koka-2015. 
Impendulo yomhleli: Siyabulela ngezimvo kwaye uvakele!  
Ngethemba lokuba abafundi bephepha bakuzuza kuzo. Kwelethu icala, siyazibona iingxaki zentswelangqesho kunye nokungafumani inkxaso kumaziko namacandelo karhulumente.  
Kunzima kwelo cala. Kuphinde kubenzima mpela ukuzifukuzelela uziqalele eyakho into uwedwa. Apho sizigxeka kakhulu izifundiswa kukumba wokungaqali msinya, besengaphakathi kwiiyunivesithi.  
Xa ukwiyunivesithi ungqongwe zizixhobo ezininzi eziquka neendidi zeencwadi kunye nabantu abanamava abanokuncedisa.  
Umntu kufuneka aqale esepha. Umzekelo neli iphepha lesiXhosa laqalwa ngaphakathi eyunivesithi; uphando lwamaphepha esiXhosa kunye neendlela zokupapasha sazifumana apho phambi kokuba siyokudibana nabakwa-Independent Media basincedisa.  
Ithuba liqala pha ngaphakathi, qha ingathi abafundi nezithwalandwe azisebenzisani; wonke umntu wenza eyakhe into angazi nokuba kanti umelwane uphanda into efanayo. Kube ke kuphoswe ithuba lokusebenzisana. Xa sijonga apha eMpuma Koloni singathi kufuneka umnatha wabantu abafunda ngeelwimi zesiNtu; badibane qho kwabelwane ngolwazi nezinto ezintsha siqhubeni.  
Apha ezivekini sakupapasha isimemo kubo bonke abasebenza ngesiXhosa ukuba badibane, sazi ukuba ubani wenza ntoni nabani phi siqale ukusebenzisana. Xa sizama ukutshintsha izwe soze sikwazi ukulitshintsha sodwa.  
Izifundiswa, ingakumbi ezisepha ngaphakathi kwiiyunivesithi zezona zinokuncedisa ngezixhobo nolwazi. Makusetyenziswane.
title: Iingxaki bayazazi, baxinge phi?

text:
Igoduka imisila iphezulu i-Orlando Pirates emva kokuvuthulula iBloemfontein Celtic ngamagowuli amathathu eqandeni (3-0) emdlalweni weMultiChoice Diksi Challenge obumhle ngeyona ndlela  eSisa Dukashe Stadium emini maqanda namhlanje. Amanqaku amathathu ayithathe iPirates ayibeka phezulu kwiDiski Challenge kwindawo yokuqala. Iphala phambili ngamashumi amathandathu amanqaku emva kokudlala imidlalo engamashumi amabini anesixhenxe. Emva kwayo yiBidvest Wits neMamelodi Sundowns ezishiywa ngamanqaku angephi ngokulandelelana kwazo. USimo Bophela uyibeke endaweni entle kwangoko iPirates emdlalweni ngegowuli elihle. Amabini afakwe nguLehlohonolo Sepeng noTshepo Kakora kwisigaba sesibini. Noxa ingalifumananga igowuli lokubika iCeltic – kodwa abadlali bayo bazamile ukumkhabela uKopano Thuntsane ovale iibhola ezinzima ezipalini. 
 
Isiqingatha sokuqala besitaka iintantsi. Ezimnyama zibhakuzelise umnatha emzuzwini wesithandathu ngebhola efakwe sisiququ, uSimo Bophela, ngebhola emshiye ethe natya unozinti weCeltic, uGiven Machaba. Ibixakekile kakhulu iCeltic kwisigaba sokuqala ngoba abadlali bePirates abafana noLehlohonolo Sepeng noS’miso Bophela bebehlasela macala onke. UNqubeko Ntimbane, uNathan Chiliza noLesedi Mohapi basebenze kakhulu emva. Ekuhambeni kwexesha, abadlali beCeltic baye baswabuluka nabo, baye bakwazi ukudlala ibhola ecacileyo. Ifolosi yeBucs, Boitumelo Radiopane, ikhe yafumana ithuba – kodwa ngelishwa layo, ayibhaqanga nto tu. Kuyiwe kwixesha lokuphumla iPirates ihamba phambili ngegowuli elinye emva kokusilawula isigaba sokuqala somdlalo. 
                         
Abadlali bakaGlen Salmon bathathe apho bebeyeke khona kwesokuqala isigaba. Badlale umdlalo ozinzileyo besiya phambili ngezo bhola zabo zibalekayo. Khange baziyekele nabo abadlali beCeltic abaqeqeshwa ngu-Abram Nteo noDitheko Mototo. URadiopane, obekhonkxwe kakhulu kwisigaba sesibini, ukhabe ibhola ethe qelele – kodwa khange imfake engxakini unozinti weCeltic. Iphantse yasengxakini iPirates emva kwempazamo eyenziwe ngunozinti wayo, uKopano Thuntsane, obambe ibhola emhlabeni wakhe ebengafanelanga ukuyibamba. Ayikwazanga ke kodwa ukulisebenzisa elo thuba iCeltic. Emzuzwini wamshumi amabinii anesibhozo kwisigaba sesibini, uLehlohonolo Sepeng, ufake igowuli lesibini lePirates emva kwebhola entle eyidlalelwe ngoogxa bakhe. Igowuli lesithathu lePirates lifakwe nguTshepo Kakora emva kwebhola ebhutyuzwe ngabadlali beCeltic endaweni embi.
title: Ihleli phezulu iPirates emva kokuvuthulula iCeltic emdlalweni weDiski Challenge!

text:
Kulindeleke amawakawaka abalandeli bebhola bathontelane eBhayi phambi komdlalo omkhulu ngempelaveki.  
Iindaba ngokuchongwa kweBhayi zamkelwa ngovuyo ngabalandeli bebhola jikelele.  
Ngentsimbi yesithandathu emalanga ngoMgqibelo, iOrlando Pirates iza kuvan’amandla neBaroka FC emdlalweni wokugqibela weTelkom obonwa njengedabi eliphakathi kukaDavide noGoliyathi eNelson Mandela Bay Stadium.  
Umdlalo weTelkom ubaluleke kakhulu kuwo omabini amaqela ngoba ayayifuna indebe.  
Ukuphumelela kweBaroka kungafunqula umoya wabadlali bayo futhi bazenzele imbali.  
Kunyanzelekile iPirates iyithathe indebe ngenxa yabalandeli abanxanelwe indebe emva kweminyaka engaphaya kwesine kungekho ebancumisayo.  
Ingayimpazamo enkulu ukuba iBucs ingayidelela iBaroka emva kokuba ibethe iMamelodi Sundowns neBidvest Wits phambi komdlalo wokugqibela. 
 UMilutin “Micho” Sredojevic noRulani Mokwena bazenzele igama njengoongqondongqondo bebhola emva kokubetha amaqela afana neKaizer Chiefs – kodwa ngoku kufike ilixa lokuphumelela indebe. 
Abalandeli bebhola benza amaqashiso ngomdlalo weTelkom ozayo kwiindawo abahlangana kuzo.  
UMark Fish noJabu Mahlangu abavakalise iimbono ezahlukeneyo ngomdlalo weTelkom.  
“Yahkunyanzelekile iPirates iwuphumelele umdlalo ngenxa yenkqubela eyenzileyo kwisizini edlulileyo. Kwisizini egqithileyo, iPirates ikwazile ukuswantsulisa iMamelodi Sundowns. Nakule isizini sibona ukuphucuka kwendlela eqhuba ngayo ebaleni. Siyayibona inguqu eyenzekileyo ebaleni – kodwa ke abalandeli bafuna lo nto ikhatshwe yinto ebonakalayo. Umdlalo uza kubanzima – kodwa kunyanzelekile iPirates iphumelele,” utshilo uFish.  
Umdlalo uza kubanzima macala. Siyayazi iPirates iqhuba kakuhle – kodwa ibanjwe yiMaritzburg emdlalweni ogqithileyo.  
Lo nto ibonisa ubunzima bokuqikelela into eza kwenzeka ebholeni. Ukubetha amaqela amakhulu kuyabonisa ukuba iBaroka ayifikanga ngentlahla kwisigaba sokugqibela. Abadlali bayo basebenzile futhi bayifanele indawo abakuyo. Akululanga ukuyithetha le nto – kodwa ikhona into ethi apha kum iBaroka iza kuphoxa abantu abaninzi,” utshilo uMahlangu.
title: Ziyawa eBhayi kwiTelkom Knockout!

text:
Umdlali wasephikweni kwiPlatinum Stars, uMahlatse Makudubela, nobesandula kugqibezela ukutyikitya iimpepha zehambo yakhe yokuya kwiGolden Arrows, utsale amehlo eqela elikhulu kwiPSL. 
Lo mdlali uneminyaka engamashumi amabini anesihlanu, kulindeleke siphelelwe isivumelwano sakhe sokudlala kwiPlatinum Stars ekupheleni kwale sizini. 
Kwaye kuvakala ukuba i-Orlando Pirates sele imjonge ngeliso lokhozi. UMakudubela kulindeleke ukuba afumane ukhuphiswano olumandla ngendawo yokudlala kubadlali abafana no-Andile Fikizolo, Kudakwache Mahachi kunye noDeon Hotto kwi-Arrows. 
Omele uMakudubela, * -Abbie Rasimphi uthe: “Ewe uzakuya ngemboleko kwi-Arrows, nalapho azakuhlala kude kuphele isizini. Andinako ukuphefumla ngamanye amaqela abonakalise umdla kuye, kodwa i-Arrows yona ibonakalise umdla kakhulu kulo mdlali.” 
Kuvakala nokuba, uMakudubela khange avume ukuphinda atyikitye neDikwena kuba enethemba lokuba ingamfunela ngakuyo.
title: UMakudubela ufunwa liqela elikhulu kwiPSL

text:
AMAGOSA kamasipala waseBuffalo City ayanyhilana, ingulo esala ukuthatha uxanduva, ekulungiseni umbhobho wamanzi okwahambisa ilindle ogqabhukileyo kusapho lakwaMqikela kwa-Q 73 eN.U. 16 eMdantsane. 
Lo mbhobho ugqabhuke kwinyanga ephelileyo kwaye ubeka esichengeni ubomi bolu sapho ngenxa yevumba eliphuma kulo monakalo. 
UNomvula Mqikela uthi lo mbhobho, usecaleni kwendlu yakhe, uqale ukuvuza ekuqaleni kwenyanga yeNkanga. 
“Emva kokuba ndibona ukuba ugqabhukile, ndahamba ndayokubika kwamasipala, kwahlaleka ithuba engade afike amagosa. Ndabona ukuba mandiphinde ndiyokuyibika le ngxaki, ngenene afika amagosa kamasipala ecandelo logutyulo-lindle. La magosa ajonga nje emva koko athi lo ngumsebenzi wamagosa ezamanzi kwakulo masipala. 
“Ndabona ukuba mandiyokubika le ngxaki kumagosa ecandelo lezamanzi. Emva kokuba efikile amagosa ezamanzi, andixelela ukuba asiloxanduva labo olu, endaweni yoko lelogutyulo-lindle. Emva koko ndiye ndabona ukuba mandiphinde ndiye kwamasipala ndiyokubika le ngxaki inye. Amagosa ezamanzi eza kwakhona aphinda athi asiyongxaki yabo le. 
“Ndiphinde ndaya kwamasipala, kweza amagosa ogutyulo-lindle, kodwa kwakhona baphinda bandixelela ukuba asiyongxaki yabo le. Mna ndixakiwe ngoku ngulo ndize udlalwa ngala magosa,” itshilo le nkosikazi. 
UMqikela uthi olugqabhuko lalo mbhobho lubeka impilo yolu sapho emngciphekweni wezifo. 
Ephefumla malunga noku, uceba wale ndawo uNtombizodwa Gamnca uthe unolwazi malunga nale ngxaki. “Okwangoku (ngoLwesibini) ndisesekhefini, kodwa ndiza kuyiqwalasela le ngxaki yalo mama. Ndiza kufowunela amagosa ndive ukuba kutheni ingade ilungiswe ingxaki yalo mama,” utshilo uGamnca.
title: Amagosa aseBCM adlala ‘undize’ nenkosikazi esengxakini

text:
USEMONTI namhlanje? Ukuba kunjalo yiza kuzixuba nabasasazi boKhozi FM uzonwabise ngomjuxuzo.  
Kaloku esi sikhululo, sinabaphulaphuli abangaphaya kwezigidi ezisixhenxe, sikwiphulo lokuzazisa kubaphulaphuli baso kweli phondo nanjengoko ipali yaso yezosasazo ifumaneka kwimimandla ethile kweli phondo. 
Ukusuka ngentsimbi yesithandathu kusasa namhlanje, uKhozi olumaphikophiko luza- kusasazela inkqubo uVuka Mzansi kwiholo yoluntu yaseMonti, beluqhuba olu sasazo kwakunye neTru FM. Phaya emva kwentsimbi yesithoba kwakusasa nje, esi sikhululo sizakube sisungula ngokusesikweni oyena nobangela wotyelelo lwaso eMpuma Koloni. Kulo msitho ke, kuzakube kukho abaphathi beSABC, iinkokeli zemveli, oosomashishini, ooceba, isikhokelo saseBuffalo City naseMdantsane City kuquka nabantu bakwaNTT VW. 
Ngentsimbi yesithoba kusasa namhlanje, uKhozi luzakube luqhuba usasazo ngqo e-Oh Mi Lounge eMonti. Emin’ emaqanda uKhozi luzakube luqhuba usasazo ngqo eMdantsane City.  
Ngokuhlwa, ngentsimbi yesithandathu, iqela leendaba lizakube luqhuba usasazo ngqo olumalunga nezolonyulo kwiholo yoluntu eMonti, kuze phaya ngentsimbi yesixhenxe malanga amaqhula akuhlekise kubebuhlungu isisu kwi99% Zulu Comedy eOrient Theatre.
title: Zixube noKhozi FM eMonti

text:
Banikwe kude kubengumhla wamashumi amathathu kule nyanga yoMsintsi abahlali baseMadameni ngaseScenery Park ukuba baphume kwizindlu abahlala kuzo bezintsapho ezilishumi elinesithandathu. 
ULuleka Gaqa uzityande igila ngentlungu yabo yokugxothwa kwezi zindlu baneminyaka behlala kuzo.  
“Ndingene apha ngo-1994, ngomhla wethoba kule nyanga sifumene incwadi ezibhalwe ngomhla weshumi elinesibini kwinyanga yeThupha zisixelela ukuba masiphume kwezi zindlu phambi komhla wamashumi amathathu,”utshilo uGaqa.  
Ezi ncwadi zisuka kwinkampani yamagqwetha iGranett Schoeman zigunyazisa ukuba aba bahlali baphume kwezi zindlu. 
UGaqa uthi esi sigrogriso kokwesibini besifumana kuba bakhe babizwa ngonyaka ka-2001 bexelelwa ukuba bazakuphuma, kodwa bancedwa nguceba owayekho ngelo xesha.  
Ngabantu abakumashumi amathathu kuquka nabantwana ekulindeleke ukuba bachaphazeleke ngenxa yokukhutshwa kwezi zindlu. 
UBongile Mtilwa uhlala nonina uNomakhosazana Mtilwa ophila ngokunyanga abantu kule ndawo.  
“Sizakubetheka kakhulu kuba abantu abanyangwa ngumama bamazi efumaneka kule ndawo, ukusuka kwakhe apha kuza kuyichaphazela ngamandla indlela aphila ngayo,” utshilo uMtilwa. 
 Ezi zindlu zinabagumbi amane, iintsapho ezihlala apha zinabantu abahlanu ukuya kwabasixhenxe, usapho ngalunye lunabantwana ababini nangaphezulu.  
UNtombizandile Mofu uthi akazazi ukuba uzakuyaphi xa bekhutshwa kwezi zindlu kuba akakwazi kuzakhela indlu yakhe.   
“Nokuba singakhutshwa sinikwe umhlaba sizakwakha ngantoni kulo ndawo kuba asiphangeli asinamali yokwakha izindlu zokuhlala, siyacela kwenziwe elinye icebo sinikwe indawo yokuhlala,” utshilo uMofu. 
 Ezi zindlu zakhiwa ngenjongo zokuba kuhlale abasebenzi bakwamasipala abasebenza kwibutho elijongene namanzi eMzanyane Water Services.  
Abahlali batyhola indoda ebizwa ngokuba nguDavid Siemelo ngelithi yiyo equqa kula ndawo inyanzelisa ukuba baphume kwezi zindlu. 
Uceba wakwaWadi 5 eScenery Park uZandisile Tokwe uthi okwangoku akukho sicwangciso asaziyo sokunceda aba bantu.  
“Ndizifumene iingxelo zokuba abantu bafumene iincwadi ezinyanzelisa ukuphuma kwabo kweza zindlu, inyaniso kukuba akukho sibonelelo sikhoyo malunga nendawo abazakuya kuhlala kuyo ngoku aba bantu,” utshilo uTokwe. 
Uceba uthi indlela abahlala ngayo abantu ayisahambelani nendlela ababehlaliswa ngayo ngumasipala waseBCM.  
Imanejala yaseMzonyana uDavid Seimelo uthe unolwazi lokuba umasipala ukwiphulo lokukhupha aba bantu, akavumanga ukuthetha malunga noku.  
Ukanti umasipala waseBCM akafumanekanga ukunika impendulo malunga nokukhutshwa kwaba bantu kwezi zindlu. 
siyabulela.mqikela@inl.co.za
title: Bakhutshwa ezindlini abahlali baseMzonyana

text:
Inqununu yesikolo saseNobotwe eMdantsane, uMkhululi Mngxekeze, akawuvali umlomo yimincili emva kokuba kuthe kwawongwa abafundi besikolo sakhe abane kuba bethe bagqwesa kukhuphiswano lwezifundo zoBalo.  
Abafundi, bebengenele kukhuphiswano lweHorizon Maths oluqhutywa jikelele lisebe lezeMfundo. Aba bafundi nguZandile Sulo owenza uGrade 6, uYinga Rulashe okuGrade7, uAthandwe Ziwele okuGrade 5 kwakunye noLikhona Haas okuGrade 5 – bawongwe eOsner Hotel eMonti, apho bebedibene nezinye izikolo zeli phondo leMpuma Koloni ebezingenele nalo kukhuphiswano.  
UMngxekeze uthi okubavuyisa ngamandla kukuba aba bafundi benzele igama elihle esi sikolo sakwaNobotwe.  
“ Kuvuya mna, kuvuya ootitshala, wonke umntu esikolweni kuba aba bantwana basenzele igama elihle kwaye nesikolo sethu basibeka phezulu. Ndiyabona nam ukuba bayayithanda iMaths kwaye bangaya kude ngayo,” utshilo uMngxekeze.  
Le Nqununu, income intsebenziswano kwanokuzinikela kootitshala abaqinisekisa ngemfundo yabantwana ekwavuyela nokuzimisela kwabafundi bakhe.  
Ootitshala abahlohla iziBalo kwesi sikolo nguYanga Damana kwakunye noLinda Nkayi. Esi sikolo sizinze kwaNU 11b eMdantsane kwaye sigqiba iminyaka engamashumi amane sikhona kwinyanga ezayo.
title: Izenzela igama kwizifundo zezibalo iNobotwe

text:
UMalwande Lennox Gidi ngumbhexeshi wenkqubo yasekuseni iSekunjalo Breakfast Show kuMdantsane FM, odume okwehashe lomdyarho ngelika “The Real President”.  
Ungumgqala ovusa uluntu ekuseni rhoqo ngoMvulo ukuya ngolwesihlanu ukusukela ngentsimbi yesithandathu ukuya kweyethoba (06:00 – 09:00). Ngumfo odlamkileyo ozilahlela nofele emsebenzini wakhe. 
Le nzalelwane yaseCumakala (24) isekhondweni lokuzenzela igama kwezosasazo, “Ndinjenjongo yokuba yimbangambanga yomsasazi kweli ozisa inguqu ebantwini, ebagcina bonwabile, befunda kanjalo benolwazi,” kutsho uGidi esidl’ iimbadu nephepha-ndaba I’solezwe lesiXhosa. 
Lo mphakathi unothando olunzulu kwezosasazo lwerediyo ukhule ephulaphula abasasazi abafana noKCI kunye no-Amaza abamphembelelayo ukuba atshe ziintambo efuna ukuba lapho bakhoyo. Waqala njengomphulaphuli ofowuna rhoqo kwiinkqubo ezahlukileyo zeerediyo ezahlukileyo, ze wawelwa ngumqa esandleni wajoyina iBush Radio ngowe-2008. Wahlala nje unyaka wamnye jwi kwiBush Radio wazuza thuba limbi eMdeez FM, eMonti. 
 Ngenxa yemfundo kwanyanzeleka ukuba afudukele eBhayi ngenjongo yokwenza iziFundo zobuNtatheli nezoSasazo (Journalism and Media Studies) eDamelin. Uthe elapho wajoyina iNkqubela FM ukusukela ngowe-2012 ukuya ngowe-2013.  
Uthe akubuyela eMonti wajoyina iMdantsane FM ngaxeshalinye efundela isatifiketi iVersatile Broadcasting Certificate kwiYunivesithi iWalter Sisulu. Kungoku nje utakis’iintlantsi kwinkqubo yasekuseni ehlaziweyo i-#Sekunjalo Breakfast Show. 
Le nkqubo uyibhexesha ngesimbo esinomtsalane esithi ‘Ndimamele’ esihlisa amahlwantsi ngomhlana, kanjalo esithi thaca imiba enikisa umdla echubelana ngayo nabaphulaphuli. Yinkqubo enikisa umdla, exhobisa ngolwazi kanjalo. 
Ehlomla ngale nkqubo uthe: “USekunjalo uthetha ukuba “It’s Time, Ke Nako”, sisiqalo esitsha sokuqala usuku ngokuzithemba. 
Inkqubo yakhe kulalwa kutyiwe yona ze kuvukwe kwangayo kumakhasi onxibelelwano, isematheni, abaphulaphuli abaziva, bathe ncithi yimincili ngayo. Kuyo uzuza iindaba eziphambili, izimvo, uhlabo madlala, iingxelo zezithuthi ezindleleni, imozulu, ezoyolo, ezemidlalo, iziqhulo, njalo njalo. Umfo lo uyolisa udlubu kunene kuyo, apho khona athi enze nawuphi na umphulaphuli obesesithokothokweni sobumnyana abone intlantsi yokukhanya egabulela imin’entsha. 
Ngumfo ekuphawuleka ukuba uxunele ekuphakanyisweni komgangatho woluntu, idandalaziswa lo nto yindlela avalelisa ngayo “Uthando lwenene Malwande!!”
title: Utak’iintlantsi uGidi woMdantsane FM

text:
Abahlali bakwaWadi 27 eGonubie phantsi komasipala ombaxa iBuffalo City, babetha ngenqindi phantsi besithi abazukuvota kulonyulo lovalo-sikhewu oluza kubanjwa ngomhla wesibini kwinyanga ezayo xa kuzakube kuvotelwa uceba ukuba basanikwa lo bangamfuniyo umgqatswa. 
Batsho ngazwi linye ngethuba bevingce phambi kwe-ofisi yeANC iWB Rubusana edolophini eMonti, besithi uceba abamnikwa ngenkani ngobengunobhala wephondo kumbutho weANC uOscar Mabuyane onguBoy Boy Kalani, abamfuni babetshilo nangaphambili. 
Bathi bafuna uVuyisile Hokisi, angene endaweni kaHelen May, kuba bayoneliseka luhlobo asele eqhuba ngalo.  
Bakwadiza ukuba uVuyisile Hokisi bengabahlali bamonyule ngokomgaqo-siseko kuba imiqathango efanelekileyo xa kufanelwe konyulwe umntu bayilandele yonke, akukho nto irhuqisa mrhaji.  
Umhlali ophambili uMelikhaya Mpukumpa, uthi yonke le nto yokutshintshwa kwamagama nokunganikwa komgqatswa ofunwa ngabo bahlali inokonyulwa kukaMabuyane kutshanje. 
“Emva kokonyulwa kwakhe uMabuyane izinto zijike zonke kuba kuthe kwakuphumelela yena waguqula izigqibo ebekuvunyelenwe kuzo. Sigqibe kwelithi singabahlali ukuba, luyaqhubekeka olu lonyulo lukhethekileyo bengasinikanga uHokisi esimfunayo, alizokuqhubekeka ulonyulo. 
U-IEC ojongene nolonyulo simxelele ukuba angawubeki owakhe umcondo ngomhla wesibini ukuba iphondo alidanga lasinika umgqatswa esimfunayo kwaye asizukuvota. UBoy boy ebengumgqatswa obefakwe ngondlela-mnyama kwakunyaka ophelileyo, ebambela singamfuni, nangoku asikamfuni akukho nto ijikileyo,” utshilo uMpukumpa.  
Okwikomiti yesigqeba eBCM kule wadi uZukiswa Rawuzele uthe: “Into ayenzayo uMabuyane akezi ewadini kuthi ukuzokusabela, uqhuba ngendlela le afuna ukuqhuba ngayo. Uthe xa besithetha naye ku Whatsapp ngoMvulo, wathi inqkubo iza kuqhuba njengonyaka ophelileyo, njani engezi nakuthi? Lityeli lokugqibela eli sikulo kuvaliwe ngoLwesibini kwaIEC. 
“Njengokuba besingena umzi nomzi sigaya inkxaso,  uKalani ebehleli endlwini yena kanti uyalazi igama lakhe ukuba sele liphambili.” I’solezwe liyibonile nemiyalezo kaWhatsapp ebiphakathi kwamalungu aphambili kwiANC kwakunye noMabuyane malunga nomba lo wokunyanzeliswa koceba. Iinzame zokufumana uMabuyane ziphanzile.
title: Bathi abazukuvota eGonubie

text:
KWIMINYAKA nje elishumi elinesithoba (19) ubudala, iphupha lentwazana yaseQonce lokusebenza kwisikhululo esikhulu sikanomathotholo lifezekile. 
Namhlanje, uSimamkele Fiyo, okhulele kwiilali zabazali bakhe, eTamara nakwaMasingatha eQonce, uza kube ephulwaphulwe lilizwe lonke kwi-5FM. 
UFiyo, ube ngomnye obhengezwe njengophumelele kukhuphiswano lwe-5FM lokukhangela abasasazi abaselula olubizwa njenge-5 Squad. 
Olu khuphiswano, oluqhube phakathi komhla wokuqala nowama25 kuTshazimpuzi, belukhangela lowo uphakathi kweminyaka eyi18 neyi25, oqheleneyo nomboko kanomathotholo. 
Ongenela ukhuphiswano bekufuneka athumele idemo, abe unematriki kwaye ngummi woMzantsi Afrika. 
USima wenze kanye oko ze wahlala ethembeni. Uxelele I’solezwe lesiXhosa ukuba lithe likhankanywa igama lakhe phakathi kwabo bawelwe ngumqa esandleni wabe sele enyembezana. 
“Azange ndicinge ukuba ndakuthi xa ndineminyaka nje eli19 ndibe sele ndisebenzela isikhululo sikazwelonke esifana ne-5FM. Bathe xa bengekalibizi igama lam ndabe sele ndintywizisa,” kubalisa uSima. 
USima ebesasaza kwisikhululo sasekuhlaleni iNkqubela FM eBhayi, kususela eseneshumi elinesithandathu (16) leminyaka. 
Ubalisa athi nanjengomntu ongathandiyo ukungenela ukhuphiswano, ingakumbi olukhangela italente, ebemathidala ukungenela olu lwe-5FM. 
“Abahlobo bam ibe ngabo abandityhalele kolu khuphiswano, nam ndafane ndangenela, kanti ndiza kuwina,” utshilo. 
USima uphinde wadiza ukuba ebengenguye umntu kanomathotholo nanjengoko bezithandela umabonakude. 
“Bendidla ngokucaphuka utata xa edlala unomathotholo, kwaye ndandicinga ndiza kusebenza kumabonakude.” 
Uthi ngenxa yokunqaba kweendawo zokusebenza kumabonakude eMpuma Koloni, waphela ezincamela kunomathotholo, kanti usabela ubizo lwakhe. 
Uthi uzonwabele iintsuku ezintlanu zokuhlala eRhawutini ngeemfefe ze-5FM nanjengoko ebeqala ukubeka umcondo wakhe kwela phondo. 
Nangona bebengenele bebabini eMpuma Koloni, uthi uziva emkhulu ekubeni kuchongwe yena. Abasasazi akhethwe nabo bamanye amaphondo baza kube beqhuba inkqubo yaxeshanye nale yakhe, elowo ngosuku olunikwe yena phakathi koMvulo noLwesihlanu. 
USima, owenza izifundo zePsychology nePhilosophy eNMU eBhayi, uza kube esasaza le nkqubo ekuseni umhla we9 kuCanzibe noZanele Potelwa, esasazela kumagumbi weSABC aseBhayi. 
simphiwe.freddie@inl.co.za
title: Intwazana yaseQonce ngumsasazi we-5FM!

text:
BRISBANE – Ipenela Flyhalf uMitchel Hunt idlale indima ebaluleke kakhulu ngethuba uCrusaders ibetha iReds ngo’22-20 izolo kumdlalo obulushica eSuncorp Stadium, eBrisbane. Ukuphumelela kweCrusaders akukholeleki ngoba kuyiwe kwixesha lokuphumla ihamba emva ngo’’20-7.  
Kwisigaba sesibini iqinisekise ukuba iReds ayichili naphantsi. Ingene engxakini iCrusaders izibhaqe isengxakini engathethekiyo emva kokohlwaywa komdlali wayo waphambili uJordan Taufua echwakaze ngenqindi uRob Simmons weReds. Nangona kunjalo, uBryn Hall, ongene endaweni yalo mdlali, ungene wenza umahluko ngokuthi alale emgceni.  
Luye lwakhula uxinizelelo ngakumbi kwiiReds ebezingazi nokuba mazenzeni. Kulo mdlalo, abadlali beCrusaders babonise amandla nobuchule babo bokudlala umbhoxo okumgangatho ophezulu abawabonise nakwiveki ephelileyo ngethuba bebetha iHighlanders ngo’30-12 belandele ngasemva nakuwo eDunedin. “Sonzakalelwe ngabadlali – kodwa amalalela wethu asebenze kakuhle kakhulu. Ndingatsho ngoku ukuba abadlali bayadlangana futhi bayabonana emidlalweni,” utshilo uSam Whitelock. 
Kanti iReds iphantse yayonzakalisa iCrusaders emva kokuphuma kwabadlali abafana noSeta Tamanivalu, u-Israel Dagg noPeter Samu kwisiqingatha sokuqala. Kulapho iReds ifumene ithuba lokubeka ibhola emgceni ngumzuzu weshumi elinesibini. Yibhola ekhatywe nguHunt eqinisekise impumelelo yeCrusaders ibetha iReds yaseNew Zealand.
title: ICrusaders ibhungcile eBrisbane

text:
UNtombekhaya Tyali, 68, waseLower Ngqungqu, eMqanduli, ujijisana nengxaki yokubhubha konyana wakhe eyedwa emva kokuba abahlali belali belikwayile ikhaya lakhe.  
Le nkosikazi ikwaywa ngabahlali belali bengenelela kwidabi eliphakathi kwayo kunye nelungu leli khaya uMlamli Tyali oligqwetha.  
Ekuqaleni kwalo nyaka, igqwetha uMlamli Tyali laxhaphaza le nkosikazi ngokuyibetha ngenduku de yophuka ingalo.  
“Unyana wam ubhubhele eRhawutini ngenxa yokukhathazwa yile nto yokubethwa kwam nguMlamli, ngoku uthumele abantu apha ukuba bandixelele ukuba ndicime ityala lokundibetha kwakhe, okanye ilali iza kundikwaya,” ekhathazekile utshilo uNtombekhaya.  
Ingxelo ithi uMlamli Tyali uthumele abantu ukuba baye kuxelela le nkosikazi ukuba ilicime eli tyala.  
“Kufike apha uNokhaya Mdunyelwa, uSithethi Mbuthuma nebhodi uVela Gili, beze kundixelela ukuba ndicime ityala okanye akukho mhlali uza kundincedisa ukungcwaba,” utshilo uNtombekhaya.  
USithembile Tyali ongunyana weli khaya ubhubhele eRhawutini emva kwengulo emfutshane, kulindeleke ukuba angcwatywe ngomhla wokuqala wenyanga ezayo. 
Emva kokophuka ingalo ngokubethwa nguMlamli Tyali, uNtombekhaya Tyali, wafaka ityala kumapolisa aseMqanduli. 
“Ngenyanga yeSilimela ityala belisenkundleni, ngoku siphindela enkundleni ngomhla weshumi elinanye kwinyanga ezayo, andisoze ndicime tyala mna, andimoyiki uMlamli Tyali,” utshilo uNtombekhaya. 
 Eli khaya liphila elusizini ngenxa yokoyikiswa ngeendlela ezininzi ngabantu abarhanela ukuba bathunywa nguMlamli. 
“Sithathelwa iigusha, siyoyikiswa ngabantu ngokubethwa nokugxothwa nokuba sihamba esitalatweni, siphila nzima kakhulu kule ndawo,” utshilo. Egameni lekhaya lakwaTyali, uVulikhaya Tyali, akafumanekanga ukuziphendulela.  
Intombi yeli khaya nesoloko isecaleni konina uNombhedesho, uthi abasazi isono sabo kusapho lakwaTyali. 
“Siphila ubomi bentshontsho apha, ngoku siza kungcwaba ubhuti sisodwa, sikwaywa xa besenze ntoni kubahlali, kuba umama wabethwa ekhusela iigusha zomzi wakhe, ibuhlungu le nto.” 
Igqiza ebelithunyelwe nguMlamli kweli khaya ukuba licenge lo mama ukuba acime ityala, limxelele ukuba lukhona uncedo. 
“Bathi ukuba ndingacima ityala, uMlamli angandingcwabela ngoba unayo imali yokwenza lo nto.” 
INkosi yale ndawo uNkosi Phathekile Holomisa akafumanekanga ukwenza ilizwi ngale ngxaki yokukwaywa kolu sapho.
title: Tyali: Bandikwayile abahlali baseLower Ngqungqu

text:
Ibesesezolo kumdlalo wamaqela aseMzantsi Afrika adlala kwiPRO 14 – iSouthern Kings neCheetahs. La maqela ebebambene ngobhongwana eToyota Stadium izolo. Ziphinde zaphuma ebaleni zithe qhushe imisila ngasemva iSouthern Kings emva kokuhlazwa kanobomi ziCheetahs. Le mpumelelo ithetha ukuthi zisayigcinile imbali yokungabethwa ziSouthern Kings iCheetahs eziphumelele ityeli lesithathu. La maqela alale amatyeli asithoba emgceni edibene, iCheetahs ziwe kathandathu amgceni, ze zona iKings zalala kathathu kuphela. UNico Lee, othe gqolo ngokuzityela itheko kwiKings, ulele kabini emgceni. 
Nakule veki zifumene amanqaku angamashumi amane anesihlanu iCheetahs noxa kusenzima ukufumana amanqaku angamashumi amathathu iKings nezizifumanele amanqaku angamashumi amabini anesine. Impumelelo yamakhwenkwe kaRory Duncan iqinisekisa ukuba asazinzile kwindawo yesithathu kwiLog xeshikweni zisathe dimfi emsileni iiKings nezingekaphumeleli nomdlalo omnye kule midlalo ilishumi elinesithathu sele ziyidlalile. Ziqubisana ne-Ulster ngomhla wethoba kweyoMdumba iKings kumdlalo wazo landelayo e-Ireland, ze zigagane ne Cardiff Blues ngomhla weshumi iCheetahs kwilizwe lase Wales. 
 
Cheetahs 
15 Clayton Blommetjies 14 Craig Barry, 13 Nico Lee, 12 Neil Marais, 11 Makazole Mapimpi, 10 Fred Zeilinga, 9 Shaun Venter, 8 Uzair Cassiem, 7 Oupa Mahoje (captain), 6 Henco Venter , 5 Reniel Hugo, Justin Basson, 3 Aranos, 2 Jacques du Toit, 1 Ox Nche 
16 Joseph Dwaba,17 Charles Marais, 18 Tom Botha , 19 Rynier Bernardo, 20 Junior Pokomela, 21 Zee Mkhabela,22 Clinton Swart, 23 AJ Coertzen 
Kings 
15 Ntabeni Dukisa, 14 Michael Makase, 13 Harlon Klaasen , 12 Luzuko Vulindlu, 11 Yew Penxe, 10 Martin du Toit, 9 Rowan Gouws, 8 Ruaan Lerm, 7 Martinus Burger, 6 Ansisa Ntsila, 5 Bobby de Wee, 4 Stephan Greef, 3 Pieter Scholtz, 2 Michael Willemse (captain), 1 Schalk Ferreira 
16.Tango Balekile,17 Johan Smith, 18 Dayan van der Westhuizen, 19 Lindokuhle Welemu, 20 Eital Bredenkamp,21 Rudi van Rooyen, 22 Benhard Janse van Rensburg, 23 Berton Klaasen
title: Iseliphupha impumelelo kwiSouthern Kings!

text:
Bashiyeke bethe khunubembe abalandeli beKaizer Chiefs abe benethemba lempumelelo kwiveki iqela labo elifince ngayo amashumi amahlanu anesithathu eminyaka. Amakhosi ayophisa emva kokuquthiswa ngegowuli elinye eqandeni emdlalweni weDStv Premiership obumhle eFNB Stadium kubusuku banamhlanje. Ngaphandle kokuthandabuzo, iqela lika-Arthur Zwane bekufanele ukuba liwuphumelele umdlalo ukuba belikwazile ukusebenzisa amathuba eliwafumeneyo kwisigaba sokuqala somdlalo. UCaleb Bimenyimana ufumene amathuba esendaweni entle amatyeli aliqela kwisigaba sokuqala – kodwa namhlanje akakwazanga ukufaka nelinye igowuli emnatheni. 
Abadlali abafana noPhilani Zulu noDaniel Cardoso bakwazile ukuthintela iChiefs ebifuna shushu impumelelo ukuze ivale umsantsa ophakathi kwayo namaqela angasentla kuyo afana neMamelodi Sundowns ebethe iRichards Bay ekwindawo yesibini. UKeagan Dolly, uYusuf Maart noNkosingiphile Ngcobo bebesilwela ukuya kwisigaba sesibini iChiefs inento esandleni. Akubanga njalo ngoba iintsika zeSekhukhune United bezomelele kakhulu. Iye yahlala kwindlela yokudlala enokuyinceda kwiChiefs ebihlasela. Igowuli elifakwe nguVusumzi Ncube linike iSekhukhune United impumelelo yatsho yanyukele kwindawo yeshumi kwiDStv Premiership. 
Oku kwenzeke emva kokuba abadlali basemva kwiChiefs bephise ngebhola endaweni embi. UBrandon Truter, omtsha kwiSekhukhune United, ufake abadlali abaqinisekise ukuba iqela lakhe liyaphumelela emva kokudlala ntanganye naMaZulu kwiveki ephelileyo. Indlela eqhube ngayo iChiefs ibaphoxile abalandeli bayo emva kokuphumelela kakuhle emdlalweni ebethe kuwo iGolden Arrows ngamagowuli amabini eqandeni kwiveki ephelileyo. Nakubeni ikhe phantsi isitya sigcwele emdlalweni wanamhlanje – kodwa iChiefs isahleli kwindawo yesine ebikuyo kakade phambi komdlalo. Ingxaki ecacileyo kwiChiefs kukungakwazi kwayo ukufaka amagowuli emidlalweni yawo. Ngoku kunyanzelekile ikhangele ifolosi ngokukhawuleza.
title: Ayophisa Amakhosi emva kokuquthiswa yiSekhukhune United emdlalweni obuseFNB Satdium

text:
Ngomzuzu wokugqibela, iGinea-Bissau, yohluthe ilizwe elisingathe itumente yalo nyaka, iGabon, ngomzuzu wokugqibela ngethuba ifaka igowuli lokulinganisa kumdlalo wokuvula eStade d’Angondje namhlanje ngokuhlwa. 
Umdlalo wokuqala uqale ngezinga eliphantsi nangoba ubuzinyaswe ngamawaka-waka abathandi bebhola. Igowuli leGabon lifakwe yifolosi eyoyikwa kwakhulu ngenxa yolwanvila enalo uPierre-Emerick Aubameyang phambi kokuphela kwesiqingatha sokuqala. Njengelizwe elidlalela ekhaya, bekulindeleke ukuba iGabon iyivuthulule kanobom iGuinea-Bissau – kodwa endaweni yoko ifumene ubunzima. Abadlali beGuinea-Bissau bayibeke phantsi ibhola kamnandi [nabo] kwelabo icala kwaye bebefika kwiipali zeGabon nangona bebefika kuvaliwe.  
Eyona nto yenziwe kakuhle ngabadlali beGuinea-Bissau kukuqinisekisa ukuba bayabagada phantse bonke abadlali abayingozi nangona amava, kulo mgangatho, aye ababetha ngethuba u-Aubameyang efaka igowuli lokuqala kule tumente ka’2017. Umdlalo uye waphucuka kwisiqingatha sesibini ngoba amazwe omabini ebefuna amanqaku amathathu.  
Nanoba iGabon ingephakathi kwaloo mazwe athathelwa phezulu kwibhola yezwekazi le Afrika – kodwa abazizo iidyongo konke konke. Ukudlala kwayo iGabon kwiitumente ezidlulileyo kuyinika amava afunekayo kwiqela elizimisele ukudlala kakuhle kwitumente efana nale.
