Ngokwengxelo ephuma kuBrigadier Vishnu Naidoo, unobangela wokuvalwa okwethutyana kwazo kukufumaneka kwamagosa aphuma kwezi zikhululo ngokohlukana kwazo echaphazelekile emva kovavanyo lawo kwikhorona. 
 Izikhululo zivalwe kuba kuqinisekiswa ngococo ngaphakathi ngenjongo zokubulala le ntsholongwana kwaye nokukhusela uluntu olungena luphuma kwezi zikhululo.  
UNaidoo uthi uluntu lakuphinda laziswe kungekudala ngokubuyela kwezinto esiqhelweni. AbaseKinkelbos abantu babongozwa ukuba batsalele u10111 okanye iNkumanda yesikhululo ebambeleyo uKapteni Neethling ku: 079 741 4621 xa befuna ukuqonda.  
EQonce bakutsalela u10111 okanye iNkumanda yesikhululo ku: 082 446 3915. EBhisho bakutsalela u10111 ze kuGatyane basebenzise u10111 okanye ezi nombolo 076 7901 932 /082 566 0986.  
Uninzi lwezi zikhululo zisebenzisa amaholo oluntu. Abolawulo kwaSAPS baxolisa eluntwini ngophazamiseko.
title: Zine izikhululo zamapolisa ezivalwe ngenxa yeCovid-19 ephondweni

text:
IGXEKE amaqela aphikisayo iANC ngelithi adelele isigqibo senkundla yomgaqosiseko. Oku kulandela ukunganeliseki kwala maqela sisigqibo sesebe lezemali elinyanzelise umongameli weli uJacob Zuma ukuba ahlawule imali ebalelwa kwizigidi ezisixhenxe ezinamakhulu asibhozo amawaka eeranti(R7.8 million).  
Ibalelwa ku250 wezigidi zeerandi imali eyachithwa ngethuba kuphuculwa ukhuseleko kwikhaya likaZuma eliseNkandla, neyakhokelela kumadabi. UZuma zange awuthobele umyalelio woMkhuseli Woluntu uThuli Madonsela owawumnyanzela ukuba ahlawule inkcitho kwizinto ezingeyonxalenye yokhuseleko. Ezi zinto ziquka ubuhlanti, indlu yeenkukhu, ichibi lokuqubha, indawo yokwamkela iindwendwe kwakunye nentendelezo yokudlalela.  
Ukungathobeli umyalelo woMkhuseli Woluntu, nokwamkelwa sisininzi samalungu ePalamente kwezinye iingxelo ezithi uZuma makangahlawuli kwakhokelela ukuba iqela leEFF kwakunye neDA abhenele kwinkundla yomgaqosiseko. Le nkundla yagweba ngelithi uZuma makahlawule inxalenye yemali ngokwesibhambathiso soMkhuseli Woluntu.  
Le nkundla yayalela isebe lezemali ukuba liphande intlawulo ekufanele ukuba uZuma ayikhuphe. Emva kwengxelo yeli sebe inkokeli yeDA uMmusi Maimane uthe uZuma usatyala abemi beli izigidi zeranti, kuba intlawulo ekufanele ayikhuphe ziipesente ezintathu xa kuthelekiswa inkcitho eyenzeke eNkandla.  
Kwelayo icala iEFF ithe linyathelo elifanelekileyo lokubuyisa isidima se-ofisi yoMkhuseli Woluntu. Lo mbutho ulumkise ngelithi alikapheli idabi lokususa uZuma kwisihlalo sokongamela. Isithethi sikaKhongolose uZizi Kodwa uthe inkundla yomgaqosiseko zange ithi isebe lezemali malifumane imvume kumaqela aphikisayo ngeyona ntlawulo uZuma kufanele ayikhuphe. Ukwathe, “Siya ekuwuqosheliseni lo mba kodwa siyayazi ukuba kukho imibutho engathanda ukuwubona uqhubekeka kuba akukho nto yezopolitiko azakusala nayo xa siwuvala.” Inkundla yomgaqosiseko isamkele isigqibo sesebe lezemali. UZuma kulindeleke ukuba ahlawule zingaphelanga iintsuku ezingamashumi amane anesihlanu.
title: Ifuna uvalwe umba waseNkandla iANC

text:
Akukho nto inqabe njengothando kwimihla esiphila kuyo. Eli gama lithi uthando linobunzulu obungaphaya kunokuba silisebenzisa, lithetha intembeko, ulwamkelwano nobunye.  
Mhlawumbi ndiyaphazama, kodwa ukho umntu ongathanda umntu angenakuthembela kuye? Masithi mhlawumbi ngokubona kwakho ngenene ukhona, kodwa akungebi uthanda nje into ethile ngaloo mntu athi uyamthanda.  
Ndibuza ke kuba ndiqonda ubumbaxa bengxoxo enokulandela lo mba ndiwuxhokonxayo kungoku. Kum-Afrika ofana nam nawe, okhule esiva amabali angomendeselwano – apho iintombi bezithwalwa, uyokuziva zibe liqela izimvo zabantu abamitshato yabo ivele ngokuthwalwa.  
Omnye uyokuxelela ukuba akukho nto iluthando, umntu ufunda ukumthanda nje kuphela. Mhlawumbi ke olu luvo lungaphikiswa ngempumelelo ngabo bathi umntu umthanda ngokuchukunyiswa yimizwa ethile ngaye, yohluke ke le mbono kwabo bathanda okuthile ngomntu lowo.  
Yima, ikhona na into yokuthanda umntu ungakhethi okuthile ngaye? Ndiyawujula nje lo mbuzo ndinganyeke kugxeka ezi nkalo zingentl’ apha.  
Kambe ayebophelekile amantombi ngexesha langaphambili kuba yayiba lihlazo into yokuzibika emfaneni icela uthando. Zajika mntakamama izinto kwixesha lethu. 
Awangoku amantombi abona ukuba angatshonelwa ngamalanga elindele ukuba umfana azithethele. Yinto eyenze yanguqhelekile into yokungamothuki umntu obhinqileyo ezibika endodeni. Hamba minyaka! Andithi bekuyizolo oku siyibona ilihlazo loo nto? 
Incwadi ethi, Uthando Lunzima yinovelana eyabhalwa nguHope Dube neyapapashwa phaya ngomnyaka ka2007 ngabakwaHeinemann Publishers. 
Kule ncwadi uZami uzibona exakene nokungakwazi ukuxelela uNjongo indlela amthanda ngayo. Mhlawumbi ke uZami lo leli qela liseneentloni nelibambe esiya sidima sobuntombi sakudala. Isasebenza na kanene loo nto? 
 Nokuba ke kungathi kanti ayisebenzi, ukuzithoba isidima yindlela engabonwa ngayo le meko xa lowo ubuzibhekisela kuye engasamkeli eso sicelo sakho. Uthini ke ukungabimanyonywana usazi nje ukuba lowo umthandayo akukho nto ithi thiki ngawe kuye!  
Kona eli nenekazi lalimthanda lingaziva lo mfana ungumqeshi walo. Noko uZami wayekhe angakuqondi ukwenza kukaNjongo, wayesithi akumjonga ambone engummangaliso womntu.  
Ithiwani ke le nto yalo mthetho ungazanga wamiselwa bani wokuzicelela uthando emntwini omthandayo? Asikokubopheleleka na ukungakwazi ukuthi, ndiyakuthanda kuba lowo ubhekisa kuye eyindoda? 
Liqhina elilushica ke eli neliqamangele amanenekazi eli lizwe lakowethu. Intlalo yethu yayamkela de yanga lilungelo lendoda ukuba yiyo ecela uthando, ke xa ingekatsho yona wena ungowasetyhini libala! Yho, hayi inene! Safuduka apho thina, esizenzayo zezeli xesha ledemokhrasi. 
Abe ayesilwela ntoni laa makhosikazi ngo1956 xa singazikuzikhulula kwesi sisinga?  
UZami umonde wakhe wamsebenzela kuba uNjongo noko wayezenza ongamboneli kumthanda nje uZami, naye wayemthanda gqibi, kunjalonje ekholisekile nguye.  
Ukuphakama kwengqondo yale ntokazi yamenza uNjongo akabhekabheka xa efuna umfazi.  
Uthi ukuba wayezicelele ngokwakhe uthando uZami ngeyade yafikelela emtshatweni na le yesi sibini? 
Zifundeleni ngokwenu mawethu iincwadi zenu, isiXhosa senu. Ndimkile! 
Owenu kusiba noncwadi lwesiXhosa!
title: Sesafuduka thina apho

text:
UMAKHWEKHWETHA kuluncwadi lwesiXhosa, uNjingalwazi Ncedile Saule, umemelele kwabantsundu ukuba benze ingxolo ngolwimi lwabo lwenkobe ukuze kuphile futhi kuphuhle imvelaphi yesizwe. 
“Sidelelwe kakhulu zezinye izizwe, kufike ixesha lokuba sithi kwanele. Kufuneka siphume senze ingxolo eninzi ngolwimi lwethu. Sithethe ePalamente, ezitalatweni, naphi na, singxole,” utshilo uSaule, ethetha eGinsberg eQonce kumsitho obuququzelelwe liSebe lezeMidlalo, uLonwabo, ubuGcisa neNkcubeko laseMpuma Koloni. 
Lo msitho ibingowokubhiyozela iziswenye zoluncwadi, eziquka uSamuel Krune Edward Mqhayi. 
USaule ucaphule kokwabhalwa nguMqhayi ngo1914, esithi: “Xa ungalwaziyo ulwimi lwakho, ungaluthethi nangoku sele ulwazi, ufunda ukungabinanyani. Izifundiswa zihlozinga nje xa zithetha, kungenxa yokuba azizange zafunda nto kooninakhulu nakooyisemkhulu. 
Kunceda ntoni na umntu anconyelwe ukulisoma ulwimi lwasemzini, ngelo xesha ungumdlungu kolwakhe.” 
USaule ubuze ukuba kutheni le nto oosopolitiki bethetha ngolwimi lwasemzini xa bethetha nabalandeli babo. “Bekwenza oko beyazi ukuba abayazi kwale nto bathetha ngayo.” 
“Okunzima kakhulu, yile yongcwaba (izizalwana zethu) ngolwimi lwasemzini, de sibhale ngqindilili kumafihlo wabo, sithethe nezinyanya zethu ngolwimi lwasemzini. Baza kusiva njani?” kubuza uSaule. 
Lo makhwekhwetha uthi uluncwadi lwethu lugqamisa indlela yokucinga. “Yinkokheli enjani engafundiyo? Akusoze uyibone ifunda nephepha. Ayinalo nethala leencwadi phaya ekhaya.” 
“Uluncwadi lwethu lwesiXhosa lubangela ukuba sibesithi, thina buqu. IsiXhosa singenza nantoni na,” utshilo uSaule.
title: ‘Yinkokheli enjani le ongasoze uyibone ifunda nephepha?’

text:
Emidlalweni esibhozo edlalwe yiSouthern Kings kwiPRO 14, mnye tshu umdlalo ekwazileyo ukuwuphumelela kule sizini. 
 Lo nto ibeka iqela lomboxo laseMpuma Koloni endaweni yeshumi elinesine kwiPRO 14. Nangani itsala nzima iKings – kodwa inethuba lokubuyisa isidima sombhoxo waseMpuma Koloni xa idibana neToyota Cheetahs emdlalweni ojongwe ngamehlo abomvu eNelson Mandela Bay Stadium ngecala emva kwentsimbi yesithathu emalanga ngoMgqibelo.  
IKings neCheetahs kuphela kwamaqela alapha eMzantsi Afrika adlala kwiPRO 14.  
Ukudlalela phambi kwabalandeli bayo, yinto ekulindeleke iyincede iKings xa idlala neCheetahs esele iphumelele imidlalo emine yonke kwesibhozo eyidlalileyo kule sizini. 
Abadlali beKings baza kuya emdlalweni wempelaveki behlaziyekile emva kokubetha iStormers ngo’13-3 emdlalweni wokucweya obuseLoerie Park Stadium, eKnysna, kwiveki ephelileyo ngoLwesihlanu.  
Ukudlala neCheetahs eqhuba kakuhle ngeke ibe ngumsebenzi okhaphukhaphu, kodwa umqeqeshi obebambele, uVuyo Zangqa, ubaqhwabele izandla abadlali bakhe ababethe iStormers esiqhube kakuhle kwiSuper Hero Sunday ebibanjelwe eFNB Stadium kwiCawe ephelileyo.  
“Imozulu khange isiphazamise kwaphela. Ubumanzi siqhelene nabo xa sidlala imidlalo yePRO 14. Kuhle ngoba abadlali bakwazile ukuyithintela indlela esiqhele ukudlala ngayo umbhoxo iStormers. Abadlali bethu basemva badlale kakuhle kakhulu. Kuyasivuyisa ukubona indlela iqela eliwuphethe ngayo umdlalo. Sizama ukwakha iqela kwaye sinethemba lokuba kuyakuqhubeka nakwimidlalo ezayo kule sizini,” utshilo uZangqa. 
Emidlalweni emithathu eyidlalele ekhaya, iKings ibethwe yiMunster, iCardiff Blues neUlster.  
Abalandeli banethemba lokuba uRobbi Kempson nabadlali bakhe baya kuthi babuyise isidima sombhoxo waseMpuma Koloni esehlileyo ngenxa yokungaqhubi kakuhle kweqela.
title: Lifikile ixesha lokuvuka kweSouthern Kings

text:
UBrighton Mhlongo no-Itumeleng Khune ngabo ababangele kungabikho qela eliphumeleleyo kumdlalo wanamhlanje. Amakhosi adlale ntanganye ngo’1-1 kumdlalo obumhle eFNB Stadium ebigcwele imi ngembambo. Ithuba lokufaka igowuli eliphoswe nguWillard Katsande libashiye abalandeli besithi: Akwaba bekunikwe mntu wumbi. La maqela aphose ithuba elihle lokuqokelela amanqaku apheleleyo abenokuwathatha awabeke phezulu kwiPSL. Ngaphandle kokungabikho kwempumelelo, abalandeli abanaso isizathu sokukhala ngoba umdlalo ubumhle kakhulu. 
Amabhaka-bhaka bekufanele ukuba kuyiwe kwixesha lokuphumla ehamba phambili ngamagowuli amathathu. Akubanga njalo ngenxa ka-Itumeleng Khune oxabe endleleni yawo. Khange aqheliselane kwakwimizuzu yokuqala. Amakhosi ahlasele kuqala ngoRamahlwe Mphahlele kwicala lasekunxele – kodwa ibhola yakhe ibingenawo amandla. Emva kwemizuzu elishumi umdlalo uqalile, abadlali bePirates bekhokelwa ngu-Oupa Manyisa obetyala iibhola kuThembinkosi Lorch, Mpho Makola, Thamsanqa Gabuza noDove Wome – baquqe bebuyelela okwezulu laseMthatha – kodwa akavuma uKhune. 
ULorenzo Gordinho no-Eric Mathoho babenako ukubhutyuza okuthile kulo mdlalo kwisigaba sokuqala somdlalo, lo nto inike ithuba uWome noGabuza ithuba lokwenza unothanda kwanyanzeleka asebenze uKhune. Ngomzuzu weshumi elinesihlanu uJoseph Molangoane ulibeke emnatheni igowuli lakhe lokuqala kwidabi laseSoweto emva kwebhola edlalwe kakuhle kuSiphiwe Tshabalala noBernard Parker. Inkqonkqozile kwakhona iChiefs isebenzi uMolangoane kwicala lasekunxele. Ifumene igowuli lokulinganisa iPirates emva kwegowuli elifakwe nguTsepo Masilela ngempazamo – ibhola ebisuka kuLorch obeyinkathazo macala onke kulo mdlalo. 
Nakwesesibini isigaba asukelene la maqela. Kuke kwakhangeleka ngathi iPirates ingafaka igowuli kwangoko kwisigaba sesibini. Umgangatho womdlalo uye wenyuka. Inxele leChiefs, u-Edmore Chirambadare uzamile ukuhlasela – kodwa ibhola yakhe iphume ecaleni kwepali. USteve Komphela wenze iingqu ngokuthi akhuphe uGeorge Maluleka noChirambadare – endaweni zabo kungethe uWilliam Twala noLucky Baloyi abathe bawubamba umdlalo. 
Abadlali beChiefs abakwazanga ukugqobhoza udonga lwasemva obelumiswe nguHappy Jele no-Ayanda Gcaba bexhagwe nguPatric Phungwayo noNtsikelelo Nyauza. Kwelakhe icala uKjell Jonevret ukhuphe uLorch obedlala kakuhle noDove Wome waze wafaka uTendai Ndoro ongakhange abenalo ulwamvila no-Abbubaker Mobara. Amakhosi afumene ipenela ngemizuzu yokugqibela – kodwa ngelishwa lawo uWillards Katsande akakwazanga ukuyivalela emnatheni. 
  
Chiefs: 32. Khune, 2. Mphahlele, 26. Gordinho, 3. Mathoho, 24. Masilela, 31. Katsande, 23. Molangoane, 12. Maluleka 11. Chirambadare, 14. Tshabalala, 25. Parker.  Pirates: 1. Mhlongo, 2. Gcaba, 4. Jele, 34. Nyauza, 21. Phungwayo, 20. Manyisa, 45. Mobara, 5. Makola, 29. Lorch, 35. Wome, 9. Gabuza.
title: Kwenzeke lanto iqhelekileyo eFNB Stadium

text:
LIVUKE phantsi uqhankqalazo lwabafundi kwiiyunivesithi zeli, phantsi kwentshukumo ebizwa ngokuba #FeesMustFall.  
Ukuza kuthi ga ngoku, abafundi baphazamise inkqubo yobhaliso kwiiyunivesithi ezintathu. Bagrogrise ngelithi abazukuvota ukuba urhulumente akabaniki mfundo yafele-fele.  
Abafundi bafuna imfundo yafele-fele, kwaye bakwafuna kupheliswe inkqubo yokuqeshwa kwabantu phantsi kweenkampani zabucala. 
 Konzakele oonogada abane kwakunye nabafundi kukrutha-kruthwano olwenzeke kwiYunivesithi yaseWits. Le yunivesithi yenye phakathi kwezo ubhaliso luthe lwaphazamiseka.  
Ezinye yiYunivesithi yasePitoli kwakunye ne-Unisa kwakule dolophu. Nase Unisa amapolisa asebenzise iziqhushumbisi zokundulula abafundi ababevala indlela eya kule yunivesithi.  
Bahlabe ikhwelo kubasebenzi ngelithi mabangenelele, begxeka ngelithi eli ziko liqeshe abasebenzi abacocayo kwakunye noonogada kwinkampani iRed Alert.  
Ukanti nakwiYunivesithi yasePitoli, ubhaliso lwabafundi linqunyanyisiwe ngenxa yoqhankqalazo. Abafundi kweli ziko bathi bafuna isibonelelo samachiza. Abafundi bakhalaza ngelithi abasebenzi abacocayo bahlawulwa imali engamawaka amabini eerandi.  
Ukanti ubhaliso lwabafundi eWits beliqhuba izolo, nangona uqhankqalazo lusaqhubeka.
title: #FeesMustFall – gqi udushe lweeyunivesithi

text:
OBESAKUBA nguMongameli uJacob Zuma ulumkise abachasi bakhe kwiANC esithi “konele” ngokurhuqelwa eludakeni kwegama lakhe, watsho esithi uza kuqhaqha amabholo ekuthetha oko ebuza ukuba “ngubani owathengisa uHani?”  
 
UZuma ebethetha nabalandeli bakhe eParktown ngoLwesihlanu ngaphandle kwezakhiwo apho ihleli khona iKomishini ekhokelwa liSekela Jaji eliyiNtloko, uRaymond Zondo, nephendla umbandela wokudlakatheliswa kombuso.  
 
NgoLwesihlanu, usuku lokugqibela lokuvela kukaZuma phambi kwale Komishini, obesakuba nguMongameli akakhange agocagocwe ngamibuzo emva kokuba amagqwetha evakalise ukungaxoli yindlela ewuqhuba ngayo umsebenzi ngakuZuma le Komishini. 
 
UZondo ubhengeze ukuba uZuma uya kuphinda abuye kusuku olakuphinda laziswe.  
 
UZuma uphindile kwiintetha zakhe zasekuqaleni kweveki ukuba le Komishini ligumgedle nje “lokufumana okugwenxa” ngakuye.  
Uthi ubudlelwane bakhe nosapho lakwaGupta abunanto yakwenza nobuqhophololo.  
 
Elumkisa abachasi bakhe kwiANC, uZuma uthe: “Konele ngoku. Bazothi ngelinye ixesha ndiyaphambana xa ndibaxela iziqu ngeziqu.”  
Ukwabuze umbuzo ophakamise amehlo kwabaninzi, esithi: “Ngubani owathengisa uChris Hani? Abanye bathetha kakhulu nje. Mhlawumbi lo mbuzo uya kuphenduleka ngenye imini.”  
 
Emilebeni yoluntu, nangona nje bagwetywa abona bantu baqhumisa irhuluwa kuHani ngo1993, isoloko ivela imibuzo yokuba babethunyelwe ngubani.  
 
UMphatheli Hani wakuSabalele eCofimvaba, ombiza tatomncinci uHani, ubhale kuFacebook esithi: “Impendulo siyayirhalela. Lo mbuzo (wokuba ngubani owathengisa uHani) uvela qho xa oosopolitiki beva kumnandi ukuthetha.”
title: Zuma: Ngubani owathengisa ngoHani?

text:
UMphathiswa wesebe lemicimbi yeenkosi zomthonyama eMpuma Koloni uFikile Xasa uvakalise umathuko izolo emva kweengxelo zokuba bathathu abakhwetha abasele bebhubhile kweli phondo.  
Iphepha-ndaba I’solezwe lesiXhosa izolo libike ukuba umkhwetha wokuqala ubhubhele kwilali iButhulo eSajonisi. Iingxelo zithi lo mkhwetha uneminyaka elishumi elisine kwaye ufumaneke enezivubeko zokubethwa. Isithethi sesebe lemicimbi yeenkosi ephondweni uMamkeli Ngam uthi bamalunga neshumi elinesithandathu abakhwetha abahlangulwe kwibhoma elingekho semthethweni eButhulo, ze basiwa kwindawo ekhuselekileyo.  
“Aba bakhwetha bahlangulwe eButhulo bancinci kakhulu ngeminyaka,” utshilo uNgam esaleka ngelithi ukwakhona umkhwetha ofunyenwe ebhubhile kummandla waseLukhanji.  
Isithethi sesebe lezempilo eMpuma Koloni uSizwe Kupelo uthi umkhwetha oneminyaka elishumi elinesibhozo ufunyenwe ebhubhile eLujecweni eNgqeleni. UKupelo uthi lo mkhwetha ufunyanwe eneempawu zokudinwa.  
UNgam ukwathe ukhona umkhwetha ongeniswe kwisibhedlele iFrere eMonti, logama ekwakhona nomkhwetha ongeniswe kwisibhedlele saseBhisho. Bakwakhona nabakhwetha abangeniswe kwisibhedlele saseMthatha bephantsi kwemeko embi kakhulu.  
UXasa udlulise amazwi ovelwano kwiintsapho ezibhujelwe ngabakhwetha. “Sibongoza abazali ukuba batyelele amabhoma ukuqinisekisa ukuba basempilweni abakhwetha. Futhi sicela ukuba banikwe amanzi abakhwetha, bangabethwa,” utshilo uXasa.  
UNgam uthi bangaphaya kweshumi bebonke abakhwetha abangeniswe esibhedlele. UNobhala wombutho weenkosi iContralesa uNkosi uXolile Ndevu ugxeke abazali ngenyhikityha yokubhubha kwabakhwetha.
title: Imbubhane yabakhwetha

text:
Akukho hlanga lungenathamsanqa. Kambe ke amanye amathamsanqa ayacubhula; ndide ndizibuze ukuba ikhona na ngenene into elithamsanqa. Ndibuye ndiziphendule ndithi ikhona, qha elam alifani nelakho. 
Ukufumana into engafunyanwanga ngabanye ingaba lithamsanqa? Akubi mhlawumbi oko ukufumeneyo ubumele kukufumana kakade? Andazi, mhlawumbi nawe akwazi. 
Okunye okundinika umdla zizinto ezitenxileyo abantu abathi zilithamsanqa. EsiXhoseni ukuwelwa lilindle lentaka lithamsanqa. Kwee! Ndithi ndakugqiba ukungcoliswa yintaka ndiswenkile uthi ndinethamsanqa!  
Omnye woonondaba beli phepha lakowethu ukhe wabalula ukuba ezinye zeengcali zesiXhosa, xa ebephanda ngentaka ekuthiwa yingqanga, zithe nokubona ilindle lengqanga lithamsanqa (unondaba uthe ‘ubulongwe’ ke yena, ndase ndaxakwa kukuba nobulongwe kwentaka. Kodwa ke andikho apho kwaye ndiyamqonda ukuba ubebaleka ntoni na). 
Ithamsanqa likwachazwa ngeendlela ezingabonisi buthamsanqa, ezingade zibe zililishwa mhlawumbi endaweni yokuba lithamsanqa. Singamakhwenkwe besiwucaphukela kakhulu umqa, sisithi kukudla kwabafazi.  
Besiwudla ngokungancedi kwaye sikubona njengelishwa ukuthi wakuya embiza ufike ujanyelwe ngumqa, ede eneendawo engathi ziyalila. Kodwa kukho iqhalo elichaza ithamsanqa elithi ‘ukuwelwa ngumqa esandleni’. Suka! Umqa nalapha ezintweni! 
Ithamsanqa likwalishwangusha komnye, nangokwahluka kweenkcubeko. EmaNgesini ukubona isikhova lithamsanqa. Kanti wona amaXhosa atsibela iinkambu zawo achile ishwangusha, asithuke asifanise nento yonke embi. Athi esibiza ngosathana abe esithuka ngonina waso. Isikhova; ithamsanqa elililishwa! 
Inqilo yintaka ethanda abantu nethanda ukuba secaleni kwendlela. Wofika ibaleka endleleni phambi komhambi; ithi yakubona ukuba uyayifumana ngamendu ibhabhe, iphinde ichophe kwakufuphi. 
 Iya kukukhapha ke isenza loo nto, suka apho idinwe khona iphambuke ihambe iihambo zakwantaka. EmaXhoseni lo mkhwa wale ntaka uchaza indlela entle.  
Inqilo yintaka yethamsanqa emaXhoseni. Ayizinzi ebantwini into yokuba ngumkhwa wale ntaka lo kwasekudalweni kwayo. Kananjalo lowo uzisikela kwithamsanqa ngokudibana nenqilo ubuya alibale kwangelo xesha lakuphambuka, nantoni na emkholayo adibana nayo angabuyi ayayamanise nenqilo ebedibene nalo. 
Ukukhubeka ngelokunene kuchaza ukuba indlela yakho iza kubantle, ngelokunxele kuthethe ukuba iza kubambi.  
Kanti loluphi unyawo amele ukukhubeka ngalo umntu kungabikho nto? Kanti ukukhubeka oku akuvi kwayamane nokucoselela ukuhamba kusini na?  
AmaXhosa ade aneqhalo elithi ‘unyawo olugidimayo luyayibhuda indlela’; abethetha ukuthini xa kanti akukhutyekwa ngokugidima? 
Ukurhawuzelelwa sisandla kuthetha ukuba uza kufumana into entle ngesandla sakho, enokuba kukubulisa umntu owamgqibela kudala okanye kukuphiwa into. Abantu abathanda imali bakurhawuzelelwa sisandla bathi baza kufumana imali. Andikhe ndilandelele ke ukufumanisa ukuba kude kwenzeke na oko. Ayizixakekisi ingqondo yomntu endinguye ngokukhangela ukuba ukurhawuzelelwa akuvi kuchaza ingxaki esikhumbeni kusini na. 
Ukukhula komntwana kammelwane abe lulutho phakathi kwekhaya kuthiwa lithamsanqa, ingakumbi kule mihla yentshabalalo yolutsha.  
Asizidubi ngokukhangela ukuba kutheni na yena lowo mntwana engathathanga unyawo loontangandini. Oku kuchaza ukuba asizimisele kuqwalasela sifunde ukuze nabethu babenjalo, sithi lithamsanqa. 
Zininzi izinto zilithamsanqa kubantu ngabantu. Okona ndikhangela kona ke mna kukuba iyintoni na kanye le nto ilithamsanqa. Akuvi ubani ezikhethela yena na ukuthatha into ngokuba ilithamsanqa ngaphezu kokuba leyo nto ilithamsanqa ngokunokwayo?  
Ezinye zezi ntetha azivi zizizangotshe zobuciko bamaXhosa ngaphezu kokuba lithamsanqa? Akuvi ithamsanqa iyinkolelo nje kuphela? Ndoke ndive! Ithamsanqa lakho kuwe mntakwethu! Goba msenge iibhokhwe zikutye! 
Owenu kwisiXhosa, Nxuba
title: Impambano yethamsanqa!

text:
Ulincimile watsho eliqhwabela izandla iqela lakhe uEric Tinkler emva kokuvala isizini endaweni entle. ICape Town City ifuneme indawo yesibini kwisizini yeDStv Premiership evalwe kutshanje. Ngokwenza njalo, iqela likaTinkler lifumene itikiti lokumela uMzantsi Afrika kwiCAF Champions League kunye neMamelodi Sundowns ethathe indebe yeDStv kwakhona. Ibuyela okwesibini iCape Town City kwiChampions League emva kokuyinceda kwisizini yayo yokuqala eminyakeni egqithileyo. Konke oku kwenzeke emva kokuba iKaizer Chiefs ne-Orlando Pirates zingakwazanga ukusebenzisa imidlalo yazo ebinokuzibuyisela kwiChampions League. 
Ngaphandle kokuqhuba kakuhle kwiDStv, iCape Town City yabethwa emdlalweni wokugqibela weMTN8 ekuqaleni kwesizini ka-2021/22. Ezo zinto zimchulumancisile kakhulu uEric Tinkler obuyiswe ngabaphathi bakhe emva kokuhamba nzima kakhulu kweCity of Cape Town phantsi kukaJan Olde Riekerink waseDutch. “Bekukuhle ukubona wonke umntu esebenza ngokuzimisela. Senze imbali ngokuba liqela elingaphulukananga namdlalo kwelishumi elinesithathu. Eyona nto ebaluleke ngaphezulu kwezinto zonke kukuba sivale isizini sihleli kwindawo yesibini kwiDStv Premiership,” utshilo uTinkler emva kokusongwa kwesizini. 
Kufuneka iqela likaJohn Comitis liqule liligangathe ngoba liza kuxakeka kakhulu kwisizini ezayo. “Umsebenzi wesizini elandelayo uqala kwangoku ngoba amaqela amaninzi aza kufuna ukubetha thina. Indlela esidlale ngayo kufuneka singene nayo kwisizini elandelayo. Izinto ziza kuthanda ukuba nzima ngoba kukho nendebe yehlabathi esekupheleni konyaka. Siza kudlala kwiCAF Champions League, kubalulekile ke kuthi ukuya kuyo sizilungiselele. Nangona kunjalo, kufuneka abadlali bethu baphumle ngokwaneleyo – kodwa ekupheleni kwenyanga yeSilimela kufuneka babuyele enkampini,” utshilo uTinkler. Iindaba ezimnandi unozinti wakhe, uHugo Marques, ufumene iwonga likanozinti oqaqambileyo kwisizini egqithileyo.
title: UTinkler uliqhwabela iqela lakhe elibuyela kwiCAF Champions League

text:
Kule mpelaveki siphuma kuyo sibe nenyhweba yokungxisha kudaka lwaseSajonisi xeshikweni kuqhutywa umnyhadala we-Isingqi Sethu Wild Coast Cultural Festival.  
Phakathi kwabo sinokubabalula bekukho uMphathiswa wezobuGcisa, iNkcubeko nezeMidlalo, uPemmy Majodina, kunye nothotho lweemvumi zomculo wesiNtu ezifana noo 4 x 4, Bizana City Boys, Dumza Maswana nooM.X.O ukubalula nje ezimbalwa.  
KwiHolo laseDolophini, eSajonisi, bekukho imiboniso bhanya-bhanya kunye neengxoxo-mpikiswano ngemiba yesiNtu.  
Bekunzima ukulandela inkqubo yalo nyaka ngoba ibingacaci into yezithethi kunye namaxesha ebekumele ukuba kwenzeka ngazo izinto.  
Umnyhadala wonke ube yindibano apho kuhlalwa kwintente enye oko kuthiwe ntsho amehlo eqongeni; kubukelwe iimvumi nabadidiyeli befashoni kuphela.  
Phandle bezikhona ezinye iintente; enye yazo ibilungiselelwe oonomngqushwana – bedlala imidlalo yabantwana, kukwakho neJumping Castle yabo. Kwenye bekukho abayili beempahla nezixhobo zesiNtu kunye neencwadi zesiNtu.  
Ezinye iintente ezintathu bezihleli nje kukhala ibhungane kuzo. Xa uzula-zula kweli bala ubufumanisa ukuba azikho ninzi izinto umntu anokuzenza; bekungekho nabantu aba bathengisa ukutya kwesiNtu, abadidiyeli botywala besiNtu nabo bebengekho.  
Kuyafuneka lo mnyhadala uboleke kweminye iminyhadala eqhubeka kweli laseMzantsi Afrika ukuze baqinisekise ukuba umntu osuka ngaphandle, naye uyakwazi ukuzonwabisa ngodidi lwezinto ezahlukeneyo.  
Isuke yangathi kwenzelwa abahlali baseSajonisi kuphela. Ngunyaka weshumi elinesithoba lo kuqhutywa lo mnyhadala kwaye asibonanga nto inokuthi masiphinde siye pha eSajonisi kulo nyaka uzayo.  
Kwa ukubhengezwa kwalo mnyhadala yinto eyenzeke kwisithuba seeveki ezimbini phambi kokuba ufike.  
Uqaphele ukuba eminye iminyhadala yaziwa kwakudala ukuba izakubanjwa nini.  
Umzekelo, umnyhadala womculo womngqungqo waseKapa sele ubhengeziwe ukuba ungowama 23 -24 kweyoKwindla 2018. 
Yintoni eyohlula abe-Isingqi Sethu ukuba bachaze unyaka usaqala ukuba pha kweyeNkanga 2017 ngomhla othile kuzakubakho umnyhadala wabo ukuze nabasuka kude bakwazi ukuzilungiselela bayokubona ubuhle bendalo yaseSajonisi netalente yasemaMpondweni?
title: Bayasibhuda Isingqi Sethu

text:
Amathol’amnyama ziintshatsheli ezintsha ze-O.R.Tambo Soccer Challenge edlalwe egameni legqala lomzabalazo uTambo.  
UMthatha Bucks ubethe iChippa United ngo’1-0 kumdlalo obubanjelwe eMthatha Stadium emalanga ngoMgqibelo weveki ephelileyo.  
Eli qela alikabinaye umqeqeshi omtsha emva kokugxotha * -Ian Palmer kwiveki ephelileyo ngenxa yeziphumo ezingancumisiyo.
title: UMthatha Bucks ziintshatsheli ze-O.R.Tambo

text:
Ndingumfundi weli phephandaba nantsi into endivela nayo: Awukho umthetho kweli lizwe loMzantsi Afrika lo nto ibangela kwenziwe unothanda.  
Urhulumente bendicela adlale indima yakhe kuyonakala. Ingxaki yam ngabantu baseMzantsi nakubantu bangaphandle. Okokuqala kubalulekile ukuba simanyane. Kaloku singabantu abamnyama sonke qha sohlukene ngamazwe. 
 Ilizwe eli lethu lilizwe elaziwayo kwihlabathi jikelele singabantu bothando, uxolo nobubele. Abantu bala mazwe angaphandle kuninzi okuhle esikufundileyo kubo. Kodwa esingakwamkeliyo zizinto ezimbi abasiphathela zona; ezinjengeziyobisi, ukuqeshisa amantombazane aselula athengise ngomzimba nezinye. 
Nathi singaboMzantsi akulunganga ukuthathela umthetho ezandleni. Ndinqwenela simanyane singama-Afrika. Soze kulunge kungahlelwanga phantsi kuthethwe. Ukuba abantu boMzantsi bebengabafuni abantu bamanye amazwe kwasekuqaleni ngebagxothwa kweli. Siyabathanda. Qha zizenzo ezimbi esingazifuniyo. Okubalulekileyo ke kukuba simanyaneni ma-Afrika amahle.  
– Mbulelo Rasta Msutwana, eMonti
title: Umanyano lwabamnyama!

text:
Abaphathi bamaqela adlala kwiPremier Soccer League bathe sa iinzwane kwiindawo ngeendawo bekhangela abadlali abatsha. Ezimnyama ngenkani (Orlando Pirates) sezithezele emnxebeni ngokuthi zityikitye ihlokondiba leziqwayi zabadlali abatsha phambi kwesizini entsha eza kuvulwa kwisithuba senyanga ukusukela ngoku. Ekuqaleni kwale veki, iPirates ibhengeze amagama wabadlali abatsha abaliqela abasuka kumaqela ohlukeneyo ngelizama ukuqinisa umkhosi kaMilutin “Micho” Sredojevic – opheswe yindebe enkulu izihlandlo ezibini ukusukela oko efikile kwiPirates. Abadlali abatsha kwiPirates: nguKabelo Dlamini, uBongani Sam, uFortune Makaringe, uSiphesihle Ndlovu, uTebogo Tlolane noTshegofatso Mabasa. 
Omnye wabadlali abatsha abasezingeni eliphezulu ofunyenwe yiPirates izolo yifolosi yaseMalawi – uGabadinho Mhango. Ukufika kukaMhlango kwiPirates kothuse umzi ngoba utyikitye isivumelwani sengqesho esitsha kwiBidvest Wits kunyaka ophelileyo nakubeni ebedlaliswa manqaphanqapha nguGavin Hunt. Isibhengezo ngokufika kwalo mdlali waseMalawi senziwe izolo emva kwexesha elide esayanyaniswa neKaizer Chiefs ekhangela abadlali abatsha emva kokuphoswa yiTop 8. “Siliqela sibulela intsebenziswano yabaphathi beWits futhi iyasivuyisa kakhulu indlela abawuphethe ngayo umba kaGabadinho, 26, ngethuba leengxoxo. Umdlali uza kuvavanywa ngoogqirha ngomso,” itshilo ingxelo ekhutshwe yiPirates izolo. 
Kuthengwe abadlali abatsha yiPirates nakubeni idlale kakuhle emva kokoyiswa kukuthatha indebe ye-Absa Premier Soccer League amatyeli amabini. Ukuze kubekho izithuba zabadlali abatsha, iBucs ikhulule inqwaba yabadlali. Phakathi kwabo badlali abahambileyo: nguThabo Matlaba, uGladwin Shitolo, uPhetso Maphanga, uDiamond Thopola noCaio Marcelo. UShitolo, uThopola, uMarcelo noMaphanga baza kudlalela iChippa United ngokokutsho kwePirates. Omnye umdlali othengiswayo yiBucs ngumdlali wasesiswini, uMpho Makola, oneminyaka eliqela eyidlalela. Yena uMatlaba akukacaci ukuba uza kudlalela eliphi iqela emva kokungavumi ukuya kwiChippa United ekuqaleni konyaka (20190 ngethuba kuvulwe inyoba yokuthengiswa kwabadlali.
title: Ezimnyama zityikitye iziqwayi zabadlali abatsha!

text:
Umbutho olawula ibhola ekhatywayo kweli lizwe, iSouth African Football Association, ubhengeze amagama wabadlali abazakuthi bathathe inxaxheba kwimidlalo yobuhlobo yeBafana Bafana. 
IBafana Bafana izakujongana neGunie Bissau ne-Angola ekupheleni kwale nyanga yoKwindla [25 & 28 March] njengokuba ilungiselela imidlalo yokuzibekela indawo kwi-Africa Cup of Nations ezayo, iCHAN neFifa World Cup ezakusingathwa yiRussia ngo’2018. UMzantsi Afrika uthe finini kwindawo yamashumi amathandathu anesibhozo (68) kumanqwanqwa eFIFA, apha e-Afrika uhleli kwindawo yeshumi nesithathu. 
Umqeqeshi olibambela, u-Owen da Gama, unikwe umsebenzi wokulungiselele eli qela lesizwe yiSafa kude kube ngumhla wokufika komqeqeshi omtsha ekulindeleke abhengezwe ingaphelanga le nyanga. 
Kweli qela kubuye uKamohelo Mokotjo noKermit Erasmus kukwatyunjwe nabadlali abatsha abangaphansi kweminyaka elineshumi elinambini uPhakamani Mahlambi noLuther Singh. ULebo Manyama nodlala kakuhle kakhulu kwiCape Town City ubizwe kweli qela. 
Umdlalo neGunie Bissau uzakudlalelwe eMoses Mabhida Stadium, kodwa ayikaziwa indawo ozakudlalelwa kuyo ozakube uphakathi kweBafana ne-Angola. 
 
  
Iqela lilonke lime ngolu hlobo:  
  
Oonozinti: Itumeleng Khune, Darren Keet, Shauib Walters. 
Emva: Ramahlwe Mphahlele, Rivaldo Coetzee,Thulani Hlatshwayo, Eric Mathoho, Lorenzo Gordinho, Diamond Thopola, Tebogo Langerman. 
 
  
Esiswini: HlomphoKekana,Thabo Mnyamane, Keagan,Andile Jali, Kamohelo Mokotjo, Tiyani Mabunda, Dean Furman, Themba Zwane, Thulani Serero. 
  
Iifolosi: Percy Tau,Lebo Manyama, Phakamani Mahlambi, Lars Weldwijk,Kermit Erasmus,Luther Singh.
title: UDa Gama ubhengeze iqela elahlukileyo

text:
Izikhotha amanxeba iEthiopia emva kokuba ikrolonqwe ngenduku yiCameroon ephumelele ngamagowuli amane kwelinye (4-1) emdlalweni obutaka iintlantsi ngorhatya lwanamhlanje. Umdlalo uqale ngesantya esiphezulu kwisigaba sokuqala. AmaTopiya abhakuzelise umnatha emzuzwini wesine ngebhola efakwe nguDawa Dukele ayinikelwe ngu-Amanuel Gebremichael. Kuye kwanyanzeleka ukuba iCamerool iphendule kwamsinyane. Emzuzwini wesithandathu, uKarl Toko-Ekambi ufake igowuli lokulinganisa ngentloko emva kwebhola entle egotywe nguCollins Fai esekunene. Khange ityhafe iEthiopia, iphinde yazama ukuhlasela – kodwa uAndre Onana ebethe qwa ezipalini zeCameroon. 
Kwisigaba sesibini, iCameroon ibuye ilume ongezantsi. UToko-Ekambi ubhakuzelise umnatha kwakhona. Emva koko uVincent Aboubakar ufake igowuli lesithathu. Kudlule imizuzu emibini, uToko-Ekambi ufake elinye igowuli. Khange ikwazi kwaphela iEthiopia ukudlala ngendlela edlale ngaso isiqingatha sokuqala. Emdlalweni wokuvula iAfcon esingathwe yoyi, iCameroon ibethe iBurkina Faso ngamagowuli amabini kwelinye. Noxa emdlalweni wokuqala yayidikidiki – kodwa kowanamhlanje ibiqhathula. Ngokuphumelela kwayo namhlanje, iCameroon sele iyiqinisekisile indawo yayo kumjikelo wesibini we-Afcon.
title: iCameroon iyikrolonqe iEthiopia ngenduku emdlalweni wanamhlanje

text:
USijadu Potelwa waseBolotwa eDutywa nowaziwa ngelikaSagweba, kumculo kamaskandi, ushicilele icwecwe lakhe lokuqala elitshisa bhe, nathi umgangatho walo ubangele iimvumi zalo mculo ezindala zihlale exhaleni. 
USagweba yimvumi kamaskandi, imbongi, umbhali, umkhuthazi ekwanguye nomsebenzi kwi-ofisi yecandelo likaNongxowa weli loMzantsi Afrika. 
Icwecwe lakhe lineengoma ezilishumi eziquka ethi Signal, Inzondo, EmaTavern, uSagweba, UMwangalala kwakunye nezinye. 
USagweba uthi uzithanda zonke iingoma ezikweli cwecwe kodwa eyona ayithanda kakhulu yileyo ithi ‘Ema-Tavern’ kuba esithi kulapho ulutsha luphelela khona. 
“Ulutsha ngabona bantu banamaphupha kwaye balikamva leli loMzantsi Afrika kodwa uthi umntu omtsha akuqhelana nemizi yentselo, aphele engayindawo ngenxa yokuxabisa utywala,” utshilo uSagweba. 
Ngaphandle komculo, uSagweba ukwangumbhali nembongi. 
Uthi enye yemveliso azidla ngayo yimibongo esibhozo ekwincwadi abayinikezela kusapho lakwaNelson Mandela bezimbongi zeli loMzantsi Afrika. USagweba uqhuba athi ukwakwiphulo lokukhulisa ulwimi lwesiXhosa ngokuthi aqambe izaci namaqhalo amatsha. 
Uthi umculo wakhe wamkelwe ngezishushu ngabaninzi, esithi uyadlalwa koonomathotholo beSABC kwanabo basekuhlaleni.
title: USagweba uxhalabise iimvumi zikamaskandi

text:
ISIBINI esiphumelel’ iimbasa ngenxa yobuchule baso bokubhala iifilim, uLayla Swart kwakunye noJahmil X. T. Qubeka siphindile kwakho sabuya nebhanyabhanya etak’ iintlantsi. 
USwart noQubeka, abangabavelisi nabanini beYellowbone Entertainment, beza nomdlalo bhanyabhanya obizwa “Blood Psalms.” 
Le filim ilandela impumelelo yabo yeKnuckle City, ekhutshwe ebutsheni balo nyaka. 
Phakathi kweengqaka zabadlali boMzantsi Afrika abadumileyo abadlala kwiBlood Psalms, singabalula uBokang Phelane, Enhle Mbali Mlotshwa, Hlubi Mboya, Zikhona Sodlaka, Warren Masemola, Sdumo Mtshali, Hamilton Dlamini, Thabo Rametsi, Sello Maake kaNcube, Thishiwe Ziqubu nabanye abaninzi. 
Phakathi kwezi ndumasi zabadlali kukho igatyana laKwaBhaca (Mount Frere) uThembekile Komani. 
KwiBlood Psalms uKomani udlala indima kaMzinzi, oyiNkokheli yamaChini. 
Ungene njengenkumanda yesibini emva komama wakhe. 
“Andifuni kulimosha ibali, kufanele balilinde ngomdla. Kodwa ndiyathemba ukuba baza kumthanda uMzinzi kwanezicwangciso anazo nesizwe sakhe,” kutsho uKomani, encokolela I’solezwe lesiXhosa. 
Umdla wakhe wokudlala kwimidlalo kamabonakude neebhanyabhanya waqala kwisikolo samabanga aphakamileyo iSimunye High eDelft ngo2004. 
Ubalisa athi, omnye wabafundi beso sikolo ngelo xesha, uLuvuyo Gaji, waseka iqela ledrama, waze wangena iklasi neklasi ekhangela abafundi ukuze bazibandakanye. 
“Ndaya kuzibandakanya, enye nenye yalandela,” kubalisa uKomani. 
Uthi emva kwematriki wabona ukuba ukudlala kwimidlalo yeqonga uyakuthanda, wahamba waya kufundela iTheatre and Performance eNew Africa Theatre. 
UKomani udlale kwimidlalo equka iNkululeko, Isikizi, Knuckle City, iJAB edlala kwiNetflix sithetha nje, kwanomdlalo obizwa Valedictory ekulindeleke ubekwiisinema kungekudala. 
Ezinye zezinto adume ngazo uKomani ngumdaniso (contemporary dance) nokuba nguDJ. 
Uthi isakhono sakhe sokulinganisa kwimidlalo kamabonakude simfundisa okuninzi ngabantu. 
“Kufanele ukuba phambi kokuba ndinxibe umlinganiswa ndifunde kwaye ndiphande banzi ngaloo mntu ndiza kumdlala. Esi sakhono sikwandifundisa ukuba ubani anganguye loo mntu afuna ukuba nguye, kodwa kweli candelo lokulinganisa kunzima, kufanele umntu anyamezele,” kuncokola uKomani. 
IBlood Psalms isaqhuba nokwenza iziqendu zayo kumaphondo ngamaphondo aquka iMpuma Koloni, iRhawuti noMntla Ntshona. 
Kule veki bebesenza iziqendu zabo kwiindawo ezifana neRhafu, iMonti neCoffee Bay. 
Kulindeleke ukuba le filim ibe kwiShowmax kunyaka ozayo.
title: Ubuso baKwaBhaca benza ezibukwayo kwiBlood Psalms

text:
Abalandeli bebhola ekhatywayo bafumene iindaba ezincumisayo namhlanje ngethuba iqela lesizwe, iSA Under-23, lizibekela indawo kwimidlalo ye-Olimpiki eza kubanjelwe eTokyo, eJapan, emva kokubetha iGhana ngo’6-5 kumapenela emdlalweni we-2019 Under-23 African Cup of Nations obubanjelwe kwisixeko saseCairo, eYiphutha. UMzantsi Afrika neGhana zigqibe amashumi alithoba emizuzu zibambene ngamagowuli amabini macala (2-2) emdlalweni. Lo nto iye yanyanzela uzompempe obephethe umdlalo awase kumapenela amaqela ngoba bekufuneka kubekho iqela eliza kuba lelesithathu kulawo aza kumela i-Afrika kwimidlalo ye-Olimpiki kunyaka ozayo eTokyo. Amakhwenkwe kaDavid Notoane atsazise igazi kuqala emdlalweni emva kokuba uHabibi Mohammed weGhana egwaze ngomkhonto ekhaya ngebhola ebisuka kuMatlala Makgalwa. 
 
Nangona uMzantsi Afrika uye kwixesha lokuphumla uhamba phambili ngegowuli elinye – kodwa ulahle inkitha yamathuba ebinokongeza ebhodini. Kwisigaba sesibini, uHJK Helsinki Evan Mensah ufake igowuli lokulinganisa kunozinti woMzantsi Afrika, uMondli Mpoto. Emva koko, uMahlatsi ufake igowuli lesibini loMzantsi Afrika emdlalweni obunzima kakhulu. Abadlali beGhana banyuse umxakatho bakubona ukuba ixesha liyemka. Emzuzwini wamashumi asibhozo anesihlanu, uSamuel Gyabaa, ufake igowuli lesibini leGhana eliye lanyanzela umdlalo uye kumapenela. Baqhube kakuhle kakhulu abadlali boMzantsi Afrika – kodwa elona qhawe ibe nguMondli Mpoto othe wacika ipenela eyenze umahluko omkhulu. Abalandeli bebhola eMzantsi baza kuxola ngoba iGhana ibethe kabuhlungu aBafana Bafana ngo’2-0 emdlalweni ohlakulela iAfcon yooxholovane. Yimbali le kuDavid Notoane unikwe uxanduva lokusa iqela eTokyo engakhange enze namalungiselelo.
title: SA Under-23: UMzantsi Afrika uzibekele indawo kwimidlalo ye-Olimpiki!

text:
Umqeqeshi weqela lesizwe labadlali abangaphantsi kwamashumi amabini uchulumancile emva kokuphumelela kweqela lakhe, kodwa uyakuqonda ukubaluleka kokuqinisa ngakumbi kumlenze wesibini.  
Amajita abethe iqela lesizwe laseLesotho ngamagowuli amabini eqandeni kumdlalo wokuqala wokuzibekela indawo kwiCAF U-20 Cup of Nations obudlalelwa eMaseru ngenjikalanga yangeCawe edlulileyo. Ngaphandle kwamathandabuzo, umqeqeshi weli qela loMzantsi Afrika wonwabile futhi ulithembile iqela lakhe, kodwa akafuni kuyifaka entloko lo nto ngoba ibhola isenokujika kumdlalo wesibini ozakube udlalelwa apha eMzantsi Afrika.  
Amagowuli Amajita afakwe nguLiam Jordan kwisigaba sokuqala noKamohelo Sithole ngomzuzu wamashumi amathathu anesixhenxe. Amajita asebenza nzima ukuze abephakathi kwamazwe azakuthi athathe inxaxheba kwitumente yamazwe ezwekazi le Afrika ezakube isingethwe yiZambia. “Siye enkampini isimo sabadlali singesihlanga ngokupheleleyo emva kokungadlali iiveki ezintathu zonke. Uninzi lwabo belukwiiholide kuba kuvalwe izikolo; lo nto ibenomthelela kakhulu kubo.  
Eyona nto esenze asaxhalaba kukuba abadlali bethu bayazana kuba bebekhe badlala bonke ngaphambili, khange kubekho mfuneko yokuqala phantsi umsebenzi,” utshilo uSenong. UMzantsi Afrika akulindelekanga usokole xa udlalela ekhaya, kodwa umqeqeshi uthi akafuni abadlali bakhe bayekelele umxakatho. “Ayakhuthaza amagowuli amabini esiwafumeneyo kakhulu futhi siyawavuyela. Asifuni kuyekelela kodwa kumdlalo wesibini. Siyayazi iLesotho iyafuna ukuya kwi-AFCON futhi izakuza kuthi inomsindo. Sifuna ukuya eZambiia nathi,” utshilo uSenong.
title: USenong ufuna Amajita aqinise ngakumbi

text:
Icandelo leeNkonzo zeMpilo kwiYunivesithi yaseWalter Sisulu (WSU) kunye neTshaplenisi yaseOR Tambo bahlanganise abafundi kwiholo leyo yeYunivesithi bebaxelela ukuba asingabo (abafundi) isizathu sokuba bathi bazibone sebengamaxhoba okuxhatshazwa. 
Kuye kwakhanyiswa amakhandlela amane aneenjongo ezine ezohlukeneyo ngelithi isikhanyiso sizisa unyango emphefumlweni nasengqondweni yomntu. 
UGqirha Thandiwe Mangxa ophethe eli candelo uthe zininzi iindlela zokuhlukunyezwa koomama apha elizweni, ngoku kufuneka abantwana aba befumene unyango ngenjongo yokuzama ukuphucula ingomso labo lingabikho mfiliba. 
Kukhanyiswe amakhandlela amane, onke enomfuziselo wawo othembisa ikamva elingcono. 
“Ikhandlela eliluhlaza umfuziselo walo lithemba, ikhandlela elityheli lona libonakalisa ukuzithanda ungumntu, uthande isiqu sakho, elimhlophe lona libonakalise uxolo nobunye nokonwaba ize elibomvu libonakalise uthando lomntu,” utshilo uGqirha Mangxa ecacisa amakhandlela ebekhanyiswe kule ndibano. 
Ethetha nabafundi kunye nabasebenzi, uMpostile Ntuthu, uthe iingxaki zeli lizwe ziqala emakhayeni esikhulela kuwo ngoba umntu uphuma kowabo sele egula kakade. 
“Andifuni le nto siyigxininise entweni yokuba kugula ootata qha ngoba eyabo ayisafuni nokuthethwa icace gca ukuba iingqondo zabo ziyagula xa bebonke bona, kodwa masikhumbule nayo indoda ikhuliswa ngumfazi. Umntu ongumama kufuneka axelele unyana izinto ezilindeleke ukuba azenze emntwini wasetyhini, amxelele uxanduva lwakhe njengendoda,” utshilo uNtuthu. 
Uthi ziyamangalisa izinto ezenzeka kweli lizwe ngokuba ayingomadoda odwa la enza izinto ezingamasikizi, kusaswele nje igama lokubabiza. 
“Kukho ingxelo ezindabeni yokuba owasetyhini ubulele umntwana wakhe, kukho nomnye usisi obone umqulu welifa likanina emva koko wambulala. Lo nto ibonakalisa ukuba ilapha elizweni le nto.  
Ukuba sizothi ngamadoda la agulayo sizonyanga wona odwa, siyiyeke into yokuba ilizwe eli lilonke ligula ngengqondo, siphele sesinyanga abathile. Indoda ayinokuzenza ezi zinto zinje, sisaswele igama lokubabiza,” wongezile uNtuthu. 
Lo kaNtuthu uthi isimo seli lizwe sifuna kubuyelwe kundebendala nalapho ibiluxanduva lwekhaya ukuqoqa nokukhomba indlela umntwana azokutsho akhule eyazi into elindeleke kuye. 
“Ukuba onke amakhaya angathatha uxanduva lokuxelelana ukuba yintoni elungileyo nengalunganga, wonke umntu angayazi into egwenxa ayenzayo hayi le nto yethu yokufathula nje kungekho kwamthetho onikwe kowenu,” uqhubile uNtuthu. 
Uthi isigulo seli lizwe lethu sicaca kakhulu kule nto yokuba oomama beyeka ootata babulale abantwana ngenyanga enye. 
“Oomama bayagula nabo ngamanye amaxesha ngoba umntu uthatha umntwana aye wamkhulisa iminyaka elishumi elinesibhozo emva koko ayomnika utata ukuba ayombulala esuthwini ogqiba bathi lo nto iyalelwe yibhayibhile bexoka. Ibhayibhile ithi unyana kaMoses woluswa ngumkakhe. 
“Amadoda abanomthetho, ziphi iinkcubeko zamakhaya ezazigcinwa kumakhaya onke? Kufuneka kuthathwe bonke ootata baye kufundiswa ngobudoda ngoba sele benxila kangaka nje bayagula, abaqeqeshwanga,” utshilo uNtuthu. 
Wongezile wathi uyalibona ilizwe libuxabisile utywala kakhulu. 
“Umntu oxabise ukunxila uyagula ke qha, asikho isizathu sokuthatha imali yokugqibela uyoyinxila. Oko kukungabi nangqondo. Unganxila uligeza elinganyangwayo!,” wongezile uNtuthu. 
                                     – isibhalo@inl.co.za
title: ‘Abemi beli bagula ngengqondo’

text:
Kungelishwa ukuba xa ubeke ilaphu elikhulu elimhlophe uze ufakele ichokoza elinye, wonke umntu uzakubona elo chokoza.  
Kumakhasi agqithileyo ndikhe ndamemelela ukunikwa ithuba koosomashishini bethu neendawo zabamnyama ezisezilokishini kumaqiqithi-qithi ezoqoqosho. Oku kuquka iindawo zokulala, ukudla kunye nezinye xa kukho imidlalo emikhulu.  
Kodwa kuninzi ekufuneka kusiwe iso xa kuzakwabelwa uluntu elisezilokishini kweli qhekeza. Kwiveki esiphuma kuyo sibenenyhweba sileli phondo lokusindleka imidlalo yokubhiyozela inyanga ebekelwe ecaleni ngumbutho wehlabathi wezizwe ezimanyeneyo yalowo wabangumongameli wokuqala weli uNelson Mandela. 
Le midlalo ibaluleke kakhulu iye yasindlekwa eBhayi kwilokishi yakwaNoxolo nalapho amazwe amathathu; iSeychelles, Amajamani kunye noMzantsi Afrika ebequbisene khona.  
Iholo iGeorge Botha ibizele imi ngeembambo kungekho nendawo. Le nto yasinika isidima esingafumanekiyo xa kudlalwa kwiindawo ezisezidolophini nalapho ibangabadlali bodwa ababukelanayo. Oku kunika umdla omandla nakubatyeleli ukuze bakwazi ukuva umfutho walapha ekhaya. 
Phambi kokuba siqhwabe izandla ke kodwa akhona amatyheneba angabangela umbathalala ukuba akukho mhlabelo. Okokuqala ulutsha ebelusisininzi sababukeli sinako ukunganqandeki ngakumbi xa sikhe sadlula emaphandeni. Ndibukele indlela ebekuyaluzela ngayo xa kuculwa imihobe yezinye izizwe neyelapho kananjalo. Ukuchasa nokuxwaxwa kweembethi manqindi zamanye amazwe nako akuhlanga kamnandi. 
Eyona nto ke ebelihlazo kukuduka kwempahla zabasemzi, zibiwa ngethuba besiya eqongeni. Igosa lesebe lezemidlalo lona liqhekezelwe inqwelo-mafutha kwaduka izinto ebezingaphakathi.  
Zonke ezi zinto zenza ukuba eli khwelo lokuzisa iziyunguma zalo mdlalo kwindawo ibenkenenkene ngakumbi. Kuninzi ke ekufuneka kwenziwe ukuze kulaliswe abantu bakwamnye amazwe, badlalele kwiindawo zethu. Eyona nto ke ingundoqo ngele kokhuseleko ekufuneka lenziwe kufuneka iimfundiso ezizodwa. 
Ngobani ke ekufuneke bashumayele indlela yokuziphatha kwesizwe sethu? Kutheni sisiszwe esingakhathaliyo? Le mibuzo mibini yimibuzo esiyibhala sizama ukuphendula kodwa kufuneka isisombululo esisiso ngokukhawuleza.  
Amaholo asezilokishini uninzi lawo awenzelwanga kusindleka imithamo emininzi neendawo zokubeka iinqwelo-mafutha ezizizo, kulapho izigila mkhuba zifumana ithuba. Kufuneka xa kusenziwa iindawo zokudlalela kubandakanywe imibutho yamangqindi ukuze le miba ingentla isiwe iso. 
Isimemelelo sokuba kufundiswe ukubaluleka kwemihobe yesizwe makubeyinxalenye yezifundo zesikolo, kufundiswe ubuthandazwe nokuzingca kolutsha nakuluntu jikelele. Oku kunganqanda ukungahlonitshwa komhobe wesizwe nabandwendweli. 
Kunyanzelekile ndoyamile kubaququzeleli bomsitho kuba banoxanduva lokuqinisekisa ukuba abantu basemzini bakhuselekile maxa onke.  
Kungoko kufuneka ukuba kudityenwe neekomiti zokuhlala kunye nabahlali banikwe imfundiso ngokubaluleka kwabatyeleli kwindawo yabo. Ukhuseleko lokuqala luphuma kubahlali ngokwabo. Olunye ukhuseleko lubayinxalenye yokujongwa ngokukodwa abatyeleli. 
Kuninzi ke ekufuneka kwenziwe ekuqiniseni eli khwelo njengoko imidlalo yale mpelaveki isibonise imisantsa nomsebenzi ekufuneka wenziwe. Masiyeni ke sizwe sikaNtu siyokufundisa umlisela nomthinjana ngokubaluleka komhobe wesizwe nokuphathwa kweendwendwe zethu.  
Ikhwelo lokulalisa nokusindleka iziyunguma ezilokishini malungacinywa ngoonqalintloko abangakhathaliyo sisidla amazimba. Ndisatshaya!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
title: Makufundiswe ukubaluleka komhobe wesizwe

text:
AmaBhokobhoko asoloko esisixhaphaxhapha seWales emidlalweni yombhoxo yamazwe ngamazwe. Emidlalweni emihlanu ukusukela ngo-2016, iWales iwubethe kane uMzantsi Afrika ophumelele kanye qha. Njengokuba AmaBhokobhoko ekutyelelo lwaseYurophu, kulindeleke adlale imidlalo ebalulekileyo namazwe aquka iFrance, iNgilane neWales. NgoMgqibelo, uMzantsi Afrika uza kudibana neWales emdlalweni wokuqala ePrincipality Stadium ngo-07:30, eCardiff. Nangona iqela likaJacques Nienaber lisenomfutho emva kokubetha iNew Zealand kwinyanga ephelileyo – kodwa lona ixhala likhona. 
Olisekela-mqeqeshi, uDeon Davids, uvumile ukuba indlela edlala ngayo iWales iphuculwe kwaye umdlalo uza kubanzima. “Njengokuba sisiya emidlalweni yokuvala unyaka esiza kuyidlala neWales, iScotland neNgilane, kubalulekile ukuqhubela phambili nendlela esidlale ngayo ngethuba sibetha iNew Zealand emidlalweni yeRugby Championship. Iingqondo zethu sizibeke emdlalweni ophakathi kwethu neWales. Sizimisele ukujongana nomdlalo omnye ngexesha ukuze singaphazamiseki,” utshilo uDavids. 
“Asikwazanga ukuyibetha iWales eminyakeni emihlanu yonke. Silindele umdlalo onzima kakhulu. Ihleli kwindawo yesithandathu kumanqwanqwa ehlabathi. Sasokola ukuze siyibethe emdlalweni wetumente yehlabathi eJapan,” utshilo uDavids ekuqaleni kwale veki. Nangona iWales ibethelwe oogqirha nezicaka ngo’54-16 yiNew Zealand kwiveki ephelileyo – kodwa kulindeleke ukuba ifune ukubuyisa isidima sayo ngokubetha uMzantsi Afrika. Kulindeleke yamkele abadlali abafana noDan Biggar, uTaulupe Faletau, uNick Tompkins, uLouis Rees-Zammit, uCallum Sheedy, uThomas Young noChrist Tshiunza abangadlalanga emdlalweni ogqithileyo ngenxa yokonzakala. 
“Umdlalo ngamnye unezinto othi wahluke ngazo kweminye. Akululanga ukudla neNew Zealand. Ibingumdlalo onzima kakhulu. Yiyo lo nto iWales yonzakalelwe ngabadlali abathile. Xa sijonga la mdlali, kucace gca ukuba iWales iza kufuna ukudlala ngcono ngempelaveki. Inabadlali abanamava futhi abasemgangathweni ophezulu,” utshilo uDavids. Umdlali ongekayi eYirophu ngenxa yengxaki yamaphephamvume nguSbu Nkosi – kodwa uAphelele Fassi kulindeleke angene endaweni yakhe.
title: AmaBhokobhoko anexhala lokudibana neWales engavuka ngawo ngoMgqibelo

text:
Umdlali ophambili weChippa United, uMark Mayambela, uyivumile induku emva kokuba iqela lakhe lingonjwe kanobom yi-Orlando Pirates ngamagowuli amane kwamabini [4-2] kumdlalo we-Absa Premier Soccer League obutak’iintlantsi ngenjikalanga yanamhlanje eNelson Mandela Bay Stadium. Nangona uMayambela ebengomnye wabadlali abathe badlale kakuhle kulo mdlalo – kodwa akakwazanga ukuyihlangula iqela lakhe kwiPirates elandele ngasemva ngamagowuli. Iqela leMpuma Koloni belizimisele ukufumana amanqaku apheleleyo phambi kwalo mdlalo kuba lincwase ukubethelela indawo yalo kwiTop 8. Amagowuli wePirates afakwe zizitshovutshovu zeefolosi, uJustin Shonge (ofake amagowuli amabini), elinye lifakwe nguBernard Morrison noThembinkosi Lorch owayekade edlalela iChippa United ngaphambili. Kanti aweChippa United amagowuli afakwe yindedeba efike kulo nyaka isuka kwiJomo Cosmos, uMxolisi Macuphu, negqala uKatlekgo Mashego ongene okuzeni kuphela komdlalo 
“Besidlala neqela elidlala kakuhle kakhulu. Ndiyavuma ngamanye amaxesha bekunzima kakhulu kuthi ukumelana nabadlali bePirates. Kodwa nabo sibasokolisile ngamaxesha athile emdlalweni ngakumbi kwisigaba sokuqala somdlalo endicinga ukuba ngesihambe phambili nokuba ngamagowuli amabini. Ibhola ke ngumdlalo ekufuneka uwasebenzise kakuhle amathuba, ukuba awenzanga njalo – uphulukana nawo umdlalo. Kubalulekile ke kuthi kwimidlalo enje ukuba sifunde kwiimpazamo esizenzileyo,” utshilo uMayambela kwiSuperSport TV emva komdlalo. 
Iimpazamo ezenziwe ngamakhwenkwe kaTeboho Moloi zinike iPirates ebilambele impumelelo ithuba lokunyukela phezulu kumanqwanqwa wePSL. UMayambela uthethe ngeempazamo ezimbi abazenzileyo bengabadlali ebaleni – kodwa kwangaxeshanye ubancomile oogxa bakhe. “Ngaphandle kokwenza iimpazamo emdlalweni, kufuneka sikhule siye phambili. Sakuhlala sibambelela kwizinto ezintle kumdlalo ngamnye esiwudlalileyo. Ndicinga ukuba abalandeli bethu bawonwabele umdlalo obumhle. Lo ngoyena mdlalo endingatsho ukuba sidlale kakuhle kuwo kule sizini futhi sizimisele ukulwa ukuze siye phambili,” utshilo uMayambela 
IiChilli Boys kunyanzelekile zikhawuleze zilibale ngokwenzeke namhlanje eBhayi ngoba kwiveki eqala ngomso ziya kwiCape Town City esokolisayo kakhulu. Ukuba iChippa ifuna ukufezekisa umnqweno wayo wokufumana indawo kwiTop 8 xa kuphela isizini, kufuneka ifumane indlela yokuphumelela imidlalo yayo elandelayo.
title: UMayambela uthi abazunikezela emva kokungonjwa yiPirates namhlanje eNelson Mandela Bay Stadium

text:
Oosompempe belizwe loMzantsi Afrika kuvuyisenwe nabo ngumbutho olawula ibhola, iSAFA, emva kokuchongwa kwabo njengabanye [babo] bazakuthi balawule imidlalo kwi-2017 African Cup of Nations. Le tumente kulindeleke iqale phakathi kwinyanga yokuqala kunyaka ozayo. 
UDaniel Bennett noZakhele Siwela bazakuntingela kwilizwe laseGabon kunyaka ozayo, lo nto imvuyise kakhulu u-Anastasia Tsichlas. 
La madoda ngamanye phakathi kwamaninzi enza umsebenzi omhle kwi-Absa Premier Soccer League.  
“Sililizwe elizingcayo kwicala lokuvelisa oosompempe abakumgangatho wehlabathi – ukuchonga kwaba sompempe babini kuqinisekisa kanye lo nto. Inkqubo yethu yophuhliso (Vision 2022) ayisoze igqibelele ngaphandle kokuvelisa abantu abafana noBennett noSiwela. Nangona apha ekhaya begxekwa osompempe bethu – kodwa ukusetyenziswa kwabo yiCAF neFIFA kuthetha ukuthi senza kakuhle,” utshilo uTsichlas kwikhasi lomnatha leSAFA. 
UMzantsi Afrika uyakuxoliswa bubukho bala madoda mabini njengoku iBafana Bafana izakuphoswa yile tumente.
title: Ivuyisana noosompempe bayo iSAFA

text:
Kwilinge lokuzama ukugalela kuvimba wokubhalwa, ukugcinwa nokukhuselwa kolwimi lwesiXhosa, uNwabisa Gxothiwe ubhale incwadi ethi ‘Unesiduko Nje Unetyala’.  
Uncwadi nakuluphi ulwimi ludlala indima ebalulekileyo ukukhusela nokugcina ulwimi olo ukuze lubonwe zizizukulwana ezizayo. 
“Incwadi le ingokuchubeka kwenkcubeko yethu, unxibelelwano nemveli uQamata umhlaba, uQamata amanzi, uQamata umoya nezinye ke,” kucacisa uGxothiwe.  
Uthi ukubhala kwakhe kuhamba nentumekelelo esuka kumazantsi wombilini wakhe. Oku kubhala ngentumekelelo kungqinwa yiNjingalwazi edla umhlalaphantsi uTshobisa Mtuze kwezinye zezifundo zakhe esithi: 
“Umbhali kumele ukuba aqhutywe yintumekelelo xa ebhala angenzi kuba ebona abanye bebhalile,” kwatsho uMtuze.  
Le ncwadi ilikhwelo kwabo banesiduko ngokwendalo yabo, idlala indima yokukhumbuza banzi ngonxibelelwano lomntu nesiduko sakhe. Incwadi le yincwadi yamavo angentlalo yakwaNtu kumaxesha akudala. 
“Unesiduko nje unetyala likhwelo elihlatyelwa wonke umntu onesiduko ukuba abuyele kwindlela ababesenza ngayo abanikazi besiduko esi azibiza ngaso, ukunxibelelana nemveli, nendalo,” kutsho uGxothiwe. 
Lo mbhali ukwasebenzise eli linge ukukhusela ulwimi lwesiXhosa kumaxesha anzima okukhula nokudweba kweelwimi zakwanonibe phakathi kwentlalo yoluntu. 
“Uphando lubonisa ukuphuncuka nokulahleka kolwimi lwesiXhosa, phakathi kwabantu abantetho isisiXhosa, naphakathi kwezinye iilwimi ingakumbi iilwimi zesiNguni,” utsho uGxothiwe.  
Lo mbhali utyhola umabonakude weli ngokuphakamisa ezinye iilwimi ngaphezu kwezinye iilwimi, ebhentsisa ingcinezelo yesiXhosa. 
“Iinkqubo ezidumileyo zone kumabonakude zithethwa ngesiZulu ngenxa yoko seside silahlekelwe ngamagama esiXhosa, sithi ukuxhatshazwa kukuhlukunyezwa, okanye imbokotho kuthwe yimbokodo,” ugadlela atsho uGxothiwe. 
UGxothiwe yinzalelwane yaseDikeni, usebenze iminyaka elishumi elinesine njengetitshala emva kokufundela ubutitshala eCPUT yaseKapa. Kungoku nje uxakeke lishishini lakhe ekunye nomyeni wakhe uQondani Gxothiwe, iBuyelembo yodumo yaseQonce. Le yincwadi yakhe yokuqala ayibhalileyo.  
Kulindeleke ukuba imiselwe ngokusesikweni kwinyanga yoMsintsi kulo nyaka eBuyelembo Village eQonce.
title: Unesiduko nje unetyala

text:
Omnye wabadlali abathembekile emva kwiChippa United, uJames Okwuosa, uzenzele imbali kwimpelaveki edlulileyo ngokuthi abengumdlali wokuqala ofince ikhulu lemidlalo. Lo mdlali ufikelele kweli nqanaba emva kokuthath’ inxaxheba kumdlalo we-Absa Premier Soccer League iChippa United ebethe kuwo iCape Town City ngo’2-1 eSisa Dukashe Stadium ngejikalanga yayi zolo. Le ndedeba yaseNigeria ineesizini ezingaphaya kwesine idlalela iiChilli Boys. Phambi kokudlalela eli qela laseMpuma Koloni, u-Okwuosa udlalele amaqela afana ne-El-Kameni Warriors, iLobi Stars, Enugu Rangers (onke ngawaseNigeria) ne-Ajax Cape Town. 
Ngumdlali wokuqala osele efikelele kwikhulu leminyaka kwaba bakhoyo abadlali. Lo nto uyivuyele kakhulu kwaye wenze amazwi ombulelo kumphathi, kubaqeqeshi nakoo gxa bakhe. “Ndicinga ukuba yinto enkulu kakhulu kwaye ndibulela uThixo ngalo nto. Ibe yindlela enzima, ndibulela usihlalo weChippa nabo bonke abaqeqeshi abandincedisileyo kweli khulu lam lemidlalo. Yinto enkulu kakhulu le kum futhi ndiyathemba ukuba uThixo uyakundipha amandla okuqhubela phambili nokudlala,” utshilo u-Okwuosa. 
Lo mdlali, oneminyaka engamashumi amabini anesithandathu, uxelele iintatheli ngezinto azinqwenelayo nangovuyo lwakhe emva kokuba iqela lakhe lizuze impumelelo yalo yesibini kule sizini. “Ebholeni akufuneki uzikhathaze kakhulu ngezinto ezimbi, kufuneka ugxile kwezi zintle. Okubalulekileyo kukuzama nokwenza umsebenzi kude kube sekugqibeleni. Ingase uThixo andinike impilo entle ukuze ndikwazi ukuqhubela phambili nokudlala. Kodwa ke ndilapha ngenxa yokusebenzisana nabanye abadlali. Abadlali abatsha mabagade izimilo zabo ukuba bafuna ukuhlala ixesha elide ebholeni, bakhuthale emsebenzini abawenzayo. Akukho nto enokubathintela xa benokusebenza ngaphezulu kwam baqinise nasemfundweni” 
“Ndiyivuyela kakhulu le mpumelelo; sidlale imidlalo emihlanu ilandelelana. Eminye imidlalo kuye kwanyanzeleka ukuba samkele inqaku elinye – kodwa siphumelele. Ngexesha lokuphumla, umqeqeshi uye wasikhumbuza ukuba singoobani. Sibuyele ebaleni sasebenza nzima satsho safumana amanqaku amathathu,” uvale ngalo mazwi u-Okwuosa.
title: UJames Okwuosa ufince ikhulu lemidlalo kwiChippa United

text:
Njengokuba abantu belizwe loMzantsi Afrika besakhwankqiswe kukungaqhubi kakuhle kweBafana Bafana – kodwa bafumana intuthuzelo kwindlela iBanyana Banyana eqhuba ngayo.  
Eli qela lesizwe lamantombazaba adlala ibhola ekhatywayo liya kumjikelo ophambi kwamagqibela kankqoyi we-2017 COSAFA Women’s Championship emva kokuba liphumelele imidlalo emibini nokudlala ntanganye komnye kuGroup C. 
 Umqeqeshi weBanyana Banyana obambeleyo, uDesiree Ellis, ushiyeke ephoxekile emva kokuba iqela lakhe libambene ngo’1-1 neBotswana.  
IBanyana Banyana ibethe iLesotho ngo’3-0 yaphinda yabetha iNamibia ngo’3-1 kwimidlalo yayo edlulileyo – kodwa uEllis uthi ushiyeke ephoxekile yindlela abadlali bakhe abadlale ngayo neBotswana acinga ukuba bekufanele okokuba bayibethile.  
“Ndiphoxekile ngoba bendicinga ukuba sizakuwuphumelela la mdlalo. Abadlali bethu badlale kakubi kwisigaba sokuqala somdlalo, kufane kwangcono kwisiqingatha sesibini. Bekunyanzelekile senze iinguqu ngenxa yeemeko esidlala phantsi kwazo,” utshilo * -Ellis. 
Njengokuba iSafa ikwiphulo lokukhangela umqeqeshi osisigxina kwiBanyana Banyana, ukuze uDesiree Ellis aqwalaselwe, kunyanzelekile azibonakalise kwitumente efana neWomen’s Championship.  
Lo mdlalo uphakathi koMzantsi Afrika neZambia umnika ithuba elihle lokwenza umahluko kwikhono lakhe lokuqeqesha nakwibhola yeli lizwe.  
“Kwesi isigaba akukho thuba lesibini. Kufuneka sidlale ngcono kunendlela esidlale ngayo neBotswana. Kufuneka sinyuse umgangatho ukuze sifumane impumelelo. Siyazi abadlali abenzanga ngabom kumdlalo ogqithileyo – kodwa siyathemba lo nto idlule ngoku,” utshilo * -Ellis. 
IBanyana Banyana iza kudlala neZambia ngenjikalanga yangoLwesine umdlalo weCOSAFA Women’s Championship.  
Ithemba lokuqhuba kakuhle kulo mdlalo likhona emva kokuba iBanyana Banyana ifake amagowuli asixhenxe kwimidlalo emithathu eyidlalileyo.
title: Ellis: Kunyanzelekile sinyuse umgangatho kwiZambia

text:
Emva kwethuba elide engasayidlali ibhola ekhatywayo, ngoku uTokelo Rantie ngumdlali weMamelodi Sundowns.  
Ukutyikitywa kwakhe uRantie kulandela ukuziqeqesha kwakhe kwinkampu yeDowns ithuba elide.  
Kulindeleke kujongwe kuye emva kokuba iSundowns igqibe kwelokuba ibolekise ngaye uJeremy Brockie oza kudlalela iMaritzburg United kude kuphele isizini.  
URantie, 28, oyifolosi eyaziwayo kakhulu kwiqela lesizwe lebhola ekhatywayo, utyikitye iminyaka emithathu yonke kwiDowns.  
“Ewe, uRantie ngumdlali weSundowns. Ndibulela kakhulu umqeqeshi (uPitso Mosimane) omnike ithuba abantu sebesithi kuphelile ngaye. Ewe, ebenazo iingxaki ebenazo kodwa konke oko kugqithile ngoku,” utshilo uKgori Dinho Mokoro,  umanejala kaRantie.
title: Kugqityiwe, uRantie ngumdlali weSundowns

text:
“Kuthiwa niyanxanwa kakhulu kwesi sikolo, yiyo lo nto eyenze ukuba side simenywe ngamapolisa kuba kuthiwa nisela utywala ngexesha lesikolo noyikise ootishala.”  
Oku kuthethwe ngusekela mphathiswa wesebe lamapolisa uMaggie Sotyu ngethuba etyelele esinye sezikolo ezinengxaki yokusetyenziswa kweziyobisi eNgqushwa, isikolo samabanga aphakamileyo iNcedolwethu.  
“Ingxelo esiyifumeneyo isixelela ukuba nina niza esikolweni nizintyintye ngotywala, kwaye nisebenzisa neziyobisi silapha ukuza kuncedana nani kulo ngxaki,” ucacise watsho uSotyu.  
USotyu uthi, indawo yaseNgqushwa ayinamapolisa aneleyo, kwaye kukho imfuneko yokuba kwenziwe isikhululo samapolisa sesibini ukuncedisana nesi sinye sikhoyo. 
“Ndizakuhamba apha ndimisele ikomiti ezakujongana nesi sikolo nezinye izikolo, eli bhunga lizakuquka amapolisa, amalungu ebhunga lokulawulwa kwesikolo kwakunye nabafundi abathile ukulwa ezi ngxaki zichaphazela izikolo,” utsho uSotyu. 
Iingxaki ezambethe esi sikolo zibangele ukuhla kwezinga lokuphumelela kwabantwana kwibanga leshumi ukusukela oko kuthe kwavela ezi ngxaki. 
Inqununu yesikolo uLuyanda Hlasela, uthi zininzi iingxaki eziphazamisa ukuhla kweli zinga. “Kunyaka ophelileyo sifumene iziphumo ezibi kakhulu kuba sifumene amashumi amane anesihlanu kuphela, kanti kunyaka ophambi kwalowo sasifumene amashumi amathandathu anesithathu eepesenti ekhulwini,” utsho uHlasela.  
Lo kaHlasela, usola isebe lemfundo ngokurhuqa unyawo ukukhawulelana neengxaki abajongene nazo.”Iincwadi zokufunda zabantwana sasifake izicelo ngoSeptemba kunyaka ophelileyo azikafiki nangoku, ingxaki yokungabikho kootishala, le nto yokunxila kwabantwana isuka phaya ngaphandle kwesikolo izekuchaphazela isikolo ke ngoku,” uthethe watsho uHlasela. 
Ingingqi yaseNgqushwa kwisebe lemfundo iqhube kakubi kakhulu kunyaka ophelileyo ngokweziphumo zebanga leshumi ngokwengxelo.  
Usekela mphathiswa uSotyu uthi, intsebenziswano phakathi kwabazali, abafundi nootishala ingabuyisela isidima kwesi sikolo.  
Owayesakuba yinqununu yesi sikolo nongusodolophu waseNgqushwa uSolomzi Ndwayana uqhayisa ngomsebenzi owawusenziwa sesi sikolo ngaphambili. 
“Ngexesha ndandiyinqununu apha esi sikolo sakhupha oogqirha, omnye wabo useCuba nangoku, ncedani nibuyise isidima saseNcedolethu ngokusebenzisana nootishala benu,” utshilo uNdwayana.  
Umfundi webanga leshumi uSinesipho Fumba uthi, ngenene banayo ingxaki yokugqithisa ukusebenzisa iziyobisi abathile kubo.  
“Ingxaki bayathanda ukonwaba, xa kuvelwa emidlalweni bonwaba bagqithise lo nto yenze ukuba baqale ukusebenzisa utywala bade baqhele,” uthethe watsho uFumba.
title: ‘Ingxaki bayathanda ukonwaba, xa kuvelwa emidlalweni bonwaba bagqithise…’

text:
Isitshovutshovu seKaizer Chiefs, uKhama Billiat, sithi sizimisele ukwenza umahluko emdlalweni obalulekileyo weCAF Champions League ngempelaveki. UBilliat unethuba elide engasayidlali ibhola ekhatywayo ngenxa yokonzakala – kodwa ngoku ungumqabaqaba okwegqabi leviniga. Amakhosi aza kulwa kubemdaka iisali xa edibana ne-Al Ahly emdlalweni wokugqibela weCAF Champions League oza kubanjelwa eKing Mohamed V Stadium kwidolophi yaseCasablanca, eMorocco. 
Eyona nto eyenza umdla kakhulu kukuba iChiefs iza kudibana ne-Al Ahly eqeqeshwa nguPitso Mosimane waseMzantsi Afrika ongafuniyo ukuhlazwa liqela lelizwe lakhe. 
Abadlali ababini, uBilliat noLeonardo Castro bayiphumelela indebe yeChampions League besadlalela iMamelodi Sundowns ngo-2016 phantsi koMosimane abaza kujamelana naye ngoMgqibelo. Nangona kungecaci nokuba uBilliat angadlaliswa na – kodwa yena uthi ukulungele ukusebenzisa amava wakhe enze umahluko emdlalweni ojongwe ngamahlo abomvu. 
“Ndiyazi kakuhle indlela ekunzima ngayo ukudlala kwiChampions League futhi ndiyayazi nendlela ekumanandi ngayo ekugqibeleni,” utshilo uBilliat, oncome umsebenzi omhle owenziwe ngooxa bakhe. “Abadlali benze umsebenzi omhle kakuhle ukuze iqela lifike kwindawo elikuyo. Ndiziva ndisikelelekile ukuba yinxalenye yalo. Kufuneka sisebenza ngokuzimisela ngoba akudlalelwa indebe yalapha eMzantsi Afrika. Siza kudibana noompondozihlanjiwe be-Afrika kweyona ndebe enkulu. Ndibaqhwabela izandla bonke abadlali abasebenze kwade kwasekugqibeleni. 
“Ndinethemba lokwenzeka kwembali ndikweli qela. Sinemizuzu engamashumi alithoba sifike kweyona ndebe inkulu kwizwekazi le-Afrika. Sizimisele ukwenza esikuxelelwa ngumqeqeshi wethu emdlalweni,” utshilo uBilliat. Kunokwenzeka uStuart Baxter abekhona encediswa ngu-Arthur Zwane noDillon Sheppard abangena endaweni kuGavin Hunt – owagxothwa phambi kokuphela kwesizini ngenxa yokungaqhubi kakuhle kweqela kwiDStv Premiership.
title: UKhama Billiat utshaziintambo phambi komdlalo weCAF Champions League

text:
Ilungu lePalamente kuzwelonke uMugwanya Bham utyelele isikolo samabanga aphezulu eMthatha iSouthernwood High School, nalapho anikezele ngesipho seetawuli ezisetyenzisa ngamantombazana xa esexesheni. 
UBham uthi ukwenza oku ngelokunceda amantombazana achitha iintsuku eziliqela rhoqo ngenyanga engalubeki esikolweni ngethuba esexesheni. 
Umfundi ngamnye uzuze isixa seetawuli angasisebenzisa ixesha elingangeenyanga ezintandathu. 
 “Sizonceda ukuthintela ukuba abafundi abangamantombazana bangezi esikolweni xa besexesheni. Sincedisana nomama notata abangathathintweni emakhaya, sifuna abafundi bakwazi ukubaluleka kwemfundo bazimisele ukuze babenekamva eliqaqambileyo,” utshilo uBham. 
Ukwathe “Bafundi sicela ningaphazamiseki zizinto ezingendawo, sebenzani nzima ukuze niphumelele. Ngonyaka ka-2019 sifuna ukubona niphumelela emagqabini.” 
Abafundi basetyhini abalikhulu  kwesi sikolo, babambe ngazibini kweli lungu lepalamente. 
Umfundi oxhamleyo uThabisa Phompolo osuka kwikhaya elingathathi ntweni eZimbane Valley uthi oluncedo luzokwenza umahluko omkhulu kuye nabanye abafundi kwaye ubezidinga kakhulu ezitawuli ngezinye iinyanga. 
Inqununu yesikolo uAyanda Fatman uthe “Sinombulelo ongazenzisiyo kwilungu lepalamente elithe gqolo ukunceda esisikolo esinabantwana abangasuka kumakhaya ohlukeneyo. Oku yinkuthazo enkulu kubafundi bethu, sinomnqweno wokufumana okuninzi nanjengoko sijonge phambili” 
Kokwesibini okaBham esiza nezipho kwesisikolo, nanjengoko ngonyaka ka-2015 wanikezela ngeeyunifom kubafundi abaliqela kwakwesi sikolo. 
ISouthernwood High kulindeleke ukuba ibenebanga leshumi okokuqala ngo-2019. Okwangoku iphela kwibanga lesibhozo.
title: Baxhamle kwisipho seetawuli zasexesheni abafundi eSouthernwood High

text:
Izinto zihamba kakuhle kwiimbaleki zoMzantsi Afrika zisuka nje kulo nyaka mtsha.  
UCaster Semenya uzimisele ukubhala iincwadi zembali ngokutsha kwiAthletix Grand Prix kule mpelaveki xa eswantsulisana noDominique Scott-Efurd waseMelika kugqatso oluzakube luseDal Josaphat Stadium.  
Le mbaleki yelizwe loMzantsi Afrika yenze ezibukwayo kwiveki ephelileyo ngethuba etshatshela kwi800m kunye ne1500m kwiSA Championship.  
Okuncumisayo ngempumelelo kaSemenya kukuba ixesha alibalekileyo eliyimizuzu eyi4:01.81 lihle kakhulu ngoku ujonge ukucima imbali eyenziwa nguZola Budd-Pieterse ngo1984 owabaleka ixesha eliyi4:01.99.  
Kunyanzelekile abhinqe omfutshane uSemenya ngoba uScott-Efurd akalilo ifokofoko. Uzibonakalise kwiveki ephelileyo ukuba uyakwazi ukubaleka ngethuba ephumelela ugqatso olungumgama oyi5000m kwiveki ephelileyo ngexesha eliyi16:55.05.  
Into enika ithemba ngoSemenya kukuba uyimbaleki ezithembileyo futhi ezimiseleyo emsebenzini wayo.  
Noxa eza kunyuka umnqantsa kodwa ithemba lokubuya nempumelelo likhona ngenxa yesantya namava anawo.  
“EMzantsi Afrika yitayitile into ebalulekileyo. Ugqatso luzakuba nzima  kodwa ndizimisele ukuleqa irekhodi elenziwa nguZola. Sendinayo intshinga ye800m ne1000m phantsi kwegama lam. Kungakuhle ukuba ndingafumana i15000m ngoku,” utshilo uSemenya.  
Kwelinye icala, uClarence Munyai uqwabaze irekhodi likaWayde van Niekerk ngethuba ephumelela ugqatso ngemizuzwana eyi19.69. 
 Le ndedeba yakwaMinyai inyukele kwinqabana eliphezulu kwezembali kwiinyanga ezintathu ezidlulileyo.  
Ngoku ubonwa njengomnye weembaleki ezinokuthi zibeke uMzantsi Afrika endaweni entle kwimidyarho yeembaleki yehlabathi.  
“Bendisazi ukuba indawo esibaleka kuyo iza kundivumela emva kokubukela abanye abantu bebaleka ngesantya esiphezulu. Ndiye ndazixelela ukuba mandenze qha nangona bendingayilindelanga indlela endiqhube ngayo,” utshilo uMunyai.
title: UCaster  ufuna ukuqwabaza irekhodi likaZola Budd!

text:
Ukudinwa ngenxa yokuhamba imigama emide kubafundi baseCala izakuba yinto yezolo emva kokungenelela kwesebe lezothutho elizakunikeza ngeebhayisekile ezingamakhulu amabini kwaba bafundi ngoLwesihlanu. 
  
UMphathiswa wesebe lezothutho eMpuma Koloni uWeziwe Tikana, uza kutyelela kwisikolo samabanga aphezulu iBatandwa Ndondo kwilali iCala Reserve ngentsasa yangoLwesihlanu ukunikeza ngezi bhayisekile. 
  
Zizikolo ezihlanu kulo mmandla ekulindeleke ukuba zixhamle kwesi sipho. 
  
UTikana ukwenza oku phantsi kwephulo iShova Kalula National Bicycle Partnership Project elasungulwa kunyaka ka2001 ukuncedisa abafundi abangeyonxalenye yenkqubo yezothutho karhulumente, kodwa babe behamba imigama evisayo xa besiya esikolweni. Oku ikwaluphawu lokuqaphela inyanga yeDwarha njengenyanga yezothutho.   
  
“Sizimisele ukuqinisekisa ukuba abafundi kwiphondo lethu liphela bayafikelela kwimfundo esemgangathweni. Sisebenza nzima nje kukuba sifuna kuzaliseke esi sifungo,” utshilo uTikana. 
  
UTikana uzakusebenzisa ithuba lokunikeza ngezi bhayisekile ukukhuthaza abazali neenqununu ukuba ziqiniseke ngokufaka izicelo zenkqubo yothutho lwabafundi kwangethuba ukulungiselela unyaka ozayo.
title: Amakhulu  amabini eebhayisekile kubafundi baseCala

text:
Kubonakala ngathi iChippa United izakuphulukana nomnye wabadlali bayo ababalulekileyo – uThamsanqa Sangweni.  
Lo mdlali-siswini waKwaZulu Natal kudala efunwa ngamaqela aseGauteng – kodwa ngoku yiBidvest Wits ekuvakala ukuba izimisele ukumthathela kuyo. Iingxelo eziphuma eGoli zithi uSangweni uthiwe tshe ezilolonga neentshatsheli ze-Absa Premier Soccer League zika-2016/17, iWits, ekuqaleni kwale veki. 
Isivumelwano sengqesho sikaSangweni neeChilli Boys sifikelela esiphelweni xa kuphela le nyanga yeSilimela, ngoku kubonakala ngathi lo mdlali akazimiselanga kuhlala eMpuma Koloni kwisizini ezayo.  
USangweni, obekwangukapteni weChippa kwisizini ephelileyo, udlale indima ebalulekileyo kwiChippa kwezi sizini zimbalwa ekuyo.  
Ukuhamba kwakhe zindaba ezimbi kweli qela lisinde ezembeni kwisizini ephelileyo. USangweni udlalele amaqela afana neMamelodi Sundowns, AmaZulu FC ne-Ajax Cape Town.  
ULucky Baloyi, okhululwe yiKaizer Chiefs kutshanje, ngomnye wabadlali ekunokwenzeka batyikitywe yiChippa United phambi kokuqala kwesizini entsha.
title: IChippa ingaphulukana noSangweni

text:
UMzantsi Afrika omtsha wazalwa kwidabi lenkululeko elakhokelela ekukhululweni kumakhamandela engcinezelo. 
Ezopolitiko eMzantsi Afrika zisoloko zibonakalisa iimfuno zesininzi sabemi boMzantsi Afrika. 
Kodwa ngoku into efuneka ngamandla eMzantsi Afrika ngumhlaba oqinisekisa inkululeko kwezoqoqosho. 
Intlupheko elutshaba elihleli likhona kumazwe amaninzi yenze ukuba kubekho amaqela athile ezopolitiko eMzantsi Afrika anyanzelisa ukubuyiswa komhlaba ngaphandle kwentlawulo. Inefuthe elinzima ke le ntetho kuba isekelwe kwiingcinga zabantu ababona umhlaba njengento ezakubakhulula kwintlupheko. 
Ezi ngcinga zinefuthe elinzulu xa uzithatha ngokunjalo bazo. 
Umbuzo endinawo ugxile ekubeni umhlaba ungakwazi ukuvelisa indima ebalulekileyo kwezoqoqosho? Ngokulula, umhlaba ungasikhulula njani entluphekweni? 
Umhlaba ngokunokwawo awunamveliso; awuvelisi xabiso, ngaphandle kokuba uphuhliswe ukuze kuvele ixabiso lawo. Oku akuphelelanga ekulinyweni nakumadlelo emfuyo. Xa utsala amanzi kulo mhlaba wandisa ixabiso lawo. 
Indlu, ispaza, naso nasiphi na isakhiwo esisekelwe ekuphuhliseni ixabiso lomhlaba ngundoqo nesiqalo sokuxabiseka kwalo mhlaba ufunwayo. 
Xa sifumana lo mhlaba sizakuwusebenzisa njani ngokwexabiso lawo? Ingakumbi kwintlupheko njengengxaki esentloko. 
Ngokolwam uluvo sikhangela isisombululo sokulwa nentlupheko ngokuthatha uxanduva lokuphuhlisa umhlaba. Kufanele ukuba siqwalasele amathuba oqoqosho ngokukhawuleza, nangavelisa ingqesho. 
Ukuvula amathuba engqesho ayiloxanduva lukarhulumente, lelomntu ofana nam nawe, urhulumente unoxanduva lokwenza ukuba imeko ivumele ushishino. 
Kuyimfuneko ukuba sibonisane norhulumente ukuze enze imeko efanele ukuvulwa kwamashishini, kwakunye nokudala amathuba emisebenzi. 
Viva kwimigaqo-nkqubo evumelana noshishino!  
Viva kwinkxaso-mali!  
Viva kwinkxaso yamashishini akhasayo!  
Viva kwimisebenzi ngexesha lethu! 
*UMbuqe ngumthandi wako konke okucingisayo. Yingqondi esoloko ilangazelela ulwazi nentlalo entle. Ngumhambi weendlela ezingahanjwayo.
title: Xa sisithi “Sifuna Umhlaba!” sifuna ntoni kanye kanye?

text:
Kwakhona mawethu! Sikwilizwe apho izinto zenzeka ngokuphazima kweliso. Abantu bayagxanya ukuhamba, kuloo nto bade baqakathe izinto ebekumele ukuba bayazinyathela.  
Yinto esingenakuyinceda ke le kuba yonke nje into itshintsha iguquka ngokukhawuleza. Itekhnoloji nayo ingxama kakhulu, futhi ukungayileqi kukuzikhanda ngenyhek’ etyeni.  
Uzibona sewuwedwa kubomi bakudala ngeli xa abantu obucinga ukuba uphila nabo sebekwamanye amazwe. Unxibelelwano kumaqonga kawonkewonke luxananaze de lwaphixikela nakwiindawo ebekungafanelekanga lukuyo.  
Sizibona sibila sisoma sinqanda umhla nezolo imifanekiso yamakhwenkwe asesuthwini afotwa ze loo mifanekiso ijikeleziswe. Kodwa ndikuthethile oku asinakugxeka konke kolu phucuko yeka nje ukuba thina sisuka sizikhucule.  
Intatheli enje ngoThandile Ntlangano eyayisebenza phantsi kweemeko ezingaginyis’ amathe yayinokuvuya ixhumaxhume ukuba le tekhnoloji yayikho ngamaxesha ayo.  
Kancinci nje, apha ndiphethe incwadi ngosiba lukaM.S. Mlandu esihloko sithi, Kwisizwe Esitsha. Le yincwadi yamabali amafutshane neyapapashwa phaya ngomnyaka ka2004 ngabakwaVia Afrika. Kumabali athwelwe yile ncwadi ndinelo lisihloko sithi, Idabi likanondaba. 
Kweli bali umbhali usilandela imbali nezidubedube ezazilimise mantsantsa ilizwe lethu. Kanye ngexesha elalidinga uxolo ngalo. Kaloku uThandile Ntlangano oyintatheli uzibona exakekile eqokelelela iphephandaba awayelisebenzela, Iliso Lesizwe iindaba zemfazwe eyayigquba phakathi kwemibutho yopolitiko eyayikho.  
Eli xesha kaloku mfundi leli kwabanjwa ngalo iingxoxo kulungiselelwa ulonyulo lokuqala kuMzantsi Afrika.  
Izixhobo zokusebenza koonondaba zazingentle konke konke, uThandile wayephithizela apho sele phela ebulawa nayimbumbulu angenakwazi nokuba yayivela kweliphi icala. 
Sisakhono umntu asifumana ngokusifundela esi, yiyeke le yanamhlanje yokusuka sibe ziintatheli sonke. Ukuba yintatheli kumaxesha angaphambili kwakuthetha ukubasemfuthweni wolwazi, kulibhongo izinto ziqala zibikwe kuwe ze wena ubikele abantu.  
Ngamaxesha esesidlule kuwo lawo. Namhlanje kuthe tshitshilili oonondaba ndawo yonke, kunjalonje nguwashiywa nowashiywa ukubhengeza iindaba. Bathi befika abo bafundele obo buntatheli zibe sezibhengezwe zathi saa nkalwana zonke ezo ndaba.  
Loo ntatheli ifika seyinikwa ngoosinga-nondaba esebekho kuloo ndawo ibonakala njengeyenza iindaba, afane achutyelwe eyona nto ibisenzeka ngabo.  
Ziya kuthi zibhengezwa kumaziko eendaba kube sekuyingxokolo luluntu kumakhasi onxibelelwano zigwadla. Andithi kaloku bona bazive kooqalazive bokwenene, abo basemsini.  
Ke olu lwabo untathelo aluhluzi, into luyibeka njengoko luyibona yaye aluzidini ngokubuza mibuzo. Ukhona phofu umntu obenokuyivumela into yokuzibona ephoswa imibuzo nguye nabani na?  
Andiqondi, kuba ke ngenene umntu unenkululeko yakhe, ke ukuhamba umiswa uhlatywa imibuzo kuba usaziwa kungakufaka engozini. Bubomi beli xesha ke obu futhi bulunge bunje kubantu babo.  
Makhe sithi ubuntatheli obu bebusafana naphaya ngaphambili, apho ubani eberhubuluza engozini efuna iindaba yaye abantu bengawuqondi nomsebenzi wakhe na kakade, ndiyakuxelela ngekunzima!  
Ewe, unyanisile okaMlandu lidabi likanondaba eli. Namhla ke umngeni yitekhnoloji efike yasenza sazibona ubunondaba xa sisonke.  
Yinto esuke yawutshabhisa umsebenzi woonondaba leyo. Bakho ke oonondaba ababengenokusebenza ngeliya xesha lemfazwe eyayiseTransvaal, imfazwe awayeyilandela rhoqo uThandile Ntlangano. Xa kuthethwa ngoonondaba akudlalwa, oku sikwenzayo. Ndiniyekile!
title: Ngamagorha oonondaba

text:
Nangalo nyaka, kumakhaya ngamakhaya nakwiindawo ngeendawo ehlabathi jikelele, sikhumbula iqhawe lethu sonke uNelson Rholihlahla Mandela owakhokelela abantu boMzantsi Afrika enkululekweni nokuhlonitshwa kwamalungelo ethu sonke. 
Usuku lukaMandela – elagunyaziswa Zizizwe Ezimanyeneyo njengomalubhiyozelwe minyaka yonke kwihlabathi jikelele , lufika mna noogxa bam sithe bhazalala kwiindawo ezinabantu abahlala ematyotyombeni siqhuba uphando-nzulu oluququzelelwa ngabe Human Sciences Research Council kunye neSebe Lezentlalo Yoluntu. Lubandakanya iintsapho ezikumatyotyombe angamawaka amahlanu kwizwe lonke, kuquka eli phondo leseMpuma Koloni. Iinjongo kukuzoba umfanekiso ocacileyo malunga nemo yentlalo yabantu abasematyotyombeni, ingakumbi kwiindawo ezibhaliselwe ukuphuhliswa ngurhulumente ngokuthi kwakhiwe izindlu zeRDP, kuphuculwe izibonelelo ngamanzi, umbane, iindlela, ukugutyulwa kwelindle, kunye nokuvulelwa kwamathuba emisebenzi eyamkelisa imali abangaziphilisa ngayo abantu. 
Usuku lukaMandela lusifikela noogxa bam sesinyathele kwiindawo ezifana ne-Amalinda, eZiphunzana, Mdantsane, Hankey, Despatch, Tinarha, New Brighton. Ukanti sisaya naseMthatha, eCala, Aliwal North, nakwezinye iziphaluka. 
Kaloku sikhumbula okokuba uMandela ebebaxabise kakhulu abantwana njengeendlalifa zeli lizwe, esenza konke okusemandleni okuqinisekisa okokuba bakhuliswa ngohlobo olufanelekileyo, amalungelo abo ayahlonitshwa, amakhaya nemo yentlalo abakhulela kuyo zibakhuthazela kwikamva eliqaqambileyo. Kungoko waseka ingxowa-mali iNelson Mandela Children’s Fund ukuze iqhubele phambili iinkqubo ezibonelela iimfuno zabantwana. Kungoko norhulumente esakhela izindlu izigidigidi zabantu abasematyotyombeni. 
Kungoko kulo nyaka xa sikhumbula usuku lukaMandela, isininzi sethu sizingca ngokuba ilizwe lethu linconywa emhlabeni jikelele ngemigaqo-nkqubo kunye nemithetho ekhuthaza inkqubela phambili nophuhliso loluntu, kuquka umgaqo-nkqubo ngokukhuliswa kwabantwana okugxininisa iintsuku eziliwaka zokuqala ebomini bomntwana, ukusukela unina esazithwele ukuyokutsho kwiminyaka emibini umntwana ezelwe njengexesha elibalulekileyo ekwakhekeni kwesiseko sokukhula komntwana.  
Kaloku kukho amava anzulu nobungqina obuphathekayo obubonisa okokuba uchitho-mali ngononophelo kwizinto ezifana nokutya okunesondlo, ukunikezelwa kweenkonzo ezisemgangathweni zezempilo nezemfundo kunembuyekezo encomekayo ekukhuleni komntwana ngokuthi kutshayelele amathuba angcono okokuba umntwana akhule esempilweni, afunde aphumelele amabanga aphakamileyo esikolweni, nokuthi abe ngummi welizwe onegalelo elililo kwezoqoqosho. 
Okubaluleke nangakumbi kukuba kwikhaya ngalinye umntwana abenekhonkco lonxibelelwano nomntu omdala onothando nokhathalayo ngendlela akhuliswa ngayo umntwana. Kaloku ukungabikho komntu omdala osisigxina nokhathalayo kusengabangela iingxaki ezininzi ekukhuleni komntwana ngenxa yokungahoyeki ngokufanelekileyo. Ukuhoyeka komntwana akupheleli nje ekumtyiseni nasekumgcineni ekhuselekile ezingozini, koko kuquka ukumdlalisa ngohlobo olumgcina edlamkile. Okunqwenelekayo kukuba lowo uhoya umntwana akwazi ukusukumela phezulu amthuthuzele xa ekhala ngenxa yokokuba elambile okanye efuna ukutshintshwa iimpahla azimanzisileyo, xa egodola, okanye esozela. Kuthi kube nzima kakhulu kwiintsapho ezisematyotyombeni ngenxa yokungonelisekiswa kweemfuno zosapho okubangwa yindlala, ubuhlwempu, nentswela-msebenzi. Ematyotyombeni akukho zihlobo, zizalwane okanye abamelwane ubani angathembela kubo kwathini ngokuncedisana ekukhuliseni abantwana. 
Okuxhalabisayo kwiindawo ezinamatyotyombe esele sinyathele kuzo kukuba ambalwa amaziko aziwa ngee-Early Childhood Development Centres okukhulisa afundise abantwana abaneminyaka engaphantsi kwesixhenxe. Okuqaphelekayo kukuba, kulamatyotyombe kukho ihambonzima engaphaya kunokokuba sicingela njengoko amaxhegwaza ezifumana ekhulisa abazukulwana ngethuba iintombi nomolokazana bephezu kweenzame zokufumana imisebenzi. Amanye amaxhegwazana akhulisa abazukulwana kuba abazali babo sebaswelweka. Bukhulu ubunzima bomthwalo wokukhulisa abantwana kwiintsapho ezininzi ezihluphekayo, ingakumbi ezisematyotyombeni. Le meko isikhokelela kwizikhalazo ngakurhulumente ngokurhuqa iinyawo ngokuphathelele kwizicwangciso zokukhusela amalungelo abantwana kunye neentsapho zabo njengoko kugunyazisiwe kumgaqo-siseko welizwe. 
Xa siqwalasela kulo nyaka, iinkqubo zikarhulumente ezaqaliswa ilizwe lisaphethwe nguMongameli Mandela ezibonelela ukukhuliswa kwabantwana zisawa ngeneno ekuhlangabezeni neemfuno ezingundoqo ezingaqinisekisa ikamva eliqaqambileyo labantwana. Kungeso sizathu ke ekulindeleke okokuba urhulumente kunye nabo bonke abakhathalayo babhinqele phezulu ekulungiseni lo mba, ngenjongo zokuqhubela phambili umsebenzi oncomekayo owaqalwa livulandlela nesithwalandwe uMandela.
title: Kukhunjulwa uMandela nesisa sakhe

text:
