Sikhe sabaxakekisa kakhulu abantu beli phondo ngokwezopolitiko, kodwa masiyibulele iANC ikwazile ukusenza ukuba sikwazi ukuqubisana nezo ngxaki. 
SV: Siselapho nje Nkulubaphathiswa, kulo mba wezopolitiko, yeyiphi indlela ocinga ukuba ilungile yokuqubisana neengxaki zopolitiko ezifana nokutshintshwa kwezikhokelo zezopolitiko noxa urhulumente eqhuba yena? 
PM: Into yokuqala, urhulumente kufuneka ayekwe enze umsebenzi wakhe njengoko uvuma nomthetho kwanomgaqosiseko. Umntu kwarhulumente uqeshwa ngomthetho, ze kuhlolwe umsebenzi awenzayo kusetyenziswa umthetho. Ukuba nje singathi sijonge ncakasana ukuba uthini umthetho, indlela yokusebenza kukarhulumente iyakuhlala ikwimo elungele umsebenzi. Iinkokheli zezopolitiko ezikwarhulumente kufuneka ziqale ziyazi ukuba umthetho uthini. Ukuba singayenza lo nto, konke kungahamba ngendlela. Akumele kungenziwa nto ngabantu abangenzi le nto bekufanele ukuba bayayenza, kodwa kufuneka yonke lo nto yenziwe ngomthetho. 
SV: Okokugqibela nje Nkulubaphathiswa, xa sinokuthi bekela phaya ikepusi yeANC namaKomanisi, sikhe sive uluvo lwakho ngeyona ndlela yokutshintsha imeko yomntu ohlelelekileyo okanye obhuqwa yindlala 
PM: Enye yezinto endicinga ukuba yimpazamo enkulu, yile yokwenza abantu babe ngabaxhamli bezipho. Abantu asibenzanga ekubeni babone inxaxheba noxanduva abanokulidlala ekuguquleni imeko abaphila phantsi kwayo, ze urhulumente afike abancedise kwinto abayicingayo. Into esiyenzileyo thina kukuba sifika endaweni sithi ‘siza kunenzela, siza kunenzela’. Ukuya phambili, ngokombono wam, nalapha kumbutho ophetheyo (ANC) kufuneka sitshintshe indlela yokwenza, sifike ebantwini sibabuze ukuba bafuna ukuncediswa ngantoni. NoMongameli (Thabo) Mbeki ukhe wayithetha le nto ngaphambili esithi ‘Vuk’Uzenzele’. Kwakukuninzi okuqulathwe yila ngcingane [kaMbeki]. Abantu akufuneki sibenze ngokungathi abanasakhono sakucinga, abananto abanokuzenzela yona. Ayilunganga into yokufika endaweni sithi ‘nantsi into enifaneleyo’, abantu kufuneka bayekwe bathabathe inxaxheba ngemibandela edla bona.
title: Masualle: Umsebenzi wethu uyabonakala

text:
Umqeqeshi weMamelodi Sundowns uPitso Mosimane kulindeleke ukuba adlalele kude kakhulu xa kufikelelwa kwiingxoxo zesivumelwano sokudlala sekapteni yela qela uRamahlwe Mphahlele. 
 Kodwa loo nto khange imnqande lo mqeqeshi ebesandula kubuya kwimpumelelo yeCAF Champions e-Algeria kule mpelaveki, ekubeni avakalise indlela anqwenela ngayo ukuba uRama ahlale kwiSundowns. 
 UMphahlele khange ahambe neSundowns ukuya eSetif nalapho eliqela lalapha ekhaya libethe i-ES Setif ngamagowuli amabini eqandeni ngokuhlwa ngoMgqibelo. 
Lento ibangelwa kukuba uRama ezakube ephelelwe sisivumelwano sokudlala kweli qela kwiveki ezayo. Ukholelwa ukuba ufanele ukuba adlale xa ikamva lakhe eqinisekile ngalo. Kuye kwanyanzeleka ukuba uMosimane enze utshintsho ngasemva wanika, uThabo Nthethe igunya lokuba abe yikapteni.  
 Emva kokuba ebuyile e-Algeria, lo mqeqeshi uvakalise indlela aphoxeke ngayo yindlela uRama aphethwe ngayo. 
“Undenzele kakuhle izinto njengekapteni,” utshilo uMosimane. 
 “Uyidlale yonke imidlalo ngelixa enokwazi ukufumaneka, nangoku enzakeleyo indlela ebezijonga ngayo izinto khange itshintshe. Nje ngomqeqeshi ndiyakholwa nguRama njengomdlali kwaye useyikapteni yam. Kodwa ukuba lento imayelana nento engaphaya komdlalo, thina baqeqeshi kufuneka sime bucala.” 
 Umhlawumbi iqela kufuneka liphendule imibuzo kuba mna andiyazi into eyenzeka ngaphaya kweengcango. Umba wezivumelwano zokudlala akufanelanga ukuba uyayekwa kude kube leli xesha,” waleke ngokutsho uMosimane.
title: UPitso akafuni ahambe uMpahlele

text:
Iseliphupha impumelelo kwiqela lombhoxo laseMpuma Koloni, iSouthern Kings, elithatha inxaxheba kwitumenete yeGinness Pro 14. IKings, eyatyiwa lizembe kunye neFree State Cheetahs, xeshikweni iqumrhu elilawula umbhoxo kumazwe akumazantsi ehlabathi, iSanzar, lithatha isigqibo sokuphungula amaqela ukuwasusa kwishumi elinesibhozo ukuyothixhaxhe kwishumi elinesihlanu, zizibhaqa lisemsileni kwiPro 14 League emva kokubethwa kuyo yolishumi elinanye imidlalo esele iyidlalile. Eli qela lithwaxwe yi-Edinburgh ngo’37-7 izolo eMyreside eScotland. 
IKings ziwuqale kakuhle umdlalo kodwa ayikwazanga ukuwasebenzisa amathuba, nto leyo ekhokelele ukubeni iye ekhefini yokuphela kwesiqingatha sokuqala isemva ngamanqaku alishumi elinesihlanu. Kwisiqingatha sesibini lizityele itheko iqela laseScotland bequqa bebuyelela ekalikeni de bayokwenza impazamo nezikhokelele  umdlali wangasemva weqela likaDeon Davids, u-Ntabeni Dukisa, ayolala emgceni okokuqala nokokugqibela emdlalweni. Ilele emgceni izihlandlo zazihlanu emdlalweni i-Edinburgh – ebethwe  kanye qha kule sizini. 
Umdlalo olandelayo weSouthern Kings ungomhla we-13 kwinyanga yoMqungu ku-2018, eNelson Mandela Bay Stadium, eBhayi – apho kulindeleke ukuba banyathelane khona neqela laseFree State, iCheetahs, ngentsimbi yesihlanu malanga. 
Kings: 15 Ntabeni Dukisa, 14 Yew Penxe, 13 Berton Klaasen, 12 Martin du Toit, 11 Alshaun Bock, 10 Kurt Coleman, 9 Rudi van Rooyen, 8 Ruaan Lerm, 7 Martinus Burger, 6 Bredenkamp Eitel, 5 Dries van Schalkwyk, 4 Jurie van Vuuren, 3 Russow de Klerk, 2 Stephan Coetzee, 1 Schalk Ferreira(captain) 
16.Tango Balekile,17 Njabulo Gumede, 18 Pieter Scholtz, 19 Lindokuhle Welemu, 20 Freddy Ngoza,21 Rowan Gouws/Godlen Masimla, 22 Harlon Klaasen, 23 Masixole Banda
title: Ziphinde zatywatyushwa kwakhona iiSouthern Kings!

text:
Kwakungo2008 esenza uGrade 10 ngethuba kuvakala iindaba zokubhubha kwemvumikazi yoMzantsi Afrika uMiriam Makeba. Wathi akuva ezi ndaba zothusa umzi wonke, wabhala umbongo othi ‘On The Death Mama Afrika’ – ekhumbula, ekwahlonipha eli gqalakazi lomculo. 
Utitshalakazi wakhe esikolweni, uMam’ uNoluthando Magodla, akube ebone lo mbongo, waqaphela isiphiwo sokubhala kuTyutulo. 
Le titshalakazi yawusa kwiphephandaba lo mbongo, ukususela ngoko uTyutulo akazange aphinde ajonge emva. 
Xa kunamhlanje, le nzalelwane yaseCacadu ngumbhali ophum’ izandla. 
Sel’ ebhale iincwadi ezingaphaya kwamashumi amathathu, ezinye zazo ezisalindele ukupapashwa. 
Kutsha nje uTyutulo, 30, upapashe incwadi yakhe ethi ‘UNtombethongo – Ukugula Awuzikhetheli’ – eyipapasha esebenzisa inkampani yakhe yopapasho iNkuthalo Media. 
Edlan’ iindlebe neli phephandaba, uthi uyibhale emva kokuba waba nencoko nomntu owayebhidwe yinj’ ukuvuthwa emzini wakhe. 
“Ndiyibhale emva kokuba ndaye ndancokola nomnye utata onguBhishophu, esithi akayazi into emehlelayo emzini wakhe. 
“Kuloo ncoko sasinayo wabalisa into yokuba intombi yakhe inomshologu, kwaye yena usindisiwe. Wabe ebubuyigxeka imeko yamagqirha, esithi ngamadimoni. Ndichukunyiswe lelo bali ke, ndabhala le noveli. 
“Inoveli kaNtombethongo kum ithetha ukuba kufike ixesha lokuba zonke iinkolo esithi zezaseAfrika zixatyiswe. Kungabikho nkolo isisithuko kwenye,” utshilo. 
Enye incwadi kaTyutulo ithi Gweba Mgwebi, esithi iziganeko zoxhatshazo olusekelezelwe kwisini (GBV) zibe ngunobangela wale ncwadi. 
“Kule ncwadi ithi Gweba Mgwebi ndichukunyiswe yimpathogadalala eyenziwa ngamadoda kumanina negqubayo kulo Mzantsi Afrika. Kuyo ndibalisa ibali lendoda eyayingafumani bantwana, kodwa kowayo kuthukwa inkosikazi yayo, kusithiwa lidlolo. Yaye yakrexeza ke inkosikazi, yade yafumana abantwana ababini. 
“Abo bantwana baye baziwa ukuba ngabakabani na. Loo ndoda yaye yaya kuzihlola kubantu besiNtu, kwacaca ukuba yiyo ingxaki. Kulapho yaye yaphatha gadalala inkosikazi yayo nemigqakhwe yakhe,” kubalisa lo mbhali. 
“Yathi ngokonela inkosikazi yayo yalwa, yade yayibulala indoda. Kulapho yabanjwayo inkosikazi. Kwaye isitsho ukuba imbulele umyeni wayo ngezandla zayo, ngoko ke makagwebe uMgwebi. 
UTyutulo uthi iincwadi zakhe uzibhala ngesiXhosa kuphela. 
“Injongo kukuvuselela isiXhosa esiya sitshabalala kuthi maXhosa. Kodwa kwinkampani yam ndizipapasha zonke iilwimi ezikhoyo eMzantsi Afrika,” kutsho uTyutulo. 
Uthi ubhala zonke iindidi zamabali, kuquka inoveli, imidlalo, amabali amafutshane, izincoko nemibongo. 
UTyutulo uthi inkampani yakhe ipapasha phantse zonke iilwimi zoMzantsi Afrika. Uthi ngoku ubhala inoveli nombhali oseSoweto eRhawutini ethi Iziphumo Zemfihlo. 
“Ikhona neyezincoko esendleleni endiqokelele ababhali abasakhulayo nabantwana bezikolo kuyo.” 
“Eyona njongo yale nkampani kukusondeza iinkonzo ebezibonakala ziyinqaba kuba kusithiwa iinkampani zopapasho zezabamhlophe. Babe besithi abantu iinkampani zopapasho ezininzi zinamaxabiso axhumileyo. Ndathi ngokwenza uphando, ndabona ukuba ndingazisondeza ebantwini ezi nkonzo zopapasho ngaphandle kokuba kubekho amaxabiso axhumileyo, ” kutsho uTyutulo ozinze eKapa. 
Ezi ncwadi zifumaneka eClarke’s Bookshop, eLong Street eKapa, naseThe Book Lounge eBuitenkant Street, kwaseKapa. Ungakhangela noNkuthalo David Tyutulo kuFacebook.
title: Osindisiweyo unyemba onomshologu, wachukumisa usiba lombhali

text:
IZA kuthabatha inxaxheba kukhuphiswano lukamabonakude imvumi yaseMthatha eyenza umculo wohlobo lweRap ngolwimi lwesiXhosa.  
USiyanda Mona oneminyaka engama-23 nowaziwa ngelikaMikkie Somaqhuzu waseZimbane, eMthatha,  uza kuthabatha inxaxheba kukhuphiswano lwenkqubo kaSABC 1 uOne Mic.  
USomaqhuzu ungomnye kwisithoba seemvumi zohlobo lomculo weRap ezisuka mbombo zone zoMzantsi Afrika ezityunjwe ukuba zithathe inxaxheba kule nkqubo kamabonakude.  
Le mvumi ithi ichulumancile zezi ndaba.  
“Ndivuya gqithi kukutyunjwa njengomthathi-nxaxheba kule nkqubo, phakathi kwamawaka ngamawaka eemvumi ezithe zafaka izicelo zokungenela,” utshilo.  
“Kaloku ndisoloko ndikhangela iindlela ezahlukileyo zokubeka umculo wam, nesiXhosa sakuthi emanqwanqweni,” yoleke ngelo lemvumi.  
USomaqhuzu uthi wohlukile kwabanye abathathi-nxaxheba abakolu khuphiswano.  
“Ziintlanzi elwandle iimvumi ezithetha isiXhosa kodwa zenze umculo weRap ngesiLungu. Mna, ndithetha isiXhosa kwaye ndenza umculo weRap ngesiXhosa. Nto leyo inqongopheleyo kwezi ntsuku,” utshilo.  
Le mvumi neyaqala ukwenza umculo ine13 leminyaka, inecwecwe elineengoma ezisi-7, elithi Andikalibali.  
“Umculo wam awunamposiso. Ubalisa amabali am okusokola ukungena emculweni, uneliso nelizwi kwimmo yentlalo, unenkuthazo kwaye zonke ezo zinto ndizivakalisa ngolwimi lwam lweenkobe.”  
Uthi “Umculo luthando lwam lokuqala. Kwaye andiziboni ndisenza enye into ngaphandle kwawo.” 
 Isizini yesibini yale nkqubo kamabonakude iOne Mic, apho aza kuvela khona uMikkie Somaqhuzu, iza kulandela emveni kwempinda yesizini yokuqala nedlalayo sithetha nje kuSABC 1 ngentsimbi yesithandathu emalanga, rhoqo ngoLwesine.  
Le sizini iqale ngomhla we19 kweyeKhala.
title: Ikhuphisana kumabonakude imvumi yaseMthatha

text:
Ngokuya kuhamba ixesha kwindebe yehlabathi ka-2018, uNeymar uluthathela kuye uxanduva lokuqinisekisa ukuba ilizwe lakhe lifumana impumelelo. Kumdlalo equthise kuwo iMexico ngo’2-0 omhle eSamara Stadium – uNeymar ubhakuzelise umnatha kumzuzu wesihlanu kwisigaba sesibini somdlalo. Ekungeneni kukaRoberto Firmino, kwakhona ibe nguNeymar odale ithuba lokufaka igowuli emdlalweni. UWillian yenye wamadoda aseBrazil adlale umdlalo oncomekayo kumdlalo wanamhlanje nakubeni umdlali wosuku kuthiwe nguNeymar. Ukubethwa kweMexico akwenzekanga ngaphandle kokuzama – kodwa iBrazil ibonisile kwakhona kwindebe yehlabathi ukuba akululanga ukufakwa kwamagowuli kuyo ngokuthintela abadlali beMexico ekungekho nto abangayizamanga kwizigaba zozibini zomdlalo. Ngoku iBrazil idlulela kumjikelo olandelayo oyisondeza kweyona njongo yokudibana kwamazwe ehlabathi eRussia – ukuphakamisa indebe yehlabathi ngomhla wokugqibela. 
      
Isigaba sokuqala sinike umdla kakhulu. Abadlali beMexico baquqe bebuyelela okwezulu laseMthatha kumhlaba weBrazil oyinozi kwimizuzu yokuqala yomdlalo. Kube nzima kekambe ukugqobhoza kubadlali beBrazil abalishica emva – kodwa iMexico ikwazile ukufumana iikona ezibalekayo noxa ingakwazanga ukuzisebenzisa kakuhle. UNeymar – eyona ndoda ijongwe kakhulu kwimidlalo yehlabathi – ngelo xesha ibingabonakali. Kuthe xa imizuzu ileqa amashumi amabini, yaswabuluka iBrazil. UNeymar, uCountinho neGabriel Jesus bayihlasele macala iMexoco – kodwa iinzame zabo azizanga nanto. Ilizwe elikwazileyo ukudala amathuba acacileyo emdlalweni ibe yiBrazil. Zibe khona iintlantsi ezithembisayo emdlalweni – kodwa kude kwaphela ixesha kwisigaba sokuqala kungekho lizwe elikwazileyo ukubhalisa ebhodini nangona umdlalo ubulawulwa yiBrazil. 
UNeymar uyibeke phambili iBrazil emva kokufumana ibhola egotywe enxele nguWillian. Ihlasele kwade kwakabini emva kwegowuli iMexico kubonakala nyhani ukuba izimisele ukufumana igowuli lokulinganisa. UHector Herrera yenye yamadoda kwiMexico ebisilwa ngamandla neBrazil ebeseyithande ukuba horho kwisigaba sesibini. UPaulinho ukhabe imbumbulu yebhola ebanjwe ngunozinti weMexico, uGuillermo Ochoa, ebengunozala weebhola ebezihlanganisa yiBrazil kwilinge layo lokufumana igowuli lesibini. UCarlos Vela ukhabe ibhola ekude ebethwe lula ngunozinti weBrazil okungekho nto ingako ayenzileyo kwisigaba sokuqala. Kubekho ukuphucuka kumdlalo weMexico kwisigaba sesibini. Abadlali abafana noHugo Ayala, uHirving Lozano noCarlos Salcedo azamile ukulwa kakhulu – into ebiwabetha kukungakwazi ukudibanisa kakuhle iibhola xa engene kumhlaba kanozinti. 
                                    
Umqeqeshi weBrazil, uTite, ufake uRoberto Firmino endaweni kaCountinho. Akuphelanga nemizuzu emibini uFerminho ubeke ibhola emnatheni ayigqibezele ibekwe kakuhle phambi kwakhe nguNeymar obethe amadoda ekunxele. Ukubethwa kweMexico kuthetha ukuthi iyagoduka – yona iBrazil ifumana ithuba lokuya kumjikelo olandelayo wendebe yehlabathi ebanjelwe eRussia. 
Brazil: Alisson, Filipe Luis, Miranda, Thiago Silva, Fagner, Neymar, Casemiro, Philippe Countinho, Paulinho, Willian, Gabriel Jesus. 
Mexico: Guillermo Ochoa, Jesus Gallardo, Carlos Salcedo, Hugo Ayala, Edson Alvarez, Andres Guardado, Rafael Marquez, Hector Herrera, Hirving Lozano, Javier Hernandez, Carlos Vela.
title: IBrazil idlulele phambili emva kokuquthisa iMexico

text:
Mhla ubawo uBenson Rubusana wabhala waze wapapasha incwadi yakhe eyimbalasane ethi “Zemk’iinkomo magwalandini,” eyibhala kwinkulungwane egqithileyo kulaa mnyaka ka1906, kwakumele ukuba ifundisisiswe ngumzi ontsundu.  
Isizathu sokuba ndithi kwakumele ookhokho nemilowo yakowethu yayifundisisa le ncwadi, kukuba intsingiselo yayo xa ndiyiqwalasela mna njengesiqu, yayikukuba kumele singanikezeli lula ngoko kukokwethu, kuba ukuba senza njalo, sakuhlala sihlelelekile kwaye siphele siphila ubomi bethu sixhomekeke kwabanye abantu.  
Xa ndingena engqondweni yeli tshantliziyo lingubawo uRubusana, ndifumanisa ukuba le ncwadi wayibhala etyhilelwe umbono ngamawabo nanguQamata.  
Lo mbono wawungowokuba xa umzi ontsundu unikezele ngeenkomo zawo, nkomo ezo zibubutyebi nomfuziselo wentlutha kumzi ontsundu ngokubanzi, oku kwalatha ukuba umzi ontsundu uya kuhlala uhlelelekile.  
Ingxaki ke kukuba la mazwi obulumko kaGqirhalwazi Rubusana, awazange alandelwe okanye avisiswe, kuba umzi ontsundu awuzange uzinike thuba lokulwela okukokwako okanye awuzange uzimisele ukufuya nokulima kwakhona, kuba uninzi lwethu, alusaphili intlalo yangaphambili yokufuya nokulima, koko siphokoka sithontelana ezidolophini sihlale intlalo ekhumshileyo, intlalo enxamnye nentlupheko nentlondi. Kaloku indlala izala intlondi, ubusela nobundlobongela.  
Xa unezinto zakho, unomhlaba wakho, unemfuyo yakho, awudingi kuphanga mntu, kuba uyaziphilela awuxhomekekanga mntwini.  
Ngala mazwi mzi wakuthi ndizama ukuthi, ukuba sasiwufundile sawufumana umyalezo okumqulu kabawo uRubusana kwincwadi yakhe, ngebembalwa kuthi abathi ukuze baphile baxhomekeke kwimisebenzi abaqeshwe kuyo zezinye izizwe. 
 Nokuba siyakholwa okanye asikholwa, enye yezinto ebangela ukuba naluphi usapho lungaphumeleli lude lugqibelele, kuxa abazali bolo sapho besebenzela omnye umntu ngaphezu kokuxhomekeka kumsebenzi wezandla zabo okanye amandla abo.  
Nam njengomnye kubantu abaxhomekeke kumvuzo endiwurhola emva kokusebenzela eli ziko lemfundo ndixelenga kulo, ndiphawula ukuba umrholo owukhongozelayo uthanda ukuphelela ezandleni kunalowo uwufumana ngamandla akho kwishishini lakho okanye kolo hlobo lomsebenzi uzenzele wona.  
Umzekelo, xa uqwalasela abemi abakweli abasuka kumazwe afana neSomalia nePakistan, abo bemi abasebenzeli mntu, koko bazivulela amashishini abo axhaswa kwasithi.  
Ngenxa yala mashishini abo nokuba sele emancinci kangakanani, ezi zizwe azizange zilale zingatyanga, kwaye ngokwenza oku, ziphela zixhasa kwathina bantu baqeshwe ngabanye abantu. Neentsapho zabo zihlala zinekamva eliqaqambileyo kuba kaloku ukuphila kwazo akuxhomekekanga mntwini, kuphilwa ngeshishini eli likhoyo apha ekhaya.  
Ndiyaphinda, ngemfuyo nangokulima, besiya kuba nobutyebi obebuya kusibangela singaxhomekeki mntwini, ingxaki kuthi kukuleqa iimoto ezinamagama endaweni yokuthenga imfuyo nomhlaba.  
Konke oku, umongameli waseKenya, * -Uhuru Kenyatta ukushwankathela ngokucace gca, esaleka kumazwi awayehlala ethethwa nguyise uJomo Kenyatta, uSteve Biko, uCabral, uFannon, uLumumba noNkrumah. 
 Kwintetho yakhe yonyaka ophelileyo kwinyanga yeDwarha, umongameli Kenyatta wayala ulutsha lwaseKenya nolweAfrika iphela ngamazwi athi, “Mzi wakowethu, ukuba ngenene uyabathanda abantwana bakho, ziyilele ishishini lakho, ungaphangeleli omnye umntu.  
Xa uwushiya lo mhlaba, abantwana bakho abayi kuwuzuza njengelifa labo loo msebenzi wakho uqeshwe kuwo, kodwa ishishini oziyilele nozakhele lona bangalifumana njengelifa labo. Phofu ke, xa usifa usemsebenzini, umqeshi okanye umphathi wakho unakho ukufumana omnye umntu angene ezihlangwini zakho ungekangcwatywa nokungcwatywa.  
Ukuba usapho lwakho luhlala kwindlu oyinikwe emsebenzini, bangakhutshwa kuloo ndlu bengakhange bazilungiselele nokuzilungiselela.  
Lilonke ke mzi weAfrika, zixelele ukuba rhoqo uphuma emsebenzini, awufiki endlwini uchithe ixesha ngokubukela umabonakude, koko fika ekhaya ucinge ngendlela onokuziqalela ngayo ishishini elilelakho.” 
 Uninzi lwethu emva kokuphuma emisebenzini lugcwala kootshisanyama, lugcwala kwiindawo zentselo, sibukele oomabonakude kude kufikelele ixesha lokulala, babe abantakwethu abaphuma kumanye amazwe eAfrika nezizwe zaseNtshona besakhela abantwana babo amashishini aya kuba likamva labo lanaphakade. Kungoko umsantsa phakathi kwethu nezinye izizwe uya kuhlala umkhulu, kuba thina,  sikhetha kwaye sithanda ukuxhomekeka ngaphezu kokuzimela nokuziphilela.  
Koda kube nini sixhomekekile okanye sihlelelekile mabandla akowethu?
title: UKenyatta uchan`ucwethe!

text:
Ngokuhamba kweminyaka, iChippa United, iya ikhula kwicala labalandeli. Enye yezinto ezibangela ikwazi ukutsala abalandeli kukudlalela kwayo eMonti. I’solezwe lesiXhosa lincokole nomnye wabalandeli abatsha beli qela laseMpuma Koloni. 
Pedro Mapelo: Molo Nkosazana, unjani? 
Umlandeli: Ewe Bhuti. Ndiphilile, unjani wena? 
PM: Kuhle nakum. Nceda uzazise ngokufutshane, usisi lo ngubani? 
Umlandeli: Igama lam ndingu-Aphiwe Nombila. Ndihlala kwilali yaseXilinxa apha eNgqamakhwe. 
PM: Oh, kulungile. Gqaba-gqaba, uqale nini kanene ukuyilandela iChippa United? 
Aphiwe Nombila: Mna ndiqale ukuyilandela iChippa kulo nyaka uphelileyo. Bendithanda ukukhapha * -Ayanda Masiko – unozinti odlalela iChippa United. IChippa United ndayithanda ngenxa yakhe. Nebhola le ndide ndayilandela ngenxa yakhe, ngapha koko ndingumntu wombhoxo mna. 
PM: Kweli thutyana uyilandele ngalo, ungathi yintoni ongasoze uyilibale ngeChippa United? 
AN: Eyona nto ndiyithandileyo mna sisigqibo esathathwa ngabaphathi bayo sokusondeza imidlalo eMonti. Yinto leyo endiyincoma kakhulu. Umdlalo wayo iChippa mhle kwaye kubakho ucwangco ngaphakathi ebaleni. 
PM: Ngubani oyena mdlali umthandayo kuba kutheni? 
AN: Ikwanguye * -Ayanda Masiko. Ndingatsho ukuba ndimthanda kuba engowalapha eNgqamakhwe. UThamsanqa Sangweni ngomnye umdlali obendimthanda kakhulu.
title: ‘IChippa ndayithanda ngenxa ka-Ayanda’

text:
EBhayi: Usodolophu womasipala waseNelson Mandela, uAthol Trollip, uthi ‘amadlagusha’ angena kwilizwe laseMzantsi Afrika ngeminyaka yoo-1820 ngendlela engenasidima; abakha budlelwane obububo nabantu afika bekweli lizwe. UTrollip uthe leyo yayiyimpazamo embi nabangayiqhwabeli zandla besesi sizukulwana sawo sikhoyo namhlanje. 
Lo sodolophu ukuthethe oku ngethuba lo masipala ebambisene ne-arhente yophuculo-dolophu yale ndawo – iNelson Mandela Bay Development Agency (MBDA) – ibibambe umsitho wokusungula uhlaziyo lwesakhiwo esingukrwec’izulu esibizwa ngokuba yiCampanile; neyakhiwa ngonyaka ka-1923 njengesikhumbuzo sokukhumbula ukufika kwamasetlani kweli lizwe ngonyaka ka-1820. Lo msitho ububanjelwe phambi kwesi sakhiwo kufutshane nonxweme lwale ndawo. 
Usodolophu uthe ngaphakathi kwesi sakhiwo kukwakho namabali angembali neziganeko zalo maxesha kubandakanya nebali lokuzika kwenqanawa uMendi. 
“Siyafuna ukuqinisekisa ukuba imbali yookhokho bam ayiphindi ibe yinto ephindayo, imbali ebhalwayo ngoku mayibe yimbali ebalisekayo sisenzela isizukulwana esilandelayo,” uthethe watsho. 
UTrollip uthe ngoku esi sakhiwo sitsha sizakuba yindawo yokuhanjelwa ngumntu wonke kuquka nabahambeli bamanye amazwe, esithi sizakuba nengeniso kulutsha nabadala kuba esithi eli linge liyinxenye yeminyaka eyi-67 kaMadiba ezinikele ekukhonzeni isizwe. 
“Kuza kuqhutywa imiboniso yobugcisa, kuza kuthengiswa, iintsimbi ezikhala rhoqo ngeyure zizakwamkela iindwendwe zasemzini kuba azizokuphelela ekuvumeni umhobe wesizwe waseMzantsi Afrika kuphela kodwa nowamanye amazwe, izakuba yingxubevange yamabali eyakudala yobukoloniyali neyedemokhrasi,” utshilo. 
Oyintloko yesebe lophuhliso loqoqosho kwikomiti kasodolophu uAndrew Whitfield, uthe le ndawo iyakuxhanyulwa macala ngabasemzini nabendlu bezokufunda.
title: Isikhumbuzo: ‘Amadlagusha ayengenaso isimilo’

text:
BATHIMBA iholo likamasipala ngenkani emva kokuba basuswa kumhlaba ebabewuthimbile abo bahlala ngasemva kumawabo nabazibiza ngokuba baziG-7 okanye Gugulethu Seven Backyarders. 
Ziinyanga zine ngoku behlala kweli holo laseLuyolo Community Centre eNY 111. Bangena ngenkani mhla basuswa kumhlaba okufutshane neli holo ngomhla we22 kweyeSilimela. Kungokunje zingama60 nangaphezulu iintsapho ezihlala kweli holo ukususela ngoko. 
Basebenzisa igumbi elikhulu apho kulala abantu abaninzi kuthe saa oomandlalo. Kulapho lukhoyo uphawu lwegama labo, G-7 nolusedongeni ecaleni komabonakude omnye kuphela. 
Kukroze oomandlalo ababekwe phantsi esamenteni. Ngelixa I’solezwe lalityelele kweli holo, kwakufika ezinye iitrasi zingena eholweni. Ecaleni kweli gumbi yindawo eyayisakuba yiofisi kaceba, nayo esele ilala abantu abadala. 
Aba bahlali bathi bagqiba ekubeni bathimbe eli holo kuba babedikwe kukusoloko besuswa kumhlaba ababebeke amatyotyombe kuwo. “Besisuswa qho ngoLwezibini. Waze uceba wasibeka apha,” utsho uNtombekhaya Mamputa. 
Inkokheli yeG-7 Backyarders uPhindile Nazo, uthi yonke into ehlangene nolawulo lweholo iphantsi kwabo. “Xa kuza kucelwa ukusetyenziswa kweholo kwizinto ezifana nemingcwabo kuziwa kuthi. Sihlawulisa ngokwethu. Sithatha isixa salo mali sizithengele ukutya ze siyigcinele ukulungisa iholo eseleyo. Akukhonto imileyo apha. Ziyaqhubeka iinkonzo. Kunekhritshi ezingenela apha. Bayazilolonga abanye abantu. Zonke ezonto ziyaqhubeka,” utsho. 
Uceba wale ngingqi, nosele esebenzela kwiiofisi zaseFezeka ngoku, uBongani Ngcombolo, uthi naye wakhutshwa ngetshova. “Bayoxutha iofisi yam eyayiseLuyolo. Bayaphazamisa abo bantu, babendisebenzisa kakubi.” 
Uthi wathetha nabo wabaxelela ukuba mabasuke kulo mhlaba babewuthimbile ngoba iSebe lokuHlaliswa koLuntu luwuthengile ngeenjongo zokwakhela abantu abafana nabo. “Into abangayifuniyo ukuyiva yeyokuba kuza kuhanjwa ngoluhlu xa kuhlaliswa abantu. Bafuna kuqalwe ngabo kuba sebewuthimbile umhlaba lo kuza kwakhiwa kuwo. Kanti ayihambi njalo,” utsho. 
UMamputa uthi kodwa akumnandanga ukuhlala eholweni kufana nje nokuhlala enkampini, ntonje babethwa yimeko yabo yokungabi nandawo. “Kuyabanda apha. Sihlala nabantwana. Akukho ntlonipho apha. Abanye basinkqonkqozela ngo3 ekuseni. Sihleli ke ngoba asinakwenza ngakumbi. 
UNazo uthi obunye ubunzima kukuba abaphangeli uninzi lwabo. “Siyankazatha ukuze sitye.”
title: Bathimbe iholo likamasipala eGugulethu

text:
INKULUBAPHATHISWA uOscar Mabuyane ulumkise abafundi esithi esikolweni mabayele ukuya kufunda ukuze bancedise ekwakhiweni kwesizwe, hayi ukuya kwenza izinto ezigwenxa. 
Ebethetha eXolilizwe SSS eNqadu kuGatyana ngoLwesithathu ngethuba etyelele kwesi sikolo ukuya kukhuthaza abafundi. 
IXolilizwe SSS yenze imbali okokuqala, apho omnye wabafundi bayo, uSimamkele Bhongo ethe wangomnye wabagqwesileyo kwiziphumo zikaGrade 12 nyakenye. UBhongo ungoyena mfundi othe wagqwesa elizweni nasephondweni phantsi kwebakala lezikolo eziphuma kwiindawo ezihlelelekileyo. 
UMabuyane uthe: “Ndifuna abantu bale ndawo, basikhathalele esi sikolo kuba siza kuqhubela phambili xa benze njalo. Masiqinisekise ukuba le nto intle apha eXolilizwe SSS ayipheleli sithubeni. Umdla wam kukubona esi sikolo sinendawo yokuhlala abantwana (boarding school).” 
UMabuyane uthi isikolo yindawo yokuxonkxwa kwekamva lesizwe.  “Sele kuthanda ukuba kubekho izinto esizivayo ngezikolo, apho abantu xa bedinga into yokwenza bayodlalela esikolweni. Isikolo yindawo apho sibumba khona umntu.” 
“Sicela abantu bakuthi bayihloniphe into edibene nesikolo,” kutsho uMabuyane. 
“Sikhuseleni esi sikolo, singaqhekezwa. Abantu abaqhekeza isikolo ngabantwana benu okanye abantu abasuka apha ekuhlaleni. Isikolo mayingabiyondawo yokuphambanela. Umntu ofuna ukwenza izinto ezigwenxa ezinjengeziyobisi, makangezi esikolweni. Isikolo likamva lelizwe.” 
Inqununu yaseXolilizwe SSS, uSizo Butshingi, ufike ngo2019 kwesi sikolo. “Ngelo xesha, esi sikolo sasithatyathwa njengesasingasebenzi ngendlela eyiyo. Ukufika kwam esi sikolo sasizuze u25% kwiziphumo ka2018. Ngo2019, ukufika kwam, sazuza u80.5%, ze kunyaka ophelileyo sazuza u82.4%.” 
Kubafundi abalikhulu elinesithathu abaphumelele uGrade 12 nyakenye, iXolilizwe izuze ukuphumelela emagqabini (distinctions) ngokulikhulu elinesixhenxe. Ngaphandle nje koBhongo, abanye abafundi ababini besi sikolo bebephumelele emagqabini kuGrade 12 wanyakenye ze bawongwa liphondo.
title: Mabuyane: ‘Isikolo ayondawo yokuphambanela!’

text:
Njengokuba abalandeli bebhola belungiselela ukubukela imidlalo yamazwe aza kube edlala kwitumente yehlabathi yalo nyaka, yena umqeqeshi weSuperSport United akayolelwanga konke konke yilo nto. UGavin Hunt ukholelwa kwelukuba amaqela amaninzi aya kusokola xa kubuya imidlalo yeDStv Premiership ekukekeleni kwenyanga yoMnga. Imidlalo yeDStv Premiership igqibelisile kwiveki epheliphelileyo ngenxa yetumente yehlabathi eza kuqala ngomhla wamashumi amabini kule nyanga kude kube ngumhla weshumi elinesibhozo kwinyanga ezayo eQatar. UMzantsi Afrika awukwazanga ukuzibekela indawo kumdliva wemidlalo yeFIFA njengeminye iminyaka egqithileyo. 
Nangona kunjalo, iPSL iyivale kwangoko eyayo imidlalo nakubeni inguRichard Ofori weGhana kuphela ophuma kwiDStv Premiership oza kuya kwitumente yehlabathi. Kwimpelaveki egqithileyo, iSuperSport United ibambene neSwallows FC ngegowuli elinye macala emdlalweni obuseLucas Moripe Stadium. Ethetha emva komdlalo, uHunt uthe: “Kwisizini nganye, abakhona amahlandenyuka. Sikhe satsala nzima nathi – kodwa sikwazile ukuphumelela imidlalo emithandathu kwesixhenxe esiyidlalileyo.” Ushiyeke ephoxekile uHunt ngoba amanqaku amathathu ebeza kulibeka endaweni entle iqela lakhe elihleli kwindawo yesithathu kwiDStv Premiership emva kweRichards Bay ekwindawo yesibini emva kweSundowns ebethwa ngumoya phezulu. 
“Zindiphoxile iziphumo zomdlalo ngoba ubulawulwa sithi. Kodwa nangona kunjalo, umdlalo wethu khange udibane kakuhle. Ukungadlali kwethu ixesha elide kuye kwabonakala. Kusekho elinye ikhefu, siza kuphinda siqale futhi (emva kwetumente yehlabathi,” utshilo uHunt ofike ekuqaleni kwesizini. Emidlalweni elishumi elinambini, iSuperSport United iphumelele emithandathu. Kwelinye icala, uKaitano Tembe, ogxothwe yiSuperSport kwisizini egqithileyo, ukhonjwe emnyango yiSekhukhune United ngenxa yeziphumo ezingancumisiyo. Uyishiya ikwindawo yeshumi elinesihlanu entla kweMaritzburg United eceba ukugxotha uJohn Maduka ngenxa yeziphumo ezibi.
title: UGavin Hunt akayolelwanga likhefu lendebe yehlabathi

text:
BEKUSAKHALA ibhungane kumagumbi okufundela kwizikolo ezikwiilokishi ezikumantla esixeko saseBhayi izolo.  
Oko kulandela uqhankqalazo lwabazali babantwana kulo mmandla bekhalazela ukunqongophala kootitshala. Kwintlanganiso ebingoLwesibini phakathi kweenqununu zezikolo, amaqumrhu alawula izikolo nomphathiswa wesebe lezemfundo eMpuma Koloni, uMandla Makupula, kuvunyelwene ukuba abafundi mababuyele ezikolweni namhlanje.  
Ootitshala kwizikolo ezikulo mmandla bagxeke isebe lezemfundo ngokurhuqa izithende ekufezekiseni iimfuno zazo eziquka ukuvalwa kwezithuba zengqesho yootityshala, ukunikwa ingqesho esisigxina kootitshala abafundisa iintsana kuGrade R, ngaphambi ziqale imfundo eyiyo, ukulungiswa kwamagumbi okufundela kwakunye neeyadi zesikolo, ukuqeshwa koonogada, nokuhlawulwa kwabasebenzi kwezi zikolo. 
Aba titshala bathe, olu qhankqalazo alunanto yakwenza nemfundo nje kuphela koko nentswela-ngqesho kubemi bale ndawo abadinga into yokwenza inegalelo kule ntshukumo. Noxa kunjalo bathi isebe malinyuse umbhinqo lihlangabezane neengxaki zezikolo kulo mmandla.  
Inqununu yesikolo samabanga aphantsi iMissionvale, uSelwyn Raubenheimer uthe, “Kuthatha iminyaka phambi kokuba isebe lezemfundo lenze lo nto ifunwa zizikolo zethu. Ingxaki yezi zikolo kukuba ziku-Section 20, azinikwa mali sabelo, kufuneka ziyokhongozela kwisebe kuqala phambi kokuba zifumane imali yokwenza loo nto ifunekayo.” 
 Inqununu yesinye sezikolo esikwakulo mmandla, uCharles Adams, kwisikolo samabanga aphantsi iRepubliek Primary uthe ibifudula inguye yedwa ititshala ekwisikhundla esiphezulu kule minyaka idlulileyo.  
Oka-Adams uthe, “Ndizokunyusela ootitshala abathathu kuvele izithuba zabanye ootitshala abathathu, kufuneka ibe lisebe eliza kupapasha ezi zithuba.” Omnye wootitshala kwakwesi sikolo uthe, bekungekho sekela-nqununu kwiminyaka emithathu edlulileyo, kungekho titshala uyiNtloko (HOD) kwiminyaka emine.  
URaubenheimer uthe iminyaka ihambile bedinga abantu bokucoca isikolo kodwa ukuvalelwa kwabantwana akusosisombululo. “Singafundisa sibe sisilwa kwelinye icala, zininzi iindlela zokudlulisa umyalezo ungadanga watshisa amavili,” utshilo oka Raubenheimer.
title: Ootitshala baseBhayi bagxeka isebe

text:
Nangona imbaleki yaseTsomo iqale ukubaleka kwisithuba seminyaka emihlanu egqithileyo kodwa isazimisele ukuya phambili.  
UMcoseleli Luyaba, 38, ngumntu ongazange wazibona eyimbaleki yemidyarho emikhulu esakhula kwilali yakwaLuthuli, izinto zaguquka ngenye imini awaboniswa ngayo elinye icala lobomi ngumququzeleli nentshatsheli yophuhliso lwezemidlalo eTsomo, uNomakhwezi Manqaba.  
“Ndikuqale ukubaleka kwiTsomo Race Marathon eququzelelwa ngusisi Nomakhwezi Mkunyana Manqaba.  
Nguye owandibona kwihotele yaseTsomo ndizonwabele. 
Wandijonga emva koko wandichonga kuloo nginginya yabantu ukuze ndithathe inxaxheba kwiTsomo Race ejongene nophuhliso lwetalente yabantu abatsha,” utshilo uLuyaba. 
Kwiminyaka emine egqithileyo, uLuyaba, obalekela iqela ekuthiwa yiBalekani Athletics Club, wenze inkqubela engummangaliso kwaye ukhuphisene namadoda aziwayo kwihlabathi kwimidyarho yeembaleki emikhulu eMzantsi Afrika.  
“Ndiqale ukubaleka kuyo iTsomo Race ngo2015 emva kokukhuthazwa ngusisi uNomakhwezi.  
Zange ke ndiphinde ndime emva koko kwaye sele ndibaleke imidyarho equka iChris Hani Marathon, iHeroes Marathon, iCheetahs Challenge Marathon, iElliot Madeira Marathon, iNelson Mandela Marathon, iTwo Oceans, iUltra Marathon neBonkolo Marathon,” utshilo uLuyaba, uthe uyakuthanda ukuba yimbaleki ngoba yinto eqoqosha isimilo somntu, emohlukanisa nezinto ezimbi imenze umntu ongumzekelo ekuhlaleni. 
ULuyaba unyamezele ngoba iimbaleki zaseMpuma Koloni azixhaswa kwaye ezinye sezifudukele kwezinye iindawo. “Into embi eMpuma Koloni kukunqaba kwenkxaso. Lo nto yenza iimbaleki zifudukele kwamanye amaphondo ngelizama ukufumana amadlelo aluhlaza. Ziye zancama ezinye iimbaleki ngenxa yokunqaba kwenkxaso. Eyona nto endiyinqwenelayo kukubakho kwenkqubo yophuhliso ezilalini. Ilele italente ezilalini nasezikolweni. Umzekelo, abantwana abakumaziko ophuhliso kwiindawo ezaziwayo njengeTuks Academy, basuka ezilalini,” utshilo uLuyaba.
title: ‘Ziyafuduka iimbaleki ngoba akukho nkxaso’

text:
ILeicester City iwongwe nje- ngeentshatsheli zaseNgilane ngokuhlwa ngoMvulo, emva kokuba iTottenham Hotspurs ingakwazanga ukubetha iChelsea, eStamford Bridge. 
ISpurs bekufuneka siphumelele ukuze ikwazi ukubambelela kugqatso lweBarclays Premier League, isithuba esingageveki. Igowuli elifakwe ngu-Eden Hazard sele liphelile ixesha lilo elincede iChelsea ukuba ibambane neTottenham ngamanqaku amabini macala. Iphupha likaClaudio Ranieri lide lafezeka njengokuba iLeicester ibambe indebe yePremier League okokuqala, oko lasekwayo eli qela. 
Izinto zikhe zabonakala ngathi zingayinzimela iLeicester, kuba bekuza- kufuneka ibethe i-Everton ngempelaveki ukuba ibiphumelele iSpurs. Ifolosi yeSpurs uHarry Kane uye walibeka phambili iqela lakhe ngomzuzu wamashumi amathathu enesihlanu. Eli gowuli limbeke endaweni entle uKane kuba uzakufunama iwonga lokuba ngoyena mdlali unamagowuli amaninzi.
title: ILeicester ziintshatsheli zeEnglish Premier League

text:
UZolani ‘Last Born’ Tete yintshatsheli yehlabathi evunyiweyo yeWBO bantamweight!  
Ekugalelekeni kwakhe eGoli kuye kwabonakala ukuba kufika intshatsheli, kube njalo naseMonti – apho ebelindwe zizihlwele zabalandeli ebezivuma iingoma ezivuyisana naye. 
 UTete, 29, umangalise ihlabathi lonke kwiveki ephelileyo ngethuba ebethe uSiboniso Gonya kungaphelanga nomzuzu lo mnye eBelfast, eNorthern Ireland. 
Ukuphumelela kukaTete yinto enkulu kweli lizwe – kodwa kukho inkxalabo yokungafumani mntu azakulwa naye.  
La qhwanya amenze eBelfast, kunokwenzeka azenze nzima ngakumbi izinto xa abaphathi bakhe bezama ukuthetha namadoda afanele ukulwa naye kwilixa elizayo.  
Nangona kunjalo likhona ithemba; abaphathi bakhe uTete bakhangela imbethi manqindi anokulwa nayo phambi kwePasika yonyaka ozayo. ULast Born ugaleleke eMonti exhagwe ngabaphathi bakhe nomphathiswa wezemidlalo nolonwabo kweli phondo – uPemmy Majodina.  
“Kuhle ukuba sekhaya. Ndibulela wonke umntu ozokundamkela apha,” utshilo uTete emva kokugaleleka eMonti. 
“Phambi komlo kuninzi kakhulu esikwenzileyo, namhlanje sibuye noloyiso. Yimbali le yenzeke kula mlo, andiqondi ukuba ukhona umntu oyakuyenza la nto kwakhona – nguLast born kuphela. Besingalindelanga ukuba umlo ungaphela kwangoko ngaleya indlela nangona besisazi ukuba ngeke uthathe ixesha elide. Mna bendijonge ukuwuqoshelisa umlo kwimijikelo emine,” utshilo uTete. 
Ukuvuya kwakhe eBelfast kuye kwanyanzeleka akubambe okomzuzwana uTete ngoba uGonya ebecinyelwe zizibane emva kokubethwa ngela nqindi linye.  
“Ndiye ndanexhala ndakumbona ukuba ufe isiqaqa. Bendingenayo injongo yokwenza into embi kuye,” uvale ngalo mazwi uTete. 
Umthelekisi kaTete ogama linguFrank Warren kucingeleka ukuba angamthelekisa nembethi manqindi eyaziwayo ekuthiwa nguLuis Nery. “Yenye yeembethi manqindi ezinomahluko kwezinye,” utshilo uWarren ethetha ngoNery.
title: Angasokola ukufumana imilo uZolani Tete!

text:
Naphi na apho sihamba khona, singqongwe yindalo. Indalo ke iyakwazi ukwenza ekuthandayo, ngexesha layo, futhi ayibhungisi mntwini.  
Kutshanje sikhe sabona kumaphondo afana neKwaZulu Natal okanye iRhawuti, kusina ngamandla imvula, nto leyo ekhokelele ekukhukulisweni kwemoto nezindlu. Inga iintsapho ezithe zachaphazeleka koku, ingakumbi abo bathe baswelekelwa zizihlobo zabo, bangafumana ukuthuthuzeleka kwanoncedo olukhawulezileyo.  
Noxa nje ezimvula zifike zatshabalalisa, lona ithontsi – okanye izandyondyo buqu – yinto ebekudala siyifuna. Imilambo namadami ebethe kroqo kukoma.  
Ooamasipala abaliqela bebesele beqalisile ukukhupha izibhengezo becela uluntu ukuba longe amanzi. Kwimimandla efana neGcuwa naseMonti, bekusele kunzima kumadami. EGcuwa bekukhe kudlule neeveki ezimbini kungekho nala wosela.  
Yonke ke le nto, ibuyela kumahlwempu – iimpula zikalujaca – kuba zizo eziye zichaphazeleke xa kungekho manzi. Kodwa ke naku okubalulekileyo: Siyikhathalela kangakanani indalo yethu? Ngubani okhe azidine athi nangona nje ebona kukho inkunkuma endaweni aqonde ukuba loo plastiki okanye elophepha aliphetheyo uyakulilahla xa efumene umgqomo olungiselwe oko?  
Kuba kaloku xa imvula isina ngendlela egqithisileyo, njengoko sibonile KwaZulu Natal naseRhawutini, lo nto ithetha ukuba kukho okugwenxa ngemozulu yethu.  
Ukutshintsha kwemozulu kubangelwa lungcoliseko lwendalo. Asinto abantu abavame ukuyisela so le yokukhathalela indalo, kodwa ezi mpuphuma zigqithisileyo ziyasixelela ukuba kufuneka sitshintshe kwindlela esenza ngayo izinto.  
Le ngxaki ayikho kuluntu kuphela, noomasipala banobubhutyubhutyu bokungakwazi ukulawula indalo.  
Ufike ngakwisakhiwo sikamasipala kuvuza amanzi emibhobheni kodwa lo masipala uxakekile ekhuthaza abantu ukuba bonge amanzi.  
Ngokomzekelo kumasipala waseMnquma eGcuwa, abahlali bale ndawo bathi idami lalapha ligcwala msinya, liphinde litshe msinya, kuba lingcolile. Bathi xa linokugutyulwa, amanzi angahlala ixesha elide.
title: Siyikhathalele kangakani indalo yethu?

text:
Iqela laseMpuma Koloni, iChippa United, liza kujamelana nowona mdlalo onzima ngempelaveki xa ligagana neKaizer Chiefs.  
Ngentsimbi yesithandathu ngongcwalazi ngoMgqibelo, iChippa iza kuzama indlela yokufumana amanqaku apheleleyo xa idibana neChiefs kumdlalo wePSL oza kube useMoses Mabhida Stadium.  
Akukho mathandabuzo, umdlalo uza kutak’iintlantsi ngoba amaqela omabini athanda ibhola ehamba phantsi.  
Ngaphezulu koko, umdlalo ophakathi kweChiefs neChippa usoloko ushiya iinkumbulo ezingalibalekileyo ezingqondweni zabalandeli bebhola.  
IChippa iya emdlalweni iqhwalela emva kokubethwa kwimidlalo yePSL emibini yiHighlands Park neMamelodi Sundowns. Umqeqeshi wayo, uEric Tinkler, ukhale ngokungabi bukhali kwabadlali bakhe phambi kweepali – kodwa watsho esithi yinto aza kuthi agxile kuyo. 
Nawo Amakhosi aya eThekwini efungele impumelelo emva kokubethwa kabuhlungu yiOrlando Pirates ngo’2-1 kumdlalo obuseFNB Stadium kutshanje.  
I’solezwe lesiXhosa lincokole noKapteni weChippa United, uMark Mayambela, othe iqela lakhe liza kulwela amanqaku amathathu emva kokuphulukana nemidlalo emibini ilandelelana phambi komdlalo wangempelaveki.  
“Ubaluleke kakhulu umdlalo ophakathi kwethu neChiefs,” utshilo uMayambela.  
“Siyazama ngako konke ukulungiselela umdlalo. Injongo yethu kukufumana iziphumo ezincumisayo emdlalweni ngoba asiqhubanga kakuhle kwimidlalo egqithileyo. Sibethwe kwimidlalo emibini ilandelelana. Lo nto ibonisa ukuba asikho kwisimo esihle kwaye asikwazi ukukhetha imidlalo ngoku. Ubaluleke kakhulu umdlalo esiya kuwo ngoba kufuneka sifumane amanqaku kuwo. 
UTinkler unomsebenzi onzima wokufunqula ukuzithemba kwabadlali phambi kokudibana neChiefs.  
Nakubeni ebengadlalanga kumdlalo obuphakathi kweChippa neSundowns emva kokuxabana nomqeqeshi – uMayambela uthi ayikho enye indlela ngaphandle kokubhityela ebhulukhweni.  
“Umoya wabadlali uphantsi emva kokubethwa yiMamelodi Sundowns – kodwa ke kunyanzelekile  ukuba siyiphose ngasemva lo nto. Imidlalo yePSL ifana nohambo olude; ngoko ke ndingatsho ukuba sijonge ngamehlo abomvu imidlalo ezayo. Ayisonwabisanga indawo elikuyo iqela. Sizimisele ukusebenza nzima ukuze sikwazi ukufumana iziphumo eziphucukileyo sikwazi ukusuka kwindawo esikuyo,” utshilo uMayambela. 
Imidlalo yePSL: 
NgoLwesihlanu: Maritzburg United vs Highlands Park @Harry Gwala, 20:00 
NgoMgqibelo: Golden Arrows vs Baroka FC @Princess Magogo Stadium, 15:30; Kaizer Chiefs vs Chippa United @Moses Mabhida Stadium, 18:00; Bidvest Wits vs Bloemfontein Celtic @Bidvest Stadium, 20:15; Free State Stars vs SuperSport United @Goble Park Stadium, 20:15 
NgeCawe: Cape Town City vs Black Leopards @Cape Town City, 15:30; AmaZulu FC vs Polokwane City @King Zwelithini Stadium, 20:15
title: ‘Ayisonwabisanga indawo elikuyo iqela’

text:
UKhulile Mbobela, 27, uza kuchitha ubomi bakhe entolongweni ngenxa yezenzo zakhe ezigwenxa zokuxhaphaza abantu ababhinqileyo ezifana nokuqweqwedisa kwanokudlwengula. 
UMbobela ugwetywe ngoLwesibini kule veki emva kokufunyanwa yinkundla yamatyala aseGqeberha kwiveki ephelileyo enetyala lokudlwengula abantwana abangamantombazana abaphakathi kweminyaka eli-19 kwakunye nama22. 
Ngokwengxelo, uMbobela amaxhoba akhe ebeye awagrogrise ngemela. Ingxelo iqhuba ithi wadibana nezi ntwazana zimbini  zizihambela wazinyanzela ekubeni zihambe naye, wabe ezikhombe ngemela besiya ethafeni. Waqala ngokufuna imali kwezi ntwazana, zakungabi namali wazidlwengula. 
UMbobela wakwenza oku ngonyaka ka2020. Wabanjwa ngomhla wesihlanu kwinyanga yoKwindla kwaku2020. Wabanjwa ngamapolisa ze wakhutshwa ngebheyile yeR2000. Kwiveki ephelileyo ngoLwesihlanu uye wabuyela enkundleni eGqeberha nalapho iye yamfumana enetyala lokuxhwila, ukudlwengula kwanokuzama ukuphanga. NgoLwesibini kule veki uye wanikwa isigwebo sobom. 
UMkomishinala wePhondo uNjengele Nomthetheleli Mene usamkele esi sigwebo. 
“Abantu ababhinqileyo bonzakele, bedlwengulwa bekwabulawa ngabantu ababaziyo kwaye nababathembayo, kwangabantu abangabaziyo abafuna ukuzivavanya kwanokubalawula. Izigwebo ezinje zithumela umyalezo oluqilima kwabanye babenzi bobubi bokuba amapolisa kwakunye neGunyabantu lezoTshutshiso (NPA) bazimisele kumsebenzi wabo wokulwa uxhatshazo kwabasetyhini,” utshilo uMene. 
UMene ukwaqhwabele izandla nabecuphi betyala.
title: Ubethwe izihlandlo ezintathu zobomi esejele!

text:
Abaphathi beChippa United babonisile ukuba bazimisele ukulungisa iimpazamo zabo ngokuthi batyikitye iziqwayi zabadlali phambi kwesizini entsha.  
IiChilli Boys zibhengeze abadlali abatsha abaquka uBrighton Mhlongo, uJames Okwuosa, uMahlatse Makudubela – bonke basuka kwi-Orlando Pirates. Kubekho noMark Mayambela osuka kwi-Ajax Cape Town. Nangona bekukho ukungacaci ngoMhlongo – kodwa ikhawuleze yalungiswa lo nto. 
Kuye kwacaca gca ukuba lo nozinti uzakusokola kwicala lokufumana imidlalo kwiBucs emva kokuchwethelwa ecaleni kwakhe ngumqeqeshi nasemva kokufika kukaWayne Sandilands kwiveki ephelileyo. 
UMayambela ubuyela eBhayi emva kokudlalela i-Ajax kwisizini ephelileyo. Wemka kwiChippa ngo-2016 emva kokuthengwa yiSuperSport United – kodwa ngelishwa lakhe izinto zange zimhambele kakuhle phantsi kukaStuart Baxter.  
Lo mdlali utyikitye isivumelwano seminyaka emithathu kwiChippa. 
Konke oku kungqinwe ngusihlalo weChippa United, uSiviwe Mpengesi, kwincoko ayenze kunomathotholo waseGoli kule veki. 
 Injongo yeqela lakhe kukulungisa iimpazamo ezenzeke kwisizini egqithileyo nokuqinisekiswa ukuba iChippa United idlala umdlalo wayo othandwayo ngabantu nokubethelela indawo yayo phakathi kwamaqela aphambili kwiPSL.  
“Sivumelene ngabadlali abathathu nePirates. Abobadlali nguMhlongo, uJames Okwuosa noMahlatse Makudubela. Sikuxolisele ukuthiwa pahaa kwezinto kungalandelwanga indlela efanelekileyo ngaphandle efanelekileyo. Ndithethile noMhlongo, sevana ngayo yonke into – kugqityiwe ngoku,” utshilo uMpengesi. 
Bobane ababadlali ngoku baziqeqesha neChippa kwinkampu eseThekwini. Bafikela kuKurt Lentjies otyikitywe kwinyanga ephelileyo.  
Izakhono nokusebenza ngokuzimisela kwaba badlali ebafumeneyo iChippa akuthandabuzeki futhi bazakuwenza umahluko emva kokusinda ezembeni kwisizini edlulileyo. 
 UThamsanqa Sangweni, uDavid Zulu, uLinda Shiba ngabanye babadlali abamkileyo kwiChippa.
title: Ifumene iziqwayi zabadlali iChippa

text:
Mongameli Ramaphosa, siyavuyisana nawe ekusekweni korhulumente wethu omtsha sikwavuyisana nawe Mphathiswa Motshega ngokuchongwa kwakhona. 
Sikunye nabantu boMzantsi Afrika, thina bebua-lit collective kunye nesininzi soogxa bethu kumsebenzi wezemfundo, siphila nethemba elihlaziyekileyo lokuba urhulumente uza kuwuhlonela umyalelo wawo wokulungisa inkqubo enzulu yokungalinganwa esagqubayo kwixesha elide wadlulayo owama1994. 
Sibalulekile isithembiso seenzame ezihlaziyekileyo zokudala imisebenzi, sikwabalulekile nesithembiso sokuxhasa iinkalo ezingundoqo zemfundo esisiseko azibophelele ngaso uMongameli Ramaphosa. Kwintetho kamongameli yokuvulwa kwepalamente, iSONA, kweyoMdumba, umongameli ukhankanye ukuba urhulumente uza kutyala imali kuphuhliso lwabantwana abancinane iEarly Childhood Development (ECD), kwilitherasi esahlumayo yokufunda nokubhala nezixhobo zeeteknoloji. Siyihlabela ikhwelo le ngqwalasela. 
Nakubeni kunjalo, ukuba sifuna inkqubo yezemfundo yethu ivelise ulutsha olugqibe isikolo olunako ukumelana namabango ezomnotho wenkulungwane yama-21 nemvukelo yezorhwebo yesine, i4IR kufanelekile ke ngoko ukuba ukunikeza imfundo esemgangathweni kubantu bonke kubekelwe phambili. 
Umsebenzi wethu kumashumi eminyaka sikwinkalo yezolwimi nelitherasi kwezemfundo isikhokelele ekubeni sitsalele ingqwalasela yakho kwimiqobo yokulungisa intlekele yezemfundo esijongene nayo. 
Siqinisekile ukuba, ngaphandle kokuba inkqubo yezemfundo yoMzantsi Afrika isuke 
· kuqhelaniso lobulwiminye iguqukele kweyobulwimimbini/ninzi 
· nangaphandle kokuba ingqwalasela engaphangalelanga yokuqonda ukulesa kwibanga eliphantsi iguqukele kwimbono yelitherasi etyebileyo nephangaleleleyo, 
Asinako ukulungisa le ntsilelo yokungavelisi ulutsha oluyilungeleyo lonke nelukwayixhobeleyo imfundo ephakamileyo okanye ukungena kwimisebenzi yengqesho. 
Imfundo Lwimi-nye neLwimi-mbini/ninzi 
Ubulwimi-nye akusiso isiqhelo kumhlaba jikelele okanye eMzantsi Afrika, kodwa inkqubo yezemfundo yethu isebenza kumanqanaba onke ngokungathi kunjalo. Njengamntwana wonke osakhulayo, abantwana abathetha iilwimi zesiNtu bafika esikolweni bethwele ubutyebi bezakhono zolwimi. 
Kodwa, ngokungafaniyo nabantwana abathetha isiNgesi, obu butyebi bezakhono zolwimi abuthathelwa ngqalelo kwaye abuphuhliswa. Endaweni yoko, bubonwa njengemiqobo kwimpumelelo yabantwana ngokwemfundo. 
Abantwana abathetha iilwimi zesiNtu bafundiswa ngolwimi lwabo lwasekhaya kwiminyaka emithathu yokuqala yesikolo. Emva koko balindeleke ukuba benze inguqu ngesaquphe, yokufunda ngesiNgesi ukuqala kwiBanga lesi-4 ukuya phambili, benikwa iincwadi zesikhokelo, iimpepha zohlolo nezixhobo zokufunda ezingesiNgesi kuphela.  
Ukusukela kunyaka wesi-4, unyaka wabo wokuqala wale nguqu, basebenzisa iincwadi zesikhokelo ezinye bekwabhala nohlolo olusesikweni olunye nabantwana abathetha isiNgesi, ekukudala bantywiliselwa kwisiNgesi ukususela ekuzalweni. Le yingcinezelo engathethekiyo. 
Kungoku nje, asikho isicwangciso sokuqubula olu lindelo lungenabulungisa olugxininisa ekubeni abantwana bafunde ngesiNgesi kuphela emva kweminyaka emi-3 nje kuphela yezifundo zesingesi abazifumanayo, ezingayanga phi. 
Akufanelanga abazali nabantwana balindeleke ukuba bakhethe phakathi kokufundiswa ngolwimi lwasekhaya nesiNgesi. Kunokwenzeka, kukwangcono, ukuba ootitshala nabafundi basebenze ngezona zakhono zolwimi lwabo abaziqhelileyo kwaye bafunde isiNgesi ebudeni bexesha labo besesikolweni ukuze bazuze uhlobo lobulwimimbini nelitherasi elwimimbini ezidingekayo ukuze bazuze impumelelo. Kunokwenzeka ukuba bonke abantwana bethu bafumane imfundo esemgangathweni. 
Nakubeni kunjalo, imfundo esemgangathweni idinga uqhelaniso ngobulwimi-mbini/ninzi, nkqu nezicwangciso zokufundisa nemveliso yeencwadi ezisisikhokelo zolwimi ezinika inkxaso ngalwimi-mbini. Ngenkxaso efanelekileyo, ootitshala banako ukuzixhobisa baphuhlise iziqhelaniso zalwimi-ninzi zabo ezikhoyo ezifana notshintsha-tshintsho-lwimi, icode-switching ukuze kufundeke ngcono. 
Ukufundisa ukulesa nokubhala: 
Njengoko uMongameli Ramaphosa ephawule, uRhulumente ukuvumile ukungxamiseka kokulungisa indlela yokufundisa ilitherasi [XG1] kwizikolo zethu. Ingqwalasela nenkxaso-mali evakalayo itsoliswe kwinkqubo yokungenelela ekufundiseni ukulesa iEarly Grade Reading kumaBanga 1-3. 
Kodwa, sikholelwa ukuba isicwangciso sangokaloku nje seSebe lezeMfundo eSisiseko sokuphuhlisa izixhobo zokufundisa nokufunda ezisekelwe kuphando iEarly Grade Reading Study sifuna ukuthathelwa ingqalelo ngononophelo. 
 Esi sicwangciso siphelele kwinto enokuzuzwa ngenxa yokungenelela okujolise ekuleseni ubudlelwane phakathi kwezandi noonobumba nokufunda amagama azimeleyo netekisi ekhethelwe bucala. 
Ngokuhambisana kunye nokufundisa ngokuthe gabalala kwezicwangciso zokulesa nokuqonda, abantwana bafanele ukudityaniswa neziqhelaniso zangemihla ngemihla ezithile, ezinentsingiselo nezonwabisayo ezibanga nezibonisa iindlela zokufunda nokubhala ezahlukeneyo, ezibandakanya iitekisi ezininzi ezahlukayo. 
Abantwana bafanele ukuba nenjongo yokulesa nokubhala (engaphaya kohlolo), babenabantu abayimizekelo emihle yokulesa nokubhala, kwaye kufuneka bafunde indlela ulwimi nokuqonda ekusebenza ngokwahlukeneyo kwiintlobo zeetekisi ezahlukeneyo, umzekelo, ukwahluka kokusebenza kwebali nezikhokelo zomfuniselo wezenzululwazi. 
Kwi-4IR/ixesha lezixhobo zeteknoloji, kufanele ukuba abantwana bafunde ukulesa ngokuhlalutya qatha, bakwazi ukwahlula iindaba ezingeyonyani bekwaqaphela nokuba zezoobani iindlela ezithathelwa ingqalelo izezoobani ezikhutshelwe ecaleni. 
Enye into engathathelwa ngqalelo kwiisicwangciso seSebe lezeMSundo esiSiseko, iDBE, lulwazi lokuba ukuphuhla kwelitherasi kwenzeka phambi kokuba umntwana aqale isikolo. 
Umzekelo, ngelixa abazali abakumgangatho ophakathi wokufuma bebongwa ngokuthatha inxaxheba kwiziqhelaniso zokwabelana ngeencwadi (ezincedayo, ngokungathandabuzekiyo) nabantwana abakwizikolo zabasaqalayo/iikretshi, ubutyebi besakhono ebesithethe ngabo bokubalisa amabali akuthathelwa ngqalelo. 
Imfundo yesikolo kufanele ukuba yakhe ikongeza phezu kobutyebi beziqhelaniso zolwimi nelitherasi eziliqela zabantwana bonke, hayi abo bantetho esisiNgesi abakumgangatho ophakathi wokufuma kuphela.  
Lixesha lokuba ulwazi namava abantwana abathetha iilwimi zesiNtu abonwe njengamaqalela emfundo. Bonke abantwana badinga ukunikwa amathuba okuphuhlisa iilitherasi ezityebileyo. 
Indlela entsha yokunikeza imfundo ekudidi oluphezulu kubantwana bethu bonke ifuna inkxaso karhulumente, izikolo, amaziko emfundo aphakamileyo, abantu abaqhelekileyo, imibutho ezimeleyo engezi ngeniso iiNGO, iintsapho, abahlali kunye nabenkxaso-mali. 
VULINDLELA Mphathiswa Motshekga. 
Ityikitywe, 
Soraya Abdulatief (UCT/Bua-lit collective), Xolisa Guzula (UCT/bua-lit collective), Catherine Kell (Umphathi wesikolo sezemfundo, UCT/bua-lit collective), Glynis Lloyd (Umcebisi welitherasi ozimeleyot/bua-lit collective); Pinky Makoe, (UNISA/bua-lit collective), Carolyn McKinney (UCT /bua-lit collective), Robyn Tyler (UWC//bua-lit collective). 
Ukufumana inkcazelo ephangaleleyo ngesikumeleyo: www.bua-lit.org.za
title: Incwadi evulekileyo eya kuMongameli nakuMphathiswa

text:
Umphathiswa weZemidlalo, uNathi Mthethwa, usigxeke kabukhali isigqibo sokungarhoxiswa kweComrades Marathon ngabaququzeleli bayo. 
Intetho kaMphathiswa ixhokonkxwe sisaziso esenziwe ngabaququzeleli abathe abazu kuyirhoxisa iComrades Marathon kulonyaka kude kubekho into entsha. 
 Ngenxa yokunwenwa kwentsholongwane yecorona, uMongameli Cyril Ramaphosa uyalele abantu belizwe lonke ukuba bangazenzi iintlanganiso ezinabantu abangaphezulu kwekhulu ngelizama ukubamba ukunwenwa kwaso.  
UMzantsi Afrika sele ubhalise abantu abalikhulu elineshumi elinesibini (112) abantu abanesifo kwaye oko kunyanzele yonke imibutho inqumamise iinkqubo zayo zemidlalo.  
Abaququzeleli beComrades bakhuphe ingxelo ethi abazu kuwurhoxisa umdyarho – kodwa baza kuyibeka esweni imeko kude kube yinyanga ezayo. 
 “Ngeke umdyarho ubekho. Ibonakalisa ukungakhathali intetho eyenziwe ngabaququzeleli beComrades,” utshilo uMthethwa emva kokubamba intlanganiso nezikhulu zebhola ekhatywayo. 
IComradres Marathon ngomnye wemidyarho emikhulu futhi etsala amawakawaka eembaleki eziphuma kumazwe ase-Afrika naseYurophu. 
 Ukuqhubela phambili kwayo kusekho isifo esiyingozi njengecorona kungabeka engozini ubomi beembaleki nobabantu ngokubanzi. 
 Ekuqaleni kweveki, usihlalo weComrades Marathon Association, uCheryl Winn, uthe abaququzeleli ababone kungekho mfuneko yokuwumisa umdyarho walo nyaka.  
“Emva kweenyanga ezinthathu zonyaka, isigqeba esilawulayo sithe siza kuyibeka esweni imeko yelizwe phambi kokwenza isigqibo esifanelekileyo kwinyanga ezayo,” itshilo ingxelo ekutshwe yiCMA.  
Umongameli we-Athletics South Africa, uAleck Skhosana, ungenelele ngelithi iCMA  sobe iphinde yenze lizwi ngalomba. 
 “Phambi kwentlanganiso, ndifumene ucingo kumphathiswa esithi uva kusithiwa iCMA iza kuqhubela phambili nokuba kumnyama entla. 
 Ukusukela ngoku, iCMA sobe yenze lizwe. Iza kwenza into eyixelelwa sithi,” utshilo uSkhosana.
title: UMthethwa ubangxolisile abaququzeleli beComrades Marathon

text:
Kweli xesha likaxakeka, ingakumbi kwezepolitiki kweli laseMzantsi Afrika, thina kufuneka sime sibhale ngamagama esiXhosa kumaXhosa.  
Uhleli nje ungumntu omnyama kufuneka uhlale usoyika; usisimumu esingakwazi ukuthetha ngokupheleleyo kuba usoyika ukugxekwa ngabo bakuthi awuhloniphi xa ubiza amagama athile.  
Sihleli nje siyoyikisana. Siphinde sicinge ukuba inkululeko yinto apha esinokuze siyingcamle ngokupheleleyo singakwazi nokukhulula iilwimi ezi zethu?  
Kwalo mba wokuhlonipha ingathi siwubamba esinqeni; ukuhlonipha ayikokungabizi amagama athile, ukuhlonipha sisenzo esibonisa ukuchubeka nembeko; oko kukuthi akukho gama lisisithuko ngokunokwalo, koko ngumntu othukayo esebenzisa igama elo.  
Akuhlonitshwa gama, kuhlonitshwa abantu. Ukuba ulisebenzisela ukwenyelisa singatsho sithi awuhloniphi.  
Nababhali beli phepha kunye neengcali zesiXhosa bayavumelana nathi kwelithi “ukuhlonipha kuyahluka ngokweendawo nemizi. Xa ke ubhalela isizwe usebenzisa ulwimi lomntu wonke, hayi izihlonipho zabathile.”  
Eli phepha lifikelela kumehlo angama-322 000 qho ngeveki; kwabo bathe balifunda sifumane iincwadi ezisixhenxe kuphela ezicela kuhlonitshwe eli gama lingu “incanca.”  
Olu ikwaluphawu lokusazi isiXhosa kumaXhosa athile. Incanca, kumntwana omncinci, libele likanina ancanca kulo ubisi.  
Lime lodwa eli gama alikwazi ukuba sisithuko. Ukuba liyathuka makube kwa isiXhosa sisithuko kuba amagama aso ayathuka. Kwa eli gama liyakwazi ukubhekisa ‘kwilungu langasese lendoda’.  
Sikhethe ukuhamba neli lisetyenziswe lixhoba ubuqu igama, *  “incanca” nangona bekumele ukuba sililungise sathi “umthondo” okanye “inkanda” – noko eli lika ncanca libhekisa kubantwana, lifana neli loo “totosi”, njalo njalo.  
SisiXhosa esi, kwaye sizakusisebenzisa ngobunjalo baso ngoba sesethu. Asinazintloni ngaso. Asizijongeli phantsi. Asiphili naloyiko. UmXhosa oneentloni ngesiXhosa, uneentloni ngobuni bakhe.
title: Igama alihlonitshwa, kuhlonitshwa abantu

text:
Abadlali baMaZulu bavuye kakhulu emva kokuquthisa Amakhosi ngegowuli elinye eqandeni (1-0) emdlalweni we-Absa Premiership obubanjelwe eFNB Stadium. Nangona AmaZulu esahleli endaweni embi – kodwa impumelelo yanamhlanje iwasusile emsileni kwaye aza kuzithemba ngakumbi xa esiya emidlalweni ezayo. AmaZulu ayaqala ukubetha iKaizer Chiefs eminyakeni elishumi elinesine. Ukubethwa kweChiefs, ebethe iPirates kwiveki ephelileyo, kumdakumbisile uErnst Middendorp obezimisele kakhulu ukuphumelela umdlalo wanamhlanje. Isiqingatha sokuqala sinike umdla zisuka; omabini amaqela abonakalise ukunxanelwa impumelelo. Into abangakwazanga ukuyenza abadlali beChiefs kukusebenzisa amathuba abawafumeneyo. ULeonardo Castro uphose ithuba lokubeka iqela lakhe endaweni entle ngethuba ekhupha ecaleni ibhola ayifumene kuLebogang Manyama. Lo nto inike amandla AmaZulu aye afumana igowuli elifakwe nguBongi Ntuli kanye phambi kokuya kwixesha lokuya ekhefini. 
Ngokungabiko kukaWillard Katsande, umqeqeshi weChiefs unike uAnthony Agay ithuba lokuqala umdlalo esiswini aye wamkhupha kwisigaba sesibini somdlalo. Kuthe kwakucaca okokuba Amakhosi anzinyelwe emdlalweni, uMiddendorp ufake uKhama Billiat noBernard Parker abakwazileyo ukwenza iintshukumo. USiyabonga Mbatha uye waqinisekisa okokuba AmaZulu afumana amanqaku apheleleyo emdlalweni ngokuvala iibhola ebeziyingozi kuzo zozibini izigaba zomdlalo. Njengokuba iChiefs ilahle umdlalo ebalulekileyo sekuphela isizini, kunokwenzeka ukuba abadlali bawathathe kancinci AmaZulu kuba ebenexesha elide engasaphumeleli. Ngoku ekugqibeleni kuhleli iBlack Leopards ebethwe ngo’2-0 yiBaroka. AmaZulu akwindawo yesibini ukusuka emva. Kweminye imidlalo: iBidvest Wits ibambene ngeqanda neChippa United. IGolden Arrows ibambene nePirates ngeqanda. Kanti iMaritzburg United ibethwe iPolokwane City ngo’1-0. 
   
Chiefs: Akpeyi, Frosler, Ntiya-Ntiya, Cardoso, Mathoho, Akumu, Maluleka, Baccus, Castro, Manyama, Nurkovic. 
Amalalela: Khune, Parker, Billiat, Moleko, Kambole, Zulu, Sasman. 
AmaZulu: Mbatha, M. Gumede, Masilela, Booysen, Xoki, Sithebe, Ncube, Maduna, Magubane, Chawaphiwa, Ntuli. 
Amalalela: Boshoff, Khumalo, Gumede, Ncobeni, Shangase, Lacny, Ngubane.
title: Asukile emsileni AmaZulu emva kukuquthisa Amakhosi ebaleni lawo

text:
Igwetywe iminyaka elishumi ingaphakathi eziseleni indoda enama-55, igwetywa yinkundla ejongene namatyala olwaphulo mthetho yaseBhayi kule mpela veki. 
uJacobs Vilijoen (55) ebengumnikazi weStokvel esibizwa ngokuba yiF and J Consultants. Iingxelo zithi usiqale ngonyaka ka2006 esi Stokvel nalapho atye imali ekwizigidi ezithandathu zeerandi (R6 million).  
UViljoen ufunyenwe enetyala lobuqhophololo yile nkundla. Ukanti inkundla ikwamnike ithuba uViljoen apho ithe makabhatale imali engange R5.5 milion phambi kokuba kufike inyanga yoMsintsi nezakuthi kucuthwe iminyaka yakhe ibemihlanu azakuyihlala ngaphakathi entolongweni.
title: Ugwetyiwe orhwaphilize iimali zabantu eBhayi

text:
Abazali belali yaseQunu eMthatha bayasikhalimela isenzo esenziwe ngabantwana babo sokutshisa isikolo abafundela kuso iQunu JSS. Bathi abantwana babo bakope into embi eyenziwa ngabafundi baseVuwani eLimpopo eyokuthi xa benezikhalazo batshise izikolo.  
Oku kulandela udushe lababafundi ngentseni yangoLwesibini, beqhanqkalaza esikolweni bekroboza iifesitile zesikolo, befuna kwinqununu yabo esiqwini kuba bekhalela ukuphuma besi sikolo baye kukhekhento bekwakhalela nesohlwayo abathi basifumane xa umfundi ethe wona. Abafundi bakwakhalazela nokuthathwa kweefowuni zabo yinqununu esikolweni ngaphakathi.  
Ngokwengxelo ephuma kumhlali ongafunanga kuchazwa nobezibonele ngawenyama uthi, abafundi batshise igumbi lokuphekela bekwaxulutya ngamatye ootishala babo kuquka nenqununu leyo.  
Umzali welali uZuziwe Qhingana uthe, le meko ibaxakile ingakumbi bebancinci kangaka aba bantwana ingapha kwamandla abo le bayenzileyo. “Sele bezithathaphi ingqondo zokucinga ukutshisa isikolo bebancinci kangaka, bekungani na ukuba bebengenokuhlala phantsi bathethe ingxaki yabo kootitshala babo bangangxami kongutshisa isikolo esizakuphinda sincede kwabona kwakudlula lento bayenzayo.  
Ixhala lelokuba bayenze ngexesha elinzima ekusondele ngalo ixesha lemviwo zokuphela konyaka.” utshilo uQhingana. Ukwathi balawulwa ziziyobisi nanguSatana abantwana babo.  
Ngentsasa yayizolo abazali, namalungu ebhodi yesi sikolo kwakunye nootitshala bebevalelene kumanye amagumbi bebambe indibano ezama ukusombulula lenyewe. Inkosi yendawo uNokwanele Balizulu akakhange ayibambe ifowuni ngethuba simzama njengoko ebevaleleke kwindibanoo leyo.
title: Batshisa isikolo kuba befuna ukuya kukhenketho abafundi eQunu

text:
Kukho iqela elitsha eKapa. Lo nto ithetha ukuba ibhola ekhatywayo izakudlala abantwana kweliya leentlanzi.  
Iqela ebelifudula liyiMpumalanga Black Aces linikwe igama elitsha izolo eKapa. Ngoku yiCape Town City FC. Oku kulandela ukuthengwa kweBlack Aces ngowayexhuzula imikhala kwi-Ajax Cape Town kwiminyaka embalwa edlulileyo, uJohn Comitis.  
Lifudukele eKapa ke nanjengoko engummi wakhona. Umnini weli qela litsha laseKapa, uComitis, ubize iintatheli kwinkomfa athe wabhengeza ngokusesikweni iinkcukacha ngeqela lakhe.  
Lo kaComitis uthe injongo ephambili kwiqela lakhe kukudlala ibhola enomtsalane ukusukela kwisizini ezayo. “Sizakudlala ibhola ekhawulezayo, engumxube yebhola eqhelekileyo kwiindawo zasezilokishini nakwiindawo zabebala kwaye sizimisele ukubuyisa amaphulo ayekhuthaza ibhola ngoLweezihanu eKapa,” utshilo kwiintatheli uComitis. 
Emva kokuthiwa paha kokuthengwa kweMpumalanga Black Aces, kwabakho isiphithiphithi ngabadlali abahamba neqela nabo bangafunwayo. Lo nto yayibangelwa kukwenziwa indaba yakwamkhozi kwalo mba ngabaphathi beMpumalanga Black Aces bangaphambili. “Bonke abadlali abalapha babefunwe nguMuhsin Ertugral,” utshilo uComitis. 
Kodwa ngelishwa * -Ertugral ukreqele kwi-Orlando Pirates kwiiveki ezimbini ezidlulileyo. Lo nto ithe yamnyanzela uComitis akhangele umqeqeshi omtsha. Eli qela litsha lifumene * -Eric Tinkler okhululwe yiPirates emva kokungaqhubi kakuhle kwisizini ephelileyo.  
Bekuvakele kumajelo eendaba kwezi veki zidlulileyo ukuba iCape Town City izakuqhogana neqela elikhulu lasemangesini. “Ngaphandle kwamathandabuzo siliqela elineenjongo eziphakamileyo.  
Sithethile neqela laphesheya, iManchester City, ngenjongo yokusebenzisana nalo kodwa kuxhomekeke kulo ukuba umbono wethu bayawuthanda,” wongeze ngaloo mazwi umnikazi weli qela litsha. 
ICape Town City izakusebenzisa iCape Town Stadium njengekhaya layo. Imibala yezikipha eblowu natyheli idandalaziswe esidlangalaleni izolo.
title: UComitis ulithiye igama iqela lakhe

text:
Uza kubuyela kwakhona kwinkundla yamatyala eGcuwa kuMvulo ozayo uQiqa Mabunde onamashumi amabini anesihlanu, ojongene netyala lokuhlaba abulale ugxa wakhe ogama linguYandisa Bacela nonamashumi amabini anesibhozo ubudala. Ngokwengxelo ephuma kwiSithethi samaPolisa uKapteni Jackson Manatha, uMabunde akanikwanga ibheyile yinkundla ngoMvulo ngethuba evela.  
UManatha uthi uMabunde ebe kunye noBacela kwilokishi yaseZithulele eGcuwa ngoMgqibelo ngethuba behlabana. Unobangela wokubulalana kwabo awukaziwa, usaphandwa. 
Kusenjalo, amapolisa aseGcuwa abongoza nabani na olahlekelwe sisihlobo sakhe angasaziyo apho sikhoyo ekubeni atsalele isikhululo samapolisa aseMsobomvu.  
Oku kulandela emva kokuba kubhaqwe indoda engaziwayo sele ibhubhile, nekuqikelelwa ukuba inama44 eminyaka ubudala.  
Onolwazi angatsalela kwezi nombolo: 047 4920 180.
title: Akafumenanga bheyile obulele ugxa wakhe!

text: Ndingumhlali ePeddie kwilali yaseHamburg; sinengxaki yombane, uyakwazi ukungabikho iiveki ezimbini sifownele kwaEskom soze ufumane mpendulo akho nyani bayakwazi ukuza kodwa bangasebenzi nangoku oko bumke ngoLwesithathu 13 December asikafumani ncedo, ingaba iseyiyo na inkonzo esulungekileyo kaEskom yokusigcina ebumnyameni simoshakalelwa zizinto? – Umhlali, eHamburg
title: THUMELA EYAKHO INCWADI EYA KUMHLELI NGE-SMS okanye NGO-WHATSAPP ku 063 721 1547

text:
Kule sizini unozinti weChiefs, * -Itumeleng Khune uyavuma ukuba izinto azimhambelanga kakuhle futhi le isizini yeyona imbi kwiminyaka elishumi edlala ibhola kwi-Absa Premier Soccer League.  
Oyena nozinti othe wadlala imidlalo emininzi kwisizini ka’2015/16 nguReyaad Pieterse. Yena uKhune noBrilliant Khuzwayo baphazanyiswe kukonzakala, kodwa nasekuphileni kwakhe akhonto ingako ayenzileyo ngoba neChiefs izinto khange ziyihambele kakuhle.  
UKhune uthi, le isizini iyayogqitha le waqala ngayo u2007/08. “Ndihleli ithuba elide ngaphandle, kodwa ndibuye ngamandla, yiyo lo nto ndiyifumene indawo yam kwiBafana Bafana. Ndiyavuma le isizini yeyona ndifuna ukuyilibala msinya. Lo nozinti uchongiwe nguShakes Mashaba njengokuba elungiselela umdlalo weGambia. Amakhosi alwela indawo yesithathu adlala neChippa United ngomso eFNB Stadium ngentsimbi yesithathu emalanga.
title: Khune: Yeyona imbi le sizini kum

text:
ABAPHULAPHULI besikhululo sikanomathotholo iMetro FM, bazigobh’ amacala emva kokuba esi sikhululo sinikwe imvume yokudlala umyinge ka-50% womculo wasekhaya, no-50% womculo waphesheya kwiinkqubo zaso zangeCawa. 
 Oku kuza emva kokuba abaphulaphuli bekhalaze ngelithi, iinkqubo zangeCawa, nezidlala ubukhulu becala umculo weSoul ne-R&B, ziphulukene nomsoco emva kokuba zihlohlwe ngohlobo lomgaqo omtsha womculo ka-90%. 
 Ongumlomo we-SABC uKaizer Kganyago, uyigxininisile into yokokuba, izikhululo zohlobo lwe-commercial iMetro FM ne-5FM, azizokukhululwa kulo mthetho mtsha, esithi, esi sigqibo senziwe kuba iMetro FM, “kuba ibazi kwaye ibaqonda ngcono abaphulaphuli bayo”.  
“Umthetho awutshintshanga. Phakathi evekini, * -90% womculo walapha ekhaya usezakuqhubekeka udlalwa, kodwa sakukhangela ukuba oku kusebenza njani emva kwexesha elithile.” 
 UKganyago ucacise esithi, ezinye iinkqubo zingakwenza ngohlobo lwazo oku, kuxhomekeke kuhlobo lwabaphulaphuli abanabo noko bakufunayo.  
“Sifuna ukuqinisekisa ukuba, umculo omninzi odlalayo kwizikhululo ngumyinge ka90/10, kodwa ezinye iinkqubo zinabaphulaphuli abohlukeneyo, ngoko ke bayakubona benza njani ngoko.” 
 Ebutsheni bale nyanga, ingqonyela kwicandelo lemisebenzi eSABC, uHlaudi Motsoeneng, ubhengeze ukuba ubuncinane bomyinge ka-90% womculo odlalwa zizikhululo ezili-18 zikanomathotholo eSABC, izakuba ngumculo walapha, aze umyinge ka-10% ube ngowangaphandle.  
KuTwitter, abaninzi bathe bagqibe ekubuyeleni kwakhona ekuphulaphuleni iMetro FM ngeCawa, emva kokuba ithe cebu kumgaqo womculo ibisele iwulandela. 
simphiwe.freddie@inl.co.za
title: Local is lekker: Ngoku masonwabele * -50/50

text:
AMAPOLISA aseMsobomvu eGcuwa acela uluntu ukuba lizokufanisa ngendoda enamashumi amahlanu anesihlanu etshayiswe yimoto yasweleka kuhola wendlela uN2 phakathi kweGcuwa neDutywa.  
Le ngozi kurhanelwa ukuba yenzeke ngobusuku bangoMvulo weveki ephelileyo ngakwilali yaseZazulwana eGcuwa.  
Eli xhoba lalinxibe isilamba esimdaka ngebala, kwanebhulukhwe ekwanjalo, untsundu ngebala kwaye unenwele ezinde.  
Amapolisa acela ukuba nabani na olahlekelwe ngumntu onjalo aqhakamshelane namapolisa aseMsobomvu kule nombolo: 047 492 0180.
title: Amapolisa afunisa ngosapho lwexhoba lengozi

text:
Kukho abantu abangakufuniyo ukujongwa, ekufuneka ucimele xa usingise ngakubo ngathi ubhade ixhego lichama.  
Sele kukho isithethe sokuba athi amehlo akungqamana kufuneke kubekho owabalekisayo awakhe. Iyandixaka ke leyo nto, kuba nantoni na umntu athi ayijonge uyijonga ngezizathu ezizezakhe. 
Zininzi izinto ezijongisayo, ezinye zimbi ezinye zintle. Akunongayijongi into ebukekayo, akukhathaliseki nokuba isemntwini na.  
Ungenongayijongi nento ephakamisisa iintshiya, nokuba isemntwini na. Uninzi lwabantu lukhuthazeka kukujongwa, lumbi lubulaleke.  
Umntu xa eza kuphuma endlini ujikajikana nesipili ezibhencela inkangeleko. Ukukhangeleka umntu akakujongi ngelilakhe iliso lokubona izinto, ukukhangela ngelabamngqongileyo.  
Oku kubonisa ukuba umntu umele kukujongwa, kwaye nobomi bakhe ubuqondisa ngokokukhangela kwabantu. 
Umntu onxiba into entle akayinxibeli yena uyinxibela indyebo yamehlo abanye, nonxiba embi uxhalela kwaindyebo yamehlo abantu.  
Umntu ucela uluvo ngendlela akhangeleka ngayo, ndingazi kungani na engakholiswa ngawakhe amehlo; kuba ke naye unawo amehlo okubona abemele kumnceda azibone.  
Engaziboni nje efuna uluvo lomnye kungokuba inkxalabo yakhe ayikho kuye ikwabanye. Oku kwenzeka kwinto yonke esiyenzayo. 
 Ukuba sakha izindlu sizakhela amehlo abanye, ukuba sithenga iinqwelo sizithengela amehlo abanye, ukuba siyaxhentsa sisebenzela okwesinamva, njalo njalo. 
Ukuze ungazizekile isono sokujonga omnye umntu kufuneka uqinisekise ukuba akakujonganga xa wena umjongile, umjonge wedwa angangqamani amehlo enu.  
Akukubhaqa ke uba sisisulu sesende livele ebhulukhweni umninilo engaliva; ube sisimoyoywana ngathi uphuzwe yinja phakathi kweentokazi. Sele isempilweni yethu ke loo nto, kunjalo nje isingathi ikho ntlanga zonke. 
Ndiwa ngeneno ke ukuqonda ukuba kukuthini ukuba umntu enze into ejongisayo kodwa angafuni kujongwa.  
Kambe ke , isingathi abantu abangafuni kujongwa ngabantu ekusesazeleni sabo ukuba oko bakwenzileyo nokubajongisayo akukho mgaqweni.  
Mhlawumbi lisela, mhlawumbi sisigwinta, okanye ngumkrexezi, njalo njalo, nto ezo aziyo ukuba uthi akuvela lunxakame uluntu ezintliziyweni zalo ngenxa yazo. Umntu ucaphukela ukunxakama koluntu kwisenzo sakhe, angafuni kujongwa, endingaziyo ukuba kutheni engaguquli esi sizathu ajongelwa sona nekusesazeleni sakhe ukuba sitenxile ukuze kwixa elizayo ajongelwe ukubukwa kunokuxwaxwa! Ukuba umbhaco unyuke kakhulu wuthobe! Yeka amanyala! 
Amehlo omntu ayathetha. Ndike ndibone naxa sukuba umntu enesiphako somzimba, kungaba uneduma elibi lakudala okanye yinyhori okanye unesifombo okanye mde kakhulu njengam lo, uthi akujongwa angevi kamnandi.  
Akeviswa kamnandi yintoni kukujongwa isiphako anaso, kuba ke kakade sisisiphako. Mna bandijonga bapetyek’ izixhanti, ezintliziyweni zabo bekhuz’ ubude obungaka!  
Ukungaziboni makopo kwemfene akuthethi ukuba ayinawo! Nantoni na ke engekho siqhelweni iyajongisa, akukhathaliseki nokuba idaliwe okanye yenziwe. 
Ukuxambulisa kukubandezela amehlo! Bokujonga ngamacala ke bantu, bemana ukukugxezula ngathi ulingcwaba elitsha, kuba ke abazude bangakujongi. Usakuthethiselani ke ukujongwa xa kanti uyajongwa (ungaboni) ungazeki siphako? 
Kunobawo phaya kuthi ongonqeniyo ukumjonga umntu, kanye ngeli xa naye amjongileyo. Ukujonga amehlo akho uwabalekise uphinde uwabuyise, ufike esakujongile.  
Yada yakhalaza ngenye imini inkosikazi yomniniwa wakhe, “Bhuti akonqeni kanene wena ukumjonga umntu! Umjonga ntoni kangaka umntu wasemzini? De kube neentloni thina!” Wakumbuza ke uDuma ukuba ukujonge ntoni na, uyakuxelela; iintloni zibe kuwe ke.  
“Ujing’ inqathe, yiyo le nto ndikujongileyo.”
title: Undijonga ntoni, ndijing’ inqathe?

text:
UDINGANI John Fubu weAzasakhe Enterprise eCumakala ubhenele emagqwetheni emva kokusokoliswa kwiprojekthi yokwenza imveliso yemithi kwihlathi likamasipala waseAmahlathi. 
UFubu uqale ukusebenza kweli hlathi, nelikumganyana ukusuka eCumakala, ngonyaka ka2016. Wathi wakubona ukuba lithuba eli wazithengela oomatshini bokuchwela umthi ngemali engange-R55 000 ze waqokelela ulutsha bafumana uqeqesho lokusebenzisa lo matshini. 
Baqeqeshwa emva koko baqalisa umsebenzi nanjengoko imvume yokusebenza babeyinikiwe ngumasipala waseAmahlathi. 
Kodwa uFubu ubanga ngelithi kuvele kwavela “umona” kwigosa elithile likamsipala waseAmahlathi, ogama linguLouis, nabanga ngelithi likwenze kwayintlekisa kooFacebook ukusebenza kukaFubu kweli hlathi limtyhola ngokutyeshela imithetho yezendalo. 
Encokolela I’solezwe lesiXhosa, uFubu uthe: “Ndiqale kweli hlathi ngo2016, ndingenamitshini yokwenza iplanga ngelo xesha. Ndafumana umlungu (waseTarkastad) onomatshini wokuchwela, ndamcela ukuba makazobona le nto ndiyenzayo. Emva kokufumana lo matshini sasebenza naye lo mlungu.” 
Kweli hlathi uFubu uthi benza imveliso zeplanga ezifana neBendricks, Purlines neeRafters. Imveliso uyithumela kwiivenkile eziseCumakala, Qoboqobo, kuKomani naseQumrha. Umatshini uthi wawethenga ngeR55 000 
“Ndabona ukuba mandizithengele umatshini wam, ndafumana umlungu waseTarkastad ukuba makazosiqeqesha kwindlela yokusebenza umatshini. Kulo nyaka uphelileyo bendiqeshe abantu abangamashumi amabini anesine. 
“Kuthe xa kubonaka ukuba siyasebenza apha, kwathi gqi umlungu (uLouis) endingamaziyo esithi le ndawo sisebenza kuyo uyayivala. Ndambuza ukuba uyivala xa engubani yena, wathi akazundiphendula. Ndathi unotshe andizuvala makayobiza amapolisa. 
“Into ayithethayo lo mlungu uthi andinazo izixhobo zokhuselo xa kunokuvutha umlilo. Ndamxelela ukuba ndingayenza lo nto yothenga ezi zixhobo. Ngenene ndayozithenga ezo zinto. Uphinde wabuya sele ehamba nabanye abelungu, engathethi nathi. Wavala indlela abantu abasebenza,” kutsho uFubu. 
Uthi into elandeleyo kukuba uLouis atshixe ihlathi, “efuna singakwazi ukungena”. “Ndayobika kwamasipala. Siye sayihlala indibano nomasipala ekhona lo mlungu (Louis). Umasipala uyibeke yacaca eyokuba wonke umntu kufuneka exhamle kweli hlathi, watsho esithi makuvulwe ihlathi. Lo mlungu akayenzanga lo nto,” kutsho uFubu. 
Ephendula, uLouis uthe: “Lo ngumbandela odibene nokhuseleko nemililo. Ukuba uMnu. Fubu ufuna ihlathi, makathobele imithetho ebekiweyo. UMnu, Fubu uxelelwe ukuba makathobele imithetho yokhuseleko ehlathini, nto leyo angayenzanga. UMnu. Fubu akanazo izixhobo zokukhusela umlilo.” 
“Into emandiyicacise kukuba umyalelo wokuba uMnu. Fubu makathi xha ngokusebenza usuke kwibambela manejala likasimasipala hayi kum.  
UMnu. Fubu kufuneka athethe nebambela manejala likamasipala, hayi nam,” utshilo uLouis. 
Kule veki ihlathi liye lavulwa kwaye uFubu uyasebenza njengesiqhelo noxa nje ukusebenza kwakhe kuza kuma ngenxa yentsholongwane yesifo seKhorona.
title: Urhanela ubuhlanga osokoliswa kwishishini

text:
Uza kuchitha iminyaka engamashumi amabini enkolonkoloza kwezimnyama izisele uMelikhaya Mpongwana (24) emva kokufunyanwa yinkundla yamatyala engingqi yaseGcuwa enetyala lokudlwengula intwazana eneminyaka elishumi elinesine ubudala (14) yaseDutywa. 
 
Ngokwengxelo yesithethi samapolisa aseGcuwa, uKapteni Jackson Manatha,  uMpongwana wadlwengula intwazana le kwikhaya lalo kwilali yaseMorrison eDutywa. UManatha uthi yadlwengulwa le ntwazana kwinyanga kaTshazimpuzi kunyaka ophelileyo ngethuba ilele nobhuti wayo omncinci ebhedini. 
 
UManatha udiza ukuba, intwazana yeva into emphathaphathayo kanti nguMpongwana emva koko wayidlwengula. Uthi ixhoba lakwazi ukumkhomba umrhanelwa kuba lamva ngelizwi. 
Umrhanelwa waye wabanjwa kwangoko ngamapolisa aseDutywa. Ityala lona belixoxelwa kwinkundla yamatyala engingqi eGcuwa. UMpongwana ugwetywe ngoLwesibini kule iveki.
title: Igwetyelwe ukudlwengula indoda yaseDutywa

text:
Iqela ekuphela kwalo eMpuma Koloni, iChippa United, likwinkqubo yokutshintsha zonke izinto ezindala ngakumbi ezibafake engxakini kwisizini edlulileyo. 
Lo nkqubo iqale ngokubuyisa uRoger Sikhakhane, indoda eyaziyo iChippa United kwangeminyaka yayo isadlala kwinqanaba elisezantsi. URoger naye waba lixhoba lokugxothwa kodwa ukuhamba kwakhe kuvakala ukuba yayingeyonto eyayiphuma ngqo kuMpengesi , kodwa ke kuba nguye indoda exhuzula imikhala kwanyanzeleka iminwe ikhonjwe kuye nangona bekhona abantu abajongene nokwenziwa komsebenzi wemihla ngemihla. Nanjengoko izolo iphelile inyanga, baninzi abantu abaphelelwe ngumsebenzi kumaqela ohlukeneyo kwiPremier Soccer League. Eziphuma kwiChippa United zithi umqeqeshi owanqunyanyiswa kwisigaba sesibini sesizini ephelileyo, * -Enrst Middendorp, uyindoda ekhululekileyo emva kokugxothwa leli qela kwiveki ephelileyo. Ulandelwe nguMich D’Avray, ongene endaweni kaMiddendorp emva kokunqunyanyiswa. Naye uD’Avray izinto khange zimhambele kakuhle phantse kuyo yonke imidlalo edlalwe yiChippa United phantsi kwegama lakhe. 
Omnye umntu ongazukubuyela kwiChippa United kwisizini ezakuvulwa kwinyanga ezayo nguPeter Koutroulis. Isivumelwano sakhe sifikelele esiphelweni kwaye kuvakala ukuba asizukuhlaziywa kuba besithi abasemfuthweni wolwazi ngoyena mntu obesenza isiphithi-phithi kwiChippa, kangangokuba nguyena mntu ebephazamisana nokusebenza kwabaqeqeshi beli qela ngokukhululekileyo. 
IiChilli-Boys ziphethe isizini edlulileyo zikwindawo yeshumi elinesine, kwaye zizakuvula imidlalo ye-Absa Premier League ngeKaizer Chiefs abavale ngayo isizini ka-2014/15. 
Izolo usekela mqeqeshi, uFadlu Davids, ulahlile naye kweli qela lizinze eBhayi. UDavids weza kwiChippa United elandela * -Enrst Middendorp kunyaka ophelileyo.
title: Isusa imidlungu iChippa United

text:
Amaqela adlala kwiPSL alungiselela ukuvulwa kwesizini entsha. Kodwa okuxhalabisayo kukuthathwa kwabadlali abathe qabavu kwisizini edlulileyo kwiChippa United. ekuqaleni kwalo nyaka sive kusithiwa * -Eric Chipeta uthathwe yi-Ajax Cape Town.  
Kuthe xa kusondela isiphelo sesizini kwahamba ifolosi yaseBurkina Faso, * -Aristide Bance. Khange kubekho ngxaki ekuhambeni kwabo badlali ngoba iqela beliqhuba kakuhle kakhulu ngelo xesha.  
Kuthe xa kuphela isizini, njengentlal’isenzeka, kwavakala ukuba amaqela amakhulu aseGoli afuna abadlali beChippa United. Khange isothuse lo nto ngoba badlale kakuhle kakhulu abadlali beli qela lizinze eBhayi. Kuthe kusenjalo kwavakala ukuba ukapteni, uJames Okwuosa, utyikitywe yi-Orlando Pirates. Emva kwakhe kwathiwa uThamsanqa Sangweni noJoseph Molongoane bafunwa yiKaizer Chiefs nePirates.  
Ukuzothi ga ngoku bobabini abo badlali akukacaci nokuba bayathengiswa okanye bazakuhlala. Kufanelekile kubekho ixhala ngoba kuyabonakala ukuba abadlali bafuna ukuhamba. Asingeyisoli iChippa xa abadlali befuna ukuhamba ngoba lilungelo labo elo, kodwa nalo eli qela kufuneka libonise ngoku ukuba yindawo abadlali abanokuthi bazakhele ikamva kuyo.  
Njengokuba uDan Malesela ekwazile ukuyithatha iChippa ayibeke endaweni engcono, ngoku abaphathi mabazame ukuqhosha zonke iindawo ezibalulekileyo kwicala lolawulo. Kule veki kuvakele into ethi uNkosinathi Mthiyane uthengiselwe iPirates, ziyaxhalabisa ezo ndaba ngoba ebeyenye yeentsika zeli qela. Kunyanzelekile umnu. Siviwe Mpengesi akhangele abadlali abanamava ukuze afezekise umnqweno kaMalesela wokwenza ngcono kwisizini ezayo. 
 Ukutyikitya abadlali abasuka kwinqanaba elingezantsi kuhle kodwa abo badlali bazakufuna ixesha ukuze baqhelane nePSL. Ukuhamba kwabadlali abanamava kungafunwa bantu banamava ezindaweni zabo kungaliqhwalelisa eli qela. Kuyafuneka kubekho into eyenziwayo.
title: Iyaxhalabisa ngoku iChippa United

text:
UNtombekhaya Tyali (68) waseLower Ngqungqu eMqanduli ubethwe wophuka ingalo ngenduku ligqwetha uMlamli Tyali.  
Uthi oku kwenzeke emva kokuba usapho lakwaTyali lucele amalizo kumalungu osapho ukuba kungcwatywe ilungu elithile ebelibhubhe kwinyanga kaTshazimpuzi.  
“Emva kokuba ootata bekhaya bebambe intlanganiso ngomngcwabo, ndaxelelwa ukuba umyeni wam uza kukhupha igusha, ndacela ixesha lokuba ndixelele abantwana, yaqala apho inkathazo,” ucacise watsho uNtombekhaya Tyali. 
 Ingxelo ithi kwakule nyanga inye kubhubhe elinye ilungu lekhaya, kwaza kwanyanzeleka ukuba kukhutshwe amanye amalungiselelo.  
“Ufike apha uMlamli ehamba ngebhaki yakhe, nenye indoda egushe intonga ekhwapheni, ungene endlini akabulisa nokubulisa wathi uzokuthatha igusha, ungqale ebuhlanti, kulapho afike wandityhala, ndawa wandibetha ngenduku emva kokuba oyise intombi yam ibindinqandela, ndophuka ingalo,”utsho uNtombekhaya Tyali. 
 Utata weli khaya ukhubazekile emva kokufumana ingozi ngonyaka ka1973, akakwazi kuthetha nakuthatha sigqibo.  
“Umhla wamashumi amabini ananye kuTshazimpuzi ngulo mhla andibethe ngawo, ndiye ndaya komkhulu kuNkosi Phathekile Holomisa, ndisiya kuchaza ingxaki yam, ndafika engekho uNkosi,” utshilo uTyali.  
Ugqirha wesibhedlele saseMqanduli uthe ingalo yexhoba yophukile emva kovavanyo. Intombi yalo mama uNombhedesho Tyali uthi ubhaqile naye kwizithonga zeli gqwetha.  
“Wandileqa ngenduku endigqibisa iyadi, kuba ndandinqandela umama,” utsho uNombhedesho Tyali. 
Ityala lokubetha, ukungena emzini ngaphandle kwemvume nokuthukwa livuliwe kumapolisa aseMqanduli. 
 “Ndiwuxelile umcimbi kwindoda endala yekhaya ngeenjongo zokuba ndibazise, akazange awulandele, koko kufike abantu abane bekhaya bezokundigrogrisa besithi abazukuphinda beze apha emzini wam, abo nguNoluthando Mpetha, Siyabulela Tyali, Lungisa Tyali, Maza Tyali,” kutsho uNtombekhaya. Kwiinzame zethu zokuthetha negqwetha uMlamli Tyali uthethe wathi: “Andisokuze ndithethe ngalo mcimbi kuba usezinkundleni zamatyala, akukho nto ndizakuyithetha,” utshilo. Ingcali kwimicimbi yemveli amasiko nezithethe uGqirha Nokuzola Mndende, uthi udelele kakhulu uTyali. 
 “Kwiinkundla zombini eyesiNtu nenkundla yaseNtshona, kukudelela nokwaphulwa komthetho kakhulu oku kwenziwe ngulo mntu, umthetho mawungene kuye,” utshilo uMndende.  
Ukanti iCommission for Gender Equality ngokukaJavu Baloyi, ithi iza kuwuthathela kuyo lo mcimbi.  
“Siza kunyanzeleka ukuba siqwalasele ukuba umama ufumana ingcebiso ngokusemthethweni, umntu onjengegqwetha kumele ukuba ungumzekelo eluntwini ngokukodwa ukukhuselwa kwabantu abadala,” uthethe watsho uBaloyi. Lo kaBaloyi uthi baza kusebenzela ukuba liphume kuluhlu lwamagqwetha eli gqwetha linguMlamli Tyali. 
UNkosi Phathekile Holomisa ungqinile ukuba lifikile ityala elinje enkundleni yakhe.  
“Ngenxa yobuzaza balo asikhange siliqale nokuliqala sele lixoxwa yinkundla kamantyi eli tyala,” ucacise watsho uHolomisa. 
Ixhoba lifumene icebo kwinkundla kamantyi eMqanduli.
