text:
Inkundla ephakamileyo yaseMthatha ngoLwesibini isikhabile isicelo sesibheno ebesifakwe nguNkosikazi Winnie Madikzela-Mandela obebanga umzi oseQunu kaNelson Mandela.  
Le nkundla iyalele uWinnie ukuba ahlawule iindleko zesicelo. 
UMama wafaka isicelo sesibheno kwinyanga ka- Epreli emva kokungaphumeleli kwenzame zakhe zokufumana lo mzi, nangona wawushiywe kusapho lonke. 
 Igwetha likaMadikizela-Mandela uMvuzo Notyesi uxelele iAfrican News Agency ukuba le nyewe bazakuyithatha bayise kwinkundla yezibheno eBloemfontein.
title: Sikhatyiwe kwakhona isicelo sikaWinnie

text:
Amasandawana anike abalandeli bawo iKrismesi emuncis’iintupha emva  kokuphumelela ngeyona ndlala incomekayo. IMamelodi Sundowns ibhulele amasaka iBloemfontein Celtic ngemvula yamagowuli amane kwelinye jwi (4-1) kumdlalo we-Absa Premier Soccer League obudlalela eLoftus Versfeld Stadium ngale njikalanga yanamhlanje. Unozinti weCeltic ebequqa ebuyelela emva kwakhe eyolanda ibhola emnatheni kwade kwakane. Amagowuli weDowns afakwe ziziququ zodwa eziquka uThokozani Sekotlong, uPercy Tau, uTiyani Mabunda noThemba Zwane. Emva kwale mpumelelo, amakhwenkwe kaPitso Mosimane athe ngcu phezulu kwiPSL ngamanqaku angamashumi amabini anesibhozo nangona esenemidlalo esandleni. 
Nangona kungabangakho qela likwazileyo ukubhalisa ebhodini kwisiqingatha sokuqala somdlalo – kodwa umdlalo wona ubukwizinga eliphezulu. IDowns iwulawule kwasekuqaleni umdlalo; into engakwazanga ukuyifumana ligowuli ngenxa kaPatrick Tignyemb owenze umsebenzi oncomekayo ezimpondweni. UTau ubenelishwa kwisiqingatha sokuqala ngethuba ibhola yakhe entle ibetha epalini. Kanti naye uHlompho Kekana uphantse wangcangcazelisa umnatha – ibhola yakhe inqandwe emgceni nguTignyemb. Akukho nto ingako eyenzileyo iCeltic kwisiqingatha sokuqala ngaphandle kokuzama ukubamba iSundowns ebekubonakala ukuba ingxamele ifaka amagowuli. 
Zijikile izinto kwisigaba sesibini. IMamelodi Sundowns ibhakuzelise umnatha kumzuzu wesibini emva kokubuya ekhefini. Iwuphakamisile nayo iCeltic umdlalo wayo – kodwa iDowns iye yagalela amanye amathathu kulo mdlalo. Ngokwenza njalo, iSundowns iqokelele amanqaku amathandathu kwimidlalo yayo emibini kule veki. URonald Pfumbidzai ifake igowuli leSiwelele lokubika ekhaya edlale ngaphandle komqeqeshi wayo onqunyanyisiweyo kumdlalo wanamhlanje. Umdlali okhethwe njengomdlali othe waqaqamba kulo mdlalo nguPercy Tau – ongenelanga ukufaka igowuli, kodwa oncedisileyo ekudaleni amanye amagowuli weDowns namhlanje…. 
 
Mamelodi Sundowns: Onyango, Hachi, Arendse, Morena, Madisha, Manyisa, Kekana, Mabunda, Sekotlong, Zwane, Tau. 
Amalalela: Mweene, Ngcongca, Nthethe, Zakri, Zwane, Lebese, Ngele. 
Bloemfontein Celtic: Tignyemb, Pfumbidzai, Rikhotso, Ndengane, Letsoalo, Lubisi, Motshegwa, Baloyi, Hotto, Mabena, Phalane 
Amalalela: Chaine, Jembula, Mabasa, Mashikinya, Nyundu, Maruping, Mahlasela.
title: Ibiyimvula yamagowuli eLoftus Versfeld Stadium!

text:
KUTHE xibilili kuNontsikelelo Mabona (65) welokishana iZithulele eGcuwa emva kokuba urhulumente ethe wanikeza yena nabanye abahlali bale lokishana iziqinisekiso zobunini bezindlu ababezinikwe ngeminyaka yoo1970. 
Le lokishana yeyakhiwe liQumrhu lezoPhuhliso eMpuma Koloni iECDC ngeminyaka yoo1970 ngeenjongo zokuba abasebenzi bemizimveliso yaseZithulele babe neendawo zokuhlala. 
UMabona (65) wafika ngo1971, eze kumyeni wakhe owayesebenza eTranskei Development Corporation. 
“Ukuqala kwethu sasihlawula iponti eneshumi (R3) ngenyanga, mali eyenyuke de yaza kwikhulu leerandi (R100) kwiminyaka yokugqibela. 
“Siza kulala ubuthongo obumnandi, kuba kaloku bendingenayo le mali yokurenta. Ubunini besiza buthetha ukuba indlu yeyam buqu,” kutsho uMabona. 
Yena uLeticia Mtwebane (66), waseLady Frere, wafika eZithulele ngomhla wesithathu kweyoKwindla ngo1973.  
“Umyeni wam wayephangela eTDC, ze wanikwa indlu ngumsebenzi. Sasihlawula iiponti ezimbini ezineshumi (R5) ngenyanga. Ukugqibela kwethu ukuhlawula irenti ibilikhulu leerandi (R100). 
“Siyavuya kakhulu, kuba kudala sisehla sisenyuka sifuna ubunini beziza (title deeds). Besikhe sikhutshwe nguECDC xa singenamali.” 
Ethetha naba bahlali uOscar Mabuyane, onguMphathiswa woPhuhliso lwezoQoqosho eMpuma Koloni, uthe: “Siqhuba loo nkqubo yokubuyisela isidima sabantu bakuthi. Esi sipho nisinikwa ngurhulumente wenu apha eZithulele sibaluleke kakhulu, nendithembayo ukuba niyasivuyela. Kuba kaloku ukuba ebethanda urhulumente ebenozithengisa ezi zindlu zoyi105 enze ingeniso eyi-R5.7 yezigidi zeerandi.” 
USodolophu waseMnquma uSithembiso Ncetezo uthe: “Le nto ithetha ukuba ezi zindlu zezabo ngoku aba bahlali, into ethetha ukuba lowo ufuna ukuxandisa indlu leyo angakwenza oko eyazi ukuba akazukuphazanyiswa mntu.” 
sithandiwe.velaphi@inl.co.za
title: ‘Ndandirenta iR3 ngo1971 kunzima’

text:
Kubonakala ngathi umdlali othandwa kakhulu ngabalandeli be-Orlando Pirates, * -Oupa Manyisa, angabuyela ebaleni emva kokuchitha ixesha elide kakhulu engadlali ngenxa yokonzakala. 
 Amabhakaniya aqubisana neKaizer Chiefs kumdlalo weCarling Black Label eFNB Stadium emva kwemini ngoMgqibelo. UManyisa wagqibela kwisizini ka’2015/16 awadlala kuyo imidlalo embalwa phambi kokonzakala. Ngoku le ndedeba iphilile kwaye ikulungele ukudlala kwakhona. Ezimnyama ngenkani ziphantsi koqeqesho olunzima kwinkampu esePotchefstroom. 
 Umqeqeshi weli qela, uMuhsin Ertugral, uzakujongana novavanyo lakhe lokuqala njengomqeqeshi wePirates ngoMgqibelo xa iqela lakhe liqubisana neqela awayeliqeqesha ngaphambili, iKaizer Chiefs. IPirates ibethe iMWU ngo’5-0 phambi kokubetha ne-Acom Bush FC ngo’3-0 kwimidlalo yokucweya ePotchefstroom.  
Kulo mdlalo wesibini * -Oupa “Ace” Manyisa ubuye namagowuli amabini kwaye ucinga ukuba le midlalo ibalungiselela ngokupheleleyo umdlalo wangoMgqibelo. “Kumnandi kakhulu enkampini, amalungiselelo ethu ahamba kakuhle kakhulu,” utshilo uManyisa kwikhasi lomnatha leBucs.  
Lo kaManyisa kulindeleke ukuba abengomnye wabadlali abazakuthi athembele kubo * -Ertugral kwisizini entsha. “UMuhsin ngungqondo-ngqondo womqeqeshi.  
Andinangxaki nezinto azifunayo. Ngoku abadlali bazama ukuziqhelanisa nendlela asebenza ngayo. Besihleli enkampini iveki yonke, ingase kuthi kanti ibiqala ngoku isizini. umqeqeshi ufuna sidlale umdlalo odibeneyo, sisebenzisane ebaleni futhi uyasithemba. Akukho mntu uzakugqama yedwa njengokuba etshilo umqeqeshi; siyaphumelela siliqela siphinde siwe siliqela xa kukubi,” utshilo uManyisa. 
 Lo mdlalo mkhulu wale veki kulindeleke ukuba ubukelwe ngamawaka-waka abalandeli bebhola nanjengoko amatikiti okungena athengiswa aphela kwiiveki ezimbini ezidlulileyo. Nangona umdlalo uzakulawulwa ngabalandeli, kodwa abaqeqeshi bazakuthi bajonge amandla abadlali babo kulo mdlalo wangoMgqibelo.
title: UManyisa angadlala ngoMgqibelo

text:
Unobhala weANC kwingingqi yaseAmathole uTeris Ntutu , uphume ngentunja kwindibano yokuqala yebhungua lomasipala waseMnquma, yokufungisa kooceba emva kokuba amalungu alombutho eMnquma ebefuna kuye esiqwini. 
Amalungu ombutho olawula ebelugcwabevu ngumsindo etyhola uNtutu kunye nesigqeba sakhe ngokutshintsha amagama abagqatswa ebekumele ukuba babengusodolophu, usomlomo kunye nesabhokwe sebhunga kumasipala. 
UThobeka Bikitsha wonyulwe njengosodolophu libhunga, uZibuthe Mnqwazi njengosomlomo ngelixa uZakhele Mkiva etynjwe njengesabhokwe sebhunga. Amalungu e-ANC eMnquma athi ebengalindelanga lamagama nanjengoko ayenyule abanye abantu. 
Omnye wamalungu obethetha egameni labahlali, uVuyolwethu Hani, uthi amasebe angamashumi amabini anesixhenxe eMnquma ayevumelene kwelokuba kusiwe igama likaThobokazi Ntanga kunye noNoluthando Qikane bakhuphisane ngesihlalo sobangusodolophu. USithembele Ncethezo kunye noSisa Matutu bebetyunjelwe ukuba bakhuphisane kwindawo yokuba ngusomlomo webhunga. 
“Sathumela amagama kwingqingqi ukuba kukhethwe kuwo kodwa kuthe ingekahlalwa indibano yebhunga seva amarhe athi lamagama atshintshiwe,” utshilo uHani.  
UNtutu uthi ulandele zonke iinkqubo zombutho phambi kokuba kuchongwe abagqatswa. “Into eyenzekayo apha kukho abo bafuna ukufezekisa iminqweno yabo besebenzisa igama leANC,” utshilo uNtutu.
title: Bebefuna kunobhala esiqwini abeANC

text:
Abaququzeleli beeSAMAs babhengeze uSomizi Mhlongo noTumi Morake njengababhexeshi bomsitho walo nyaka. 
Ukudityaniswa kwesi sibini kuza kuqinisekisa ukuba iqonga laseSun City lizakube lijulelwe ulonwabo lodwa, intsini, ukuqhula njalo njalo. 
UMhlongo udume ngokuba liyolisa kwimidlalo yeqonga, njengomsasazi kamabonakude nonomathotholo kwanemvumi. 
USomgaga besasaza la mawonga noThando Thabethe kunyaka ophelileyo. Ukanti noMorake kwelakhe icala, akaloqhula nje kuphela, kodwa ukwahlonitshiwe njengomsasazi ophum’ izandla kumabonakude. 
Ii-SAMA 23 zingobusuku bomhla we-27 kuCanzibe 2017, zakusasazwa ngqo kwiSABC 1 ngentsimbi yesibhozo.
title: Babhengeziwe abasasazi bee-SAMAs zalo nyaka

text:
Wothuse umzi uKapteni waMabhokobhoko, uSiya Kolisi, emva kweentetha zakhe azenze kumajelo eendaba kwilizwe laseJapan kutshanje. UKolisi uthi umongameli wokuqala woMzantsi Afrika okhululekileyo, uNelson Mandela, ebengeke ayixhase indlela ekwenziwa ngayo inguqu embhoxweni welizwe lakhe.  
Umbutho olawula umbhoxo eMzantsi Afrika, iSaru, wamilisela inkqubo enyanzelisa ukuba kubekho inani elithile labadlali abamnyama kwiqela lesizwe ngelizama ukunika ithuba lokudlala abadlali abangakwaziyo ukudlala emdlalweni owonganyelwe ngabantu abamhlophe kuzo zonke izintlu zawo.  
UMandela ngomnye weenkokheli ezalwela ukutshatyalaliswa kwengcinezelo nocalulo olwagquba iminyaka emininzi phambi kuka1994 eMzantsi Afrika. 
Kudliwanondlebe alenze eJapan, kucace okwekati emhlophe ehlungwini okokuba uKolisi akahambisani nenkqubo esetyenziswayo embhoxweni waseMzantsi Afrika ejoliswe ekuncediseni abadlali abamnyama abangafumani mathuba embhoxweni.  
“Andiqondi ukuba uMandela ebeza kuyixhasa inkqubo elandelwayo nangona ndingamazi. Bendingenakuthanda ukuchongwa ngenxa yebala lam ngoba lo nto ngeke ilincede iqela. Akufanelanga kunyanzeliswe inani labadlali elithile. Xa ufuna ukwenza iinguqu kufuneka uqale phaya ezantsi xa kuphuhliswa abadlali. Khafane ucinge, ukuba ndandingayanga kwizikolo zamaNgesi. Ndandingazukutya kakuhle futhi ndikhule kakuhle ngokwasemzimbeni. Mhlawumbi inani labadlali linganyanzeliswa phaya kwiCurrie Cup – kodwa awukwazi ukuchonga abantu nje kwiBoks ngenxa yebala. Kunzima eMzantsi ngoba sifuna iziphumo ezihle nenguqu,” utshilo uKolisi. 
UKolisi ube nguKapteni wokuqala omnyama kwiqela lesizwe emva kokunikwa uxanduva nguRassie Eramus kunyaka ophelileyo.  
Njengokuba umbhoxo wawubonwa njengomdlalo wabantu abamhlophe phambi kuka1994, AmaBhokobhoko aphumelele iindebe zehlabathi (1995 & 2007) kungekho badlali abamnyama kuwo. 
 Lo nto iye yanyanzela iSaru ukuba kubekho imithetho enyanzelisa ukuqukwa kwabantu bonke embhoxweni. Phantsi kukaErasmus kubekho inani elivisayo alichongileyo futhi baliqela nabadlali abanike ithuba lokudlala imidlalo yamazwe ngamazwe.
title: Akahambisani nenkqubo yenguqu embhoxweni uKolisi

text:
Oogqirha abangama87 beli loMzantsi Afrika ebebeqeqeshwa kwelaseCuba kwinkqubo ebizwa ngeNelson Mandela/Fidel Castro Collaboration, bathweswe izidanga kwiYunivesithi iWalter Sisulu eMthatha kuLwesihlanu esisuka kuye. 
 Eli ibe lelona qela elikhulu ukuthweswa izidanga phantsi kweNelson Mandela/Fidel Castro Collaboration kusukela oko laqala eli phulo ngonyaka ka1996, kwaye sele beyi732 oogqirha beli abaqeqeshwe phantsi kwale nkqubo nabaqeshwe kwizibhedlele ezininzi zeli loMzantsi Afrika.  
USekela Mphathiswa weSebe lezeMpilo kuZwelonke, uGqirha Joe Paahla uthethe wenjenje: “Oogqirha abaninzi abathweswe izidanga phantsi kwale nkqubo baziingcali kumacandelo amaninzi kwezobugqirha, endingabalula kubo omnye uGqirha owenze imbali, ngowokuqala wasetyhini kwiAfrika iphela ukubangugqirha wezotyando lwentliziyo.”  
UMphathiswa wezeMpilo uSindiswa Gomba uthi  lusuku olumnandi kakhulu olu kodwa kunomcelimngeni kwiPhondo lweMpuma Koloni lokunqongophala koogqirha, ithi ke lo nto eli phulo loogqirha baseCuba liza kuncedisa kakhulu.  
Utsho ehlaba ikhwelo kwaba gqirha okukuba mababuyekeze iindawo ababuya kuzo ngoba xa begqiba ukufunda abasafuni ukuya kwiindawo zasemaphandleni naxa sebenikwa isibonelelo sokuba bephangela emaphandleni, ibashiye ke lo nto benengxaki yabantu ekufuneka baye kwiindawo zasezidolophini xa befuna iinkonzo ezithile. 
 Omnye umcelimngeni kukuba baye kwizibhedlele zabucala kanti ayingomnqweno karhulumente ukuqeqesha abantu ze bahambe bayokusebenzisa izakhono zabo kwizibhedlele zabucala.  
Omnye woogqirha baseCuba, uGqirha Sofika Mkhiva noyinzalelwane yaseDikeni, uthi wazibandakanya neli phulo kunyaka ka2011 wayokufunda kwisiqithi saseCaribbean kwaye ngoku usebenza kwisibhedlele sasePort Shepstone kwiphondo laKwaZulu-Natal.  
UMkhiva uthi indlela ibingelula ukubakude nekhaya uze uqeqeshwe ngolwimi ongalaziyo kodwa ke ekwabulela oogxa bakhe ngokunyamezela.
title: Bathweswe izidanga oogqirha ababuya eCuba

text:
Imvumi yomculo weAfro Pop uBulelwa “Zahara” Mtukutana ithi ikhulele kusapho oluxabise inkonzo, kodwa iingxaki ezifike mhla eqala ukuduma emculweni zamnyanzela ukuba asele utywala ukuphozisa ingqondo. 
Oku kuvela kule veki ngethuba uZahara ezityand’ igila, esithi udiniwe kukuphila impilo yobuxoki. 
“Ndikhulele ecaweni, ekhaya kukhonzwa ndingazange ndabuphatha utywala njengokuba ndizobuphatha kweli Goli. 
“Utywala ndibuseliswe ziinkxwaleko, hayi ngokuthanda kuba bendicinga iingxaki ziza kusuka, ndicima zona ngokuziphosa kwiziyobisi. Ndiye ndaqaphela ukuba azimki koko ziyanda mandithathe isigqibo esakuthi senze utshintsho kwimpilo yam,” utshilo uZahara. 
“Ndizibone xa ndigqiba ibhotile yewayini ndindodwa ukuba ikhona ingxaki apha kum kwaye inkulu.” 
UZahara ebebalisela I’solezwe emva kokuba ethe wabhodla obekungaphakathi kuye kumnatha wonxibelelwano esithi “ngoku kwanele ukuphila impilo yobuxoki.” 
UZahara, nozalelwa ePhumlani eMonti, ukwakhwele ezehlela kuTK Nciza weTS Records kwakunye noSanele Dlamini weMLH Music esithi ngabo ababangele ukuba abe lixhoba kuba bamxhaphazile. 
Uthi kufikelele ixesha lokuba ngoku athethe kuba kudala esoyika ukuphuma phandle athethe. Uthi oosisi bakhe bakhe bazama ukumlwela kooTK ukuqala kwayo le mpi.  
“Ndabacenga oosisi bam ndibavala umlomo kuba ndisoyika ukuthetha kuba ndibazi aba bantu ukuba nantoni ingenzeka kubo, noTK wandigrogrisa esithi mandivale oosisi bam umlomo. Kuba nam ndandifuna ukuphila iphupha lam kanti liphupha lam eliza kundijikela.” 
Uthi wanyamezela ecinga ukuba uza kukhawuleza aphume kodwa wabona ukuba uye esoyela. UZahara uxelele I’solezwe ukuba zizigaqa ezenziwe nguTK neqela lakhe, kodwa okwangoku akakalungi ukuba angazikhuphela ngaphandle.  
“Ndifikelele kwithuba lokuba abantu bayazi ukuba le mpilo bayibona ndiyiphila intofontofo kuFacebook nakuInstagram, ayiyiyo le ndiyiphila manyani, intliziyo ilihlwili. Ndidiniwe kukuphila ubuxoki.”  
UZahara uthi uye walilo nexhoba lokuqhathwa nguDlamini weMLH Records kanti usasebenzisana noTK. Ukwadize ukuba ufuna imali yakhe yonke ayityalwa yiTS Records.  
Uthi ufuna ukusukela kwingoma awaduma ngayo uLoliwe ukuzo kutsho kuMgodi. Uthi okunye okumenze ukuba aphume elubala kungokuba oogxa bakhe kwezomculo bathule babe bekule meko yakhe kuba basoyika kwaye bephela ngenxa yokuthula. “Zininzi iimvumi ezihlaselwe sisifo soxinizelelo zithule zixhatshazwa kuba zicinga ukuba kuza kulunga, abanye becinga ukuphelelwa sisonka sabo.”  
Uthi ukuthetha kwakhe kumncedile kuba ngoku amagqwetha aphezulu kwawo lo mcimbi wakhe. Uthi nangoku sithetha nje zininzi iimvumi ezimtsalelayo ezinkulu ezaziwayo, ezisoyika ukuthetha.  
UZahara uthi uncedwe yinkxaso yabazali bakhe engamlibalanga noThixo. Uyavuma ukuba ubethakele kakhulu kwaye usifundile isifundo, uthi utywala ububonile ukuba abusiso isisombululo kwiingxaki. Enye yezinto ephambili eyaziwayo kukutyelwa kwakhe imali yiTS Records. 
Ukuphendula, uTK Nciza uthe uZahara ethetha oku nje kukuba izinto azimhambeli kakuhle njengoko ezimele. “Watshomana noSanele Dlamini ukuba bayokuvula inkampani le iyiMHL, andingeni ndawo mna. Ayikho imali esimkweleta yona. Konke anako wakufumana esekwiTS,” kutsho uTK. Uthe balindele ileta evela kumagqwetha kaZahara kodwa abanalo uvalo ngoba ubungqina banabo, bokuthi uZahara abamkweleti. 
UZahara uthi ufuna imbuyekezo yemali ekwizigidi ezilishumi zeerandi (R10 million) kwiTS Records. Uthi ube qashwa ngooR150 000 kodwa anikwe iR15 000. “Nayo loo R15 000 bendiyifumana emva kokubagqogqa. Beziphela iinyanga ezintathu nangaphezulu ndifuna imali,” utshilo uZahara.
title: ‘Iingxaki zinditsalele ebhotileni’

text:
IiSharks zikhangela isitya ebumnyameni ngoku kwiSuper Rugby. Iziphumo zangale mpelaveki siya kuyo zibaluleke kakhulu kuba zizakucacisa ukuba libheka kweliphi na icala iqela likaGary Gold. 
NgoMgqibelo eli qela liza- kudlalisa abanye abadlali ngemva xa lidlala neeCheetahs. Umqeqeshi uGold, ubhengezile ngoLwesibini ukuba umdlali okhabayo uPat Lambie uzakubekelwa bucala nakule mpelaveki. 
ULambie wabetheka ngentloko kumdlalo wokuqala wovavanyo owawuphakathi koMzantsi Afrika ne-Ireland eNewlands. Sele kudlule phantse inyanga ngoku, kwaye uvavanyo olwenziwe kule veki luveze ukuba lo mdlali kusafuneka anikwe elinye ixesha aphile ngokugqibeleleyo. 
Omnye umdlali odlala ndaweninye noLambie, uGarth April ongadlalanga kakuhle ncam kwiveki ephelileyo kulindeleke ukuba aphinde avale indawo kaLambie. UGold ngoku kunyanzelekile ukuba enze utshintsho kubadlali bakhe bangemva. 
Inzalelwane yaseMthatha, * -Odwa Ndungane obenyanzeliswe ukuba asuke ephikweni ayokudlala ngasemva endaweni kaWillie Le Roux kumdlalo wabo neeLions, uzichaphazele iingxaki abebejongene nazo kula mdlalo babethwe kuwo. 
“Besisoloko sidlala ngabadlali abanye oko iqalile le sizini yeSuper Rugby bebesoloko beqala umdlalo. Bekunzima emva kokuba uPat, uWillie no-Andre kuye kwathiwa abazokufumaneka, noPaul Jordaan uye wenzakala usandula kuqala umdlalo. 
“Sinethamsanqa lokuba nabadlali abanomxhelo abafana noJP Pieterson okwaziyo ukudlala kwiindawo ezahlukeneyo ebaleni, kodwa utshintsho oluninzi ebaleni lusiphathele iingxaki,” utshilo uNdungane.
title: ULambie uzakubekwa bucala nakule mpelaveki

text:
Ukhuphoswano lwendebe ye-Absa Premier Soccer League luthande ukunyukela kwelinye inqanaba kule isizini. IMamelodi Sundowns, eziintshatsheli ezikhuselayo, ikhuphisana neCape Town City, iSuperSport United neKaizer Chiefs. Nakubeni umqeqeshi weDowns, uPitso Mosimane, ezimisele ukuyigcina le ndebe iphambili kwibhola yoMzantsi Afrika – kodwa uthi ucinga ukuba iCape Town City iza kuyiphumelela le ndebe.  
Eli qela laseKapa lihleli kwindawo yokuqala kwiPSL ukuzakuthi ga ngoku kwaye lamkela iChippa United kumdlalo walo ozayo ngoMvulo. UPitso ukuthethe oku ngethuba encokola neentatheli ngomdlalo omkhulu ophakathi kweqela lakhe neKaizer Chiefs ngo’15:00 eFNB Stadium ngoMgqibelo. UJingles ucinga ukuba iChiefs inethuba lokulibetha iqela lakhe kweli tyeli ngenxa yokonzakala kwabadlali bakhe abaliqela. 
“Andazi nokuba ukhona na umntu okule ngxaki sikuyo. Abadlali bethu abaninzi bonzakele. Kodwa ke siyazi ukuba kungenxa yemidlalo eminzi esiyidlalileyo ngaphezulu kwawo onke amaqela. Kutshanje besidlala neCape Town City – eyayineentsuku ezisibhozo uphumle,” utshilo uPitso. 
“Phambi komdlalo wethu neChippa United sasidlale imidlalo emininzi, emva koko kwanyanzeleka ukuba siye eKapa. Bekunyanzelekile kubekho umdlalo esiphulukana nawo kule imeko. Ndibona iCape Town City inethuba lokuphumelela indebe yePSL ngoba abadlali bayo baphumle ngokwaneleyo,” utshilo uPitso. 
Ephawula ngomdlalo wempelaveki, umqeqeshi weDowns uthe iChiefs ayixakekanga njengeqela lakhe, baya kulo mdlalo bengadinwanga. “Sihamba lonke eli thina. Kwinyanga ezayo, sizakube sidlala qho emva kweentsuku ezintathu. Kanti kusekho nemidlalo yeCaf Champions League. Andiqinisekanga ngeWits kwiConfederation Cup. Ndiqinisekile iSuperSport iza kuqhuba kakuhle kwiConfed Cup. Sonke sisengxakini. Siza kukhathazwa kukonzakala kwabadlali nokuhamba-hamba,” uvale ngalo mazwi uJingles.
title: UPitso uyinika iCape Town City indebe yePSL

text:
Igqala lomzabalazo uRaymond Mhlaba, owabayiNkulumbuso yokuqala yephondo laseMpuma Koloni, wabhubha elihlwempu into ebonakalisa ukuba wayeyinkokeli engajonganga siqu sayo. 
  
Oku kuthethwe yingqonyela yebhunga lamafa esizwe (National Heritage Council) uAdvocate Sonwabile Mancotywa, kwipalamente yephondo eBhisho ngoLwesine, ngethuba esenza intetho yesifundo ngobomi bukaOom Ray, nanjengoko esaziwa njalo uMhlaba. 
  
UMhlaba wazalelwa eBhofolo, ze ekukhuleni wazibandakanya nomzabalazo. Wayeyinxalenye yamabanjwa etyala laseRivonia athi agwetywa ngo1963 phantsi kwetyala lobhukuqo-mbuso. 
  
UMancotywa, owayengumphathiswa wezemidlalo, ubugcisa nenkcubeko phantsi kwekhabhinethi kaMhlaba, uthi kuninzi okungathi kufundwe kuOom Ray ziinkokeli zanamhlanje. 
  
“U-Oom Ray ngumzekelo wenkokeli esinokufunda kuyo thina zinkokeli zanamhlanje. Ku-Oom Ray, isikhundla eburhulumenteni kwakufana nebhaso. Ulisebenzele eli lizwe kwaye ubuninzi beengcingane zakhe azaziwa ngabantu abaninzi beli,” utshilo uMancotywa. 
  
“Nangona nje uOom Ray wayenamava athe xhaxhe kumzabalazo weli, wayezihloniphile izimvo zezinye iinkokeli nangona zazingaphantsi kuye ngeminyaka,” utshilo uMancotywa. 
  
UMancotywa ukwavakalise ukuba kukwizicwangciso zakhe ukubhala incwadi ngobomi bukaMhlaba. UMhlaba ubhubhe ngonyaka ka2005 eneminyaka engamashumi asibhozo anesihlanu. 
  
 Ukanti umasipala waseRaymond Mhlaba, owenziwa yidolophu yaseBhofolo, Dikeni, Bedford, Adelaide, Xesi, Balfour neSeymour – uvakalise ukuba ukwizicwangciso zokwakha umfanekiso oqingqiweyo kaMhlaba.    
Ukanti umasipala waseRaymond Mhlaba, owenziwa yidolophu yaseBhofolo, Dikeni, Bedford, Adelaide, Xesi, Balfour neSeymour – uvakalise ukuba ukwizicwangciso zokwakha umfanekiso oqingqiweyo kaMhlaba.
title: Mancotywa: Wafa eyimpula kalujaca uOom Ray

text:
IKUMKANI yamaXhosa uMpendulo Zwelonke Sigcawu ubalule ukuhlwempuzeka kwakhe nokuhamba ecela phambi kwenginginya ebibuthelene Komkhulu eNqadu kuGatyana kwimpelaveki esiyishiya ngasemva, ebiyokubhiyoza naye nanjengoko efince iminyaka engamashumi amahlanu wazalwayo.  
Nangona nje ebalula indlala Komkhulu, uSigcawu, esebenzisa iKing Zwelonke Foundation, ukwazile ukuqokelela imali engaphaya kwesigidi seerandi (R1.2 million) ukuze abhiyoze nesizwe sakhe kulo nyaka. 
 “Le mali siyiqokelele ngoncedo lomfo wakwaGoba (uDumisani) endamsondeza kuba ndibona isakhono sakhe sokuququzelela iiSATMA Awards. Loo mali asiyoyam, yeyesizwe sam. Ngenxa yale mali, ndiza kukwazi ukolula isandla sam, ndifikelele kwabo bangathathi ntweni,” utshilo uSigcawu.  
USigcawu uthi imeko yokunqongophala kweentsiba zokwenza uphuhliso Komkhulu imenza ukuba angalali behlayo ebusuku. 
“Bantwana begazi ndilihlwempu elihambe licela, kuba ndifuna siphuhle isizwe endisikhokeleyo. Ayindiphilisi into yokubona isizwe sakowethu silambile, sigcwele ulwaphulomthetho nentswelongqesho,” utshilo uSigcawu.  
Kulo mba wokucela utsho esithi: “Kuye nabani na onokundinceda, ndicela iimoto zohlobo lweMini Bus (Iveco) ukuze ndikwazi ukuhamba ndityelela neenkosi endizikhokeleyo. Imoto endinayo incinci yanela kuphela abantu abahlanu.” 
Kwinginginya ebibuthelene Komkhulu, uSigcawu uthe: “Intliziyo yam ichulumancile kukunibona nizokubhiyoza nam. Ubukho benu bubonakalisa ukundithanda nokundixabisa. Nam ndiza kwenza njalo kuni. Ndinithanda nonke kwaye ndifuna nindicebise xa nibona ukuba ndiphuma ecaleni.”  
Phakathi kwezinto eziza kuxhanyulwa luluntu olukhokelwe yile kumkani zizitulo ezinamavili (wheelchairs) ezilikhulu elinamashumi amabini anesihlanu neziswe ngoncedo lweKing Zwelithini Foundation KwaZulu Natal.  
Kukwakho nezihlangu ezikumakhulu amahlanu ezithengwe yingqonyela yakwaSAA uVuyani Jarana logama abafundi abahlelelekileyo beza kuxhamla kwiziqhusheki zangaphantsi (sanitary pads). 
 Ibhanki uNedbank uthembise ngokubinza ngeekhompyutha ezingamashumi amathathu kwisikolo esiza kukhethwa yile kumkani.  
AbakwaNedbank bakwathembise ngokufundisa uluntu lakwaXhosa ngezakhono zokulima ze baphinde baqeqeshe ulutsha olungaphangeliyo ngezakhono zoshishino.
title: Kumkani Zwelonke: Ndilihlwempu elicelayo

text:
Namhlanje I’solezwe lesiXhosa lidibene nomnye umlandeli weChippa United ongeva blowu nastatshi ngayo futhi oqinisekisa ukuba uyilandela naphi apho iya khona. UKhasta usibalisela banzi ngothando nohambo lakhe neeChilli-boys. 
Pedro Mapelo: Siyakwamkela kweli phephandaba. Ngokufutshane, ukuba ungubani, uhlalaphi? 
Kayalethu Tu: Igama lam ndinguKhayalethu, ikhaya lam liseTinarha, kodwa ngokokuhlala ndikwaNobuhle. Abandaziyo bathi ndinguKhista. 
PM:Uqale nini ukuba ngumlandeli weChippa United? 
Ndaqala ukulandela iChippa United kula nyaka yafika ngawo apha eBhayi. Eyona nto yanditsala kakhulu apha kuyo kukuba yayisondele kum okanye yayifikeleleka njengomntu ebehleli ezithandela ibhola. Ibhola yinto endiyithandayo kakhulu, kangangokuba ndikwanguye umququzeleli wemidlalo apha kulo mmandla wam. 
PM: Kunjani ukuba ngumlandeli weeChilli-boys? 
Kumnandi kakhulu ukuba ngumlandeli weChippa ngoba sifumana ithuba lokuqokelelana singabalandeli siphinde sakhane ngezinto zobom.  
Enye yezinto ezimnandi ngokuba yinxalenye yesebe labalandeli kukuba siyasondelelana nabalawuli beqela nabadlali bayavuya kakhulu xa sidibana nabo. 
PM: Uziva njani njengokuba iChippa United ivale isizini kwindawo yesithandathu? 
Siyavuya kakhulu. Basebenzile abadlali bethu kwisizini ephelileyo nangona besinengxaki yokubethwa kakhulu kwimidlalo yangaphandle. Ukufumana indawo yesithandathu yimbali kweli qela lethu. 
PM: Khawusiphe iqela lakho njengomlandeli omkhulu. 
Daniel Akpeyi, Diamond Thopola, Nkosinathi Mthiyane, Maponyane, James Okwuosa, Thamsanqa Sangweni, Joseph Molongoane, Buyani Sali, David Zulu, Andile Mbenyane noMlambo. 
PM: Umyalezo wakho kubaphathi beChippa United nakubantu beMpuma Koloni. 
Ndifuna ukuthi abaphathi beChippa mabazame bafumane abaxhasi kule sizini ukuze bazokwazi ukubamba abadlali bangahambi ngokubabhatala imali engcono kunokuba besenza.  
Ingase iChippa United ibenezinto ezenzela abantu ngoba yeyabantu. Okunye endikunqwenelayo kukuba abantu balapha eMpuma Koloni bayixhase iChippa kakhulu ngoba kuphela kweqela esinalo apha.
title: UKhista uthi uyaziwa jikelele ngokuthanda iChippa United

text:
UDUSHE loonoteksi eMthatha lushiye omnye wabakushishino lweeteksi ebhubhile ngethuba kuthululwa iimbumbulu ngamadoda angaziwayo kwirenki yeeteksi yaseCorana kufutshane nodederhu lweevenkile iCircus Triangle eMthatha izolo. 
Ixhoba lalo mlo, eliqikelelwa kwiminyaka engamashumi amabini anesihlanu, liyinzalwelane yaseCorana eLibode, kwaye belisebenza njengomncedisi (taxi conductor) waseCorana eCircus Triangle. Kuvakala ukuba lidutyulwe ngamadoda ebehamba ngesithuthi esiluhlobo lweDouble Cab nathe abaleka kamva. Kwesi siganeko kushiyeke konzakele abantu ababini, omnye wabo ungeniswe esibhedlele onzakele ngokumasikizi lo gama omnye enyangwe kwikhemisti wakhululwa kamva. 
Othethela amapolisa kummandla waseMthatha uWarrant Officer Dineo Koena uthi awukaziwa unobangela wokudutyulwa kwexhoba okwangoku.” 
Ixhoba lidutyulwe inxeba elinye esifubeni lasweleka ngoko nangoko, kwalimala abantu ababini. “Sicela umntu onolwazi ngesi siganeko axelele amapolisa, ingxelo esiyifumene kwindawo yesiganeko ibonakalisa ukuba esi siganeko sinxulumene nodlame loonoteksi nanjengoko ixhoba lincedisa erenkini,” utsho uKoena. 
Sele befikelele kwisine abantu asele bedutyulwe babulawa kolu dushe lonooteksi kulo nyaka kuphela kwiziganeko ezine ezenzeke kwindawo yaseMbuqe, Bongweni kwidolophu yaseMthatha naseNtlaza.Indoda ezibonele ngamehlo engavumanga ukubizwa ngegama ngeloyikisela ukhuseleko lwayo nephangela kwirenki yaseCorana ithi, lo mlo uqale kwinyanga ephelileyo emveni kokuba isithuthi saseMthatha kumbutho ka-Uncedo Service Taxi Association sithathelwe imali ngonooteksi baseLibode kodwa lo nto akhange ithathelwe manyathelo ngamapolisa aseLibode. 
Le ndoda ithi ixhoba lidutyulwe ngethuba isithuthi sikawonkewonke saseLibode besizothathelwa imali njengendlela yokuziphindezela kanti kukho le veni egade esi sithuthi saseLibode, ngethuba oonoteksi baseCorana bewela, kwadutyulwana. 
UKoena ukwathi banazo iingxoxo abanazo nabaphathi becandelo lezothutho, uthi esi siganeko senzeke kanye ngethuba bephuma kwingxoxo.
title: Isidumbu emva komlo woonoteksi

text:
Usekela mongameli wombutho olawulayo uCyril Ramaphosa, uxelele abalandeli beANC eBoitekong eRustenburg ukuba uluntu luyayithanda i-African National Congres (ANC).  
URamaphosa ebekule ndawo ukuza kugaya inkxaso. Uthi nokuba imeko inzima kanjani kulo mbutho kodwa uluntu lusayilandela futhi luyayithanda iANC.  
Ukwabulele inginginya yabalandeli balo mbutho ngenkxaso abayinikayo.  
URamaphosa uthi imicelimngeni ejongene noluntu bayayazi efana namanzi, umbane, kwakunye nemisebenzi.  
Usekela mphathiswa uthi izicwangciso abanazo zokukhawulelana nezo ngxaki.
title: Ramaphosa: Uluntu luyayithanda iANC

text:
Ibe zindidi ngeendidi ezahlukeneyo nezitsala umdla impahla zefashoni zabafundi baseWalter Sisulu University nobungenakutsho nokuba zithungwe ngabafundi xa ujongile ngethuba bebonisa ngazo kuMnyhadala weFashoni.  
Lo mnyhadala ubuqhutywa yile yunivesithi eHemingways ngempelaveki.  
Abafundi babonakalise umdla nochulumanco ngobu busuku bengakholelwa ukuba ezi mpahla zenziwa ngabanye babafundi babo eWSU. 
Abafundi ababonise ngetalente yabo yokuthunga ibingamashumi asixhenxe anesithoba bephuma eMonti nakwiKhampasi eseGcuwa.  
Ngolu suku ibilukhuphiswano kwitalente, ingulowo ebonisa ngesakhe isakhono ekuthungeni nobe kusenza ukuba kubenzima kubagwebi abebephethe olu khuphiswano. 
Kodwa kunjalo abagwebi bade baphuma nabona bagqwesileyo kumsebenzi wabo wezandla.  
Abo nguPhila Ngwendu elandelwa nguSiphosethu Dyubele, kwindawo yesithathu yanguAnathi Plaatjie ze owesine yanguMoreblessing Ndlovu. 
OkuLawulo kwiSebe lezeFashoni eWSU, uSibusisiwe Nodada, uthe abathandi befashoni mabahlale belindele ifashoni esematheni kubafundi bakhe. 
Lo mnyhadala ubanjwa rhoqo ekupheleni konyaka ngeenjongo zokukhuthaza aba bafundi kwaye nomsebenzi wabo ubonwe luluntu. 
abongile.ginya@inl.co.za
title: I-WSU ityhile kwelinye ikhasi ngefashoni

text:
Umqeqeshi weSouthern Kings, uRobbie Kempson, ukholelwa kwelokuba liseza kuqhuba kakuhle iqela lakhe kwiPRO 14.  
Oku kuvakaliswe nguKempson emva kokutywatyushwa kweKings kanabom yiEdinburgh ngo61-13 emdlalweni obuseScotland kwimpelaveki egqithileyo.  
IKings isazuze impumelelo enye kule sizini kwaye isahleli emsileni kwiPRO 14. Ifolosi yeKings, uPieter Scholtz, ikhutshwe ngekhadi elibomvu ngenxa yokudlala kakubi nguJohn Barclay. Lo nto iliqhwalelisile iqela laseBhati.  
UKempson uthi uyakholwa ukuba lisenakho ukuzuza impumelelo iqela lakhe.  
“Okokuqala, mandiqhwabele izandla iEdinburgh ngokuzuza impumelelo emdlalweni wokuqala enyakeni. Idlale kakuhle kakhulu. Kwimizuzu yokuqala, nathi sidlale kakuhle. Lo nto indinika ithemba lokuba singenza ngcono kule isizini. Siphulukene nolawulo lomdlalo emva kwekhadi elibomvu likaPieter Scholtz,” utshilo uKempson. 
UKempson uthi ingxaki elijongene nayo iqela lakhe okwangoku yindlela abacinga ngayo abadlali abanamava.  
“Okwangoku indlela abacinga ngayo abadlali yiyo esasokolisayo. Abadlali abaninzi bethu abanamava abakakuqheli ukudlala kwiPRO 14. Ngekulula ukuba ibingabadlali abaselula ababesihambe nabo,” utshilo uKempson. 
 Le ndedeba ithi bayazama ukubiza iingcali ezinokusombulula le ngxaki.  
“Siyazama ukuzisa abantu abaza kunceda abadlali bethu ukuze batshintshe indlela abacinga ngayo. Sikhe sabiza nendadi ephume izandla, ugqirha Kirsten van Heerden. Sizimisele ukubanceda abadlali bethu,” utshilo uKempson. 
Nangona iqela lakhe lisathe gabhu engxakini, uKempson uthi ukuzalelwa kwakhe eMpuma Koloni nokuqhelana nesimo seli phondo kuza kumnceda kwiinzame zakhe zokuhlangula iqela.  
“Ndiyinzalelwane yeli phondo. Ndiyazazi iingxaki abajongene nazo abadlali. Siliqela labaqeqeshi sinako ukulihlangula eli qela ,” utshilo uKempson. 
 Kumdlalo olandelayo, iKings iza kungquzulana neCheetahs ngomhla wama25 eBhayi.
title: UKempson uqinisekile ngokuhlangula iKings

text:
“Ubudlelwane phakathi kweYunivesithi iFort Hare kwakunye nosapho lakwaNtantala nelo lakwaJordan busukela kwiminyaka yoo1930 futhi kuyabonakala ukuba asokuze buphele.” 
La ngamazwi kaNjingalwazi Sakhela Buhlungu, ingqonyela yaseFort Hare, ngethuba le yunivesithi ibisamkela amaphepha ophando abhalwe nguGqirha Phyllis Ntantala-Jordan owafumana isidanga kweli ziko-mfundo kwiminyaka yoo1930. La maphepha anikezwe ngokusesikweni ngunyana kaNtantala-Jordan, uPallo Jordan, obesakuba nguMphathiswa wesebe lezobugcisa nenkcubeko. 
Ngokokutsho kukaBuhlungu, la maphepha aqulathe yonke into ebhalwe nguNtantala-Jordan ngethuba esaphila. UNtantala-Jordan, obhubhele eMelika nyakenye, wayetshate nombhali kwanengqondi uArchibald Campbell (AC) Jordan. UJordan (AC) wazalelwa eMbokothwana kuTsolo logama uNtantala-Jordan ezalelwa eTyekelebende eDutywa. 
UBuhlungu uthi bachulumancile ukufumana la maphepha nanjengoko beyazi ukuba azakunceda abafundi abaninzi abenza uphando. “Umntu omaziyo uGqirha Ntantala-Jordan uyakuyazi ukuba aqulathe umgangatho la maphepha,” utshilo uBuhlungu. 
UJordan (Pallo) uthi ngumama wakhe buqu owayalela ukuba aziswe eFort Hare la maphepha. “Wathi xa esenza esi sicelo, ndaqala ukwenza unxibelelwano neFort Hare. Zange ibenangxaki iFort Hare yathi makuziwe nawo la maphepha. Ukuze ubone ukuba iFort Hare ibiwafuna nyhani la maphepha, yiyo eyahlawula iindleko zokuthutha la maphepha ukusuka eMelika ukuza apha eFort Hare,” utshilo uJordan, esaleka ngelithi unethemba lokuba ayakusetyenzelwa le nto umama wakhe ebefuna asetyenziselwe wona – uphando. 
UNtantala-Jordan, waziwa njengengqwayi-ngqwayi yezembali, inkcuba-buchopho, umbhali, isifundiswa kwanetsha-ntliziyo lamalungelo oluntu. 
Kusenjalo, uJordan (Pallo) uthe wasungula ngokusesikweni incwadi yakhe ethi Letters to my Comrades kwiholo iMiriam Makeba laseFort Hare eMonti. Le ncwadi iqulathe ubuncwane nobunkcuba-buchopho boncwadi lukaJordan oludibanisa iminyaka engaphaya kwamashumi amane osiba lwakhe. 
Ubuninzi bokuqulathwe kule ncwadi, ngokokutsho kukaJordan, zizibhalo esele zikhe zapapashwa kodwa zifundeka ngcono ngoqhogelwano kule ngqokelela. 
UJordan uthi unikwe intshisakalo nguFidel Castro, ongasekhoyo nobesakuba yinkokeli yelizwe laseCuba, ukuze enze le ngqokelela. Uthi ezi zibhalo azikhethwanga nguye koko zikhethwe ngabantu abasondeleyo kuye. Yiya evenkileni uthenge, uzifundele!
title: Uncwadi lobuncwane lukaNtantala-Jordan lunikezwe uNokholeji

text:
UMAKADENETHA womsasazi kanomathotholo, uSiphiwo Magoda, uthi abaphathi nabaqulunqi bakanomathotholo kufuneka baqiqe, badidiyele iinkqubo ezisemagqabini bavelise nabasasazi abakwanjalo. 
UMagoda ebencokolela I’solezwe lesiXhosa phambi kwemibhiyozo yokuqaphela amashumi amane (40) eminyaka kususela oko waqala ukusasaza. 
Yayingumhla we19 kweyeDwarha ka1982 ngethuba uMagoda ezibandakanya nonomathotholo welo xesha, iRadio Transkei. 
Ukhumbule olu suku lokuqeshwa kwakhe esithi ingathi bekuyizolo. 
“Ndamkelwa ngamaxhwangusha anjengoTheo Mcinga owayenguMphathi Sikhululo noOxley Sandile Maya owayejongene neeNkqubo zoSasazo. Ikwangabo ababentyontyela, befaka ifuthe lokuba ndigqibelele, bendithembile nam ndingafuni kubaphoxa ukubonisa inkuthalo, inyameko kwanoluleko,” ukhumbula atsho uMagoda. 
Kule minyaka ingama40 yokusebenzela umzi wosasazo, eli gqala lomsasazi lenze iinkqubo ngeenkqubo laze kananjalo lakhokela nakumacandelo aliqela. 
“Ndibeyintatheli, ndade ndaliSekela Ntloko leeNdaba eRadio Transkei, ndangumqeqeshi weentatheli ukungena kwam eSABC ngo1993  njengeNtloko yeCandelo elo, kulungiselelwa unyulo jikelele luka1994,” kuqhayisa uMagoda. 
UMagoda ngumbhexeshi wenkqubongxoxo yoMhlobo Wenene ethi Umxholo kuMhlobo. 
Wayekhona ngethuba kusungulwa esi sikhululo seSABC eGqeberha. 
“Ndathunyelwa eGqeberha ukuza kuncedisa ukudibanisa iRadio Transkei, Radio Ciskei neRadio Xhosa – kwazalwa Umhlobo Wenene FM. Zange ndibesaphindela eGoli kuba uMhleli oPhezulu owayephethe ngoko, uBarney Mthombothi wathi mandiphuhlise iCandelo leeNkqubondaba,  kwatsho kwavela uLaphum’ ikhwezi ekuseni, naleyo  yasemin’ emaqanda ukongeza kumnqongo waleyo yasemalanga. Ukusuk’ apho ndanguExecutive Producer weCurrent Affairs, ndabuya ndanguMhleli wokuqokelelwa kweendaba (Editor  Radio Assignments) iminyaka elishumi eGqeberha, ndandulukela eSea Point eKapa ndanguMhleli kumabonakude (Editor: TV Assignments), ndayeka emva kwe10 leminyaka ndabuyela eBhayi njengombhexeshi woMxholo kuMhlobo,” kubalisa uMagoda. 
UMagoda ligqibelo kubantwana abathathu. Uzalelwe ze wakhulela kwidolophu yakuGatyana. 
Abaphulaphuli boMhlobo Wenene bahlala bemncoma bemtyibela ngokuthetha isiXhosa esimnandi nesityebileyo. Uthi oku kwenziwa kukuba ezalelwa kwikhaya lesiXhosa esingaxutywanga nesingenampembelelo zezinye iilwimi. 
“Ndicinga ukuba kukwakho nesiphiwo sokwazi ukulusebenzisa ulwimi lwenkobe kwanokuzingca nokuziqhelanisa ukuthetha isiXhosa,” kutsho lo makhwekhwetha wezosasazo. 
UBaw’ uZizi uthi iimeko zivuma useza kuqhuba ebhexesha le nkqubo ithandwayo yoMhlobo Wenene nanjengoko abaphathi besoneliseka ngumsebenzi wakhe. 
Ebuzwa ngemingeni yale mihla ejamelene nosasazo, uMagoda uthi usasazo lusengxakini ngenxa yokukhula kwesantya sokhuphiswano kuba zininzi izikhululo, ezinye zisasaza ngeintanethi. Kodwa ekwathi ulwalamano phakathi konomathotholo namaqonga onxibelelwano yinguqu ebanzi nekhuthazayo. 
“Kule mihla kulula ukwazi ukuba into othetha ngayo inika umdla ongakanani ngoko nangoko ngokujonga amanani kumakhasi onxibelelwano, nto leyo yayingekho kudala kuba olu qhagamshelwano lwalucalanye. Ithi le nto iyonke abaphathi nabaqulunqi kufuneka baqiqe, badidiyele iinkqubo ezisemagqabini nabasasazi abakwanjalo,” kucebisa lo msasazi. 
Uthi umnqweno wakhe ngowokuba unomathotholo uyeke ukukruqula ngokwenza into enye ekukuthetha nje, kodwa  makakhuphisane nomabonakude, makafike kuqala ezindabeni  nasekupapasheni. 
Imibhoyozo yokuvuyisana nalo msasazi kwiminyaka engama40 ekunomathotholo ibibanjwe kwimpelaveki ephelileyo kwisikolo awayefunda kuso iSt Johns College eMthatha.
title: UMagoda ujong’ emva apho asuka khona nezosasazo

text:
Inye into oyifumanayo xa ethetha uMongameli omtsha weCaf: ufuna kusetyenzwe. Kungenziwa nje kuba kugqithiswa usana kunina, ufuna umsebenzi osemgangathweni ophezulu futhi oza kuthatha iCaf uyibeke endaweni ephezulu ebholeni yehlabathi. Oku kucace ngca okwekati emhlophe ehlungwini ngethuba uGqirha Patrice Motsepe ethetha namajelo eendaba eGoli ekuqaleni kwale veki emva kokonyulwa kwakhe njengoMongameli weCaf ngaphandle kokuphikiswa eRabat, eMorocco, ngoLwesihlanu weveki ephelileyo. Ungene esikhundleni ngexesha elinzima iCaf ingaqhubi kakuhle kwicala lezezimali nakwezolawulo – izinto eziqhokra kakubi uphuhliso lwebhola ekhatywayo. 
“Zininzi izinto ezifuna ukulungiswa,” utshilo uGqirha Motsepe. “Soze ndibe nguMongameli weCaf esisidodo, eza kuthi xa kuphela iminyaka emine ibe ingenanto ebonakalayo eyenzileyo. Kufuneka iCaf enamandla futhi ekwaziyo ukuzenzela ingeniso,” utshilo uGqirha Motsepe. Emva kwentlanganiso yokuqala kaMotsepe, iCaf igqibe kwelokuba iyigcine indlela itumente ye-Afrika eqhutywa ngayo. Oku kuthetha ukuthi iAfrica Cup of Nations (Afcon) iza kubanjwa qho emva kweminyaka emibini nangona amaqela aseYurophu ethanda ukuyigxeka xa engafuni ukukhulula abadlali. 
“Ikhona imibono eyahlukeneyo – kodwa iAfcon iza kuqhubeka qho emva kweminyaka emibini,” utshilo uMotsepe, oncwase ukuqhogana neenkampani ezinkulu ukuze zigalele imali kwiCaf efuna ukutyala imali kuphuhliso lwebhola ye-Afrika. Isizathu esibangela ingaguqulwa iAfcon kungoba yeyona engenisa imali kwiCaf elahlekelwe zizigidi zedola emva kokuqhawula isivumelwano samalungelo okusasaza imidlalo ayethengiselwe inkampani yaseFrance. Into yokuqala uGqirha Motsepe ekulindeleke ayenze kukufumana inkampani eza kuthenga amalungelo okusasaza yonke imidlalo yeCaf ifumaneke nasebantwini base-Afrika abangakwaziyo ukuyibukela ngoku.
title: UGqirha Patrice Motsepe akazimiselanga ukukhokela iCaf esidodo

text: Elowo nalowo ebelangazelela ukufikelela kwikhawuntali, ukuze aqiniseke ngenene ukuba ubufumene utywala.
title: Ukrozo bengxangile, benxanelwe ukunxila

text:
NguGqirha wokuqala kusapho lwakhe kwaye engumntwana wokuqala ukufumana imfundo enomsila kokwabo. 
Lo nguBathini Baphiwe Gqwaru, onguGqirha Gqwaru namhlanje emva kokuthweswa isidanga sezoNyango yiYunivesithi yaseWalter Sisulu eMthatha. 
UGqr. Gqwaru, 24, wazalelwa ze wakhulela eMbizana. Wenze amabanga aphantsi eSt Patrick’s SPS, eBizana Village JS, waze wadlulela eSt Johns College apho aphumelele khona iMatriki. 
UGqwaru ngomnye phakathi kwentaphane yabafundi bezoNyango baseWSU abaqhayise ngempumelelo yabo kumakhasi onxibelelwano izolo (ngoLwesihlanu). 
Engawuvali umlomo, ebalisela I’solezwe lesiXhosa, uthi bekungelula. 
“Ekugqibeleni, ndingathi ndigqibile, okwangoku. Emva kweminyaka emithandathu ndingathi ndiphumle,” kuthetha uGqr. Gqwaru emva kokuthweswa isidanga seMBChB. 
Uthi unyaka wakhe wesibini kwezi zifundo zoNyango wawunzinyana, kuzalwa intombi yakhe, ngelixa kwelinye icala umama wakhe elahlekelwa ngumsebenzi. 
Uthi kulapho kwaye kwafuneka aqalise axhase usapho lwakhe ngezemali ngelixa kwelinye icala ekwangumfundi. 
“Kodwa andifuni kunaba kakhulu ngaloo minyaka, ngoku ndigqibile, ndichulumancile, ndingxamele ukuqalisa ngomsebenzi,” kutsho lo gqirha. 
UGqr. Gqwaru uthi unomdla wokunyanga kwicandelo labantwana (paediatrics) nenyuroloji xa izinto zimhambela kakuhle. 
“Eli cala lelona ndilithandayo kwaye abantwana ndiyabathanda. Ndingathanda ukunceda abantwana, ingakumbi abasezilalini,” utsho. 
UGqr. Gqwaru uthi abantwana abanesigulo sokugogeka kwamalungu omzimba (cerebral palsy) bafumana ubunzima kwaye yena angathanda ukufundisa banzi ngesi gulo. 
Okwangoku uthi ufuna ukuya kuziqhelanisa nomsebenzi (internship) eAddington Hospital eThekwini. 
Uthi angathanda ukubulela usapho lwakhe ngenkxaso, ingakumbi kumama wakhe oqinisekise ukuba uyagqiba esikolweni. 
UGqr. Gqwaru uthi ngowokuqala ukuba nguGqirha kwaGqwaru, kwaye engowokuqala ukuya eyunivesithi, esithi oku kuthetha ukuba uvulele abeza emva kwakhe indlela. 
I’solezwe lithi halala! kuni nonke nithwele izidanga kumacandelo ngamacandelo!
title: Ungxamele ukunyanga othweswe isidanga yiWSU

text:
Abaphathi benkampani ekuthiwa yiR&G Consultants baluthathele kubo uxanduva lokugubhulula italente nokuxhasa ibhola ekhatywayo kwiidolophu eziphantsi kweO.R.Tambo District.  
Kwiveki ephelileyo baququzelele itumente yebhola ekhatywayo enkulu ekuthiwa yiR&G Soccer Challenge equke amaqela alishumi elinesithandathu aphume kwiidolophu ezifana neFlagstaff – apho kwazalelwa umphathi wenkampani, iNgqeleni, uMthatha neLibode. Amaqela abemele iFlagstaff ebemane: yiJabula, iHeavy Stars, iNew Aces neTry Again.  
INgqeleni ibimelwe yiGuqaza, iHappy Brothers, iHappy Team neHotspurs. Wona uMthatha ubumelwe yiFairfield, iHome Defenders, iJazz Lovers neGreen Lovers. ILibode ibithumele iNduna Aces, iSpear, iAce Milan neArsenal. 
Imidlalo ekhiqene kuyo amaqela phambi kwemidlalo yokugqibela ibibanjelwe eMthatha International School Sports Ground iintsuku ezimbini zonke.  
Ngokokutsho komququzeleli wetumente, uMatinise “Tiech” Toni, ingcingane yabo besisigqeba isoloko ikukudibanisa amaqela ebhola ekhatywayo asezilalini ukuze akwazi ukuziqokelelela imali enokuthi iwancede xa esiya kudlala kumanqanaba aphantsi kweSafa kwiphondo leMpuma Koloni. 
 Ukuvumbulula italente entsha yenye yezinto eziphambili kubaququzeleli betumente bencediswa ngamadoda aziwayo ebholeni afana noZolile Mthetho obekade engusompempe wemidlalo yePSL. 
Emva kwemidlalo eqingqithe iintsuku ezimbini, iJabula Football Club iphumelele indebe ekhatshwe yimali engamawaka alishumi elinesihlanu eerandi (R15 000) emva kokuvuthulula iGreen Lovers ngo’3-0 emdlalweni wokugqibela ngeCawe ephelileyo.  
Yona iLovers izixolise ngamawaka asixhenxe namakhulu amahlanu eerandi (R7 500) emva kokuvala itumente ebinzima kwindawo yesibini.  
Amaqela amane aphambili aya kwitumente eza kube iseThekwini. Zonke iindleko zohambo lwamaqela omane ziza kubhatalwa yiR&G Consultants.
title: Ligoduke neR15 000 yonke iqela laseFlagstaff!

text:
Amakhosi azinzile kwindawo yesixhenxe kwiPremier Soccer League emva kokudlala ntangane emdlalweni wanamhlanje. Umdlalo oqale ngesantya esiphezulu obuphakathi kweKaizer Chiefs neBlack Leopards – ushiye uninzi luphoxekile emva kokuba uphele ebambene ngo’1-1 eThohoyandou Stadium ebigcwele ithe qhu ngabalandeli bebhola ekhatywayo (18 0000) baseLimpopo. Bekulindeleke iChiefs ifumane amanqaku amathathu emdlalweni wanamhlanje emva kokubethwa yiBaroka FC ngo’1-0 kwiveki ephelileyo ngenxa yokungawasebenzisi ngokupheleleyo amathuba ekhona. Umqeqeshi wayo, uErnst Middendorp, uqale umdlalo ngabadlali abafana noLorenzo Gordinho, uKabelo Mahlasela, uWillard Katsande nabanye – kodwa iChiefs yakhe ayikwazanga ukuyibetha iBlack Leopards edlale kakuhle isiqingatha sokuqala. UMwape Musonda weLeopards, ohamba phambili ngokufaka amagowuli kwiPSL, namhlanje akabonakalanga nangotshengele emdlalweni. 
Emva kwesiqingatha sokuqala somdlalo, iBlack Leopards neKaizer Chiefs ziye kwixesha lokuphula zibambene ngegowuli elinye macala (1-1). ILeopards iqale yankqonkqoza kwiimpondo zeChiefs kwimizuzu yokuqala. UKarabo Tshepe noMwape Musonda ngabona badlali abaphantse bayonzakalisa iChiefs eqale umdlalo ngabadlali abatsha abasixhenxe. UBernard Parker uphantse wabeka ibhola emnatheni ngentloko emva kokungquba ibhola ebigotywe nguRamahlwe Mphahlele. Khange kube kudala, uAndriamirado “Dax” Andrianarimanana ubhakuzelise umnatha emva kokudlalelwa kakuhle nguWillard Katsande noKabelo Mahlasela. UMarks Monyai ufake igowuli elihle leLeopards ngentloko emva kwebhola ebibekwe phantsi kufuphi nomhlaba kaDaniel Akpeyi. UMwape Musonda uphoswe ligowuli emva kwebhola echithwe nguMario Booysen endaweni embi. 
UDax, ofake igowuli lakhe lokuqala njengomdlali weChiefs, uphantse wafaka elinye igowuli emzuzwini wamashumi amahlanu anesihlanu. Ibhola yakhe inqandwe ngumdlali wasemva weLeopards. Nangona ebehlaselana omabini amaqela – kodwa isantya somdlalo besithande ukuhla kwisigaba sesibini. UKhama Billiat ukhabe imbumbulu yebhola emzuzwini wamashumi amahlanu nesibhozo ephakathi kogxudululu lwabadlali beLeopards abakwazileyo ukuyinqanda ayafikelela kunozinti. Umqeqeshi weChiefs, uErnst Middendorp, ukhuphe uReeve Frosler, obeqala ukudlalela iChiefs, wafaka uPhilani Zulu endaweni yakhe. Yona iLeopards ifake uJoseph Mhlongo ngelizama ukuqinisa umdlalo wayo. Ibhola kaKarabo Tshepe iphumeme ecaleni ayikhabe eyedwa emhlabeni kanozinti. UNdlovu uvale ibhola embi kaZulu. Komnye umdlalo, iHighlands Park ibethe iMaritzburg United esemsileni ngo’1-0 emdlalweni obubanjelwe eMakhulong Stadium. Kanti yona iChippa United ibethwe yiBidvest Wits ngo’1-0 izolo eBhayi. 
   
Leopards: King Ndlovu, Marks Munyai, Chris Katjiuka, Jean Munganga, Pentjie Zulu, Khuliso Mudau, Lehlohonolo Masalesa, Tshwarelo Bereng, Lifa Hlongwane, Karabo Tshepe, Mwape Musonda. 
Amalalela: Rotshidzwa Muleka, Rhivhavhubzi Ndou, Lesedi Kapinga, Ivan Mahangwahaya, Robert Ngambi, Joseph Mhlongo, Thokozani Sekotlong. 
Chiefs: Daniel Akpeyi, Ramahlwe Mphahlele, Mario Booysen, Daniel Cardoso, Lorenzo Gordinho, Reeve Frosler, Adrianarimanana, Willard Kantsande, Kabelo mahlasela, Bernard Parker, Khama Billiat. 
Amalalela: Bruce Bvuma, Ryan Moon, Siphelele Ntshangase, Philani Zulu, Siyabonga Ngezana, Given Thibedi, Njabulo Blom.
title: Amakhosi abuye nomnqongo emva kokubambana neBlack Leopards

text:
Iphelile indlela yeMamelodi Sundowns emva kokuba ibanjwe ngobhongane yi-Al Ahly emdlalweni weCAF Champions League ophele ngegowuli elinye macala eLucas Moripe Stadium ngenjikalanga yanamhlanje. Amasandawana akakwazanga ukufumana amagowuli amathathu eqandeni ebiwadinga emdlalweni obunzima namhlanje ePitoli emva kokubethwa kwawo ngo’2-0 emdlalweni obuseCairo International Stadium kwiveki ephelileyo. Ukufika kwe-Al Ahly kwangoko eMzantsi Afrika kuyisebenzele ngoba ikwazile ukuziqhelanisa neemeko zaseGauteng kwangethuba. Iinzame zikaPitso Mosimane neqela lakhe zokuphakamisa indebe yezwekazi le-Afrika kwakhona ziphanzile kwakhona – kodwa lo nto ibanika ithuba lokuphefumla nokukhusela indebe ye-Absa Premiership emidlalweni eshiyekileyo. Amathuba amabini athe gqi ekuqaleni komdlalo akasetyenziswanga nguThemba Zwane noRicardo Nascimento ovinjwe indlela nguMohamed El Shenawy ezipalini. 
Amaqela aye kwixesha lokuphumla ebambene ngegowuli elinye macala. Oku kwenzeke emva kokuba uLebohang Maboe egwaze umkhonto ekhaya ngokufaka ibhola ezipalini zakhe emzuzwini wamashumi amabini ananye. Umtshutshisi omkhulu, uGaston Sirino, ufake igowuli lokulinganisa ngebhola ayinikelwe nguThemba Zwane. Ibhola egotywe nguHlompho Kekana ayisetyenziswanga kakuhle nguSibusiso Vilakazi oyizame ngentloko. Emva kwexesha elingephi, uPitso ukhuphe uMosa Lebusa, endaweni yakhe wafaka uTebogo Langerman ofike wayishukumisa iAl Ahly ngeebhola eziphuma ephikweni. Umdlalo ubulawulwa yiSundowns kwaye ikwazile ukunyanzela iAl Ahly ukuba ihlale emhlabeni wayo ixesha elide – kodwa ayincedanga lo nto ngoba (iAl Ahly) ibeze eMzantsi Afrika izokukhusela into enayo. Nangona iSundowns yayikhe yabetha iAl Ahly ngamagowuli amahlanu eLucas Moripe Stadium – amathuba okwenza lo nto kwakhona ebembalwa emva kokubethwa eCairo emdlalweni ogqithileyo. 
  
Sundowns: Onyango, Madisha, Nascimento, Lebusa, Ngcongca, Kekana, Jali, Sirino, Zwane, Vilakazi, Maboe. 
Amalalela: Mweene, Langerman, Arendse, Mabunda, Mahlambi, Mhulise, Meza. 
Al Ahly:  ElShenawy, Maaloul, Rabia, Yaser, Fathy, El Soulia, Dieng, Metwally, Geraldo, Ajaye, Badji.
title: IDowns ibanjwe ngobhongwane yi-Al Ahly yaphuma kwiChampions League

text:
Udibene nenyoka iphung’ umhluzi unothimba waseBhayi ngethuba ebebanjwe ngobhongwana wakrazulelwa nalo maphekepheke amaxwebhu eesamoni ebetshambaza ngawo.  
Lo mbhodamo wenzeke ngethuba ibhunga lomasipala waseNelson Mandela belibambe intlanganiso yalo kwiholo iErnest Swanepoel kwidolophu yaseDespatch ngoLwesihlanu esimshiyileyo.  
Le sherifu ibithwele loo maxwebhu ithunywe ukuwadlulisela kooceba bombutho weDemocratic Alliance(DA) uTrevor Louw, Neville Higgins noMbulelo Manyathi ngokomyalelo walo mbutho. 
Esi sithathu saba ngoobholelecaleni nonobangela wokwahlukana kweDA nenqatha selijinga emlonyeni ngokuthi basebenze nxamnye nezigqibo zalo mbutho zokungavoti nomdibaniso obizwa ngokuba yiBlack Caucus equka iANC, EFF, UDM, UF neAfrican Independent Congress (AIC). I-DA, efike ingxamile kule ntlanganiso, ikhatshwa liqaqobana lamalungu aphethe amaqwakuqwaku amaphepha abhalwe imibhalo ethi makehle uBobani, ibineqikili lokuphakamisa ivoti yokungabi nathemba ngakuSodolophu ohleliyo uMongameli Bobani, iqamele ngezityholo nokuba uphantsi kophando lweeHawks ngotyiwo lwemali yophuculo lwendlela yeIPTS nangokududulelwa phandle kwala malungu mathathu kulo ntlanganiso.  
Lo mbutho ubanga ukuba esi sithathu kuquka noBobani lowo – abanalungelo lokuhlala kuloo ntlanganiso. 
 Itsho phantsi kwaqhum’ uthuli  iDA ngethuba uSomlomo weli bhunga uBuyelwa Mafaya, esalela unothimba, esithi uphazamisa intlanganiso kuba akanalungelo lokuhambisa amaxwebhu anjalo intlanganiso iqhuba, nemibutho ekhokela kumasipala ivotela ukuba kungabikho voti yakungathembakali ngakuBobani. 
 Usinde ngezikasibi ngethuba unothimba lowo, ebanjwa ngobhongwana, kwakrazulwa nalo maphepha alahlwa phantsi, wasimbela isinqe ukugoduka emva kokufonywa ngabahlali ebebevutha ngumsindo besithi uyadelela.  
“Ube nenkani kwangentseni simxelela ukuba akanalungelo lokuza kunikezela ngalo maphepha,  sisithi aba bantu banezindlu zabo apho angahanjiswa khona, khangela ke iinkani zakhe zimbeke phi,” utshilo omnye unogada ongavumanga kuzichaza. 
 Inkokheli yeDA kweli phondo, ekwanguceba kulo masipala, uNqaba Bhanga, uthe abazokuncama – baza kubuya ngaye uBobani.
title: Usinde ngokulambisa unothimba waseBhayi

text:
IIMVUMI kuquka nabasasazi beenkqubo zeMaskandi kwizikhululo zikanomathotholo ezincinane eMpuma Koloni, baphakathi koluhlu lwamagama atyunjwe njengabachongwa abalindele ukuwongwa ngembasa yeSouth African Traditional Music Achievement Awards (SATMA) kulo nyaka. 
Olu luhlu lubhengezwe kumsitho obubanjelwe eMbombela, eMpumalanga kwimpelaveki ephelileyo. 
Aba baquka iimvumi zeli phondo ezityunjelwe kwibakala leBest IsiXhosa Artist/Group ezifana noYallunder, Abafana bakuQumbu noSihlangu Semfene. 
Ukanti abasasazi bomculo wesintu kwizikhululo zosasazo zeMpuma Koloni abakhuphisana ngembasa yeBest Traditional Music Community Radio Presenter baquka uYandisa Zizele weKhanya FM yaseGcuwa, uSilulami Dumezweni weNkqubela FM yaseGqeberha, uKhangelani Ngxak’ isefrijini Nkosana weIngwane noJikijwa weNgqushwa FM. 
Lona iphondo leMpuma Koloni livan’ amandla nelaseGauteng, iLimpopo neFree State njengelona phondo linesebe lobuGcisa neNkcubeko elisebenzayo. Iya kuzala nkomoni? Iya kubonana ngaloo mhla mkhulu. 
Xa ufuna ukubona amanye amabakala nendlela yokuvotela omthandayo, ungatyelela kwa: www.satmaawards.co.za 
Xa uvota ubhala igama lalowo umchongayo, uthumele ikhowudi esecaleni kwegama lakhe ku49495, iSMS ixabisa iR1. 50.
title: Iimvumi nabasasazi beMpuma Koloni babizwe kwiSATMA

text:
IDABI eliphakathi kukaGareth Cliff ne M-Net likhulise amarhe okuba ugqogqo lwetalente lwee-Idols lungahlehliswa. 
UCliff uthe ntimfa amaphepha asemthethweni phambi kweM-Net ngenxa yokugxothwa kwakhe kwinkqubo yee-Idols. 
UM-Net wabika ukuba ugxothe lo kaCliff ngeentetha azenze emva kwengxoxo-mpikiswano engobuhlanga edalwe nguPenny Sparrow. 
NgoLwesihlanu, amagqwetha kaCliff anike uM-Net amaxwebhu asemthethweni, aze ngoMvulo avakalisa ukuba izinyanzeliso zawo aziselwanga so, esithi ayaqhuba necala lezomthetho. 
U-Eric Mabuza, noyinxalenye yegqiza lamagqwetha amele uCliff, naye ukungqinile ukuba indumasi yegqwetha, uDali Mpofu, uzakukhokela kulo nyewe. 
Ukanti noxa kunjalo, ii-auditions zokukhangela iimvumi ezilandelayo zizakuqhubekeka ukuqala ngomhla we-30 kuJanyuwari eThekwini. 
Encokola nabemithombo yeendaba, intloko yezopapasho eM-Net, uNondumiso Mabece uthi eli ayilotyala. 
“Okwangoku, akukabikho tshintsho kwinkqubo yee-Idols.”
title: Ekho engekho uCliff, zihlabela-mgama zona ii-Idols!

text:
BEBESELE bebala iintsukwana phambi kokuba bakhumbule unyaka wokuqala lingekho ilungu labo losapho uMayenzeke Skade waseKhowa (Elliot), kodwa endaweni yokumkhumbula bathiwe nkaa ngentlungu yokubiwa kwelitye kwingcwaba lakhe. 
UMayenzeke usweleke kweyoMqungu 2019, ze wenzelwa ilitye kwidlaka lakhe kwindawo ebizwa njengokuba kuKwilokishi Endala eKhowa. 
Ilitye likaMayenzeke labiwa kwinto ekholeleka ukuba ngumkhambathi onexesha elide eqhuba kula madlaka. 
Abantu bale ndawo bathi sele ifana “noqhelekile” into yokubiwa kwamatye, ayokuthengiswa kwimizi yabangcwabi okanye kwimizi ethengisa amatye okungcwaba. Le yingeniso kwabo bathenga la matye xa egqiba kubiwa. Bawathenga ngemali ephantsi xa egqitywa kubiwa emva koko baxhumise amaxabiso xa bewathengisela ezo ntsapho zifuna ukungcwaba. 
Ebalisela I’solezwe lesiXhosa, uWilson Skade, uthi bothuka ngentseni yosuku phambi kweKrismesi ukuba ilitye lomntakwabo libiwe. 
“Ilitye saqaphela ukuba libiwe ngentseni yomhla wamashumi amabini anesine kweyoMnga 2019 kuba kwasa lingekho. Ngoko nangoko sayokubikela amapolisa aseKhowa. Noxa nje sifake isimangalo emapoliseni, saqhuba nokuzisezelela umkhondo. Emva kweentsuku ezimbini, ngomhla wamashumi amabini anesithandathu kweyoMnga 2019, sawufumana umkhondo, wokuba ilitye lomntakwethu likumzi wabangcwabi eMaclear. 
“Sabaleka saya kulo mzi wabangcwabi safika salibona ilitye, babe belibhala ngokokutsha. Sabona ukuba masiyokuthatha amapolisa aseMaclear, afika ambamba umntu okwafikwa ebhala. Sabuya nalo ilitye labe sele linombhalo wumbi,” kutsho uWilson. 
UWilson uthi lo mrhanelwa osebenza kulo mzi wabangcwabi waseMaclear uvele phambi kweNkundla yaseMaclear ngomhla wesibini kule nyanga yoMqungu apho athe wanikwa umdliwo wamawaka amahlanu eerandi (R5 000). 
Emva kokuba enikwe lo mdliwo eMaclear uthathwe wazovalelwa eKhowa, kodwa akazange aphinde abekwe tyala kuba umantyi, ngokokutsho kosapho lakwaSkade, wavakalisa ukuba umrhanelwa akanakugwetywa kabini. 
“Into engasonelisiyo yile yokuba kugxilwe kuphela kumbandela wokuba lifunyenwe phi ilitye kuyeke ukugxilwa kule yokubiwa kwelitye,” kutsho uSkade. 
USkade uthi yabakhubekisa umphefumlo ukufumanisa ukuba ilitye lomntakwabo libiwe. “Akukabimnandi nangoku,” utshilo esithi maninzi amatye asele ebiwe eKhowa. 
“Maninzi kakhulu amatye abiweyo apha eKhowa. Umkhondo wokubiwa kwelomntakwethu sawuva ngomfo waseDyoki othi bona bancedwa kukuya kulo mzi wabangcwabi baxelele umnini wala ndawo ukuba ohlukane nokweba amatye wabantu,” utshilo uWilson. 
Iinzame zokufumana uluvo lalo mzi wabangcwabi azikhange ziphumelele ngethuba sibhala eli nqaku, into eyenza kubenzima ukubiza igama lawo.
title: Umkhuba wokubiwa kwamatye kumadlaka aseKhowa

text:
Kwiinyanga ezimbalwa ezidlulileyo siye sajonga iindlela ezahlukeneyo zokukunceda ugcine imali eyaneleyo yokuthatha umhlalaphantsi ungekho phantsi ngoxinizelelo. 
 Nangona kubalulekile ukufumana imali eyoneleyo xa usondela kwiminyaka yakho yomhlalaphantsi kubalulekile, kukwabalulekile ukuba usebenze ngobulumko ngokulondoloza kwakho ukuqinisekisa ukuba imali yomhlalaphantsi ayipheli. 
 Njengoko sisondela ekupheleni kochungechunge lwethu ngokucwangcisa umhlalaphantsi, amanqaku ambalwa okugqibela aya kujonga ngeendlela ezahlukeneyo zokukunceda ukulawula ngocoselelo ukugcinwa kwakho komhlalaphantsi. Ukuqala, siza kucubungula ezinye zezinto eziphambili ezixhasa inkqubo yokuthatha umhlalaphantsi.  
Ukuqonda oko ukuba bathetha ukuthini kunye nendlela abasebenza ngayo, linyathelo lokuqala ukuze bakwazi ukwenza izigqibo ezinolwazi malunga neemali zakho zexesha elizayo. 
Zeziphi iindlela ozikhethayo xa ufuna umhlalaphantsi? 
Ukuba ulilungu lengxowa yomhlalaphantsi, unokukhetha ukuba: 
Thatha isinye kwisithathu(one-third) somvuzo wakho wokuthatha umhlalaphantsi njengemali yentlawulo yemali kwaye usebenzise inzuzo eseleyo ukuthenga isibonelelo esinikezelwa ngumhlalaphantsi (esibizwa ngokuba yi-annuity); okanye usiyeke isixa semali kwaye usebenzise inzuzo epheleleyo ukuthenga i-annuity. Ubuncinane bomyinge we-annuity okwangoku nguR247 500. Oku kuthetha ukuba  inzuzo yakho yomhlalaphantsi ingaphantsi kwexabiso lemvume, ungavunyelwa ukuthatha inzuzo epheleleyo ngemali. 
Imithetho yokuthatha umhlalaphantsi kwiProvident Fund iyahluka kancinci. KwiNgxowamali yokubonelela unokuthatha i-100% yengeniso yakho yomhlalaphantsi njengesixa semali. Ukuba uthatha isigqibo sokuthatha imadlana kunjalo, (okanye uthathe isigqibo sokungathathi kwamali ezinkozo), inzuzo eseleyo iya kufuneka isetyenziswe ukuthenga i-annuity. 
Kubalulekile ke ukwazi ukuba urhulumente ucinga ukutshintsha imithetho malunga nokuhlawulwa kweeNgxowamboleko zeProvident Fund ukusuka ngomhla we-1 Matshi 2018, ukuba zihambelane nezePensions kunye nePension Annuity Funds. 
Ziziphi iintlobo ezahlukeneyo ze-annuity? 
Kukho iintlobo ezimbini ezibanzi onokukhetha kuzo, i-Living Annuities kunye ne-Gauranteed. Apha ngaphantsi yinkcazelo ekwinqanaba eliphezulu lezinto eziphambili zeemveliso ezimbini: 
Ii-Annuties eziphilayo (Living Annuities) 
Kwi-Annuity ephilayo unayo inzuzo kunye nokuguquguquka kokukhetha utyalomali oluthile olwenza ixabiso lomgaqonkqubo wakho. Uvumelekile ukuba ukhethe inani lemali engenayo oyifumana ngokuqhelekileyo evela kwi-investments – oku kuphakathi kwe-2.5% -17.5% yexabiso elipheleleyo ngonyaka, kwaye unokutshintsha le pesenti kanye ngonyaka, ngonyaka wesikhumbuzo sokuqala kwepolisi yakho. Xa usweleka, abaxhamli bakho bayakuzuza kwimali yakho eshiyekileyo. Ixabiso leLiving Life Annuity aliqinisekanga kwaye luxhomekeke kutyalomali lwakho kunye nemali yakho yomvuzo engenayo. Oku kuthetha ukuba ubeka emngciphekweni imali yakho ngokuhamba kwexesha xa ingalawulwa ngokuchanekileyo. 
IAnnuities eqinisekisiweyo (Gauranteed Annuities) 
I-Annuities eqinisekisiweyo yenzelwe ukuhlawula imali ngentsalela yobomi bakho, kungakhathaliseki ukuba uhlala ixesha elingakanani. Ziye zithengiswa ziinkampani ze-inshorensi xa uthenga ishorensi  ngempumelelo (kunokuba utyale imali yakho yonke yomhlalaphantsi). Ingeniso oyifumanayo isekelwe kumanani amaninzi, njengokuba umgcini-inshorensi elindele kangakanani ukuba uphile kunye nohlobo lwe-annuity oyithengayo. Ngenxa yokuba inshorensi iqinisekisa ingeniso yakho, umvuzo wemali uhlala uphantsi kakhulu xa uthelekiswa nemilinganiselo ephezulu engenayo efunyenwe kwi-Living Annuity. Nangona kunjalo, akukho mngcipheko wokuba ungadlulisa umvuzo wakho emva kokufa kwakho akukho ntlawulo kubaxhamli bakho, nangona kukho iinketho ezithile ongazongeza kwimigaqonkqubo yakho (kwi-premium) ukuvumela abaxhamli bakho ukuba baqhubeke befumana ingeniso emva kokudlula kwakho emhlabeni. 
Zeziphi iirhafu eziza kufuneka uzihlawule? 
Nangona isabelo somvuzo wakho womhlalaphantsi othenge ngaso i-annuity (okokusebenzisa ukuthenga i-annuity) ayikho phantsi kwerhafu, ingeniso oyifumanayo kwi-annuity ihlawuliswa ngokusekelwe kwiminyaka yakho kunye nemali engenayo. 
Ukuba uthatha isigqibo sokuthatha isixamali sentlawulo yomhlalaphantsi, isixamali eso siyakutsalwa imali yerhafu nesifunyanwa kwirhafu ekwingxowamali yeRhafu yengxowa-mali yomhlalaphantsi okanye uluhlu lwerhafu yenzuzo. Okwangoku, i-R500 000 yokuqala ihlawuliswa kwi-0%, emva koko isixa sentlawulo sihlawuliswa kumaqela angu-18%, i-27% ne-36%. Kubalulekile ukuba uqaphele ukuba irhafu isetyenziswe kwisiseko esibalulekileyo. Oku kuthetha ukuba i-fund yangaphambili yomhlalaphantsi yomvuzo, isibonelelo semali kunye nezibonelelo ezithile zokunciphisa unokuthi ziqwalaselwe xa zibala i-tax tax account. 
Isishwankathelo, kukho into onokuyiqwalasela xa usenza isigqibo malunga nesithuba somhlalaphantsi. Ukwazi ukuba okanye ungathathi isabelo semali ngexesha lomhlalaphantsi okanye ukuba yeyiphi inkokhelo yokuthenga i-annuity yokuthenga engaba nzima. Ngexesha elingasentla linikezela ngophawu oluphezulu lwezinye zezinto eziphambili, yinjongo efanelekileyo ukubonisana nomcebisi wezezimali ozimeleyo ukuseka isicwangciso sokuthatha umhlalaphantsi esilungileyo (kunye nentsapho yakho).
title: Indlela yokuphuma nemali ebonakalayo yomhlalaphantsi

text:
Abahlali baseKamvelihle kwaWard 53 eMotherwell, batyhola uSodolophu weNelson Mandela Bay uMongameli Bobani ngokukhetha iphel’emasini xa enikezela ngeenkonzo.  
Oku kuthethwe ngabahlali abe bevutha ngumsindo abamise ngxi iinkonzo ngoLwesithathu kule veki betshisa amatayala avuthayo bevala iindlela ezingenayo neziphumayo eMotherwell. 
Abahlali abaqale imigushuzo ngabendawo yoogobityholo ebizwa iAsijiki ababanga ngelithi iinkonzo zinikwa elinye icala lamatyotyombe elibizwa iNomakanjani. 
Bathi intsusamabandla iqale emva kwentlanganiso noCeba obaxelele ukuba umbane uzokufakwa kuqala eNomakanjani nanjengoko imali iphumele ela cala, yaye iAsijiki izokufumana isabelo semali yeenkonzo emva kohlahlo lwabiwomali loomasipala kwinyanga yeKhala. 
Abahlali ebebengathethi nanye ethethwa nguceba banyanzelise impendulo ekhawulezileyo kusodolophu begrogrisa ngelithi abazuvota ngomhla wesibhozo kuCanzibe ukuba abawufakelwa umbane. 
Usihlalo wabahlali, uNompumelelo Mana, ubethe ngenqindi phantsi esithi uBobani makazifeze izithembiso zakhe angacalucaluli.  
“UBobani makangayiqhekezi phakathi le wadi, iinkonzo makazohlule ngokulinganayo. Wayethe masiwusebenzise umhlaba, siyawusebenzisa, makasinike iimfuno zethu. Sisiqalo esi ukuba asiwufakelwa thina umbane siseza kuqhuba noqhankqalazo yaye sizokuqiniseka ukuba iprojekthi ayiqhubi nakwela cala,” ufunge watsho. 
Bathi into evus’umnyele ngentseni ziingxelo abazivileyo ezithi sezikhona izixhobo zokufakelwa umbane abantu baseNomakanjani, banyanzelisa ukuba zohlulwe phakathi nakubo ziziswe ngokukhawuleza.  
“Sifuna u50/50 wezinto ezenziwayo kule wadi hayi ukuba kulungelwe icala elinye, umbane siyawufuna nathi yaye asizuvota ungafakwanga. Sisebugxwayibeni apha sidinga nezindlu zangasese kubi kuthi kwicala leenkonzo,” utshilo. 
Ugaleleke uBobani imimoya isephezulwana, wayicima loo ntlantsi ngelithi iinkonzo zizokufunyanwa ngokulinganayo, omabini amacala aza kufakelwa umbane ngokukhawuleza. 
 “Amaxhala phantsi, okwenziwa eNomakanjani kuzokwenziwa eAsijiki, iinkonzo zezenu, le wadi inye nesithili sokuvota sinye. Ayisoze yenzeke eyokuba iinkonzo zifunyanwe ngabathile logama abanye bengazifumani,” uthembise watsho. 
UBobani uyibethelele eyokuba kwakule veki uzokuqalisa umsebenzi wokufakelwa kombane, ethembisa kambe ukuba nezindlu zangasese zisendleleni.
title: Bakhalela ukucalucalulwa nguBobani!

text:
Emva kokubethwa kabuhlungu yiJapan kwiNdebe yeHlabathi ngo-2015, namhlanje uMzantsi Afrika ufumene ithuba lokuphindisa emdlalweni obalulekileyo eTokyo Stadium. AmaBhokobhoko abethe iJapan ngo’26-3 emini namhlanje kwatsho kwaphela ngayo kwiNdebe yeHlabathi emdlalweni obunzima kakhulu. Izigidi zabantu baseJapan ebezinethemba lokubona iqela lesizwe lingena kwimidlalo ephambi komdlalo wokugqibela kwiNdebe yeHlabathi zishiyeke zibambelele ezidleleni. Umdlalo ubunzima macala kwisigaba sokuqala nangona kuyiwe kwixesha lokuphumla AmaBhokobhoko ehamba phambili ngo’5-3. Abadlali bakaRassie Erasmus babuye belume ongezantsi ekhefini. Balele emgceni izihlandlo ezibini – kodwa nguMakazole Mapimpi oziqaqambisileyo ngokulala kabini emgceni esebenzisa isantya sakhe ephikweni. 
Utshice ityhefu uMapimpi yatsho yavuleka indlela yoMzantsi Afrika osokoleyo kwisigaba sokuqala somdlalo. Umdlali waseJapan obephantsi koxinizelelo, uKeita Inagaki, ube nethamsanqa ngethuba esinda ekhadini elibomvu emva kokudlala kakubi isigantsontso soMzantsi Afrika – uTendai Mtawarira. Umdlali othe waqaqamba emdlalweni ibe nguFaf de Klerk olele kanye emgceni. Emva kokudlala ngendlela encomekayo kwitumente yehlabathi yalo nyaka, indlela yeJapan ifikelele esiphelweni namhlanje. Ziindaba ezimnandi ezo ebantwini baseMzantsi Afrika abebesakhala ngento eyenzeka ngo-2015. Ngoku AmaBhokobhoko aza kuqubisana neWales kwiveki ezayo emdlalweni ophambi kwamagqibelakankqoyi eYokohama Stadium. 
 
Japan: 15 Ryohei Yamanaka, 14 Kotaro Matsushima, 13 Timothy Lafaele, 12 Ryoto Nakamura, 11 Kenki Fukuoka, 10 Yu Tamura, 9 Yutaka Nagare, 8 Kazuki Himeno, 7 Lappies Labuschagne, 6 Michael Leitch (captain), 5 James Moore, 4 Luke Thompson, 3 Koo Ji-won, 2 Shota Horie, 1 Keita Inagaki. 
Amalalela: 16 Atsushi Sakate, 17 Isileli Nakajima, 18 Asaeli Ai Valu, 19 Wimpie van der Walt, 20 Amanaki Lelei Mafi, 21 Fumiaki Tanaka, 22 Rikiya Matsuda, 23 Lomano Lava Lemeki. 
South Africa: 15 Willie le Roux, 14 Cheslin Kolbe, 13 Lukhanyo Am, 12 Damian de Allende, 11 Makazole Mapimpi, 10 Handre Pollard, 9 Faf de Klerk, 8 Duane Vermeulen, 7 Pieter-Steph du Toit, 6 Siya Kolisi (captain), 5 Lood de Jager, 4 Eben Etzebeth, 3 Frans Malherbe, 2 Bongi Mbonambi, 1 Tendai Mtawarira. 
Amalalela: 16 Malcolm Marx, 17 Steven Kitshoff, 18 Vincent Koch, 19 RG Snyman, 20 Franco Mostert, 21 Francois Louw, 22 Herschel Jantjies, 23 Frans Steyn.
title: UMapimpi utshice ityhefu yatsho yavuleka indlela yoMzantsi Afrika emdlalweni obuseTokyo!

text:
IBhodi elawula ukuthengiswa kotywala eMpuma Koloni (Eastern Cape Liquor Board) ikhuphe isilumkiso kubafundi isithi mabazikhwebule kwiziyunguma zokubhiyozela ukugqiba ukubhala iimviwo phantsi kwento abayibiza njengePens Down. 
IPens Down sisiyunguma esenziwa ngabafundi, ingakumbi abo bakumabanga aphezulu, xa begqiba kubhala iimviwo zokuphela konyaka. 
Ngenxa yezi ziyunguma, imizi yeentselo ide iququzele imisitho emikhulukazi isithi yiPens Down Party. 
“Okuqaphelekayo kukuba kwezi ziyunguma, abafundi basebenzisa utywala ngendlela egwenxa eye ibangele ukuba bazibandakanye nokwabelana ngezesondo. Ezi ziyunguma zivame ukwenzekela kwiindawo zikawonkewonke ezifana neelwandle okanye kwimizi yentselo. 
“Into exhalabisayo ngoku, kukuba kubaneziphumo ezibi. Ekuqaleni kwalo nyaka, iteksi yatshayisa abafundi ababekwisiyunguma sePens Down KwaZakhele eBhayi, apho kwabhubha abafundi abangamantombazana ababini abakwiminyaka elishumi elinesine,” kutsho isithethi sale Bhodi uMgwebi Msiya. 
UMsiya ucele abazali ukuba baqaphele abantwana babo ngeli xesha likaxakeka watsho ememelela nakubathengisi botywala ukuba bahlonele imiyalelo yeelayisenisi zabo, bangathengiseli iintsana utywala. 
 Xa ubona umnini wevenkile yotywala esenza okukhabanyo nelayisenisi yakhe fowunela iEastern Cape Liquor Board ku: 080 000 0420   
Xa ubona umnini wevenkile yotywala esenza okukhabanyo nelayisenisi yakhe fowunela iEastern Cape Liquor Board ku: 080 000 0420
title: Isilumkiso kubafundi ngeziyunguma zePens Down

text:
“UKUBA kukho bani ongaphathekanga kakuhle yimizekelo yam eyavakala ikukuqhula: ndithi ngxe! Ibingeyonjongo yam ukujongela phantsi nabani na.” 
Oku kwathethwa nguMphathiswa wezeMfundo wePhondo laseMpuma Koloni ongasekhoyo uMandla Makupula (57), kwimbalelwano eyayipapashwe liphephandaba I’solezwe lesiXhosa kunyaka ophelileyo. 
UMakupula wayephendula kwizankxwe kwinqaku elalipapashwe leli phephandaba apho wayekhuthaza ootitshala ukuba mababengumzekelo kubafundi. 
Iqhula, isicaka soluntu, itshantliziyo, utitshala wezibalo kwanosopolitiki – uMakupula ibingumntu obezixakekise ngekamva labantwana beli phondo. Noxa nje iziphumo zebakala leshumi elinesibini (Grade 12) bezirhuqa emva xa kuthelekiswa namanye amaphondo, uMakupula akazange alilahle ithemba futhi ebesoloko ekholelwa ukuba kukusebenza nzima nokuzinikela okunokutshintsha imeko yezemfundo kweli phondo. 
UMakupula ukhokele eli sebe iminyaka esibhozo. Noxa nje abanye abantu bebemgxeka, akazange avumele izankxwe zimphazamise kumsebenzi wakhe wokuphucula imfundo yabantwana beli phondo. 
UMakupula waqeqeshelwa ubutitshala kwiYunivesithi yaseTranskei (eyaziwa njengeWalter Sisulu University ngoku), ze wahlohla izifundo zezibalo nenzululwazi kwibakala lamabanga aphezulu. Ukhe wayiyo nenqununu, into exela ukuba njengoMphathiswa ebesenza into ayaziyo, hayi ukuthekelela. Waxelela eli phephandaba ukuba ikhondo lobutitshala yinto esondele kakhulu kwintliziyo yakhe, ngoko ke uye angathandi xa ebona ootitshala benxibe ngendlela engafanelekanga. 
Kumsebenzi wakhe, uMakupula ebesoloko ebonela kutitshala wakhe ongasekhoyo uDouglas Vakele Mapisa. UMapisa lo, ozala umama uNosiviwe Mapisa-Nqakula, wayeyinqununu eMdantsane, efundisa uMakupula. 
“Iimfundiso zakhe ezakhayo zisandikhokela nangoku ebomini bam. Lowo ke nguMnu. DV Mapisa, owayesakuba yinqununu yaseLangelitsha Higher Primary eMdantsane. Wayegxininisa ukubanjwa kwexesha, ucoceko, ukufaneleka kwisinxibo, ukusebenza ngokuzinikela, nokuba impumelelo iyasetyenzelwa. 
“Ndisoloko ke njalo ndihlab’ ikhwelo kwimihlangano nabasebenzi besebe ukuba silandele imizekelo yooBawo uMapisa, nto leyo inokubuyisa isidima nesithozela kubutitshala nakubafundi njengobizo,” uMakupula waxelela eli phephandaba. 
Kwinyanga ephelileyo, kumsitho wokudiza ngenani lootitshala bonyaka ka2019, sileli qela lephephandaba I’solezwe safika sele ethethile nezinye iintatheli uMakupula, kulandela ukubambeka linqaku elikwanxulumene nezemfundo eMdantsane. 
“Hayi akukho ngxaki masiyokuphaka, ze sithethe xa sisitya,” kwatsho uMakupula eyalela iintatheli zephephandaba I’solezwe ukuba ziyokuhlala naye etafileni, zidlane iindlebe naye ngombandela wenani lootitshala abafanele ukuba basesikolweni kunyaka ozayo. 
Emva kokuba sithethile, uMakupula wathi: “Qhubani manene, umsebenzi wephephandaba I’solezwe wokupapasha iindaba ngolwimi lwesiNtu siyawubona, futhi siwuqaphele.” 
Apha sithetha ngomntu obeyikhathalele kunene imfundo, esithi into ebangela lo nto kukuba ufuna ukubenza bancume “abazali abancama imali yabo yokugqibela kuba befuna ikamva eliqaqambileyo labantwana babo.” 
Noxa nje izinto bezingancumisi mzi, uMakupula ebesoloko ekholelwa ukuba ukhona umqela owenziweyo leli sebe. 
“Kodwa ke kubalulekile ukuqwalasela umsebenzi omkhulu esiwenzileyo silisebe. Ngokomzekelo, umfundi wokuqala omnyama othe watshatshela kwilizwe liphela ebephuma apha kweli phondo. Lowo nguLuvo Luzipho wase-St James kuCofimvaba, owabhengezwa ngonyaka ka2014 njengomfundi wokuqala omnyama ogqwesileyo phantsi kwenkqubo yentando yesininzi,” watsho uMakupula. 
Asisayithethi ke eyobuqhula bakhe. Ethetha nabafundi, ootitshala nabazali eNgcingwana eDutywa nyakenye, uMakupula wathi: “Namhlanje sixakene nootata ekuthiwa ziiBlesser. Uyayazi ingxaki yala mntu (Blesser) yintoni? Ndingangayichani kakuhle kuba andiyiyo iBlesser, kodwa ebomini into endiyifundileyo kukuba, xa ukhe waphosa inqanaba elinye uyakuhlala uqhwalela unaphakade.” 
“Ndiyasola ukuba la mfo (Blesser) akazange amdlale undize ngexesha elifanelekileyo. Ngoku sele [emdala] usafuna ukudlala undize nabantwana, kuba kaloku undize yinto yabantwana,” kwatsho uMakupula. 
Phumla Ngoxolo Dlangathi!
title: Makupula: Iqhula nesicaka soluntu

Sicela urhulumente angenelele apha kwezi thenda zeSecurity, siyafa kukugqilazwa zizo! Uphangele (more than 25 days) kodwa urhole R2500.
