Le ngxelo ithi iziganeko zoqhankqalazo kweli ziqhutywe ukusukela ngenyanga yokuqala yalo nyaka. Othethe egameni lale nkampani uKaren Heese, uthi ibangela inkxalabo le meko yabahlali abaqhankqalaza yonke indawo.  
“Okona kuxhalabisa kakhulu kukuba ngaphandle kokuba zikhula ezi ziganeko, abantu baqhankqalaza ngendlela enobundlobongela obugqithisileyo, oku kuthetha ukuba silahlekiwe ngumbono wezona zinto zifunwa ngabantu bethu,”uthethe watsho uHeese. Le ngxelo ithi iphondo leMpuma Koloni lelona lihamba phambili ngeziganeko zoqhankqalazo lilandelwa liphondo laseRhawutini kugqibele iphondo laseNtshona Koloni. “Kunyaka ophelileyo sibe neziganeko ezilikhulu namashumi asixhenxe anesine kuphela unyaka wonke, zingahle zigqithise nangaphezulu kulo unyaka,”uthethe watsho uHeese. 
Kutshanje abahlali kumasipala waseMalahleni baqhube uqhankqalazo kwidolophu ezimbini zalo masipala eziquka iCacadu neDordretch bekhalazela iinkonzo ezingafikiyo kubo.KuQoboqobo abahlali ngenyanga kaCanzibe batshise inqwelo zokusebenza zakwamasipala,ithala leencwadi neeofisi zikamazipala.Umphengululi zincwadi jikelele uKimi Makwethu kwinyanga ephelileyo udize ukuba ngomasipala abakumakhulu amabini namashumi amahlanu anesixhenxe abangakwazi kusebenzisa imali karhulumente ngendlela eyiyo.Ethetha ngezingxaki uMakwethu wathi oku kubangela umsindo kubahlali baze babhenele kuqhankqalazo. ”Ulawulo lezimali,ulawulo jikelele nokungabikho kwezakhono ezifunekayo yenye yonobangela bengxaki komasipala,’watsho uMakwethu.Umasipala waseEnoch Mgijima uthengise izixhobo zakhe kwintengiso yasesidlangalaleni kwinyanga ephelileyo ngenxa yokuba bengakwazi kuhlawula ityala lenkampani yeNjineli. 
Ecacisa ngendima yesebe lakhe kwinyanga ephelileyo umphathiswa wesebe lentsebenziswano kurhulumento nemicimbi yemveli uFikile Xasa wathi okwabo kukungenelela bencedisa ukuze kufunyanwe isisombululo.
title: Ikhokele iMpuma Koloni kuqhankqalazo!

text:
IBizana Pondo Chiefs igxeleshe ukunyukela kwindawo yokuqala kumjikelo wesibini weABC Motsepe League.  
IPondo Chiefs izenzele igama kwisizini ephelileyo ngethuba ikhuphisana neTornado FC nePE Stars ngendawo yokuqala kwiMotsepe League.  
Kodwa ngelishwa layo, intshinga yaphunyelelwa yiTornado FC ebhangileyo kunyaka ophelileyo.  
Usihlalo weChiefs, uNkosinathi Mqokiyana, uxelele eli phephandaba okokuba iqela lincwase indawo yokuqala kwisigaba sesibini kule sizini.  
NgoMgqibelo odlulileyo, iChiefs ivule unyaka ngokunyukela kwindawo yesine emva kokuba ithwaxe iBirmingham City FC ngamagowuli amane eqandeni (4-0). Ezo ziphumo ziyisuse kwindawo yesithandathu zayibeka kweyesine, ngoku inamanqaku angamashumi amabini anesihlanu emva kwemidlalo elishumi elinesine. 
IChiefs ijonge ukunyusa umxakatho ngakumbi kumjikelo wesibini wesizini eqhubekayo.  
“Kuzo zonke iisizini, sidlala ngokuzimisela ngoba sifuna impumelelo. Nakule isizini siza kuyilwela indawo yokuqala,” utshilo uMqokiyana.  
Kanti kwelinye icala, iMatta Milan yaseDutywa iphose ithuba lokubuyela kwindawo yokuqala emva kokuba idlale ntanganye ngo’1-1 neSpear of the Nation.  
Omabini la maqela ebesethubeni lokunyukela kwindawo yokuqala ngempelaveki ngoba ebefuthela emagxeni weBush Bucks FC.  
Sihleli kwindawo yesibini iSpear of the Nation ngamanqaku angamashumi amabini anesixhenxe lo gama yona iMatta Milan ikwindawo yesithathu ngamanqaku angamashumi amabini anesithandathu, ishiywa ngenqaku elinye yiBucks FC emva kweziphumo zemidlalo egqithileyo. 
Imidlalo yeABC Motsepe League: 
Amavarara adlala neBirmingham City FC, iBhisho Stars idibana neYaka United, iBush Bucks neSwartkops Valley United Brothers, iBush Pirates idlala neSpear of the Nation, iHighbury neSibanye FC, iMatta Milan yamkela iPeace Makers, uze wona uMthatha Bucks udlale nePE Stars.
title: Ilwela indawo yokuqala kwakhona iPondo Chiefs

text:
KAPA:  
Isixeko saseThekwini saziwa njengeso singungqa phambili ekuveliseni umculo wohlobo lweGqom nothandwa kakhulu lulutsha kwiindawo ezishishina ngotywala kweli loMzantsi Afrika nalapho bathi bajuxuze kuze kuse xa kukhala olu hlobo lomculo kwiindawo zentselo. . 
Kungokunje isixeko saseThekwini sinemvumi entsha yomculo weGqom esaze ngobuso elizweni uSisipho Nontanda (27) oyinzalelwane yaseMthatha nokhulele kwisixeko saseThekwini. 
 Nalapho wafika wadibana neqela lamantombi amathathu, iqela labo lomculo balibiza ukuba yiCaos.  
Uthi ngethuba ekwiqela leCaos wadibana noDJ Deep nosele walandulela eli ngomnyaka ka2016 phambi kokuba bakhuphe ingoma yabo yokuqala. 
USisipho kungokunje uzibandakanye neZiyawamo Productions nezinze eGugulethu eNtshona Koloni.  
Le nzwakazi eseze ngobuso elizweni itshotsha entla kumculo weGqom. Ithe yashicilela ingoma yayo yokuqala eZiyamo kwinyanga ephelileyo. 
 Igama lengoma yakhe entsha yeGqom ithi ‘Jitha’ nethe kamva yalandelwa zezinye iingoma ezintathu athe wazenza nooDJ baseKapa esingakhankanya kubo uDJ Mowie waseNew Cross kwanoMashaya ophuma eRobertson. Eli nenekazi liqale ukucula ngonyaka ka2010.  
“IGqom iyandonwabisa, ndiphila yona ndenza into endiyithanda ngentliziyo yam yonke yaye akuvakali nokuba ndiyasebenza xa ndisenza umculo wam ngenxa yothando lwam kumculo weGqom,” utshilo uSisipho.  
Uthi ngethuba ekhula wayethanda ukumamela umculo wabantu abafana noMshoza, kwanoLebo Mathosa ongasekhoyo.  
Esitsho ukuba uthe ekukhuleni akafuna ukufana nabo wafuna ukuba abe nguye acule umculo awuthandayo. 
Ucebisa abantu abafuna ukungena kwikhono lomculo ukuba bangazenzi abanye abantu bazimisele benze oko bakuthandayo. 
 USisipho wenza izifundo zakhe zobuNtatheli kunyaka wakhe wokugqibela kwiKholeji yoqeqesho iDamelin.  
Ukanti le mvumi ngomhla wokuqala kule ibephezulu ithe yatshila eqongeni ngengoma yayo yokuqala eClub 7 eBellvile.  
Ngomhla wesibini kule iphezulu ithe yabelana ngeqonga neDestruction Boyz eLounge eWorcester.
title: Ukhula mihla le umculo weGqom!

text:
Urhulumente waseMpuma Koloni uphumeze izigidi ezingamashumi amahlanu eerandi ukulungisa izibhedlele ezintandathu ukuze zikwazi ukumelana nomthamo wabagula yintsholongwane yeKhorona. 
Ezi zibhedlele yiGrey eQonce, iNompumelelo eNgqushwa, Isilimela eSajonisi, iSt Elizabeth eLusikisiki, Mthatha General kwakunye neDora Nginza eBhayi. 
Ukulungiswa kwezi zibhedlele sele kuqalile, utshilo urhulumente waseMpuma Koloni. 
INkulubaphathiswa uOscar Mabuyane uthi ukuchithwa kwale mali yokulungiswa kwezi zibhedlele kuza kushiya umqela oncomekayo nanjengoko imigangatho yazo ibisele iwohloka. 
Kusenjalo, uMabuyane uthi amanani wabo bosuleleke yintsholongwane yeKhorona aseza kunyuka ngenxa yesicwangciso abanaso sokuhlola abantu. 
“Sisesenyeleni, umcimbi uza kuba shushu njengoko ziqengqeleka iinyanga. Hlala endlini, ukhusele usapho lwakho,” utshilo uMabuyane. 
INkulubaphathiswa ithi abantu abazimasa imingcwabo mababeke ukhuseleko lwabo phambili. 
“Enye into ekufuneka iqondiwe kukuba nokuba inani labo bazimase isingcwabo lingakanani, abantu baza kosuleleka yile ntsholongwane yeKhorona xa bengabeki phambili imiqathango yokuzikhusela. 
“Nokuba abantu balishumi basenokosulelana xa bengabeki phambili imiqathango yokuzikhusela. Into ebalulekileyo kukuba ubani angayi esingcwabeni xa kungekho mfuneko. 
“Masizame ukunqanda ukunwenwa kwale ntsholongwane ngaphandle kokuba side sibekwe iliso ngabezomthetho. Ukhuseleko lwethu lubaluleke kakhulu,” kutsho uMabuyane. 
“Hlala endlini uphume kuphela xa kunyanzelekile, ngokuya kuthenga ukutya okanye usiya kwiinkonzo zempilo. Masihlambe izandla rhoqo futhi sizikhwebule kwiindibano zasezidlangalaleni.”
title: Khorona: Kuphunyezwe iR50 million yokulungisa izibhedlele

text:
“Ndingalwa ndibe bomvu ngesiXhosa sam!” La ngamazwi kaAkhona ‘Bhodl’ingqaka’ Mafani xa ebephosa esivivaneni ngokubaluleka kokubhalwa, ukufundwa nokulondolozwa kolwimi lwesiXhosa kumnyhadala iAmazwi Puku Story Festival kwisixeko iMakhanda kweli leMpuma Koloni. 
Lo mnyhadala nobusaziwa ngokuba yiPuku Story Festival uthe wahlangulwa ekutshabalaleni yiNational English Literary Museum (Nelm).  
Lo msitho ububanjwa ityeli lesixhenxe kulo nyaka ukususela oko wasungulwa ngoka2013 liqumrhu iPuku Foundation nezinze eGoli. Ububanjwe ukusuka ngomhla wama21 ukuya kowama23 kule yoMdumba.  
Umhla wama21 kweyoMdumba ngumhla obaluleke kakhulu kwihlabathi jikelele, nowaziwa ngokuba ngumhla wokusebenzisa ulwimi oluncance ebeleni, i-International Mother Language Day.  
Kusenjalo, umbutho weZizwe eziManyeneyo uye wabhengeza ukuba unyaka lo sikuwo wama-2019 ngunyaka weelwimi zemveli kwihlabathi jikelele, i-International Year of Indigenous Languages ngokwamakhumsha. 
Lo kaMafani ekunye nenye imbongi ephume izandla eMpuma Koloni ngamacwecwe ayo emibongo, uSiphelo ‘Nqontsonqa’ Dyongman, baxelele loo nginginya ukuba ulwimi luyinkcubeko ekufuneka elowo azidle ngayo kuba luthi luncede ubani ukuba azazi imvelaphi yakhe.  
UZongezile Matshoba woleke ngelithi, “Abantu bamana bebuzana ukuba siyaphi nesiXhosa. Emngcwabeni  xa ubhubhile kuye kuthiwe ubhubhile umXhosa, kungakhathaliseki nokuba ubukhumsha usikhupha ngeempumlo isilungu.” 
Inkxaso yalo msitho iphume kwiinkalo ngeenkalo. Abantwana bajikelezisiwe, bambi basiwa kumathala eencwadi naseRadio Grahamstown.  
Abanye basiwe kwisikolo sobuntatheli kwiYunivesithi iRhodes. Wona umzi wabashicileli iVia Afrika uthe wakhuthaza ababhali beelwimi zesintu ukuba bangayeki ukubhala ngeelwimi zabo. 
UHeinrich Dirk nosuka kweli qumrhu uthethe ngephulo iWritePublishRead nalapho kuye kupapashwe khona ababhali kumakhasi onxibelelwano, mahala.  
Yena uMhleli wephephandaba I’solezwe, * -Unathi Kondile uthe wenza amagqabantshintshi ngamahla ndenyuka okupapasha iphephandaba lesiXhosa.  
Uphefumle ngeminyaka emihlanu lasekwayo I’solezwe kwakunye nemingeni abagagene nayo. OkaKondile ukwakrobise nakwiphulo I’solezwe elikulo nalapho bajonge ukukhupha iincwadi ezithile nezisekelwe kumabali adlubhedu nabathe bawashicelela kwiphephandaba elo. 
Umnyhadala onje awugqibeleli ncam kungothulwanga uncwadi. Umsitho uvulele ithuba kuSithembele Xhegwana kunye nokaMatshoba lokuthula uncwadi lwabo olutsha.  UXhegwana wothule uncwadi lwentombi yakhe eminyaka eli-11, uNgcali Xhegwana, nebizwa ngokuba yiWoodland. 
“Le yincwadi enamabali abantwana nanikisa umdla kakhulu,” utshilo uXhegwana. UMatshoba yena uthule incwadi yakhe yamabalana amafutshane nayolisayo ethi ‘Izinto Zehlabathi’, ncwadi leyo ayipapashe esebenzisa elaa phulo iWritePublishRead labakwaVia Afrika. 
Ababhexeshi benkqubo uMadoda Ndlakuse kunye noCebo Solombela nabo bebengaziyekelanga, besenza abadume ngazo. Bakwancediswe ngabanye oonomabali, uZiyanda Mkalipi noBabalwa Kona. Babalise amabali neentsomi zesiXhosa kwindimbane yabantwana bezikolo, benza imidlalwana, beculisa neengoma zesintu. 
UNdlakuse uthe xa ethetha, “Amabali ngamabali anceda ukukhulisa ingqondo kunye nodlamko ebantwaneni, kwaye ukucula kuyabadibanisa abantu.” Utsho ecula ingoma ethi ‘Alaka doonsta’ bangenelela abantwana. 
“Le ngoma ndayiva iculwa kwindawo ezimbini ezohlukeneyo ndayithanda, umnqa ke kukuba andiyazi nokuba ithetha ukuthini kwaye nolwimi olu iculwa ngalo andilazi, kodwa ndithi ndakuyihlabela bandilandele abantu kwaye bayithande. Ibe ngathi zithe tshe ezo ntsuku zintathu zaloo mnyhadala, kubonakala ukuba umzi ontsundu usanxaniwe. Iqela eliphume izandla iVia Kasi Movers lidyushe eqongeni libalisa ibali lendoda efileyo, lisebenzisa umdaniso. Iqela likaXolisa Ngubelanga iJo Kinda People lonwabise ababukeli ngomdlalo walo othi Broken Lens.
title: Usindiswe ekutshoneni umnyhadala  iPuku!

text:
Ukuthengwa kwezixhobo ezitsha zokusebenza ngumasipala waseLukhanji kuzakuguqula indlela asebenza ngayo lo masipala kwiinkqubo zokugqithiswa kweenkonzo.  
Oku kuthethwe ngusodolophu walo masipala uNozibele Makhanda ngethuba ekudliwanondlebe nephephandaba I’solezwe lesiXhosa.  
Lo masipala ugalele imali ekwishumi elinesihlanu lezigidi zeerandi ukuthenga iiloli zokuchola inkunkuma kwanezinye izixhobo.  
“Zimbini ezifikileyo ngoku sithethayo silindele ezinye ezimbini ekulindeleke ukuba zifike ngenyanga yeSilimela, kukho nezinye ezimbini zokunyuka epalini zokulungisa umbane,” ucacise watsho uMakhanda.  
Lo sodolophu uthi eyona ngxaki iphambili yomasipala wakhe ibiziloli ezindala ezingekho mgangathweni. “Ezi besisebenza ngazo bezindala, bezisonakala zishiye inkunkuma endleleni okanye zithathe ixesha ukufika kwindawo ekumele ukuba zithathe khona inkunkuma,” utshilo. 
Ingxelo kasodolophu ithi, ukuthengwa kwezi zixhobo kubanjezelwe ziinkqubo zangaphakathi kurhulumente. “Inde kakhulu inkqubo elandelwayo apha kurhulumente xa kuthengwa izinto ezinkulu ezifana neeloli zokusebenza, lo nto yenze ukuba kubekukona zifumanekayo, ayinanto yokwenza nolonyulo yonke le nto,” uthethe watsho uMakhanda.  
Ilokishi yakwaMlungisi yenye yeendawo ebezinenkunkuma engathathwano ehlala ixesha elide, lo gama ingingqi yaseTop Town ineengxaki zombane ongekhoyo kwezinye zezitalato. “Ndinethemba lokuba ngoku xa kukho ingxaki sizakukhawuleza ukusabela, umzekelo xa kukho umbane omnkileyo kuzakukhawuleza nokuthathwa kwenkunkuma ngokunjalo,” utsho uMakhanda.  
Zizakucoceka izitalato zaseLukhanji ngenxa yoku. 
Umasipala waseLukhanji wenziwa yidolophu yaseKomani, Whittlesea, Linge naseZibeleni. Oyimanejala yalo masipala uNolwandle Gqiba uthi, ezi zixhobo aziyonxalenye yomasipala wendibanisela ezayo nozakubizwa ngegama lika-Enoch Mgijima.  
“Oku akunanto yokwenza nomasipala omtsha ozayo, ezi izixhobo zizakujongana ncakasana nomasipala waseLukhanji,” utshilo uGqiba. Le ngxelo ithi, iiloli zokuthutha inkunkuma zalo masipala zagqityelwa ukuthengwa ngonyaka ka 2010.
title: Izigidi zentengo yezixhobo eLukhanji

text:
Usomashishini kwanenkokeli yemveli uMandlaphakamile Makinana uthi iinkonzo zakuthathelwa ingqalelo xa zizibandakanya nemiba yoluntu ekuhlaleni.  
“Inkonzo yenye yento ebisoloko ithe cwaka ngezinto ezenzeka ekuhlaleni ezichaphazela uluntu ixesha elide. Kodwa noko oku kuyatshintsha kuba iinkonzo zizama ngako konke ukuba zibuyele eluntwini kwaye zithabathe inxaxheba kwimiba yoluntu,” utshilo uMakinana.  
UMakinana, okwayinkokeli yombutho iSakhululeka Isizwe, ukuthethe oku ngethuba enikeza ngenkomo ehamba ngamanqina kwibandla lamaTshetshi eScenery Park eMonti.  
Le nkomo ixhelwe kwinkomfa “iButho Labavuseleli bakaKrestu” ebibanjwe yile nkonzo ngempelaveki.  
UMakinana uthi babone kufanelekile ukuba bangakhethi nkonzo itheni emva kokuba kuze umkhonzi waseTshetshi ezokucela isandla kubo.  
UMfundisi Sam Beja obethethela iBhishophu yeDiocese yaseRhini ubulele iSakhululeka Isizwe, esithi bakwabulela uThixo ngokuthi asebenzise abantu bakhe ebulela ikhonkco kwanonxibelelwano phakathi kwabantu bakaThixo.  
Ibutho Labavuseleli bakaKrestu liqale ngoLwesine weveki ephelileyo, injongo ikuvuselela izazela kumarhamente.  
UBeja uthi le nkonzo yamaTshethsi igqiba iminyaka elikhulu elinashumi amathandathu anesihlanu (165) yasekwayo. 
 Uthi eli lizwe lifuna ukuthandazelwa kwaye inkonzo mayingapheleli ngaphakathi endlini kaThixo mayiphumele nangaphandle.  
Usihlalo weSakhululeka Isizwe uThemba Wele nowayesakuba lilungu lepalamente ephondweni kumbutho weEFF uthi, enye yezinto abayiqapheleyo bengulo mbutho kukungahoywa kweenkonzo ngurhulumente kungoko nabo beqalise eli phulo lokunceda le nkonzo. 
 Uthi urhulumente makangalawuli yedwa kwaye masingoyiki nokugxeka kwanokumncoma urhulumente.
title: AmaTshetshi aphiwe isipho senkomo

text:
UNYAKA ka2021 usisikhumbuzo seminyaka elikhulu wabhubhayo uJohn Tengo Jabavu ongumseki wephephandaba lesiXhosa, Imvo ZabaNtsundu. 
U-JT Jabavu wazalwa ngomhla weshumi elinanye kweyoMqungu 1859 ezalelwa eBhofolo. Ngonyaka ka1884, uJabavu waseka Imvo ZabaNtsundu eyayipapashelwa eQonce, eneminyaka engamashumi amabini anesihlanu. 
Usapho lwakhe luthi lufuna ukwenza isikhumbuzo egameni lakhe ngenyanga yoMsintsi kulo nyaka, nanjengoko wabhubha ngomhla weshumi kweyoMsintsi 1921. 
“Kunyaka ophelileyo sithe sihleli silusapho sacinga kulo nyaka ka2021, ukhokho ugqiba iminyaka elikhulu wasishiyayo. Kulo nyaka sithi sifuna ukumkhumbula ngemisebenzi yakhe. Ukhokho wayengumpondozihlanjiwe kwezemfundo nasekubhaleni, enendima enkulu awayidlalayo eWisile. 
“Sikhumbula imisebenzi yakhe ukhokho. Isizukulwana sakhe sikhona eLondon eNgilane naseUganda kwanalapha eMzantsi Afrika. Siza kudibana sisonke silusapho senze isikhumbuzo,” kutsho uSiyabonga Jabavu, isizukulwana sikaJonathan James Jabavu, ongubhuti kaJT. 
UJabavu uthi baza kuqala kwingcwaba lakhe eQonce babeke ilitye, bandule ukusebenzisa iziko iFort Hare eDikeni, njengendawo yokubonisa ngemisebenzi yoMhleli weMvo ZabaNtsundu. Usapho lukwaceba nosuku lokukhumbula amaxesha kaJabavu, oluza kubanjelwa eMonti. 
“Ukhokho wafumana iwonga le-Order of Luthuli (enikwa abantu abadlale indima kumzabalazo wedemokhrasi, amalungelo oluntu, ukwakhiwa kwesizwe, ubulungisa, uxolo kwanokusonjululwa kwembambano) elinikwa ngowayesakuba nguMongameli weli uThabo Mbeki ngo2006. Kungumnqweno wethu silikhaya ukuba utat’ uMbeki azokwenza intetho ngolu suku (memorial lecture),” utshilo uJabavu. 
Amaziko afana norhulumente kwakunye neFort Hare aza kubandakanywa kwesi sikhumbuzo, utshilo uJabavu. 
U-JT Jabavu wazala uDavidson Don Tengo (DDT) Jabavu. U-DDT Jabavu wayengomnye wabahlohli bokuqala ababini kuphela ngethuba lokuqalwa kweFort Hare ngo1916. U-DDT uzala uNoni Jabavu owayengumbhali osebenzele amajelo eendaba aliqela eBhritane naseUganda. Usisi kaNoni watshatela eUganda wanosapho phaya, ze yena uNoni watshatela eBhritane wanosapho phaya. 
“Umzila kaJT yimfundo, ezenkcubeko kwanezopolitiko. Le nto iza kufuneka ukuba sibeneJabavu Legacy Foundation, ukuze siqhube nomzila kakhokho wethu,” utshilo uJabavu.
title: Isikhumbuzo somseki weMvo zabaNtsundu

text:
NANGONA nje ethe gqolo ukuphazanyiswa yimibutho yezopolitiko kwintetho yakhe yasePalamente, uMongameli Jacob Zuma usezakuhlala kwisikhundla sakhe de kufike ixesha lakhe ngo-2019, ngokokutsho kwamagqirha amabini aseMpuma Koloni. 
IPalamente yaseMzantsi Afrika ibisisigqubu sezithuko kwakhona phambi kokuba uZuma enze intetho yobume besizwe kwiveki ephelileyo.  
Kuqale amalungu e-EFF esithi akanakuvumela uZuma athethe logama amalungu eDA nawo athe aphuma, eshiya uZuma ethetha kukho amalungu eANC ubukhulu becala. 
Noxa kunjalo, uZuma usezakuhlala esikhundleni sakhe ngokokutsho kwegqirha laseMdantsane uNomqondiso Notshangaza Skweyiya. 
USkweyiya uthe: “Nokuba bangenza njani sokuze bamenze nto uZuma, uzakufika kunyulo luka-2019, isengulo Zuma nimbonayo. Ngamanye amagama ndingathi, ocinga ukuba uZuma akazukufika kunyaka ka-2019 makathobe amaxhala kuba akayi ndawo.” 
“Ukuba awumthandi uZuma yazi ukuba akukho kwanto uzakumenza yona,” utshilo uSkweyiya. 
Elinye igqirha, uNozihlwele Gibi wakuCentane uthi izikhalazo zabemi baseMzantsi Afrika malunga nolawulo lukaZuma zenza “agqwaliseke” lo mongameli.  
Kodwa noxa kunjalo, uGibi akaboni ephuma esikhundleni sakhe uZuma. “Intlambululo nokuzithoba eluntwini, avume iimpazamo zakhe, iyafuneka apha kuMongameli ukuze abantu baphinde babuye bamthembe,” utsho uGibi. 
UGibi uthi xa lo kaZuma enokuzihlambulula futhi avume iimpazamo zakhe, uZuma “angaxoleleka” kuluntu loMzantsi Afrika.  
“Izikhalo zimenza angathandeki ebantwini uMongameli, yiyo le nto kufuneka azihlambulule okanye athethe ngeempazamo zakhe,” utsho uGibi. 
Amakhwelo okuba uZuma makehle esikhundleni athe gqolo ukuphuma nkalwana zonke.  
Indibanisela iSave South Africa ekhokelwa ngusomashishini uSipho Pityana ithe yabamba “eyona ntetho ichanekileyo” ngobume besizwe eKapa ngoLwesithathu kwiveki ephelileyo, apho lo kaPityana ethe wakhwela ezehlela kuZuma. 
Isithethi sikaZuma uGqirha Bongani Ngqulunga, uthe ucela ukuthunyelelwa imibuzo nge-imeyili ngethuba simtsalela umnxeba, kodwa side safikelela kupapasho lwephephandaba engekayiphenduli imibuzo.
title: UZUMA AKAYI NDAWO – kutsho amagqirha

text:
Ndingu mongi ongaphangeliyo iminyaka elithoba onabantwana abane! Umtshato unempawu zokuhexa, naselalini kuyahlekiswa ngale nesi iyindoda engumahlalela.  
Ndaphumelela izifundo zam zokonga ngomyaka ka 2008 eLilitha College of Nursing. Ndiyayibhatala imali kaSANC minyaka le ndiyilo mpula kaLujaca!   
Ndiziqhatha ngelithi, soze kolubizo kubekho imeko enje, mhlawumbi kwamanye amasebe ingenzeka le nto. Ndichitha ixesha lam sithetha nje kwimibuthwana engenzi ngeniso (NPO’s), akukho sibonelelo apho, ukuba sithe sasifumana ibaliwaka leerandi! Inditheze amandla lemeko yonke le minyaka ndinoxinizelelo olumandla! 
ETHEMBENI, eQonce 
Thumela ezakho ku: 063 743 9538
title: Umongi ongeqeshekiyo

text:
KOOMASIPALA ethe yanikwa ithuba lokubakhokela iPAC izakuthi rhoqo ngokunika ingxelo kuluntu ngendima yokuhanjiswa kweenkonzo esele ihanjiwe.  
Oku kuthethwe ngumongameli walo mbutho uLuthando Mbinda ngethuba lo mbutho usungula umqulu wezithembiso. UMbinda ugxeke urhulumente okhokeleyo ngelithi wohlulekile ukufezekisa iimfuno zoluntu.  
Ukwathe iPAC izakubeka phambili iimfuno zoluntu ezifana nezindlu, imfundo, ezempilo, amanzi kwakunye nokugutyulwa kwelindle.  
OkaMbinda uthembise ngelithi, “Kubo bonke oomasipala abaphantsi kwePAC ooceba bazakubamba imihlangano noluntu rhoqo, kumaholo oluntu. Oku kukuqinisekisa abantu ngokwenziwa ngalo malungu bawonyule ukuba abamele kwibhunga.”  
Ukwathe lo mbutho ufuna intsebenziswano neminye imibutho yasekuhlaleni, kuquka neenkokeli zemveli.  
Ukwathe iPAC isezakugxila kwiphulo lokuqinisekisa ukuba umhlaba ubuyiselwa kubanini bawo. “Ukuqinisekisa ukuba kukho ukhuseleko lokudla, uluntu kufuneka linikwe umhlaba ukuze lizivelisele ukutya. Kwiindawo apho umhlaba uphantsi kweenkokeli zemveli sizakubamba uthethathethwano ukuze siqinisekise ukuba abantu banikwa umhlaba, bavelise ukutya,” utshilo okaMbinda.  
Ukwathe lo mbutho uzakudala amathuba engqesho. UMbinda uthe, “Enye yezinto ezingundoqo kumasipala ngamnye ophantsi kwePAC kukudala amathuba emisebenzi. Asizukuvumela inkqubo yokuqeshwa kwabantu phantsi kweenkampani ezishishina ngabasebenzi.”  
Ulutsha lizakufumana ingqwalasela eyodwa koomasipala abaphantsi kwePAC. UMbinda uthe lo mbutho uzokwenza konke onako ukutyala kwimveliso yolutsha.  
“Sizokwakha iindawo zolonwabo nobugcisa zolutsha. Akukho lutsha lizakushiywa ngasemva nelizakuphela litshaya inyaope okanye liphele lingamaxhoba okuqweqwediswa phambi kwamehlo esizwe.”  
Ulebele ngelithi bazakuba neengcaciso koomasipala abaphantsi kwalo mbutho.
title: Izakunika ingqwalasela kulutsha iPAC

text:
OYENA msasazi mncinci ngokweminyaka kubasasazi boMhlobo Wenene FM, uThembela Booi, ungene waphelela kwesi sikhululo njengomsasazi wenkqubo yeeKwayala. 
UBooi, wakwilali yaKwaNtsinekana eNgqushwa, ungena endaweni kaBulelani Koyo osutywe kukufa kwinyanga yeKhala. 
Waqala ukusasaza kwisikhululo sasekuhlaleni iNkqubela eGqeberha ngo2014 eminyaka nje eli-17 esenza uGrade 11. 
Apho wenze iinkqubo eziliqela ezifana nebhrakfesi, iinkqubo zabantwana, ezolonwabo nezengxoxo. 
“Ndiziva ndiwongekile ngokunikwa uxanduva lokuqhuba le nkqubo. Ndikhule ndinomdla wokusebenza nongasekhoyo uBK. Ndiza kuwuxhoma phezulu umgangatho womculo weekwayala, ndisebenzisana nabanolwazi kwiikwayala. Ndiza nezinto ezintsha enkqubeni,” kuthembisa uBooi, ofince iminyaka eyi25 ubudala ngomhla wokuqala kweyoMsintsi. 
UBooi yinxalenye yoluhlu lwabasasazi abatsha ababhengezwe nguMhlobo Wenene kutshanje. 
UKhanyisa Bunu oliqhula elaziwayo nokwangumdlali kamabonakude uza kuzimanya neqela leBEE. Uza kuhlekisa rhoqo ngoLwesihlanu ngemizuzu elishumi emva kwentsimbi yesixhenxe kusasa. 
UMzwandile Ntshona, onguMfundisi wolutsha kwibandla iSeventh Day Adventist uqeshwe njengomsasazi weMiphanga. UNtshona bengumsasazi wesikhululo saseFlagstaff, iNkonjane FM. 
Umhlobo Wenene ukwabhengeze ukuba uMfundis’ uKeketso Bloem weUnited Congregational Church uza kubhexesha Isandulela Senkonzo rhoqo ngeeCawe phakathi kwentsimbi yesibhozo neyesithoba kusasa. 
Ukanti inkqubo yeMvuselelo ebhexeshwa nguNomonde Vakalisa iqeshe uGqr Bishop Jacob Freemantle ngeeCawe. UFreemantle waseWesile kwisithili saseRhini, ungena kwizihlangu zikaMfundis’ uFaleni osandul’ ukugxothwa sesi sikhululo.
title: UKing Booi uthatha iintambo kuKoyo

text:
Ziphume phakathi kwintlanganiso yebhunga ekhethekileyo iinkosi zemveli kumasipala iKing Sabata Dalindyebo ngoLwesihlanu esisuka kuye. 
Le ntlanganiso yebhunga ibibanjelwe eNkululekweni eMthatha. Iinkosi zemveli zikhalazela ukungabandakanywa kwazo kumthetho onika igunya oomasipala ukuba baphuhlise umhlaba okufuphi nedolophu, kodwa ube lomhlaba ukulawulo lweenkosi. 
UNkosi uJonginyaniso Mtirara uthi ngethuba kuqulunqwa lo mthetho. 
we-Spatial Planning and Land Use Management Act-[Spluma]), akuzange kuviwe zimvo zoluntu, kungoko begqibe ukungathathi nxaxheba xa kuvotelwa lo mthetho. 
“Saluvakalisa uluvo lwethu ngalomthetho kwamhla mnene kwingqungquthela eyayihleli eMonti kunyaka ophelileyo, sifuna kuyiwe ebantwini kuyokuthethwa nabo kungathethwa nathi kuphela,” utshilo uMtirara. 
Lo mthetho uqalile ukusebenza emveni kokutyikitywa ngumongameli uZuma ekuqaleni kwenyanga edlulileyo kwaye abanye oomasipala abane eMpuma Koloni abaquka iCamdeboo sele bewupasisile kwiintlanganiso zawo. 
Phakathi kweenkosi ezitsibe phandle ngaphambi kokuqala koluvoto ziquka uNkosi uMtirara, uNkosi Nolusapho Mandela, uNkosi Sakhumzi Tswina nezinye. 
Kweliphepha-ndaba uTswina uthe: “Asizovotela umthetho esingahambisaniyo nathi kuba umhlaba ngowethu, abantu baphethwe ziinkosi.” 
Ezinye zezinto ezikhalazelwa ngabantwana begazi kukuba xa kucelwa inxiwa ezilalini kuzokufuneka kuxelelwe nomasipala. 
UMabandla Gogo we-UDM uthi amaqela opolitiko khange anikwe ithuba lokuthetha ngawo lomthetho. 
Usomlomo webhunga lomasipala wase-KSD uDumani Zozo uthi, akukhonto banokuyenza kuba lo mthetho sele uphunyeziwe kuzwelonke. Umasipala weKSD uzochitha imali engaphezu kweR440 000 ukuhlawulela unobhala kunye namalungu ebhodi kwi-ofisi ezojongana neSplum. Ooceba be-ANC bavumele ngokuwupasisa lo mthetho.
title: Iinkosi zinyevulela umthetho omtsha

text:
IINKOSI zabaThembu zimbeke njengebambela-kumkani uNkosana Mthandeni Jongisizwe Dalindyebo kumsitho obubanjwe ngoLwesihlanu kwibhotwe lesi sizwe eBumbane cebu kuhle eMthatha. 
 
  
UNkosana Jongisizwe ngumninawa kaKumkani Buyelekhaya Zwelibanzi Dalindyebo, odontsa isigwebo seminyaka elishumi elinesibini kwintolongo yaseMonti. 
 
  
Ukubekwa kukaNkosana Jongisizwe, kuza emva kokuba abantwana begazi lobukumkani babaThembu bebenikwe inyhweba yokutyumba abantu abaselungelweni – ngokwesiko – lokubambela uKumkani Zwelibanzi. 
 
  
Amagama abephakanyisiwe lelikaNkosana Jongisizwe noNkosana Azenathi Dalindyebo, unyana kaKumkani Zwelibanzi. UNkosana Azenathi, akakhange aphumelele kugqatso nanjengoko unina engenguye umfazi ozalwa ebukhosini. 
 
  
UNkosana Jongisizwe ngunyana wesibini weNdlu eNkulu kaKumkani uSabata Jonguhlanga Dalindyebo. 
  
Ethetha eBumbane emva kokubekwa kwakhe, uNkosana Jongisizwe, uthe uzimisele ukumanya esi sizwe.
title: UJongisizwe libambela-kumkani labaThembu

text: Ukuphumelela kweANC kwii Wadi ezintathu sebengasekho abo bebengabagqatswa kubonakalisa ifuthe lombutho eluntwini. Oku kuthethwe ngusihlalo weANC eMpuma Koloni uPumulo Masualle. Isibini saba bagqatswa sabhubha kwingozi yemoto, nglixa uNceba Dywili edutyulwe wasweleka eBhayi kwiveki ephelileyo. UMasualle uthe, “Siyawabulela lamaqabane ngegalelo athe analo embuthweni, sibulela noluntu olunike iANC inkxaso egameni lalamaqabane angasekhoyo.” Uqhube wathi, nangona lombutho uzamkela iziphumo zonyulo, kukho ukukhathazeka xa uphulukana noomasipala okanye iiWadi ezithile, kuba unomnqweno wokuhlala ilikhaya labantu.
title: Iphumelele iiWadi sebengasekho abagqatswa iANC

text:
Azizinxadanxada amagosa esebe lezolimo nophuhliso lwamaphandle eMpuma Koloni ezama ukuvala amazibuko ethintela umbungu (Fall armyworm) oqwenga izityalo ezinje ngombona.  
Lo mbungu uthe wabonwa kwiphondo laseLimpopo naseMntla Ntshona nothe wabangela ukungazinzi kumafama avelisa umbona.  
Igosa elijongene nale ngxaki kwisebe lezolimo nophuhliso lamaphandle, uGqirha Thembakazi Silwana, uthi bazama konke ukuzama ukuthintela ukungena kwalo mbungu kweli phondo. 
 “Sithetha namasebe ahlukeneeyo achaphazelekayo, sibeka amagosa emideni yeMpuma Koloni, sikwafundisa abelimi ngendlela zokuthintela,nokulwa nalo mbungu xa unokubonwa kweli leMpuma Koloni,” utshilo uSilwana. 
 Umlimi wombano kwifama iMthimkhulu, eMonti, uLungile Monakali, uthi ukufika kwalo mbungu akusokuze kubaphazamise kuba bakuqhelile ukujongana neengaxaki eziphazamisa ulimo.  
“Ngenxa yoncedo esihlala silufumana kurhulumente, ulwazi esinalo namava wethu azakusinceda ukuba silwe ngempumelelo nale ngxaki. Umphathiswa wesebe lezolimo nophuhliso lwamaphandle kweli phondo, uMlibo Qhoboshiyane, uxelele abantu bephondo leMpuma Koloni ukuba isebe lakhe lizilungiselela ukulwa nale ngxaki.  
“Sizama konke esinako ukuqinisekisa ukuba okwangoku ungekangeni lo mbungu apha eMpuma Koloni, sibe sizilungiselela ngokuthintela nokuxhobisa abelimi,”utshilo uQoboshiyane. 
Ngokwengxelo lo mbungu ukhe wabonwa kweli leMpuma Koloni ngaphambili, kwaye amagosa karhulumente alwa nawo ngaphandle kwengxaki. 
“Ngonyaka ka-2001, 2003 nonyaka ka-2013 ukhe wabonakala lo mbungu, ukuba nguwo, ndiqinisekile ukuba siyakukwazi ukuwoyisa kodwa ukuba ngomnye owahlukileyo – siyakusebenza nzima sisilwa nawo,” uthethe watsho uSilwana. 
Ngo-2013 lo mbungu wabangela ilahleko emandla yombona kwiingingqi eziquka i-Alfred Nzo, Amathole, Chris Hani, Joe Gqabi nase-O.R. Tambo. 
“Imeko eziguqukayo zemozulu ingakumbi ukunyuka kwamaqondo obushushu nokunqongophala kwemvula zezinye zezinto ezingunobangela walombungu nezinye ingxaki,”  ucacise njalo uSilwana. 
UQoboshiyane uthi isebe lakhe lalahlekelwa yimali ekwishumi lezigidi zerandi ngenxa yokugqugqisa kwalo mbungu kwiifama zombona eMzantsi Afrika.  
Umlawuli oyintloko yela sebe, uLeon Coetzee, uthi baxakeke koomasipala bezama ukufundisa amafama amancinci ngale ngxaki. 
“Sithumele iincwadi zembalelwano koosodolophu boomasipala abohlukeneyo  ngelizama ukuqinisekisa ukuba banolwazi ngale ngxaki,”utshilo uCoetzee.IMpuma Koloni liphondo eliphila ngokulima nanje ngoko uninzi luhlala ezilalini.  
Ukanti uSilwane uthi benza inzame zokubeka imali bucala ukuze bakwazi ukugagana nalengxaki xa ithe yafika eMpuma Koloni.
title: Azizinxadanxada amagosa esebe lezolimo eMpuma Koloni

text:
Ezinye izinto zingathathwa ngokuba zincinci, abantu phandl’apha basoloko benemibuzo efuna iimpendulo.  
Ngeli linge sizama ukuhlangabezana nabo. Yintoni umahluko phakathi kwemilowo nemilondekhaya? Imilowo okanye amalowa ngabantu baloo mzi, abantu beso siduko saloo mzi wamathile, amadoda neentombi zaloo mzi, iintombi zelo khaya lamathile, ezendileyo nezingendanga.  
Imilondekhaya ngabantu abazalana neso siduko sithile abathi bangeniswe kwimicimbi yekhaya yecamagu; umzekelo abantwana beentombi ezendileyo, abatshana kunye nabantwana babatshana nezizukulwana zabatshana. Kukuthini ukuba nomgqwaliso?  
Kuxa umntu lo asuke wanezothe angathandwa ngabanye abantu, asuke abe namashwa, zonke izinto azenzayo zisuke zingalungi zingaphumeleli, kuba usuka anyanyeke, athiyeke kwabo asukuba enento yokwenza nabo. Kude kuthiwe xa kuthethwa ngaye ungumntu onesimnyama.  
Le nto inokudalwa, mhlawumbi umntu le nto udalwe nayo, kanti ke abanye kuthiwa sukuba besithwa ngamayeza amaxhwele asetyenziswa ngabantu abammonelayo. Omnye kuthiwa sukuba ethakathiwe ngabantu abangamfuniyo, abafuna angaphumeleli. Kukuthini ukuthonga? 
 Kukuphupha uxelelwa into okanye izinto ngamanyange akowenu, izinyanya. Elo phupha uvuka kusasa ulilawule kubantu bakowenu abadala, baze bona babalise iimbali ngabakwaziyo.  
Kuthi ke xa lixaka elo phupha kuthatyathwe iintonga kuyiwe koosiyazi, abantu ababonayo, abantu abanokufa okumhlophe, amagqirha. Amagqirha ke athi alilawule ngokwawo elo phupha ukuba lithetha ukuthini na. Bathini na abaphantsi? Mbala mni na wesiko abawufunayo?  
Kuthethwa ukuthini xa kusithiwa, ‘Camagu’ naxa kusithiwa, ‘Makube chosi, kube hele’ naxa kusithiwa ‘Makudede ubumnyama kuvele ukukhanya.’? 
 Emva kokuba inkabi yomcimbi, ibhokhwe okanye inkomo ilalisiwe emthonyameni, yahlatywa yinkulu yakhala. Abantu bayakhwaza bathi, ‘Camagu’.  
Eli gama lithi camagu lithetha ukuba, ‘Makube njalo, mazifumaneke zonke izinto ezicelwayo.” Kwakhona kuthiwa, ‘Makube chosi kube hele.” Into ethetha ukuba ‘Makube njalo, zonke izinto mazize kubantu baloo mzi, baphile ubomi obumnandi obukhululekileyo.”  
Naxa igqirha lichaza umhlola ngaphandle kwengoma nokubethelwa izandla, ukanti ke naxa libethelwa izandla, lithi lakuchana inyani yomhlola, naxa livumbulula izinto ezichanekileyo ekucacileyo ukuba abantu bayaneliseka kuthiwe, ‘Chosi! Chosi” Xa abantu batshoyo ke bathetha ukuthi bayaneliseka zezinyaniso zelo gqirha, bathi, ‘Makube njalo!’  
Xa kusithiwa, ‘Makudede ubumnyama, kuvele ukukhanya!’, sakukhumbula ukuba abantu abaNtsundu bakholelwa ukuba zonke izinto ezintle zivela eMpumalanga apho ilanga nokukhanya kuvela ngakhona.  
Yiyo le nto onke amasiko esiNtu ingakumbi awesiXhosa eqala ngokubaswa komlilo, xa kuselwa ingcaza kubaswa umlilo kuqhunyiswe necuba, xa kungeniswa inkwenkwe ebhumeni kufuneka ikhankatha lingene kuqala libase umlilo phambi kokuba impobole, amaxhego amadala ayiyale ngobudoda, naxa intombi ingena emkhusaneni kwantonjane kufikwa inkazana sele ibasile; naxa abazalisikazi bezalisa umfazana kubaswa umlilo wesifutho.  
Ukukhanya kukholelwa ukuba kuzisa izinto ezintle. Kukuthini ukuthi siyanqula siyathandaza? Ukunqula kukucela izinto ezintle nempilo entle, kwabalele ukuthula, abaphantsi, asele besandulela, izinyanya.  
Ukuthandaza kukungxengxeza uleleza ngemposiso neziphoso ozaziyo ezenziwe kwabaphantsi, izinto abantu abathe abazihoya nangona izimfanelo ebekufanele ukuba bazilungisile, okanye izinto ekukudala zivela emathongweni, koko bona bengazikhathalelanga.  
Apha umntu uthi nangona ephosisile makaxolelwe. Yintoni umthonyama? Umthonyama sisazulu okanye amazantsi obuhlanti, kulapho kuthi kuxhelelwe inkabi yomcimbi, nalapho umswane uthi usasazwe khona, uze ugalelwe inyongo ukuze iinkomo zingagxwali zihlabane zenze ingxolo nengozi.  
Le ndawo ingumthonyama, amaXhosa akholelwa ekuthini kulapho izinyanya zihlala khona. Yintoni ingcaza? Ingcaza yibhekile yotywala yemizi ethile ekhutshelwa abantu bekhaya elo emva kokuba zenziwe zonke iimfanelo, ikhutshiwe yonke imilawulo yotywala ngokwezizwe. Le bhekile yengcaza iselwa kuphela yimilowo nemilondekhaya.  
Le bhekile iqala ingcanyulwe lixhego elidala lekhaya, akukhathaliseki nokuba elo xhego linekelebha okanye linamanqagisa, livuza nezinkcwe. Emva kokuba lingcamle le bhekile ijikeleziswa kumntu wonke wekhaya arhabule. 
 Le bhekile isisicamagusho kwizinyanya zaloo mzi; le bhekile isingxengxezo kumathongo aloo mzi. Ngale bhekile kucelwa impilo; kucelwa izinyanya zingawunikeli umva umzi nabantu belo khaya.  
Ngaba umcimbi wamagqirha isenguwo na, xa kuthi ngalo mhla amagqirha axhentsayo kuhlatywe umntu ngomnye axabene naye, ize lo mcimbi ungamiswa kutsitywe phezu kwesidumbu. Ngaba iselisiko elo?  
Inzima ke into yezibhoxi ezithi zenzakalisane xa kukho imicimbi, into yokonzakalisana kwabantu iqheleke xa kusaluswa, apho kude kufe amakhwenkwe xa eguywa, kodwa ke andizange ndive kusithiwa ingcibi mayingawusebenzisi umdlanga kuba kufiwe. Kwezinye iimeko kukhe kusweleke umntu wekhaya obegula umcimbi sele uqhuba, ngokwazi kwam awuye umiswe.  
Endikwaziyo kukuba umcimbi umiswa xa kuthe kwasweleka isizalwane phambi kokuba umcimbi uqhube, ikhaya ke liwumise lingawuqhubi kuba liphantsi kwelifu elimnyama, inzila.  
Umcimbi wesiko osele uqhuba awumiswa. Kuthi kuzanywe ukuphandwa unobangela emva komcimbi lowo.  
Ndinengxaki nobugqirha bam ngunyaka wesine ndagqabazayo, ndanikwa ulugxa ligqirha ebendingumkhwetha okanye isigogo salo.  
Ngoku ingxaki yam iindwendwe ezifuna ukuchazwa azingeni. Ngoku sendiphila ngokuzithengisela. Akungeni nomntu lo omnye oze kucela iyeza. Kufuneka ndithini ukulwa le ngxaki.  
Into yobugqirha ngumhlaba onzima, indlela yokuziphatha komntu oligqirha ibaluleke kakhulu, abantu abaNtsundu bangena emagqirheni ngobusuku kuba besoyika ukuba amayeza abo abawafumene emagqirheni atshitshe. 
 Abantu ke kunzima ukuba baye emntwini oligqirha, abanekhwiniba abalibonayo abangalithandiyo kuye. Kuyafuneka ke ukuba xa uligqirha ubufunde gqibi ubugqirha, ubafunde nabantu oza kusebenza nabo.  
Ndicinga mna ukuba ingxaki ilele kwakuwe, phinda uye kufuna amacebo kweli gqirha ubuthwasiswa lilo, utsho likucebise ukuba siqwetywa njani na isidima sobugqirha sokwenza ukuba uhlonitshwe uthenjwe ngabantu.
title: Imibuzo ngamasiko nezithethe zesiNtu

text:
Phaya ekuqaleni kwalo umiyo, ndisesekhaya, ndifumene ucingo luvela kumninawa wam ngokokuzana koobawo, lusithi kukho undwendwe phaya kokwethu oluze ngomcimbi wobulawu. 
 Ndithe kuba bendixakekile kwaye kungelula ukuyeka oko bendikwenza, ndathi makhe ndive ngesimo solu ndwendwe phambi kokuba ndiphendule.  
Undwendwe oluza ngobulawu kaloku luyahleba malunga nokuza kwalo ukuze lungafiki kungekho bantu emzini. Lolundululwe ngokungxama yintoni ke ngoku olu undwendwe? 
Ukayise uthe undwendwe olo ke ngumyeni wentombi buqu, uze kulobola umkakhe! Ndikwafumanise ukuba uhamba yedwa loo mfokazi, akanaye kwamkhaphi.  
“Kanti baphi oonozakuzaku balo mfana?” Impendulo ke ibuye isithi uyaqala ukuza kuvela apho ekhaya, susela oko umfana wayezithathele intombi eminyakeni, engayicele mntwini, engazange aze kuyixela nakakade. Ngeliphandle ke wayezizakuzela ngokwakhe umfana! 
Ukuthathwa kwale ntombi ingacelwanga nokungaxelwa kwayo nokusuka umfana angqombonyeke nje athi uze kulobola; noko nje xa zizonke ezo nto zibonisa ukugwexwa kweenkqubo zobulawu zethu lulutsha. 
Ndizive ndingenako ke ukuyeka umsebenzi endandiwenza ndiye kolu ndwendwe lunje. Ndivuyele kwanokuba kube kanti lufike ndingekho mna apho ekhaya, kuba ke bendingenakumelana nesimo esinjalo.  
Isindululo sam ke sathi umninawa makabize ummelwane amchazele ngesimo solu ndwendwe. Ze, ekunye nommelwane lowo, aluxelele ukuba maluhambe lubuyele kokwalo liyo- kuphuthuma abakulo. Lo mfana kaloku akanakusuka eze nje yedwa ngokungathi uzekuthenga igusha kanti uze kulobola! 
Ukulungiselela ukuba lungasose luzibone laliwe okomshologu undwendwe olo, ndathi kumninawa mabalothule umthwalo lowo bawugcine kakuhle ukuze noko lungathi beluze lusindwa luphinde lugoduke lusasindwa.  
Ndathi ke mayithathwe impahla leyo igcinwe ukuze luthi mhla lubuya nabakulo luyifumane isenjengoko luyishiya; kuchotshelwe umcimbi wobulawu ke. 
Ukwenza ubungqina bempahla leyo, ndithe mayibhalwe phantsi phambi kwalo, lunikwe esalo isiphetshana esinye sigcinwe. Ngokwenjenjalo bendisenzela kuthi nokuba lubuya sele bengasekho bona, ubungqina bempahla bubekhona bona. Oku ndikuthathele kumava am apho ndafika amadoda endandichophele nawo umcimbi engasekho, akhoyo ezikhanyela iindawo esasigqibe ngazo, ndathi akwaba kwakubhaliwe! 
Benza njengoko ndiyalele ngako konke umninawa nommelwane. Undwendwe lwanikwa ukudla nento eselwayo, laphinda ebelize ngayo lingalobolanga. Ewe! Kwakumele kube njalo! 
Kaloku mzi wakuthi ukulobola asikokuhlawula ixabiso engathi lelentengo. Ubulawu buchotshelwa ngendlela eyakha amakhaya amabini.  
Ayephi ke loo makhaya kulo mfana? Ukulobola okungathi kukhutshwa umdliwo woburhumsha sasingenakukwamkela thina bengubo. Sasiyakuba siphisa ngomntwana ebantwini esingabaziyo ngaphezu kokuba sele wazilahlelayo kakade. Kulunge kuye ukuzilahla, hayi nakuthi.  
Indlela oluzenza ngayo izinto ulutsha iyakhwankqisa. Bathi ngeli xa bekhula bebona kodwa bazikhethele ezabo iindlela ezilunge kubo, ze zakubantshulela ameva kufuneke ibesithi ababangula loo manyala. 
Thina sasiyithathe ngokuba igcagcile intombi, kwaye asizange siphinde sijonge kwanto yokuba ingeza kulotyolwa. 
 Yayizidephisele ngokwayo ukuba ingaze ithathwe njengomfazi apho ikhoyo kwanokuba nathi singaze siyithathe ngokuba yendile, sithi isesiphatshwini.  
Ukuba bakhumbuzene xa kutheni ke ngoku asazi, kuba ke nentombi leyo yethu sele imasu mabini kweso siphatshu ibikuso njengokuba kukhona kufuneka sichukumise umcimbi wobulawu bayo nje ngoku. 
Zizibandisa ngokwazo iintombi zanamhlanje. Zikhetha imbutho endaweni yomendo. Zivuma ukushweshwa ze zifune ukuba nathi samkele loo nto! Goba msenge iibhokhwe zikudle! 
Owenu kwisiXhosa, Nxuba
title: Undwendwe lobulawu

text:
Umqeqeshi weqela lebhola ekhatywayo lamantombazana kwilali yakuHombe, eLusikisiki, uMongezi Mamane, uxelele I’solezwe lesiXhosa ukuba esona sizathu esibangela aqokelele abantwana kukuba ufuna ukubanceda ukuze baphephe ezintweni ezenzeka ezilalini. 
 UMamane uthi wasungula iqela lakhe kwiminyaka edlulileyo nabanye batsho bavula awabo kwezinye iilali.  
“Enyanisweni, zininzi izinto ezingalunganga ezenzeka ezilalini. Amaxesha amaninzi, abantwana abangamantombazana baye babe ngamaxhoba.  
Into esiyenzayo, siye sidibane rhoqo ngeempelaveki. Iqela ngalinye liye likhuphe iR50, eliphumeleleyo ibalilo elithatha imali,” utshilo uMamane.  
I’solezwe lithethe nomqeqeshi emva kokuba iqela lakhe, iRed Fire, libethwe ngo’2-0 liqela laseTyeni emdlalweni wakutshanje. 
“Nangona sibethiwe nje kodwa abadlali bam badlalile.  
Eyona nto esiyijongileyo ngaphezulu kwemali kukuqokelela abantwana ukuze babone ukuba zininzi kakhulu izinto ezilungileyo abanokuzixakekisa ngazo.  
Ukudlala kwabo ngeenyawo benganxibanga izihlangu zokukhaba ibhola kubonakalisa ukuzimisela nokuyithanda kwabo ibhola.  
Inye into efunekayo, kukubaxhasa ngoba baninzi,” utshilo uMamane oqeqesha iqela elinabadlali abangamashumi amabini.  
USiphokazi Ndulela, uKapteni weCeltic, uthe ibhola ayigcini imizimba yabadlali isempilweni nje kuphela koko ibanceda nasezifundweni zabo.  
“Mkhulu kakhulu umahluko ophakathi komntu odlala ibhola nalowo ungadlaliyo.  
Ezifundweni zethu siqhuba kakuhle kakhulu thina sidlalayo,” utshilo uNdulela emva kokudlala.  
UKapteni uthe imali ephunyelelweyo iza kungena engxoweni yeRed Fire izama ikiti. 
Naye uAmahle Mphethuka, 16, ungqine ngelithi ibhola yenza umahluko ngoba iintanga zakhe sezinabantwana. 
 “Ukuzibandakanya ebholeni kwandinceda mna. Iintanga zam zinabantwana. Ukudlala akukufundisi ukukhaba ibhola kuphela, ufunda nendlela yokuziphatha.  Siyababulela abo beza necebo lukudlala ibhola kwezi ndawo zethu,” uvale ngaloo mazwi uMphethuka. 
isibhalo@inl.co.za
title: Kulungiswa izimilo ngebhola kwiilali zaseLusikisiki

text:
Umqeqeshi weBorder Bulldogs, uTiger Mangweni, uthi iqela lakhe lizimisele ukuyiphumelela yonke imidlalo yalo ekhaya kule sizini.  
Kuza kube kudlan’ iintsimbi ngempelaveki xa iBulldogs isamkela iSouth Western Districts Eagles kumdlalo oza kube useBCM Stadium ngo’19:00 ngoLwesihlanu.  
Kwimpelaveki edlulileyo, iBulldogs itywatyushwe kanobom yiValke ngo’66-27 eRhawutini.  
UMangweni uthi bajonge ukuqokelela amanqaku apheleleyo, oko kungalibeka endaweni entle iqela. 
 “Sizimisele ukuyiphumelela yonke imidlalo esiyidlalela apha ekhaya.Ndikholelwa ukuba iza kusinceda kwiinzame zethu zokulwela ukuya kwimidlalo eyandulela eyamagqibela kankqoyi lo nto,” utshilo uMangweni. 
Le ndedeba ithi ukungadlali kakuhle kweefolosi zabo kuko ukubangele babethwe emdlalweni wabo wokuvula itumente.  
“Sibethiswe ngenxa yokungadlali kakuhle kweefolosi zethu emdlalweni odlulileyo. Adlale kakuhle wona amakhwenkwe adlala ngasemva. Usincedile umdlalo ngoba siye sabona apho sibetheka khona siliqela nangona besingazifuni iziphumo ezinjeya,” utshilo uMangweni. 
Ephefumla ngomdlalo obuphakathi kwabo neSWD Eagles, uMangweni uthethe ngolu hlobo. 
 “Ineefolosi ezinkulu iEagles kwaye iyakuthanda ukusebenzisa zona. Kuza kufuneka zisebenze kakhulu nezethu ngoLwesihlanu,” utshilo uMangweni. 
UManejala wozoNxibelelwano weBorder, uAkhona Mgijima, uhlabe ikhwelo kubalandeli beqela ngelithi mabaphume ngobuninzi babo. 
 “Abafana abenzanga kakuhle kumdlalo wokuvula itumente – kodwa ndiqinisekile ukuba baza kwenza ngcono ngoLwesihlanu. Sicela abalandeli baphume ngobuninzi babo bazokuxhasa iqela labo. Ibaluleke kakhulu inkxaso yabo,” utshilo uMgijima. 
Kwezinye iindaba zombhoxo: iBorder Women ingquzulana neSharks kumdlalo we-Inter-Provincial League ngo’15:00 ngoMgqibelo, eBuffalo City Stadium.
title: Kudlan’ iintsimbi eBuffalo City Stadium ngempelaveki!

text:
Umqeqeshi weMamelodi Sundowns, uManqoba Mngqithi, uthi iqela lakhe belibuthuntu emdlalweni wayizolo. ISundowns ibambene ngeqanda macala neBloemfontein Celtic emdlalweni weDStv Premiership obuseLucas Moripe Stadium. Ukungaphumeleli kweSundowns emdlalweni wayizolo kulandela omnye umdlalo ebambene kuwo neSuperSport United ngeqanda macala ngempelaveki egqithileyo. Ziindaba ezimbi ezi kwiDowns ebiqale isizini ngendlela encumisayo. 
Njengokuba isahleli phezulu kwiDStv Premiership, ishiya iSwallows ekwindawo yesibini ngenqaku elinye qha. Kungenzeka iSwallows iyibhukuqe emalanga namhlanje ukuba ikwazile ukubethwa iChippa United. UMngqithi ukhale ngokungasetyenziswa kakuhle kwentaphane yamathuba ngabadlali bakhe emdlalweni wayizolo. “Umdlalo ubunobunzima wona. Ebekhona amathuba ebekumele sivule ngawo umdlalo,” utshilo uMngqithi ethetha neSuperSport TV. 
“Okwenze kwanzima kuthi kukuba iCeltic ibihleli emva futhi ingasivumeli sigqithe. Amathuba esiwafumeneyo kwisigaba sokuqala ebemaninzi. Ube nelishwa uKermit Erasmus ngokungzuzi nto ngoba ngekwazile ukufaka amagowuli amathathu eyedwa. Siyakwamkela okwenzekileyo emdlalweni – kodwa ndiyavuma, besibuthunt  emdlalweni. Indlela esidlale ngayo ayikho kwizinga elamkelekileyo. Sidlale umdlalo obhetele emva kokwenza iinguqu kwisigaba sesibini somdlalo. Into esinokuyibulela kukuba akufakwanga gowuli kuthi futhi asikabethwa kule sizini,” utshilo uMngqithi. 
Abantu abaninzi basambomba nangoku kuFacebook ngenxa yokungavunywa kwegowuli leCeltic athe usompempe lifakwe ngumdlali olaleleyo kwabe kungekho njalo xa kuvezwa kumabonakude (TV). Umqeqeshi weCeltic, uJohn Maduka, uthe akakwazi ukuhlomla ngalo ngoba bona, babone ngathi umdlali weSiwelele ebelalele. Emidlalweni emihlanu kulo nyaka mtsha, iCeltic ayikaphumeleli namnye umdlalo kwaye ibethwe kabini.
title: UMngqithi uthi ‘Asikabethwa – kodwa besibuthuntu emdlalweni wayizolo’

text:
Bangaphezu kwamawaka amabini abemi beli loMzantsi Afrika abavaleleke kumazwe angaphandle ngenxa yesifo seKhorona. 
 Isebe elijongene nobudlelwane namazwe angaphandle kweli limanxadanxada lizama ukubuyisela eli qela eMzantsi Afrika.  
Ekupheleni kweveki ephelileyo ngabantu abalishumi elinesithandathu beli abathe bancedwa ngurhulumente ukubuyela ekhaya eMzantsi Afrika besuka eDubai.  
Othethela isebe elijongene nobudlelwane namazwe angaphandle uLunga Ngqengelele uthi benze oku emva kokufumana umyalelo.  
“Basebebaninzi abemi beli abakumazwe angaphandle. Eli iqela libuyiselwe ekhaya emva komyalelo kaMongameli uCyril Ramaphosa. Sithethana nemizi yozakuzo yoMzantsi Afrika imihla ngemihla,” kutsho uNgqengelele.  
Le ngxelo ithi ngamawaka amabini namakhulu amathathu abantu beli abavaleleke kumazwe angaphandle ngenxa yokuba ubomi bumile kuloo mazwe abakuwo. 
“Amakhulu asixhenxe namashumi amathathu ngabafundi, amakhulu amathandathu ngabasebenzi, amakhulu amane namashumi alithoba ngabatyeleli, ukanti abanye abakazichazi ukuba bebehambe besiya kwenzani kula mazwe,” kucacisa uNgqengelele.  
Kukho iingxelo zokuba kukho ishumi elinesithandathu elivaleleke eJamani nebekulindeleke ukuba ligalele kweli ekuqaleni kwale veki.  
“Ngokomyalelo kaMphathiswa uNaledi Pandor sigxile ngokukodwa kwabo badinga indlela yokuhamba kwizikhululo zeenqwelomoya, abafundi abakhutshelwe ngaphandle kweendawo zokuhlala ziiyunivesithi zehlabathi, kwakunye nabantu abadala nabo bangaphilanga,” kutsho uNgqengelele. 
Le ngxelo ithi urhulumente uzimisele ukubanceda nangaluphi uhlobo abemi beli abavaleleke kumazwe angaphandle ukuze babuyele ekhaya eMzantsi Afrika.  
Kukwakho iingxelo zokuba kukho isibini seli esele sikhulile esivaleleke kwilizwe laseMorocco, nesikuluhlu lwabo baza kuncedwa.  
Ukunikezela ngolwazi okanye ukufumana ulwazi ngesifo seKhorona, uluntu lungatsalela inombolo yasimahla engu 0800 029 999, okanye umyalezo othi ‘Hi’ kwinombolo kaWhatsApp ethi 0600 123 456. 
 URamaphosa ukuthethwano noMongameli waseRussia uVladimir Putin ekhangela uncedo kwela lizwe.  
“Ilizwe laseRussia sele lincede ilizwe laseChina, Italy neUS kumacebo okulwa neKhorona, ndimbhalele uMongameli Putin,” kucacisa uRamaphosa.
title: Bayadinga kumazwe angaphandle!

text:
“MHLA ndafa kwakuze kugcwale abantu abaninzi esingcwabeni sam bezokujonga ukuba ndifile na nyhani.” 
 
La mazwi athethwa nguNicholas Tilana Gcaleka (69) obhubhele kwisibhedlele saseMonti kwiveki ephelileyo emva kokugutyungelwa ngumhlaza wedlala lobudoda. 
 
Oku kuvakaliswe ngunyana kaGcaleka, uSandile Tilana, ngethuba kubanjwe umngcwabo weli tshantliziyo lemiba yenkcubeko eTeko Kona kuCentane ngoMgqibelo. 
 
Umlisela nomthinjane ubuphume ngendlu ukuza kuthi ndlelantle kuMbhambatho, igama ebesaziwa ngalo lo mfo wasemaTshaweni. 
 
UGcaleka waduma kakhulu ngonyaka ka1996 ngethuba ethatha uhambo oluya eBhritane esithi amanyange akubo avele ngephupha esithi makayokulanda intloko yeKumkani yamaXhosa uHintsa kaKhawuta, owabhubhela kumlambo iNqabara kuGatyana ngo1835 emva kokugetyengwa ngumkhosi wamaNgesi. Emva kokubulawa kwakhe uHintsa intloko yakhe yathathwa yasiwa eBhritane njengegugu lokuba abulewe amaXhosa. 
 
USandile Tilana uchaze uyise njengomntu obekrelekrele esebenza nzima.  
 
“Ebebathanda kakhulu abantu utata, eyithanda inkqubela. Apha kum ebesoloko esithi ‘molo Sandile ongenamfazi’. 
Ubude umve xa etala esithi ‘mhla ndabhubha kwakuze kugcwale abantu bezokujonga ukuba ndifile na,” utshilo uSandile Tilana. 
 
UMzwandile Ndzulwana owayehambe noMbhambatho ukuya kulanda intloko kaHintsa, uthi bayifumana le ntloko futhi yayigunyaziswe nangurhulumente wela lizwe. 
 
UNdzulwana, ongumthandazeli, uthi umntu othi intloko abeza nayo asiyiyo ekaHintsa makayokuphikisa la rhulumente waseBhritane. 
 
ULoyiso Nqevu weNkolo kaNtu, yena umchaze uGcaleka njengemboni, igqirha kwanenkcubabuchopho, esithi ibingumhlobo wakhe osenyongweni.
title: Mbhambatho: ‘Bazokujonga ukuba ndifile na’

text:
Amakhosi anyathelela phezulu emva kokukrolonqa ngeduku iTshakhuma Tsha Madzivhandila ayibethe ngemvula yamagowuli amathathu eqandeni emdlalweni weDStv Premiership obutaka iintlantsi eFNB Stadium ngenjikalanga yanamhlanje. Impumelelo yeKaizer Chiefs yanamhlanje yeyesithathu imidlalo ilandelela emva kwexesha elide isokola. Amakhosi aphakamise umdlalo wawo kwangoko kwisigaba sokuqala. 
Ngomzuzu weshumi elinethoba, uNkosingiphile Ngcobo ubhakuzelise umnatha ngebhola entle ayinikelwe nguSamir Nurkovic – oye wachongwa njengomdlali oqaqambileyo ekupheleni komdlalo. Emva koko, uGavin Hunt uye wanyanzeleka ukuba afake umdlali endaweni kaRamahlwe Mphahlele oye wonzakala. Idlale kakuhle nayo iTshakhuma Tsha nangona iibhola zayo bezingayi kuDaniel Akpeyi. 
IChiefs iye kwixesha lokuphumla ihamba phambili ngegowuli elinye emdlalweni obuthande ukubarhabaxa. ULebogang Manyama, ongene kwisigaba sesibini ufake igowuli lesibini, emva kokufumana ibhola entle kuHappy Mashiane – ongene endaweni kaNgcobo okhutshwe ngenxa yokonzakala. 
Idlale ngabadlali abangaphelelanga iTshakhuma ngenxa ka-Alfred Ndengane okhutshwe ngekhadi elibomvu emva kokudlala kakubi uNurkovic. UMashiane ubhalise igowuli lesithathu lomdlalo. Ngoku iChiefs ihleli kwindawo yesixhenxe, isuka kwindawo yeshumi elinambini phambi kokuphumelela imidlalo emithathu. Komnye umdlalo weDStv Premiership, iMamelodi Sundowns ibambene ngeqanda neBloemfontein Celtic emdlalweni obuseLucas Moripe Stadium.

TTM: Arubi, Lukhubeni, Ndengane, Mabotja, Nkili, Ndlondlo, Maphangule, Theron, Rakhale, Manaka, Lamola

title: Amakhosi ayikrolonqe ngenduku iTshakhulu Tsha Madzivhandila FC

text:
Le yincwadi evulekileyo endiyibhalela abahlekazi namakhosazana angabaphathi besikhululo sosasazo Umhlobo Wenene FM esikomkhulu laso liseBhayi, nesisasaza ngolwimi lwesiXhosa. 
Bhotani, nina zindwalutho ezingafanele kubhubha, endizihloniphe kakhulu kuba nithwele uxanduva lokusasaza nokufundisa isizwe esiNtsundu nezinye izizwe ezinomdla wokwazi ngenkcubeko yabaNtsundu ingakumbi eyamaXhosa. 
Imbangi yokuba ndinibhalele le ncwadi ivulekileyo yindima yenu entle eniyibonakalisileyo nivakalisa elubala ukuba anihambisani nobusela bokubiwa kwemisebenzi yabantu. Oku nikubonise ngethuba iimvumi zoMzantsi Afrika zaziqhankqalazela ukubiwa kwemisebenzi yazo yomculo eziyisebenzele nzima ziqamba iingoma, ekuthi ethubeni kuvele amanyangaza asebenzisa ubuchwepheshe bale mihla ayithengise ngexabiso eliphantsi kwizitalato zeli lizwe. 
Umba ondiphakamisileyo kukuba nina nihlonipheke ninjalo nithabathe indima yokuncedisa kubusela bokubiwa komsebenzi wam oqulathwe kwincwadi yam ethi, ‘Iziduko Zabantu Abathetha IsiXhosa,’ eyapapashwa ngo2003 nakwezinye iincwadi zam ezingamashumi amathathu ezixoxa ngeminombo yeziduko, amasiko nezithethe ezingezizwe ngezizwe zabaNtsundu eziphume ngo2011. 
Obu busela bokuba umsebenzi wam nibenze kwinkqubo yenu ebizwa “UMXHOLO” eniyiqhuba rhoqo ngentseni phakathi evekini eqhutywa ngumsasazi ekuthiwa unamava obizwa ngegama elithi Mnu. Siphiwo Magoda, (ngelishwa umqulunqi okanye umdidiyeli wale nkqubo andimazi). 
Obu busela benzeke amatyeli amabini mna ndimamele usasazo lwenu, andiqiniseki ukuba buphelele apho. UMnu. Siphiwo Magoda wenze udliwanondlebe nendoda ayibize nezichaze ngokuba nguMnu. Nkqubela Gqobo, esithi iyingcali yeziduko. Ngokwenene le ndoda iqhubekile kula matyeli isebenzisa ulwazi lwam ngeziduko isasaza emoyeni imana itshintsha iindawo ezincinci. 
Kwityeli lokugqibela ndiyimamele, le ndoda inguNkqubela Gqobo ibibizwe nini ukuba ize kuxelela abaphulaphuli benu ngesizwe samaNgutyana esisisizwe samaZotsho kuba kukho isithwalandwe esiliNgutyana esiswelekileyo. Le ndoda ifike yafunda umsebenzi wam opapashiweyo oxoxa ngesizwe samaNgutyana. 
Kwakhona nina kumnatha wenu wonxibelelwano ekuthiwa https//m.facebook com/mhlobowenenefm/posts/1776859092367033 le ndoda inguMnu. Nkqubela Gqobo niyayibanga njengomntu wenu onisebenzelayo. Nibhale nathi: UMXHOLO 1: UBUYILE UMBANDELA ONGEMVELAPHI YEZIDUKO NGEENKANUKO ZABAPHULAPHULI. ULAPHA UMNUMZANA GQOBO OYINCUTSHE… 
Ndingathanda ukunazisa ukuba uluvo ngokusasazwa kweziduko lwaqalwa ndim kwisikhululo sosasazo esabhangayo iRadio Transkei. Ngenxa yobuchwepheshe bam bokuthutha nokulanda imilibo yabantu bezizwe ngezizwe umsasazi osaphilayo uMnu.N.N. Yapi wandipha isiqhulo esithi, ‘Ingcali yeziduko’. Kwakhona ngowe1999 ukuya kowe2009 ndasabela isimemo kwiziko lenu Umhlobo Wenene FM ndanisasazela iziduko, amasiko nezithethe zabaNtsundu kwinkqubo zenu ezintathu ezi zezi: Twelf Down, Ezemfundo, Ukholo Lwemveli. 
Ndiphinde ndabizwa ngabasasazi abangaphambili bale nkqubo yenu ithi, ‘Umxholo,’ ukuba ndize kuphendula ngobukumkani bamaZulu, isizwe samaMfengu, nembali ngeentaba. 
Iyandothusa ke ngoku ukuba ningazi ukuba ukuthabathela kuwe uluvo lomntu BUBUSELA obungaphaya obubizwa iPLAGIARISM kwiinkundla zomthetho. Isichazimagama iOxford Advanced Learner’s Dictionary obu bututu nibenzayo ibutolika ngolu hlobo: “To copy another person’s ideas, words or work and pretend that they are your own.” 
Le ndoda nide nayinika isiqhulo sam esithi ‘Ingcali Yeziduko’ njengoko umsasazi wenu uMnu. Siphiwo Magoda eyibiza. Ndiza kuba ngubani esam isiqhulo ngoku, okanye ndiza kuba yingcali yantoni? Ngaba umqulunqi/umdidiyeli wale nkqubo ithi ‘Umxholo’ wazi njani ngale ndoda inguNkqubela Gqobo isebenzisa umsebenzi wam kwisikhululo senu? 
Ndingathanda ukunazisa ukuba ndichithe izigidi zeerandi ngokwemali yoMzantsi Afrika ndiqokelela lo msebenzi weziduko nina enithe nagqiba ekuthini niwuchithe niwenze owenu ngemini enye. Enide naqwela nixelela ihlabathi ukuba nibuye nengcali yenu. 
Ndithanda ukunazisa ukuba ewe lilungelo lakhe nawuphi umntu ukuphanda ngomba awuthandayo kodwa kufuneka evakalise elubala ukuba uphando lwakhe ulwenza njani, kwafuthi izeziphi iingcali esele zikhe zalenza elo linge. Kwaye kufuneka exelile ukuba uza kwahluka kanjani kuzo. 
Ndigqibe ekubeni lo mba ndiqale ndinixelele kwiphephandaba uviwe lilizwe njengokuba ndiza kuwusa ezinkundleni zomthetho.
title: Isikhululo sosasazo Umhlobo Wenene FM lisela

text:
UKUBA ungumntu omtsha ofuna ukungena kwezoshishino, zibandakanye neRural Youth Health and Social Enterprise Development Indaba eChalumna eMonti ngoMgqibelo. Le Indaba izakubanjelwa eXhamini eChalumna eMonti ngentsimbi yeshumi elinanye.  
Ezinye zeenjongo kukuqulunqwa koluhlu (database) yabo bafuna ukuzibandakanya kwezoshishino. “Selukhona ulutsha olusebenzisana noluntu kumashishini alo enza iinwele, izikroxo ezithengisa utywala, iispaza shop.  Sifuna ukubadibanisa ngokwezakhono abanazo; umzekelo ezolimo, abenzi beenwele, capentery, plumbing, njalo-njalo sibajongele inkxaso esinoyifumana. Uninzi lolutsha lunazo izakhono kodwa aluyazi ukuba lungalufumana phi uncedo,” itshilo ingxelo kumbutho kwiZanoncedo. “Lukhona ulutsha olunezizakhono qha akukho nkxaso luyifumanayo. Abanye banesakhono sePlumbing, umthungo, ukwenza iinwele, umculo, ubugcisa kodwa abazi bazakwenza ntoni. Ngcono uyokhangela umsebenzi ngeso sakhono sakho,” itsho ingxelo. Le Youth Indaba ifuna ukuxelela ulutsha ngentsebenziswano phakathi kwemibutho ezabe iphaya neChalumna ngeenkqubo ezikhoyo, uphuhliso lwezezimali noshishino emakhaya. 
Xa ulutsha lubuzwa ukuba akhona na amathuba abawafumanayo aphuhlisa izakhono bakwazi ubanamashishini bathe: “Akho kwalo mathuba apha. Siye sifumane loo misebenzi mhlawumni ukupheka esikolweni okanye ukwenza indlela kuphela, uphele nalo msebenzi. Sube izokwenziwa yinkampani yalo ndawo lo nto thina siqeshwe apho qha. Asazi noba singenza njani ukuze sibe nokufumana amathuba oba nawethu amashishini.” 
Omnye olivolontiya kule projekthi yeZanoncedo uthe: “Thina sincedwa kukufumana ulwazi kule project sifunda lukhulu ngoba siya kuqeqesho, sikhe silime ngamanye amaxesha, nangoku senza iiComputer, senze nemimye imisebenzi yezandla.”
title: Rural Youth Health and Social Enterprise Development Indaba

text:
Le mpelaveki iza kube ixakeke kakhulu eMonti ngenxa yeetumente zamanqindi ezimbini.  
Eyokuqala iza kusingathwa yiXaba Promotions kwiholo lase-ICC, eyesibini isingathwe yiRumble Africa Promotions eOrient Theatre.  
Umlo ophambili kwitumente yeXaba uphakathi kwentshatsheli yeIBO kwihlabathi, uGideon Buthelezi, oza kube ekhusela kuLucas Fernandez waseArgentina.  
UYanga Sigqibo waseZiphunzane uza kujijisana ngebhanti leWBC elingenamntu noRenie Dacquel wasePhillipines.  
UNtlantla Ngamntwini waseZiphunzane udibana no-Ulises Lara waseMexico, yomithathu imilo ikudidi lweJuniorBantam. 
KwiWelterweight * -Uyanda Nongogo waseMdantsane ungquzulana noAziz Uliza kumlo we-IBF Youth engenamntu.  
Itumente ineminye imilo emithathu eza kutaka iintlantsi equka ophakathi kukaLuyanda Ntwanambi noDalisizwe Komani.  
Umququzeleli weXPE, uAyanda Matiti, uthi impumelelo yabafana bakhe iza kubabeka endaweni entle.  
“Ndineenjongo zokubalwisa imilo emikhulu ngaphezu kwale aba bafana. Kubalulekile ukuba bayiphumelele imilo. Ukuba uphumelele uLuyanda Ntwanambi uza kulwela intshinga yoMzantsi Afrika kwimpukane ungaphelanga unyaka – kodwa njengoko benditshilo, funeka aphumelele lo mlo,” utshilo uMatiti. 
Umlo ophambili, uAzinga Fuzile uza kuxhimfana noWaidi Usman waseNigeria kwi-IBF Afrika. 
 UPhila Mpontshane waseMdantsane ubeka intshinga yakhe esichengeni kumlo wakhe noKoos Sibiya. UKhanyile Bulana uvana amandla noTello Lithebe waseFreyistata kumlo wentshinga eshiywe nguFuzile.  
Kudidi lwengcongolo kukho impinda yomlo ophakathi kwentshatsheli yoMzantsi Afrika, uXolisa Magusha oqubisana noAyanda Ndulani. 
 Isithethi seRAP, uMfesane Nyathela, ubongoze abalandeli bamanqindi ukuba bafike ngethuba.  
“Ikwizinga eliphezulu itumente, abalandeli kuza kufuneka bafike ngethuba ngoba iyaqala ngentsimbi yesibini entloko,” utshilo uNyathela.
title: Inye iveki yile, kuza kubethwa umntu eMonti!

text:
Iintliziyo zabadlali bePolokwane City zityumkile emva kokubethwa yiMamelodi Sundowns izolo – kodwa akukho ntlungu eyodlula ukonzakaliswa komdlali ngeShibobo alifakwe nguThemba Zwane. Esi siganeko senzeke ekunene, uZwane uthe gqi nebhola ayinyengeza phakathi kwemilenze yomdlali weCity ohlabe ngentloko phantsi emva kokungayiboni ibhola. Amasandawana bethe iPolokwane ngamagowuli amabini (2-0) kumdlalo we-Absa Premier Soccer League obumhle kakhulu ePeter Mokaba Stadium. Amagowuli weDowns afakwe Ricardo Nascimento noLebo Maboe. Ngoku iSundowns ihleli kwindawo yesibini kwiPSL, ilandela iBidvest Wits ebethe iKaizer Chiefs ngo’3-1 kumdlalo obuseFNB Stadium. 
UZwane ubancomile oogxa bakhe emva komsebenzi omhle abawenzileyo izolo. Le ndedeba ichongwe njengomdlali oqaqambileyo emdlalweni wayizolo. “Ndifuna ukubulela oogxa bam nabaqeqeshi abandinike ithuba lokudlala. Sidlale kakuhle kakhulu namhlanje. Besiwadinga amanqaku amathathu kakhulu. Nam ndidlale kakuhle – kodwa zisekhona iindawo ekufuneka ndizilungise,” utshilo uZwane kwiTV emva komdlalo. 
UZwane umqhabele izandla uLebohang Maboe obenomdlalo omhle okwafake negowuli lesibini leSundowns.
title: Ihlabe ngentloko phantsi indoda emva kweShibobo likaZwane

text:
Uhambo lwam nani lufikelele esiphelweni namhlanje. Mandithathe elithuba zihlobo ndibulele intsebenziswano kolu hambo bendikulo kunye nani, uthando olungaka. Noba bendibhala ndodwa nje, kodwa bendingendodwa. Qho ndibhala bendisiba nawe engqondweni. Kube kuhle kakhulu andifuni nokuxoka. Ndibhala eli nqaku nje ide ingathi ndiyanibona ngeliso lenyama, ndizenzela umfanekiso ngqondweni. 
Ndifunde izinto ezininzi kakhulu ngeli xeshanyana sikunye zinto ezo bendingasoze ndizazi uba bendinganikwanga ithuba lokwabelana nani ngokusentliziyweni yam. Ndifunde ngam, ndafunda ngani, ngaphezu kwezinto zonke ndafunda ngezimo ezohlukeneyo zamakhaya ngamakhaya.  
Apho ndihamba khona bekubakho into efuna ukwazi banzi ngekhaya elo. Into endishiyeke nayo kukuba; bayabulaleka abantu esiphila nabo futhi ezinye zezinto ababulaleka zizo ayizonto ezingabonwa ngemehlo le nyama. 
Kuyo yonke ke lo nto, abanye benu endibazi ngeliphepha ide yangathi ndiyabazi ubuso ngobuso, phofu sazana ngembalelwano nakula makhasi. Ndibulela ngembalelwano zenu, utshintsho olwenzekileyo nolusaqhubekayo ukwenzeka kumakhaya ngamakhaya.  
Akukho nto imnandi njengokuba negalelo ebomini bomntu ngakumbi umntu ongamaziyo nongazalaniyo naye, ndingatsho ukuba abo sizalana nabo masingabahoyi qha ndicinga ukuba sesihleli sibahoya kakade. 
Ndiyathemba ukuba imfundiso ebesisabelana ngazo apha nizithathe nazigcina koovimba benu, kwaye ndinethemba elikhulu lokuba ngokufunda kwakho eli phepha, esi sibhalo kulo nyaka udlulileyo uye wenza utshintsho ebomini bakho.  
Bakhona ke abantu ebebeye bandibhalele, sithi chuu ukuncedana ngazo zonke indlela esinako ukuncedana ngazo. Ubudlelwane nabantu busondele kakhulu entliziyweni yam ngakumbi emakhayeni esiphuma kuwo. Akukho nto inokuze ibentle kwindawo esihlala kuzo singaqalanga emakhayeni ethu. Kwaye ngendlela endibona ngayo ubunzima buya bubheka pha. Kodwa ke asinakuncama ngenxa yalo nto. 
Kubazali: Mandigqibelise ukuthetha nani kweli qonga ngamazwi athi; le ndlela umntwana wakho umkhulisa ngayo, uzakubayiyo ke. Ungaba nomntwana okanye abantwana, lo nto ithi awusenzi izinto ngendlela obuzenza ngayo. 
Ubomi abusekho ngawe qha kwaye into yoba ucinge umntwana usemncinci ayisebenzi, nyaniseka kubantwana bakho kude kube sekupheleni.  
Kubazali abakhulisa abantwana bodwa: Umntwana angakhe alinge abelixhoba lokungavani kwenu ningabazali. Umntwana angavinjwa ithuba lokwazi umzali wakhe. Ngamaxesha onke funeka ukhumbule le ukuba akazikhethelanga ukuza emhlabeni, nini ningabazali.  
Kungakuhle ukuba nimnike ithuba azithathele isigqibo. Kubantwana; xabisani nihloniphe abazali benu. Uba usenomzali zibalele ekuthini unethamsanqa. 
Endaweni yokuba ukhalale ikhaya ngenxa yokwenza komzali, funa uncedo. Akukho ngxaki ingena sisombululo, kuxhomekeka ukuba isisombululo usifuna phi. Funa ingcebiso kwindawo nakubantu abanolwazi. 
Ndibulele kubaphathi nabasemagunyeni kweli phephandaba ngethuba lokuphuhlisa isakhono sam sokubhala, nawo onke amanye amathuba aye avuleka ngenxa yokundithemba kwabo ukuba ndinako ukuwenza lo msebenzi. Ubomi bam abusoze buphinde bubenje ngakuqala. Umntu noko ngoku uthe ‘qwa’. Kangangokuba sendiyithathele kwelinye inqanaba yonke le nto yokubhala, zininzi izinto eziye zazalwa kokubhalela eli phephandaba. 
Yilo nto kubalulekile ukuba xa umntu efumana ithuba alisebenzise ngoku ixesha lisavuma, ngokuba asazi ukuba sinexesha elingakanani. Akukhonto ingapheliyo ‘engapheliyo iyahlola’. Lithiwa ndim, mayithi iphela noba yintoni na le ubambe kuyo okanye isakuncumisayo, mayiphele ungenasikrokro ngoba uba unesikrokro uyakubanobukrakra, ungabinaxolo andiqondi ke ukuba yinto oyifunayo leyo. 
Ukuba ndithi andizunikhumbula ingaba ndiyaxoka. Kuthiwa ke, xa kuvalwa lo umnyango ukhona ovulwayo. Noba awuvulwanga soze kungabikho nefestile evuliweyo. Side sibuye sihlangane! 
Ngeenkcukacha: katomnoku@gmail.com, 079 284 1757
title: Ndibulela kwintsebenziswano

text:
Umqeqeshi omtsha weqela loMzantsi Afrika kwiqakamba, u-Ottis Gibson, wenze ilizwi okokuqala ngeli qela azakuliqeqesha. Lo kaGibson unikwe uxanduva lokuqeqesha iProteas kwiveki ephelileyo yiCricket South Africa. Emva kokubeka phantsi ngokusesikweni njengomqeqeshi wabadlali abajula iqakamba kwiqela lesizwe laseNgilane kutshanje. Le ndedeba yakwaGibson yenze amazwi ngezinto ezilindeleyo xa igaleleka eMzantsi Afrika. Oyena mba uphambili ngoku kwiCricket South Afrika ziinguqu nophuhliso lwabadlali abamnyama. 
“Umba wenguqu ubuchatshazelwe futhi ngumgaqo-nkqubo kaRhulumente. Akukho nto endinokuyitshintsha ke apho, kufuneka ndisebenza ngayo qha. Njengokuba ndingenokuyitshintsha – kodwa ndiyazi ukuba kutheni kukho lo mgaqo-nkqubo,” utshilo uGibson. 
Ephawula kumba wabadlali abakhetha ukudlalela amaqela aseYurophu, uGibson uthe: “Xa ucinga ngoMzantsi Afrika kuthi qatha engqondweni abadlali abahambileyo kube kukho namahum-hum ngabanye abadlali abasafuna ukuhamba. Wonke umdlali uzakuthi isigqibo asithathayo sikholisekile kusapho lwakhe. Xa abantu besithi ababadlali bahamba kuba bengafumani amathuba – akukho nto ingako endinokuyenza mna njengomqeqeshi. Yinto leyo efanele ukuqwalaselwa yiCSA. Okwam kukusebenza nabadlali abakhoyo kuphela ndizame nokuphumelela imidlalo.” 
Njengokuba amazwe adlala iqakamba elungiselela indebe yehlabathi ezakube ingo-2019, lo mqeqeshi uthi uMzantsi Afrika yenye yezinto ephambili ukubuya nendebe kwaye ukwathi akaboni sizathu sakungaphumeleli ngo-2019.
title: UGibson uthethe okokuqala ngeProteas

text:
Amaqela amabini adlale ngeyona ndlela incomekayo kwisizini ka2017/18 afumana ithuba lokulwela isityhwentywe sezigidi ezisixhenxe zonke zerandi (R7-million).  
Iqela laseMgungundlovu, iMaritzburg United, liza kudibana neFree State Stars kumdlalo weNedbank Cup okulindeleke ukuba utak’iintlantsi eCape Town Stadium ngentsimbi yesixhenxe ngorhatya ngoMgqibelo.  
Ukusiwa komdlalo wokugqibela weNedbank Cup kwaqhwatyelwa izandla futhi kwavuyelwa ngabantu baseKapa ngoba inexesha elide ingalinikwa ithuba lokusingatha imidlalo ebalulekileyo efana nalo.  
Njengokuba la maqela mabini esilwela indebe, aya kulo mdlalo wempelaveki ezimisele ngeyona ndlela. IFree State Stars yagqibela ngo’94 ngethuba iphumelela indebe yeCoca Cola – kanti yona iTeam of Choice zange yayifumana indebe kwimiyaka elishumi elinesihlanu idlala kwiPSL. 
Enye into enika umdla ngakumbi ngalo mdlalo uzayo kukuba amaqela aqeqeshwa nguFadlu Davids noLuc Eymael – abanye babaqeqeshi abenze umsebenzi omhle kakhulu kwiPSL kwisizini ka2017/18.  
IMaritzburg United ibethe amaqela afana neMamelodi Sundowns, iBloemfontein Celtic neRoyal Eagles ukuze ifikelele kumdlalo wokugqibela.  
IFree State yona izibethe amaqela afana neKaizer Chiefs, Ubuntu Cape Town neChippa United. Nangona la maqela engenabalandeli abaninzi – kodwa indlela adlala ngayo kakuhle kulindeleke ibe yiyo etsala abalandeli bebhola ekhatywayo. 
 Umdlali weUnited, uSiyanda Xulu, uxelele iSolezwe ukuba iqela lakhe liwulungele ngokupheleleyo umdlalo weNedbank. 
“Lona umdlalo ubalulekile kuthi. Ndifuna ukwenza kakuhle kuwo ukuze liphumelele iqela. Akukho nto siza kuyitshintsha kwindlela esiqhele ukudlala ngayo. Ukuphumelela kwethu indebe kwakusinika uvuyo olukhulu. Ndim noBevan Fransman kuphela abanamava wokudlala kwimidlalo yamagqibela kankqoyi. Lo nto ithetha ukuthi yinto enkulu kakhulu kwabanye abadlali,” utshilo uXulu. 
UFransman noXulu kulindeleke benze umahluko ngenxa yamava abawafumene kumaqela abawadlalela kwiminyaka eyadlulayo.
title: Leliphi eliya kugoduka neR7-m yeNedbank?

text:
UMKOMISHINALA wamaPolisa eMpuma Koloni, uLt Nomthetheleli Mene ukugxeke kabukhali ukubulawa kabuhlungu kwentwazana eminyaka emihlanu (5) yaseMnyameni (Alexandria). 
Umzimba wale ntwazana ufunyenwe endlwini kamalume wayo kwisitalato iPendu kwilokishi yakwaNonkqubela. 
UColonel Priscilla Naidu uthi amapolisa abikelwe ngumrhanelwa buqu nongumalume wale ntwazana ekuseni namhlanje ukuba kukho umntu obethwayo endlwini yakhe. 
Uthi ekufikeni kwawo amapolisa afumene umzimba womntwana oyintombazana ominyaka mihlanu ebethelwe oogqirha nezicaka, ethe tywa phantsi kwigumbi lokuphumla. 
UCol Naidu uthi umrhanelwa ebenxile ekwiqondo lokugqibela, ingavakali nento ayithethayo. 
“Ixhoba, uSiphenathi Xhali ebenamanxeba aliqela emzimbeni wakhe. Kurhaneleka ukuba ubulewe ngomhlakulo , othe wafumaneka kwisiza sikammelwane. Kukwarhaneleka ukuba umntwana lo kungenzeka ukuba udlwengulwe. Uqhaqho lomzimba lakwenziwa ukuze kube oko kuyangqinisiswa,” kutsho uCol Naidu. 
Kuvakala ukuba lo mntwana uthathwe kwammelwane ekuseni namhlanje. Kutyholwa ukuba umama wakhe ebemse kulotata wakhe ngoLwesihlanu (izolo) emva kwemini kwakule ngingqi. 
Kutyholwa ukuba utata lowo uye wamshiya kwammelwane umntwana. 
Umrhanelwa onama43 eminyaka ubudala ubanjelwe ukubulala. Kulindeleke avele kwinkundla kamantyi yaseKenton- On-Sea ebutsheni beveki ezayo. Kusalindwe iziphumo zoqhaqho lomzimba ukuze kongezwe ityala lokudlwengula.
title: Umalume ubanjelwe ukubulala umtshana (5) ngomhlakulo

text:
Umqeqeshi weKaizer Chiefs, uSteve Komphela, ubonakalise ukuzithemba okungamangalisa emva kokwamkela abadlali abatsha kwiveki ephelileyo.  
Abantu bayazibuza inoba kutheni kunjalo emva kokuba iqela lakhe libuye nelize kwisizini ephelileyo.  
Impendulo nantsi: uKomphela unikwa inkxaso epheleleyo yiChiefs, ukusukela kubadlali abafunayo ukuya kubaqeqeshi afuna ukusebenza nabo kule sizini izayo – kwenziwa lento ayifunayo.  
Kwiveki ephelileyo, Amakhosi, abhengeze esidlangalaleni abadlali abasibhozo abazakuthi bathwaliswe uxanduva lokubuyisa isidima sawo kwisizini ezayo. Kuzo zonke ezo zigqibo zithathwe yiChiefs – ilizwi liphume kuye uKomphela.  
“Bendiyinxalenye yabo bebekhangela abadlali, ndim obenika umkhombandlela. Kwisizini ephelileyo ndisebenzise abadlali endifike benethuba elide belapha – kodwa kule isizini, lukhona utshintsho,” utshilo uKomphela. 
Nangona kukho iimbuso ezintsha lo mqeqeshi uthi umceli-mngeni neenjongo zeqela lakhe azitshintshanga. “Izinto ekufuneka ndizenzile kwisizini entsha ziyafana nangoku bendifika – kodwa ke ngoku kufuneka ndiqokelele abadlali babeyimbumba ngokukhawuleza. Kufuneka ndibahlanganise ngokukhawuleza ukuze sizokwazi ukufumana iziphumo ngokukhawuleza kwisizini ezayo,” utshilo uKomphela. 
Kwisizini edlulileyo, lo mqeqeshi unyamezele uxinizelelo phantse yonke isizini – khange anikezele kodwa noxa bekulukhuni.  
Ngoku abalandeli bazakulindela izinto ezingcono kune sizini ka-2015/16. 
 “Andikoyiki ukuphulukana nomsebenzi, soze uthi iFerrari ikunika eyona moto igqwesileyo uyale kuba usoyika ukungaphumeleli umdyarho xa kubalekiswa. Ibhola ekhatywayo ifuna abantu abanesibindi. Endaweni yokoyika, ndinethemba lokuphumelela kule nto ndiyenzayo,” utsho ngokuzithemba okukhulu uKomphela. 
Phakathi kwabadlali abatsha eNaturena kukho uRamahlwe Mphahlele, Sibusiso Khumalo noKeagan Buchanan.  
UKomphela uthi ukusebenza nabantu abatsha kumnika ithemba.  
Amakhosi kulindeleke azivavanye kumdlalo weCarling Black Label ophakathi kwawo ne-Orlando Pirates ekupheleni kwale nyanga eFNB Stadium.
title: Uzithembe ngakumbi uKomphela

text:
KULINDELEKE ukuba lixoxwe ngoLwesihlanu ityala letshantliziyo uVusi Mahlangu obanjwe ngezityholo zokuphazamisa ingalo yomthetho ekwenzeni umsebenzi wayo. 
UMahlangu ebevele enkundleni eMthatha ngoLwesihlanu. Ngethuba evela enkundleni umbuso ucele ukwandiselwa ixesha nanjengoko ubusafuna elinye ithuba lokuhlola ubume beenkcukacha zakhe.  
Iingxelo zithi uMahlangu uxelele umphandi wetyala ukuba wakhe wagwetyelwa ityala elinye, kodwa iinkcukacha zamapolisa zibonakalisa ukuba sele ebanjwe amatyeli amathathu ubuncinane. Umtshutshisi uThembisa Ntloko ufake isicelo sokumiswa kweli ityala kodwa umantyi uMac Pauzi ubonakalise ukungonekiseki sesi sicelo.  
Umphandi wetyala uKapteni Nceba Mdebuka uthe, kusamele aye eMpumalanga ayoqinisekisa ngedilesi kaMahlangu kwikhaya lakhe lokuzalwa. 
 Ukwathe umrhanelwa akanikezelanga ngesazisi sakhe lo gama esebenzisa imihla yokuzalwa emithathu ubuncinane.  
Igqwetha likaMahlangu uBayethe Mahlangu uthi ukumiswa kweli tyala kwakhona ngesizathu esinye yindlela nje yokugcina umrhanelwa entolongweni. 
UMahlangu uvele enkundleni ezichebile iiDreadlocks zakhe. Le ndedeba yabanjwa libutho lamapolisa iiHawks kwiveki ephelileyo.  
Ukubanjwa kwakhe kulandela ukuduka kwakhe ngethuba esiya kwindibano yabasebenzi baseWSU eMthatha.
title: UMahlangu uzakucela ibheyile

text:
Amakhosi abuyise iinkumbulo zakudala ngethuba ecambalalisa iChippa United ngamagowuli amane kwamabini (4-2) emdlalweni weNedbank Cup obutshisa bhe eNelson Mandela Bay Stadium ebusuku namhlanje. Ngoku iKaizer Chiefs iza kudibana neTS Galaxy emdlalweni wokugqibela kwinyanga ezayo. Amashumi amabini amawaka abalandeli agoduke exolile emva kokubukela umdlalo osemgangathweni ophezulu oveliswe yiChippa neChiefs. Kuthe xa kubonakala okokuba umhlaba uyenyuka; uWillard Katsande, uKhama Billiat – besebenzisana noAndriamirdo Andrianamanana – baqinisekise ukuba nokuba kwenzeka ntoni – kodwa iChiefs iyaphumelela. Kuye kwanyanzeleka uErnst Middendorp afake uDumisani Zuma, ofike wafaka igowuli, endaweni kaKabelo Mahlasela oye wonzakala emdlalweni. 
Emva komdlalo obumhle kwisiqingatha sokuqala, Amakhosi aye kwixesha lokuphumla ehamba phambi ngegowuli elinye eqandeni. UDumisani Zuma ubhakuzelise umnatha emva kokuba unozinti weChippa United, uMbongeni Mzimela, ebhutyuze ibhola endaweni embi emzuzwini wamashumi amathathu anesixhenxe. Umdlali wasesiswini kwiChiefs, uAdriamirado Andrianamanana, utsale imbumbulu yebhola ethe qelele kwimizuzu yokuqala – kodwa ngelishwa lakhe, iphume phezu kwepali. Abadlali beChippa basemva uZitha Macheke, uFrederic Nsabiyumva noGladwin Shitolo babenexesha elinzima kakhulu – kodwa bazamile ukunqanda abadlali abayingozi abafana noKhama Billiat noKabelo Mahlasele – oye wakhutshwa emva kokonzakala okumasikizi. Noxa iChippa ibihlasela kakuhle ngoThabo Rakhale – kodwa yena uKurt Lentjies ebengabonakali kwaphela. 
UMzimela uphinde waxakeka kwakhona zisuka kwisigaba sesibini. UBilliat, uDax noZuma bebezama indlela yokufumana igowuli lokuphumelela umdlalo. Noxa iChiefs ibihlasela ngamandla nakwisiqingatha sesibini – kodwa umdlalo weChippa United ubenako ukuphucuka. Khange bakholelwe abalandeli uBilliat ephosa ithuba  ejongene noMzimela. Ukapteni weChippa, u-Andile Mbenyane, ufake igowuli lokulinganisa emzuzwini wamashumi asixhenxe anesithathu. Umdlalo weChippa uye watshintsha emva kokufumana igowuli ngoba abadlali bebebona ukuba ikhona into abangayifumana kwakhona xa behlasela. ULerato Manzini ufake igowuli lesibini emva kwebhola entle ayinikelwe nguThabo Rakhale. UDax uphendule ngokufaka elakhe emva kokunikelwa ibhola nguZuma. UBernard Parker ufake igowuli lesithathu. Khange kube kudala, uBilliat ufake elesine ekude. Amakhosi awuphumelele umdlalo.
title: Amakhosi aya emdlalweni wokugqibela emva kokucambalalisa iChippa United

text:
Nakubeni bekulindelwe kutak’ iintlantsi kumdlalo obuphakathi kweFrance neDenmark – akubanga njalo emva kokuba umdlalo uphele kungekho lizwe elikwazileyo ukubhalisa ebhodini eLuzhniki Staium namhlanje. Omabini amazwe aye emdlalweni namhlanje esezindaweni ezintle – lo nto yenze kwangabikho kothuka yindlela izinto ezenzeke ngayo eLuzhniki Stadium. Emva kokuphumelela imidlalo emibini yokuqala, umqeqeshi weFrance, uDidier Deschamps, ukhethe ukungabaqalisi umdlalo abadlali bakhe abaphambili abafana noPaul Pogba, uKylian Mbappe noHugo Lloris namhlanje. 
Abadlali beDenmark bankqonkqoze kwangoko kwiipali zikanozinti weFrance – kodwa into abangakwazanga ukuyenza kukufaka igowuli. Bekubonakala ukuba iFrance ayinabo abadlali bayo abaphambili. Bekungekho mfutho oqhelekileyo kumdlalo wayo. Emva kokuphela kwesigaba sokuqala kungekho nto ebhodini, uDeschamps ukhuphe u-Antoine Griezmann, endaweni yakhe ufake uNabil Fekir. 
IFrance, enethemba lokuya kwimidlalo yokugqibela kwindebe yehlabathi yalo nyaka, ivale imidlalo kaGroup C ihleli phezulu. Emva kwayo ibe yiDenmark ebidlala nayo namhlanje.
title: IFrance neDenmark zihleli phezulu kuGroup C

text:
KUBONAKALA ngathi kusekuncinane okwenziwa ngurhulumente ekuxhobiseni abasebenzi malunga neendlela abanokuzilandela okanye bazibike izehlo zobuqhetseba nobuqhophololo xa bezibona zisenzeka. 
Kubasebenzi bakarhulumente abathethe nephephandaba I’solezwe, akekho nomnye oyaziyo ukuba angabika phi na xa ebona isenzo sobuqhetseba nobuqhophololo. 
Oku kwenzeka nangona nje intloko yooKhetshe (Hawks) uLieutenant-General Berning Ntlemeza exelele amalungu asePalamente ukuba amagosa karhulumente waseMpuma Koloni angamashumi asixhenxe anesithandathu (76) aphandwa ngezehlo zobuqhophololo obuxabisa imali engange-R143 yezigidi zeerandi (R143m). 
Le ngxelo ibithiwe thaca ePalamente ngomhla weshumi elinesine kwinyanga ephelileyo. 
Osebenza njengotitshala kweli phondo, uthi akayazi ukuba zibikwa phi izehlo zobuqhophololo. “Andiwazi owona mnyango wokubika ubuqhophololo ngaphandle kokuhlebela oonondaba okanye amalungu esigqeba solawulo sesikolo (SGB). Kodwa inkxalabo yeyokuba, ayinakuyifihla lo nto iSGB?” kubuza le titshala. 
Osebenza njengonontlalontle uthi naye akawazi owona mnyango wokubika ubuqhophololo. “Andazi ukuba zibikwa phi izehlo zobuqhophololo kuba akekho umntu owakhe wasicacisela ngoko.” 
Igosa lakwamasipala kweli phondo, nalo lithi alazi ukuba zibikwa njani izehlo zobuqhophololo. “Kudala zisenzeka ndizibona qha andiyazi eyona ndlela yokuzibika,” litshilo eligosa. 
Osebenza kwisebe lezempilo uthe: “Andiyazi ukuba ndingazibika njani kuba nalomapolisa ngala avele aphinde axele ukuba ebeve ngabani.” 
Ngokwengxelo efunyenwe liphephandaba I’solezwe kumasebe amane aseMpuma Koloni, zimalunga namashumi amathathu anesihlanu izehlo zobuqhophololo nobuqhetseba ezithe zabikwa kule minyaka mibini idlulileyo. 
Isithethi sesebe lemisebenzi yoluntu nezendlela uMphumzi Zuzile uthi zibalelwa kumashumi amabini anesithandathu izehlo zobuqhophololo ezithe zabikwa ngokumayelana neli sebe kule minyaka mibini idlulileyo. 
“Isebe lisebenzisa inombolo yokuchasana nobuqhophololo kazwelonke (National Anti-Corruption Hotline 0800 701 701) ukubika izehlo zobuqhophololo. Sikwanawo nomgaqo-nkqubo wokukhuthaza ukuba abasebenzi babike izehlo zobuqhopholo bengenaloyiko lokuba bazakuchazwa,” kutsho uZuzile. 
Isithethi kwisebe lohlaliso loluntu uLwandile Sicwetsha uthi kwisebe labo zisixhenxe izehlo zobuqhopholo ezithe zabikwa kwinombolo engu-0800 701 701.  
UMamnkeli Ngam osisithethi sesebe lentsebenziswano kurhulumento uthi zibini kuphela izehlo zobuqhophololo ezithe zabikwa ngokumayelana neli sebe kule minyaka mibini idlulileyo. 
Isithethi kwisebe lezemidlalo, ulonwabo, ubugcisa nenkcubeko uAndile Nduna uthi icandelo labo lowulo-mingcipheko (Risk Management Unit) lilo elijongene nezehlo zobuqhetseba nobuqhophololo.  
Isithethi kurhulumente wephondo uSizwe Kupelo uthi inombolo kaMongameli Jacob Zuma ethi 17737 ingasetyenziswa ukubika izehlo zobuqhophololo nobuqhetseba. 
Amasebe aseMpuma Koloni – elezempilo, elezemfundo, elophuhliso loluntu, elezothutho, elophuhliso lamaphandle nelophuhliso lezoqoqosho – akavumanga ukuphefumla ngeenkqubo zawo ezimayelana nokujongana nomba wobuqhophololo nobuqhetseba. 
sithandiwe.velaphi@inl.co.za
title: Abayazi ukuba bubikwa phi ubuqhophololo

text:
